
1a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos bskor las gsang sgrub gsang ba'i las byang sha ba ri pas mdzad pa bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mahA kA la sh+ri a d+hiSh+Tha wa ti sa ta na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po byin brlabs
1b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ myur mdzad mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa'i chos tshul
1b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sgrub pa'i sgrub pa po chen pos mi dang mi ma yin pa gnod pa rab kyis dge ba'i bar du gcod pa byung na/ /dge sbyor nyid kyi
1b4(rgyud 'grel): bar chad gsal ba'i phyir/ /dpal mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs 'di ltar bya ste/ /gnas dben pa bzang por
2a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po nag po chen po'i rten rdzas dang/ mchod rdzas la sogs pa phyi rten nang rten dgos pa'i yo
2a2(rgyud 'grel): byad bsags la maN+Dal legs par byas te/ me tog tshom bu dang/ mchod rdzas dang rten rnam dag bkod nas/ tsan
2a3(rgyud 'grel): dan ber la dar nag gdags/ /rang stan bde ba la shar du phyogs par 'dug ste/ rang yi dam lha'i gzhung bzhin du
2a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams gcad pa dang/ byin gyis brlab bya'i rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dge sbyor yan lag bdun pa dang/ tshad
2b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa bzhis bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i dang las rang yi dam ye shes
2b2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i bskyed rim gzhung bzhin bya/ de'i snyen sngags ci rigs par bzlas nas/ rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/ bgegs kyi rgyal po
2b3(rgyud 'grel): log 'dren bkug pa'i steng du/ paM yig las pad ma 'dab brgyad bsam/ /de'i lte bar raM dmar po las nyi ma'i gdan bsams te/ /rang gi
2b4(rgyud 'grel): snying khi'i 'od zer gyis lho phyogs kyi dur khrod tsan dan gyi shing kha nas dpal ye shes kyi mgon po nag po chen po spyan drangs nas nam mkha' na tshur byon
2b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ gdan thog tu bzhugs par bsams la/ nges par 'byon zhing bzhugs nas bdag la byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ro/ /de la yid ma ches
3a1(rgyud 'grel): na rang lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas gdan skyed pa snga ma bzhin byas/ gdan thog tu yi ge hUM mthing nag bsam/
3a2(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od 'phros 'dus rdo rje gri gug hUM gis mtshan pa bsam/ de gyur pa las nag po chen po bskyed de/ khro bo'i gzugs brnyan sku mdog mthing nag 'od
3a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin zhal gsum par sgom mo/ /dbus zhal sku mdog dang 'thun pa/ zhal g.yas dmar nag /g.yon pa ljang nag tu'o/ /
3a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du mthong ba bzhin zhal gcig mthing nag tu sgom/ /gang ltar du sgom yang phyag drug pa kho na ste/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po mi mgo'i phreng ba 'grang ba/ gnyis
3a5(rgyud 'grel): pa na gri gug /gsum pa na Da ma ru 'khrol ba'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/ gnyis pa na mdung rtse gsum pa/ /tha ma na zhags pa bsnams pa/ /
3b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i steng na sangs rgyas mi skyod pa bzhugs pa/ dpral ba sin d+hu ras byug pa/ mche ba brtsigs pa/ dbu dang sku la/ sbrul dang rin po che'i brgyan gyis blungs pa/ mi
3b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo khrag 'jig pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs kyi steng du/ sprul dang rin po che'i phreng ba'i ske rags bcings pa/ dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa/ zhabs gnyis bgrad
3b3(rgyud 'grel): pas bgegs kyi rgyal po mgo g.yas su bstan pa mnan pa/ sku che la yan lag rags pa/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ lha ma yin sde brgyad bran 'khor du 'dus par sgoms la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum gyis sku gsung
3b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs byin gyis brlab/ lha dbang skur ba bya mi dgos te/ byas kyang 'gal ba med do/ /rang dang mgon po gnyis ka'i thugs kha nas 'od 'phros pas lho phyogs dur khrod kyi shing tsan dan gyi sdong po gcig
3b5(rgyud 'grel): gi steng nas rang bzhin gyi dpal nag po chen po spyan drangs te/ nam mkha' la tshur DA ma ru dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i sgra dang bcas pa byon nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la/ na mo
3b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA la ya/ po de sad ta ma hA sad ta ya/ zhes phyag btsal la/ sh+rI ma hA kA la dza/ zhes mdun bskyed nag po'i spyi bor dgug /ma hA kA la ya hUM gis dam tshig pa la ye shes pa bzhug/
4a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA la ya baM gyis gnyis su med par 'dres par bsam/ mahA kA la ho:zhes pas mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas gzhung gzhan bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ khyad par du
4a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po'i spos ni/ tsan dan dang/ nyungs kar dang/ sgog skya dang/ sha chen dang/ gu gul cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos dbul/ yang na tsan dan dang/ nyungs kar / bu raM /
4a3(rgyud 'grel): gu gul / mi khrag gis sprus pa'i ril bu dbul lo/ /yang na gu gul mi khrag bsres la dbul lo/ /sngags ni / tsa la na ni pu ra dza li/ dza la ki na ri li ka pa hUM kaM / na ra wa
4a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ u ra d+ha ka hUM/ ka phe ka ra// b+hi b+hi na/ sha d+ha pa d+ha pi la/ d+ha ma ru e pa la e ka la/ ha hi lo'i yan/ an d+he/ e pan tsa lu la e san/ si ra ma la / ka
4a5(rgyud 'grel): hi na ra sa ta pa sha a sa ma thi s+thi/ ma hA kA la hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA / zhes bya'o/ /de nas stod pa bya ste / hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag
4a6(rgyud 'grel): po gzi brjid che/ /ye shes rgyas phyir dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /dbyings na bzhugs phyir mi bskyod rgya yi btab/ /mkha' 'gro bsdud
4b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir sin d+hu ra yis byugs/ /rigs lnga'i mchog 'dus thod phreng dbu brgyan can// /bams gsum la gzigs spyan rtsa dmar la zlum/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir rno sdug mche ba brtsigs/ /pha rol phyin drug dge phyir phyag
4b2(rgyud 'grel): drug ldan/ /bdud bzhi rnams cod rdo rje gri gug thogs/ sngags rnams mi brjed gzungs ldan thod phreng bsnams/ /gsang chos sgrog phyir cang te'u drag tu 'khrol/ /nyon mongs ma spangs dag phyir thod khrag bsnams/ /dug gsum sting 'bugs mdud rtse gsum
4b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dzin/ /gdur? bya mi 'dor rtag tu zhags pa bsnams/ /'jigs pa bskyob phyir stag lpags sku smad bkris/ /bsod nams tshogs rdzogs sku mdog gzi brjid 'bar/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad ma'i gdan/ /ma rig mun sel nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/
4b4(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs tshad sal zla ba'i gdan la gzhugs/ /gdug pa 'dul rtags bgegs rgyal log 'dren mnan/ /chos sku mi 'gyur thob phyir sku mdog mthing nag 'bar/ /dgos 'dod skong phyir tsan dan steng na bzhugs/ /nag po chen po dpal la phyag 'tshal
4b5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /sngon gyi zhal bzhes rjes su dran mdzod la/ /bdag gis btsol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod/ /ces bstod do/ /de rjes/ sku rim gyis gsal bar sgom/ /de'i rjes la dpal nag po chen po'i thugs khar bad ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la hUM yig
4b6(rgyud 'grel): la snying po'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsams la sngags bzlas te/ /rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer sngags kyi yi ger 'phros pas mchod par gyur/ /mgon po'i thugs kha nas 'od zer sngags kyi 'phreng ba tshur 'dus pas bdag byin gyis brlabs sing/ /dngos grub
4b7(rgyud 'grel): thob bar bsams la srog gi snying po 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big nan bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes gtam gyi bar ma chad par bzlas te/ /de yang grangs 'bum phrag gsum mam/ bdun na ma/ bcu bzlas pa'am/ yang na tsan dan gyi 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): shing gi rtsa ru zla ba drug bzlas pa'am/ /yang na mtshan rtags su sngags pa rnams dang/ btsun pa dang/ chu chen po skyes pa dang/ grong khyer me yis tshig pa dang/ /bud med mang po dang/ khyi nag dang/ bya nag la sogS
5a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rmi ba dang/ gnod byed dang thabs nas rgyal ba la sogs pa rmi ba dang/ yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang/ /nyams dga' zhing ting nge 'dzin gsal ba la sogs pa nyams byung byung gi bar du zhag re la thun bzhi ru byas la bsnyen pa bya'o/ /
5a3(rgyud 'grel): thun re'i mchod pa dang bstod pa dang/ nyams pa bshags pa dang/ 'dod pa bsgrub par zhu pa byas la/ ye shes kyi mgon po nag po gshegs par bya/ /bskyed pa'i nang po chen po rang la bsdu/ /spyod lam la sogs pa chos spyi dang 'thun pa/ /
5a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis ni bsnyen pa'i bya thabs so/ /sgrub pa ni/ gnas dur khrod dam/ shing gcig gam/ ma mo'i khyim mam/ chu 'gram la sogs par dgos pa'i rdzas bsags la/ dkyil 'khor zla gang gru bzhi pa bya/ thig la sogs pa
5a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin gdab/ /tshon gri ba ni dbus gru gsum mthing nag gtsang gis skor/ de'i mthar zlum po thod pa'i ra ba bya/ de gnyis bar gyi zla gam gsum dmar po/ /thong ra'i phyi'i gru chad bzhi ljang khu/ /sgo la sogs pa gzhung ci dang 'thun
5a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dpal mgon po chen po'i gzugs brnyan dgod/ zla gam gsum la phud dang/ gtor ma dang khrag gi snod dgod/ sgo bzhi la shar du 'phags ma nam gru ma/ lho ru nag mo chen po gri gug thod pa can/ nub tu/ /
5a7(rgyud 'grel): legs ldan nag po chen po/ byang du dpal re ma ti rnams kyi rtsa ka li dgod/ /mgon nag 'khor gyi rten rdzas rnams/ mchod rdzas dang/ las sbyor gyi rdzas rnams kyang bshams la/ rang stan bde pa la 'dug ste/ byang chub mchog tu smon pa'i sems
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pas/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha gsal bar byas te/ snying po ci rigs bzlas par bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa las yi ge bruM smug nag tu bsam/ de nas lha'i gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa
5b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam /nang gi dbus rim gyis mtho ba/ dbus gru gsum mthing nag /de'i phyir zla gam gru gsum dmar po/ de'i phyi ma zlum po mi mgo'i rtsig pas gtsang khang rtsigs pa/ de lcags gzer dang 'dra ba dam po lcags kyis byas pa/ de rnams 'od 'bar
5b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam pa can sgom / de'i dbus su gru gsum gyi thog tu pad+ma dang/ bgegs kyi rgyal po tsigs pa'i steng du hUM las dpal mgon po nag po sngon bzhin sgom/ sgo bzhir legs ldan nag po tshan po/ lhor nag po chen po gri gug thod pa can/ de gnyis
5b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM dmar nag dang/ mthing nag las bskyed de/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o/ /bad ni tsan dan gyi bde dang thid khrag bsnams pa/ gri gug ma ni rdo rje gri gug dang/ thod khrag thogs pa'o/ /shar ju ru snug nag nas 'phags ma nam gru ma zhal
5b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag na ral gri dang thod khrag/ sku mdog smug nag go / byang du nag po chen po zhal gcig phyag gnyis yoM ma tA kA ? rak+Sha? du dzeDNi? dza hUM hUM ja pa/ phyag na ral gri dang phub thogs oM shin hA kA la hUM hUM phaT pa/ nag po chen po gsum dang nag
5b6(rgyud 'grel): gi ber gsol ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i sku rags dang/ lha sbyo ma o nag mo baN+DDha? la ku lu ku lu hUM b+hyo par ro ru dud sol dang wa ba gcig kyang gda' mo'i sku bstod zhing bi lpags pa/ sku smad re lnge ri sham bu can no/ /mgon o oM ? mahA kA la sid+d+hi? yaM du dza dza hUM hUM phaT phaT/ lcam bral
5b7(rgyud 'grel): kun gshin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal dang/ sbrul gyis brgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ khro tshul can gzi brjid dang 'od 'bar ba/ drag shu tshal mthu rtsal che ba/ 'khor nag po chen po'i tshogs dang/ ma mo dang /
6a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso mo la sogs pa/ chos skyong ba'i lha ma yin dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor bar bsgom/ /de dag gi sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs dang/ ye shes kyi mgon po nag po chen po 'khor
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas rnams dur khrod chen bo'i gnas nas spyan drangs te /bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dang/ phyag btsal ba dang/ mchod pa dang bstod pa rnams byas la/ de'i rjes la bdag gi thugs kha'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas rdul tshon gtso bo'i
6a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs dam bskul/ de las 'od zer dang/ sprul pa'i khro bo kho mo bsam gyis mi khyab ba phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ lo ka'i khams kun gyi chos skyong thams cad dbang du bsdus te las la dkol nas/ de dag gi sngags la bdag gi
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs thams cad drag po mngon spyid kyis bsgral bar bsam/ sha khrag za zhing 'brur bar bsams la/ mgon nag chen po 'khor bcas bod pa'i sngags dang/ rbad pa'i sngags dang/ dgra bgegs bsad pa'i sngags dang/ gsum
6a5(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba 'di dag gzhan dang ma 'dres par bzlas/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ sha sa na/ a pa ka ri ni/ re sha ma A pats+tshi/ ma hA ka lo yaM i ta na ta rad na tra ya yA/ a pa ka ri nan/ ya ti pra ti ga dz+nyi /smar si d+han du shaM/ sarba dus dang/ sarba ta ka
6a6(rgyud 'grel): ya/ b+haM liM/ kha kha khA hi/ khA hi/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na /b+hand+ha b+hand+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ din me ke ni mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes smra pa gzhan gyis bar ma mchod par bzlas/ thun mtshams su
6a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ thugs dam bskul ba dang ye shes ba cha ste rang la ?/ dam tshig lha la sogs pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid du shes par bya zhing/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la bltas te/ snying rje dang
6b1(rgyud 'grel): byams pa bsgom/ de la sgrub pa'i mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub/ mtshan rtags ni skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pas tshur phyag byed pA drang/ skye 'gro mang po bdag gi 'khor du 'dug pa dang/ g.yog byed pa dang/ byol song 'khor ba dang/ sems
6b2(rgyud 'grel): can ci yang rung ba bsad pa rmi ba la sogs byung byung sgrub par bya/ de yang 'khor lha? rten nas sgrub pa dang/ mnan bsrag sbrag ma la brten te sgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo la rten nas sgrub pa la gnyis/ bsrung pa'i 'khor lo dang/ drag pa'i 'khor lo
6b3(rgyud 'grel): la rten pa'o/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ nang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ phyi gri gug rtsibs brgyad/ de'i phyi me ri 'bar bas skor ba bri/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs re re la snyen sngags dang/ bsrungs cig sprel te / oM badzra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+She tra big nan rin yag
6b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM ma hA kA la shas na a pa hA ri sha ri ri/ a ba tsa/ ma hA kA lo yaM/ i dan twa khad na tra ya la ma bkar ni na/ ya ti pra ti dz+nya smra ra si tan duSh+TaM che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ 'di lan cig lam shong na skyar gyi bri'o/ /bri/ nang gi mu khyud la sngags rings
6b5(rgyud 'grel): bri/ lta ba la bsrung bya'i gzugs ming rus gnas bcas pa bris la gur gum maM g+hi waM gyis rtsa ba mnan no/ /rab gnas byed na/ bskyed rims la sogs pa bsgoms pa/ 'khor lo mi dmigs pa las yi ge bruM bsam/ de las 'khor
6b6(rgyud 'grel): lo bskyed/ de'i steng du baM las pad ma dang/ raM las nyi ma'i steng du sngags kyi yi ge rnams bsams la/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas chos skyong bkug ste/ sngags kyi yi ge la thim pas yi ge rnams dpal nag po chen por bsgom
6b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs khar pad ma'i lte ba la nyi ma gnas par bsam/ de'i steng du sgrub sngags bsams nas/ bdag lhag pa'i lhar gsal pa'i thugs kha nas 'od zer sngags su 'phros bas/ dpal nag po chen po'i thugs khar phog /
7a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs kha las sngags 'od byung nas zhal nas 'thon te/ bdag gi zhal nas thugs khar thim pas sdig sgrib dag cing/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa'i mthu skyed par bsam/ sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam ci nus bzlas
7a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ mchod stod bya/ ye shes lha gshegs/ dam tshig lha zhu nas/ sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs su gyur par bsam/ me tog dkar po la rten 'brel sngags te/ gtor bas kyang/ sngags nyid mgon po'i rang bzhin yin la/
7a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon nag nyid sngags kyi gzugs su bzhugs pas/ cis kyang gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i yi ger bsams la bsrung bya'i yul la gdags te/ de'i lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin / yi ge btags pas cis kyang mi tshugs par bsam/
7a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gzhan ci dang 'thun na/ /'khor lo la rten te drag po'i sgrub pa byed na/ 'khor lo gnyis byas te/ gnyis ga la phyi'i ri mo zlum po bzhi rim du skor ba'i mu khyud sum rim bya/ ri mo phyi rol ma'i phyi ma ris skor/ mu khyud phyi rim
7a5(rgyud 'grel): ma la snyen sngags la mA ra ya phaT btags pa dbu phyi ru bstan pa bri/ pad ma la gri gug rno nang du bstan ba ci mang du bri'o/ /nad ma la sgrub sngags dbu phyi ru bstan pa 'khor bar dgod/ ri mo zlum pa nang ma'i ngos su 'khor lo
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad rtse nang du bstan pa bri/ /rtsibs brgyad la 'khor lo'i sngags brgyad bris la/ kha kha khA hi khA hi che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ g+h+rih+na grih+na che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ b+hand+ha g+hand+ha che ge mo
7a7(rgyud 'grel): mA ra ya hUM phaT /ha na ha na a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ da ha da ha che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT / ba tsa pa tsa che ge mo mA ra ma hUM phaT di na me ke ni a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ zhes pa rnams so/ /dbus su sgrub bya'i gzugs ming dus
7b1(rgyud 'grel): dang sngags su bcas pa bri'o/ /de yang 'khor lo steng ma'i mdun na g.yas ngos na phar la 'khor bar bri'o/ /'og ma'i yi ge g.yon du 'khor bar bri/ rtsibs brgyad kyi dbu nang du bstan pa bri/ de rnams khrag chen dang dug gis byugs la
7b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gnyis kha sbyar te/ bar du ling ga bris la bzhug /de thod par btsug la thod pa 'grub khub du bcug la/ de nas yi dam ltar bskyed/ mdun du dang la nag pa chen po bskyed la dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya ste/ bsnyen sngags brgya tsam
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ de'i rjes su 'khor lo stong par bsgoms la der bruM la/ gnam lcags mchen cha'i 'khor lo me 'bar bar bsgoms la/ 'khor lo'i bar gyi ling ga la Ni 'am/ tri las sgrub bya bsams la/ rang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya
7b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas te/ dpal nag po chen po las sprul pa'i khro tsogs la lcags kyu dang/ thob thogs pa mang po 'phros te/ bsgral bya rang rgyud kyi gnas nas dgug bar bya/ lcags kyus snying nas bzung/ tho bas rgyab nas phul/ bkug nas
7b5(rgyud 'grel): sngar gyi sgrub bya la bzhugs/ de nas 'khor lo skor te/ 'khor lo drag tu 'khor ba dang/ dpal nag po chen po'i sprul pa dang/ 'khor du bcas pas/ mtshon cha'i char du phab pas/ bsgral bya lus dum bur gtub khar bsam/
7b6(rgyud 'grel): sha rus dum bu dang/ khrag zags pa thod pas bcus te gsol bar mdzad pa dang/ sha rus lhag ma mes bsregs cing chos pa yang thod par blangs nas gsol bar bsgom/ lhag ma thal bar yang song bar bsam/ bsnyen
7b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang las sngags sbrel la ci nus su rang res skabs su bzlas shing thun gyis brab bo/ /de ltar zhags bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa cig tu sgrub par bya'o// //mnan sreg sbrag ma la rten te sgrub na /
8a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'am/ 'khor lo med pa'i ling ga bres pa yang rung te/ rang gi mal 'og 'grub khung bcas par bcug la/ mdun du mchod rdzas dang me thab la sogs pa bshams te/ me thab tu
8a2(rgyud 'grel): nyin gung dam mtshan gung la ling kha bsro zhing/ yang mal 'og tu mnan par bya/ cho ga gzhan sgrub pa ci dang 'thun no/ /de ltar zhag bdun nam / bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o/ /gtor ma la rten te sgrub na /
8a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal steng du gtor snod bzhag te bre gang yan chad kyi che la gtor ma bya/ gtor ma de zur gsum pa rtsab zlum por byas la/ gtor mda' mde'u ni thog lcags sam/ mi bsad pa'i lcags dum bu gzugs / ras kha tshar mnyams
8a4(rgyud 'grel): pas yol ba bya/ mnga' la dar nag btags la gzugs/ maN+Dal steng du mchod rdzas ci 'byor pa yang bsham / me tog tshom bu lnga dgod/ dpal nag po chen po'i rten yod na steng du gzugs/ gtor ma'i nang du 'khor lo
8a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am ling ga gzhug/ /de nas cho ga gzhung bzhin byas la maN+Dal steng gi rten nam/ me tog tshom bu lta bu bskyed la/ dza:hUM ba ho(rgyud 'grel): ye shes pa dgug bzhug cing /dgyes par bya/ dbang bskur rgyas gdab byed na yang
8a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas gtor ma stong par bsam la /der kaM las gtor snod thod pa chen por bsam/ de'i nang du gtor ma'i dngos po dang/ ling ga yi ge Ni 'am dri las/ dgra 'am bgegs gang
8a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod par skyed la/ rang dang dpal nag po chen po'i thugs kha nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa las/ las kyi mgon po thugs kha nas khro bo dang khro mo rnams spros pas / gnod byed kyi lus sems rang dbang med par bkug pa
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bskyed pa de la stim pa dang/ mtshon chas btubs pa la sogs pa bya zhing/ thun rdeg cing sngags rings bzlas so/ /yang skul ba'i ma mo dang/ mkha' 'gro lag na thod pa thogs pa mang pos sgral ba'i sha khrag thod pas bcus te/
8b2(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po tshogs la rol/ rang re yang rol par bsam ma/ /thun 'jog tsam na mchod pa/ bsted pa/ nyams grib bshags pa dang/ las la skul bar bya/ ye shes lha rten gshegs su mi gsol/ rten la bzhugs par
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rang spyod lam dge ba dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /thun gzhan la 'jug rtsan/ dam tshig gi dpal nag po chen po byas la / ye shes pa spyan drangs nas stim pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin bya'o/ /dgra bgegs tshar gcod pa'i
8b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags byung na gtong ma btang te/ nang pa'i gdon 'dul ba yin na/ gtor ma'i phung tsam zhig bzhag la/ de nas gtor ma gnod byed phyogs su btang te/ gtor ma skyel mis gos nag bgo /med na dar nag gi 'phan lus la
8b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ gtor ma la lam phye sgo phye byas la gtor ma zor du 'phang ngo btang ngo/ /de nas 'phangs nas yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ba las/ phan yon mdor bsdus pa drug ste/ chos skyong mnyes pa dang/ tshogs stsog pa
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dri ma 'dag pa dang/ bar char mi 'byung ba dang/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gro ba dang/ 'phrin las sgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba ste/ don chen por 'gyur ro/ /nag po'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o//
8b7(rgyud 'grel): byis pa chung du'i gdon bsrung ba dang/ de las sogs pa'i mi smyo 'bog la sogs pa'i nad gso ba dang/ ser ba bsrung ba dang/ gzhan gyi sbyor ngan zlog pa dang/ chang nyes zho nyes bsrung ba dang/ gzhan pa'i bsrung ba la sogs pa
9a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bya bar 'dod na 'di ltar bya ste/ dang po nad ba dang/ byis pa'i gdon 'dul na / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub pa sngar ltar byas la/ bsrung bya'i skye gdags / bsrung dga' na gtor chen ltar bzung la/ 'brub
9a2(rgyud 'grel): khung bcas la/ ling kha mang du bris la bzhug / de nas mtshams bcas pa grub na legs ma grub na bya ba gzhan btus la/ dpal nag po chen po'i skyed rim bsnyen pa bzhin byas la/ bsnyen sngags dang sngags rings la thun bzhir
9a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya zhing / nyungs dkar la sogs pas brab/ gri dang phung? pa la sogs pa brteg /skabs su mchod gtor dang bskul bya 'phral gtor btang ngo/ /g.yas rno pas dgra bgegs thul lo zer ram/ ma thul zer yang de dag la yid brtan
9a4(rgyud 'grel): du mi rung pas / rang dam bsrung bya'i gza' tshol sems can bsad pa dang/ tshig pa la sogs pa byung gi bar du/ 'phrin las ma bshol bar bya'o/ /de nas bsreg mnan yang bya'o/ /ser pa bsrung na lo cho ga gzhan bzhin byas la /
9a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bcu'i sngags bzlas pa'i rdzas gyis bsrung bskor la/ thal chen dang nyungs kar la sngags rings bzlas la sprin nag la gtor ro/ /sbyor ngan phyir la bzlog la/ rang dpal chen por bsgoms la/ 'khor lo rtsibS bcu pa phyi ru
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ 'khor lo nang du phyogs skyong bcu dgyel ba'i steng du khro bo bcu bsgoms la 'khor lo bskor ro/ /zho chang bsrung na/ sngags bzlas nas nyungs kar blugs pas thub/ zho skams na nu ma la dung pas bdug /sngags bzlas pa'i
9a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas byug/ de dag la sngon du gtor ma btang pa gal che'o/ /mnan pa byed na/ gtor ma chen po bshams la/ mnan pa'i 'khor lo bri ba ni/ phyi'i mu gsum bsang pa'i 'khor lo ltar byas la/ khyad par du las kyis kha sgyur
9b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ mA ra ya byung sar de'i tshab ma staM b+ha naM ku ru laM bri/ dbus su mu khyud skor la de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs la rtse mo phyi ru bstan pa byas la rtsibs la khro bo gcu'i sngags re bris nas de nas dgra 'am bgegs gang la byas pa de la 'god/ de nas dang
9b2(rgyud 'grel): po dgug bzhug byas la/ 'brub khung gru gsum rang gi mal 'og tu bru/ kha khyer sor bzhi phyir skyed la/ sor gnyis spangs su rtsig /shog bu la ling ga mang du bris te/ /gzugs byas pa'i snying khar bzhug /gzugs brnyan gyi ske la tha?
9b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug? po btags la/ rang gi srin lag gis bzung dang po dang/ skabs skabs su dgug bzhug mang du bya/ skabs su 'am zin zin tha gu shing phur la rtod/ 'brub khung du ling ga bcug la de'i kha g.yam pas bcad/ g.yam bde'i steng du ri rab gling
9b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang bcas pa bri/ 'og ngos su rdo rje rgya gram bris la kha bcad de nas gtor chen bshams la sha lngar byin gyis brlabs/ de'i steng du dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la stim/ sngags rings brgya rtsa bzlas
9b5(rgyud 'grel): shing/ rang gi thugs kha nas 'od byung nas kha nas 'thon/ mgon po'i thugs khar thim/ lte ba nas khro bo dang khro mo 'thon/ /mnar? bya bkug ste ling ga la stim/ khro mo khro bo rang gi snying khar bsdu ba yang dang yang du bsam/ bzlas pa 'phro
9b6(rgyud 'grel): dmag grangs pa dang/ chu bo chen po skyes pa dang/ grong khyer mes tshig pa dang/ bdag gam gzhan gdod byed la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang/ sems can bsad pa la sogs pa byung na mnan pa bya ste /gtor chen steng nas dpal mgon po
10a1(rgyud 'grel): steg ste/ bar snang la bzhugs pa la yang ye shes lha spyan drangs la bzhug /mchod pa bya/ gtor ma la yang byin brlabs byas la bsngo ba bya/ rang gi 'og gi 'khor lo ston/ gtor ma'i khar bzhag
10a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed bkug la bstim/ sngags rings bzlas shing/ mgon po'i sprul pa'i 'khor gyis/ gnod byed bsad de btubs pas gtor ma sha khrag gi dngos por gyur pa chos skyong 'khor bcas la btab par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes
10a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gshegs/ dam tshig pa rang la bsdu'o/ /de nas mnan pa'i sa ni dge 'dun gnas pa'i them pa'i 'og gam/ mchod rten rab gnas byas pa'i 'og tu bcug la rdo rje rgya gram byas pa'i g.yam pas kha
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bcad la kha las? dgab/? rkang pa g.yas pas mnan de'i steng du gtor ma blugs/ des gnod byed mi 'tshor ro/ /mnan pa'i las so/ /drag po'i sbyin bsreg giS btub pa'am bsad pa ni/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi rgyar khru gang pa byas la
10a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng logs kyi 'tho dang rgya mnyam pa zlum po 'phangs su khru gang pa/ zhes sor bzhi rtsig /steng du sgyed bu gzugs /phyogs gsum du sgor bya/ de'i nang du bud shing se ba la sogs pa cher ma can gis dga' /de'i
10a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du bye ma blug la bzhag /de'i rtsa ru yang 'brub khung legs re la khru re yon ba byas la de'i ling ga mang po bzhug /mgon po bskyed/ dgug bzhug bya ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin byas la/ mgon po'i sngags rings
10a7(rgyud 'grel): kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ston pa mang po bzlas/ gnod byed skyed la dgug bzhug lan mang po bya/ khugs pa'i yid ches pa byung nas/ phur pa dang mtshon cha bsnun/ dum bu mang du ma song bar du bsad par bsam par bya/
10b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas ling ga'i rol lag pas mi bzung bar 'dzin byed gzhan gyis bzung la slar bzhin bsgyur ste/ phur pa'am mtshon gyis bye ma bkrug /ling ga tshig pa dang/ rang gi 'og tu dong gru gsum pa byas la/ de'i nang du phye ma
10b2(rgyud 'grel): blug la/ g.yam pa la 'og tu rdo rje rgya gram / steng du gling bzhi dang bcas pa'i ri rab bris pa can gyi kha bcad/ de'i steng du rang bsdad la rmi lam ston cig par gsol ba gdab/ rmi lam bzang ma drag po'i sbyin bsreg
10b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ dnan? bzlas pa mang du byas nas 'og gi bye ma phyug la/ dge 'dun gyi them pa la sogs par mnan/ de nas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /drag po'i sbyin sreg bya bar 'dod na/ maN+Dal gru bzhi byas pa'i
10b4(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ rgya dang spangs khru re tsam pa gru gsum pa rtsig /de dag nag por bya/ gru gsum gyi mdza' mar me ri dmar po bri/ mdun la nye bar mchod rdzas bsham/ gtor chen yang bshams la bzhag / nas bri dang/ sha
10b5(rgyud 'grel): chen la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas yang ci mang ci bzang du bshams/ g.yas su mgon po 'khor bcas kyi gtor ma bsham/ g.yon du bgegs kyi gtor ma bsham par bya/ /mgon po'i gtor ma bsham par bya/ mgon
10b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rten yod na dgod/ med na mda' bya rgod ma dang/ dar nag po dang/ skyes pa grir shi ba'i snying dang gsum/ dar dang snying mnga' la btags pa gzugs/ sreg rdzas mi khrag dang nyungs kar dang/ btsan dug dang /
10b7(rgyud 'grel): thal ? rnams sbyar la / ling ga dang sbags la sreg go /'khrul 'khor bcas pa yang dgug bzhug byas la mtshan gyis btub cing / oM mahA kA la g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na/ oM ma hA kA la b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ oM mahA kA la sh+re /ha na ha ha/
11a1(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA k+Sha la ya d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya/ oM mahA kA la sh+ri / g+h+raM karmA ku ru hUM phaT/ zhes sngags rings kyi bsham du btags la mu khyud la bri'o/ /sngags de bzlas par yang bya'o/ /rang gi 'khrul 'khor
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa dang/ mthon bskyed pa dang/ dgug bzhug sngar ? bya'o/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor nas bgegs gtor btang /mtshams gcad /mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab /de nas thab khung du raM las me dpung bsam pa'i dbus
11a3(rgyud 'grel): su/ hUM las dam tshig mgon po bskyed/ ye shes mgon po spyan drangs/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon pa dang/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): dgug bzhug cing dgyes par bya/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab / mi bskyod pa dbul sgom mo/ /
11a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'khor lo dang/ ling ga dang / bsreg rdzas bsres la lha la dbul/ bsreg rdzas la lag pa mi reg par dgang gzer gyi blugs/ rab brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'bring lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ sngags rings bzlas la dbul/ sngags kyi bsham la/
11a5(rgyud 'grel): oM ag ne ye de wa te dzra la ra/ zhes btags la bzlas so/ /de'i dus su / gsal pa rnams gsum gal che ste/ rang yi dam gsal ba/ bsreg rdzas gnod byed du gsal ba/ me chos skyong du gsal ba'o/ /rdzas ma
11a6(rgyud 'grel): zad par shing zad na/ shing gzhan gyiS gsol la bya/ rdzas zad pa dang/ ye shes lha phye la rang la bzhug /dam tshig lha rang la btus la sgyed bu gsum gzugs / de'i steng du glang btsugs la mar khu blugs/
11a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu me sbar la mar khu khol ba dang/ raM las me dpung bskyed la/ reg bya tsha ba dus mdza' me lta bu bsam zhing/ sreg rdzas rnams gnod byed du bsams la/ bsreg cing nyungs kar dang/ lcags cha? dang /
11b1(rgyud 'grel): dug phye gsum gyis brab /ji srid mar khu ma skams par du gnod bed bkug cing brubs la/ mar khu zad pa dang gla nga'i nad glang? kha sbub pa'i steng du gtor chen bzhag glang? kha sbub pa'i steng du gtor chen bzhag
11b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ mgon po 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor chen dbul /'dod don zhu ba'i gsal ba gdab/ gtor ma rnga la sogs pa'i sgra dang bcas paS gtang ngo/ /mgon po rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs/ 'khor gyi gtor ma btang ngo/ /
11b3(rgyud 'grel): gtor chen gyi gtor ma btang zin pa dang/ gla ngal sbyar ba dbye/ sol ba de sa yis kha mnan/ nang par chags la chu la gdab/ yang na rlung la phyar btang/ sbyin bsreg lag len no// /ithi/
11b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal nag po chen po 'di/ nag po gzhan gang bas kyang byin brlabs myur la che bas/ sgrub pa po bkra shis la bsams pa 'grub/ spyir sngags thams cad nas rdo rje slob dpon la dus rtag tu bsnyen bskur bya ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsrung dgos pa
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ 'di sgrub pa pos kyang bsrung zhing/ sgrub pa byas na/ thun mongs dang mchog gi dngos grub thob bo/ /dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal sha ba ri pa chen pos mdzad ba rdzogs so// //
11b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta a ta ya badzra dang /bod kyi lots+tsha ba phur bu 'od kyiS bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o/ /dpe 'di la shin tu dam pa'i bka' rgyas bde mchog snying pa/ btab bo/ /dpal 'byor lha mdzes lha'i dbang po dang/ /'dra zhing
11b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam spyod pa gam mi mnyam rdo rje mtho ba yi/ /shangs bdu gu lung pa phyag dpe dgos 'dod rin chen phreng ba 'di/ /ga ru ra b+ha Ta khyung? po bzang po bdag gis bzabs pa lags// //
12a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos bskor las/ sha ba ri pas mdzad pa'i gsang sgrub bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ gu hyA swa d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba spyan ras gziD la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dben
12a2(rgyud 'grel): par tshogs gnyis sngon 'gro bas/ /bsrung ba rdo rje chos 'byung nang/ /rlung me chu sa lhun po'i steng/ /b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang pa'i dbus/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi zla'i steng/ /tshigs bdag po mo 'gyel ba'i steng/ /dpal ldan grags chen
12a3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka /zhal gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gri gug thod pa Da ma ru/ /thod pa rtse gsum zhags pa can/ /g.yon rkyang gar gyis rol pa'i sku/ /sprul dang rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras/ /stag lpags grol ba dpa' bo'i sku
12a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ye shes ra ga'i 'ong/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma/ /Da ma ru dang thod pa can/ /g.yas rkyang stabs kyis yab la 'khyud/ /las bzhir sku dang yon tan rigs/ /gsung dang 'phrin las bdud rtsi can/ /'khor lo rin
12a5(rgyud 'grel): chen pad+ma dang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rab mdzes pa'i/ /gri gug 'dzin sogs mgon po bzhi/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las/ /yab 'dra'i mdog can gtso mo'i tshul/ /dkar ser dmar dang ljang khu yi/ /tshogs bdag steng du rol par bzhugs//
12a6(rgyud 'grel): zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod 'grub/ /gra phyogs sgeg bdug sogs brgyad dam/ /bcu drug sna tshogs mchod sprin can/ /sgo /dzin mi tra bed dang thod/ /TA kI ra dza lcags kyu thod/ /dzin mi tra bed dang thod/ /TA kI ra dza lcags kyu thod/ /gtum
12a7(rgyud 'grel): po trag shad mdung zhags 'dzin/ /khyams la phyogs skyong rgyal chen te/ /bcu bzhi nang gi rim pa las/ /de phyir lha chen 'jigs byed dgu /klu dang gza' ste so gsum mo/ /de'i phyir rgyu dkar nyi shu brgyad/ /gtsang rigs mgon po
12b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun bcu lnga/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis spras/ /phyi rol khor yug dur khrod brgyad/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang/ /'phrin las sprul pa mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ /'thing dkar ser dmar ltar ba yi/ /dam can rgya mtsho 'jigS
12b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can/ /lha sku sgrib bral 'od gzugs kyi/ /dpral mgrin snying lte gsang ba'i gnas/ /oM dkar sku dang a dmar gsung/ /hUM 'thing? thugs sogs yon tan ser/ /ha ljang 'phrin las lnga yig ni/ /mdun rgyab nges pa'i ?
12b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /'phro 'du'i 'od zer mdza' yas kyis/ /ye shes spyan drangs gnyis med pa'i/ /spyi bor mi spyod la sogs lnga/ /thugs kar pad nyi zla hUM mthar/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra pA la b+hig man bi na ye ka hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM k+She tra pA
12b4(rgyud 'grel): la b+h+rig man hUM phaT/ bud d+ha rang na pad+ma dang/ /badzra karma rus bstan bzhin/ /thabs sgyur sngags dang shes rab sgyur/ /zhal shes rig 'dzin rnal 'byor pa/ /sprul? sgyur sngags sham ldan pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa dar rgyas spel/ /dkon
12b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog dbu 'phangs bstod pa dang/ /sems can phan bde 'god la sogs/ /sngags kyi 'od zer 'phreng ba can/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag sna tshogs las/ /gang dgos yid bzhin myur du 'grub/ /log lta the tshom rab spangs nas/ /dad mos
12b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gus brtson 'grus ldan/ /bsnyen bsgrub dam tshig la gnas shing/ /byang chub sems dang ldan pa de/ /bkra shis bde legs ldan par 'gyur/ /gsang bsgrub rim pa dam pa'o/ /sha? ba ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// /
12b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis mgon po phyag drug pa'i bstod pa lags/ /rgya gar skad du / mahA ka la a k+She pa stong tra na ma/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i stong pa rngam pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba/ myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM grub par gyur 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): cig /hUM dur khrod chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i nang/ /tshang tshing 'khrigs pa tsan dan chen po'i tshal/ /skal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /bgegs chen snol ba'i gdan la rab tu bzhengs ma hA ka la phyag drug 'jigs pa'i
13a2(rgyud 'grel): sku// sku'i cha lugs mi zad 'bar ba las/ /dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan pa po/ /gsung gi nga ro mi zad 'bar ba las/ /hUM dang phaT kyi sgra'i stong gsum 'gengs/ /rnam dag thugs ni mi zad 'bar ba las/ /spros dang bral ba'i mtshan ma sbyir yang ston//
13a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas khyod la stong// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i gri gug gis/ /nyon mongs rtsad nas bcad nas dgra la 'phyar ? 'phreng ba 'dzin pas skye 'gro rtsis la 'debs/ /Da ma ru'i mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdud/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal
13a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag bsnams pa ni/ /dam nyams srog rtsa zhal du gsal ba po/ /mdud rtse gsum pos khams gsum dbang du bsdud/ /zhags pas dam nyams ma lus 'ching bar mdzad/ /byin brlabs dngos grub gter la skyabs su mtsho/ /chos
13a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku ba 'gyur ba med brtags su/ /sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba la/ /khrag 'dzag lnga bcu rtsa lngas brgyan pa bo/ /stag gi lpags pa sprul gyis chun pas mdzes/ /ma hA ka la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byin yak+Sha gnol ba'i gdan steng na/ /krig krig zhabs
13a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dgu bgegs thal bar klog /zhal gdengs mche ba brtsigs shing rngam pa yis/ /dam nyams kheng khrag 'dren cing zhal du gsol/ /spyan gsum me ltar 'bar zhing sgrad pa yis /kha nas gsuM dbang du bsdud cing rtsis la 'debs/ /dbu skra 'bar ba rdzas pa'i spyi bos?
13a7(rgyud 'grel): mi skyod rgyal po rab tu brgyan pa po/ /dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM bzhengs cig bzhengs cig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs/ /bskul lo bskul lo 'gro ba'i don la bskul/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul 'phrin las gnyan bo mdzod/ /
13b1(rgyud 'grel): ma g.yel ma g.yel dpal ldan nag po che/ /skyob ba shAkya seng ga'i spyan mnga' ru/ /bstan pa srung bar khas blang dam bcas pa'i/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /skyes bu dam pa blo dang ldan pa yi/ /bstod pa 'di yis lan cig stong byas
13b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /ba ma bu tsha rnams la brtse ba bzhin/ /nag po chen pos brtag tu bsrung bar mdzod /nag po chen po'i bstod pa rngaM pa sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyiS mdzad ba rdzogs so/ /hUM bskal pa me ltar dbang ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /dpal ldan 'jigs byed
13b3(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po ni/ /chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing nag zhal/ /ye shes rgyas phyir dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /dbyings na bzhugs phyir mi skyong rgya yi btal /mkha' 'gro 'dul phyir sin d+hu ra'i mtshan/ /rigs lnga'i rang bzhin thod bas dbu la
13b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /dus gsum mkhyen phyir spyan gsum rnam par gzigs/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir mche ba rnam par rtsigs/ /pha rol phyin drug dag phyir phyag drug pa/ /klu rgyal dbang du bsdud phyir sprul gyis brgyan/ /nyon mongs ma lus rtsad nas gcod?
13b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /g.yas pa'i dang po gri gug thugs khar 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad mi brjed 'dren pa'i phyir/ /bar ba thod skam 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'dzin/ /chos rnams thams cad stong par sgrags pa'i phyir/ /tha ma shes rab Da ma ru yi sgra/ /rnam
13b6(rgyud 'grel): bar rtog brtsad nas spang pa'i phyir/ /g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag thugs khar 'dzin/ /dug gsum ma lus brtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir/ /par pa kha TwaM rtse gsum phyag na bsnams/ /srid gsum gdug pa ma lus 'ching ba'i phyir/ /tha ma bdud zhags
13b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po bsdog cing bsnams/ /'jigs pa ma lus sbyong zhing skyob pa'i phyir/ /sku smad stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /nyon mongs skem phyir nyi ma'i gzi brjid 'bar/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir byin
14a1(rgyud 'grel): yak+Sha gnan/ /dgos 'dod sgrub phyi tsan dan dkyil na bzhugs/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po khyod la bstod/ /sngon gyi zhal bzhes rjes su dran mdzod la// sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /rnal 'byor bcol pa'i
14a2(rgyud 'grel): phrin las grub par mdzod/ /mgon po'i gzhung bstod bla ma rA hu las mdzad pa'o// //hUM byin brlabs nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// dur khrod phyag rgyas sku
14a3(rgyud 'grel): la brgyan/ /zhal gcig mthing nag rngam pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos rtags/ /phyag drug brda' dang ldan pa ni/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rtags/ /zhabs gnyis bgegs chen gnan pa ni/ /bgegs rnams dran du bskol ba'i rtags
14a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas gri gug bsnams pa ni/ /nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags/ /bar ba 'phreng ba 'dren pa ni/ /sems can mi brjed 'dren pa'i rtags/ /tha ma cang te'u 'khrol ba ni/ /chos kyi sgra chen sgrogs pa'i rtags/ /g.yon pa thod pa bsnams pa ni/ /rnam par
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa gcod pa'i rtags/ /bar pa kha TwaM bsnams pa ni/ /dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags/ /tha ma zhags pa bsnams pa ni/ /sems can bcings pa bsgrol ba'i rtags/ /zhal gdangs mche ba rtsigs pa ni/ /nyams pa'i shal rol ba'i rtags//
14a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum me ltar 'bar ba ni/ /dug gsum sems can sgrol ba'i rtags/ /dbu skra gyen du rdzes pa ni/ /rnal 'byor thar par 'dren pa'i rtags/ /sin d+hu ra yis mtshan pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdud pa'i rtags/ /mi skyod pa yis brgyan pa ni/ /dbang
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags/ /byin brlabs nag po chen po la/ /bdag ni dad pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze sa ra has zhal gzigs dus su rtags kyis sgo nas bstod pa'o// //hUM lho phyogs rnam dag tsan dan shing gi gseb /
14b1(rgyud 'grel): ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ /thugs kyi sprul pa mahA ka la ni/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag drug pa/ /stobs chen rab 'bar 'gyings pa'i cha byang can/ /khro gnyer rab 'jigs mthing nag brjid pa'i sku/ /dmar la zlum pa'i
14b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum ma 'od 'pho/ /shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten g.yo bar byed/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i ljaD la hUM sgra sgrogs/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshams bsgrad mche ba rtsigs/ /bar nas rdo rje'i khrag gis gser chen 'babs/ /rmin ma'i a tshom bskal pa'i me ltar
14b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar/ /thod pa lngas brgyan mi skyong dbu brgyan can/ /drag po dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar/ /sgegs pa'i nyams ldan dar gyi cod pan mdzes/ /'gur gyi bum bar gsang ba'i gshugs glu len/ /hUM dang phaT kyi glu sgra di ri ri/ /sku stong glang chen ko pas
14b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa yang/ /dpal thul chen po'i gyad las khyad par 'phags/ /sku smad stag gi lpags pas dkris pa ni/ /khams gsum g.yul rgyal srid gsum zil gyis gnon/ /bdud bzhi sreg mdzad me dpung klong na 'gying/ /rnam rtog spang phyir mi ro'i
14b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs phyir phyag drug pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /'khor ba'i rnam rtog spang phyir mgo 'phreng can/ /ma hA ka la khrag mthung rgyal po khyod/ /gri gug rab tu 'bar bas dgra srog
14b6(rgyud 'grel): gcod/ /thod skam phreng bas dgra bgegs rtsis la 'debs/ /Da ma rus mkha' 'gro ma tshogs bsdud/ /thod rlon rab tu 'bar bas dgra khrag gsol/ /mdung rtse gsum pos srid gsum dbang du bsdud/ /bdud zhags nag pos skye nas 'dzin par byed/ /tsan
14b7(rgyud 'grel): dan be con klad pa'i rgya srubs 'gas/ /khyod kyi sprul pa nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam/ /gdug pa'i gnod sbyin 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor/ /k+She Ta pa la sogs las la 'gyed/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bran du 'khol/ /dkar po'i chos skyong nag po'i dpung
15a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i/ /ma hA ka la lha mchog chen po la/ /bdag cag bstod dang gtor ma drag tu 'bul/ /rtse bas dgongs la bu bzhin skyab du gsol/ /bcol ba'i phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzod/ /dpal sha ba ri bas mgon po'i zhes
15a2(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa'i dus su don gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o// //phyag bzhi pa gtso rgyang klu sgrub lugs kyi sgrub thabs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa turb+hu? dza ma hA kA la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du /nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal nag po chen po phyag
15a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sngags pas rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas/ /de'i rjes su nam mkha' i phyogs su paM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma/ de'i steng du A(rgyud 'grel): yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil
15a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de'i dbus su yi ge hUM gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ de'i lte bar hUM gi yig bltas la/ de'i 'od zer gyis gdong ma nas grub pa'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs pa can gyi nag po chen po spyan drangs la/ hUM gi yi ge las spros
15a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /yang dag par bstod nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra maN+Da la mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de ma thag par tha mal pa'i lus gyi dngos po med
15a6(rgyud 'grel): par bltas te/ chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos nas/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na bdzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyhaM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /de nas pad+mar a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'o/ /zla ba de la hUM yig dkar po bltas nas/ de yongs
15a7(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las ral gri'o/ /de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM gi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlab po/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las/ dpal ldan nag po chen po sku mdog sngon po/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang
15b1(rgyud 'grel): gri gug phyag g.yon na rtse gsum dang thod pa'o/ /thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba/ /klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mi'i mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ 'jigs par mdzad pa/ dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ zhal mche ba rnam
15b2(rgyud 'grel): par gtsigs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' i gcod pan can/ sems dpa' i dkyil mo krung gis nyi ma la gnas pa nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i nag po chen po bsam nas/ snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs/ /dam tshig sems
15b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang lhan cig ro gcig par bsam par bya ste/ yang dag par mchod cing dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya bas so/ /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs/ mA ma kI la sogs pa de rnams kyis bdud rtsis dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su rang ye shes
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sa bon gyi 'od zer las spros pa'i sbyin ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa dang bstod pa yang bya'o/ /de nas de la bdud rtsi lnga dang/ gtor ma dang mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de la 'bul ba'i sngags mi 'di'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya wA k+tsit+ta badzra NI /na mo badzra kro d+ha ya
15b5(rgyud 'grel): sa hA daMSh+Tatka Ta b+hai ra wA ya a si mu Sha la pa ra shU pA sha gri hI ta hastA ya oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha band+ha band+ha ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa gardza gardza bi spho Ta yab? spho Ta ya sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kaM ga Na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta
15b6(rgyud 'grel): kA ya wA k+tsit+ta? badzra NI oM A:hUM/ oM maM maM haM haM kaM kaM raM raM ra ra ma hA ma hA kA la yaM sid+ha? rd+ho ke sha wart+ma? Ne i mo ba la grih+Na grih+Na grih+Na pa ya grih+Na pa ya oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sarba big+ha bi nA ya ka oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NA mA dya nutpan+na twOta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ gtor ma
15b7(rgyud 'grel): byin te yang dag par mchod nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM A:maM haM raM hUM phaT swAhA/ yang dag par mchod cing bstod nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs
16a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzab pa 'di rdzogs so// //dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi spyan sngar bsgyur ba'o// //ye shes mgon po gri gug can gyi bdag bskyed bzlas pa bstod pa rnams bzhugs//
16a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal mgon po sgrub par 'dod pas/ gnas yid dang mthun par stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du btang la/ pad+ma rang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du mi ro bkan pa cig pas ma/ de'i steng du rang nyid skad
16a3(rgyud 'grel): cig gis dpal mgon po sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas gri gug dang g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa/ mchab gcigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du langs pa/ mi mgo skam po lngas dbu
16a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs can/ zhabs g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang pa/ me'i klong dkyil na bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de'i thugs kar raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM mthing nag bsam/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas
16a5(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs nas rgyal ba mi bskyod pa spyan drangs la dbu'i gtsug na bzhugs des mgon po 'khu ldog mi 'byung ba yin gsung/ yang 'od zer dmar smug 'phros pas/ gdug ba can thams cad kyi sems des bsregs par bsam /hUM de'i mdza' /oM
16a6(rgyud 'grel): mahA kA la ha na ha na badzra na hUM phaT/ ces pas g.yas skor du 'khor bar dmigs la/ bsnyen pa 'bum cho bcu bskyal/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /bzod par gsol/ dge ba sngo/ 'bum 'tsho bcu gsum bskyal na steng gdon las thar pa yin
16a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ /dpal mgon po'i bzlas lung la brten pa'i mngon rtogs bla ma'i zhal las byon ba bzhin bris pa'o/ /rtags ni/ phyi dang nang dang mi 'grub dang/ /ldog? brtags lnga ru shes par bya/ /chub shugs drag khang thog 'tsheg glu len bya nag a tsa ra/ /dar nag
16b1(rgyud 'grel): thogs dang 'dod? 'bod/ /phyi'i rtags su shes par bya/ /slob dpon 'o nges gtam smra dang/ /chos 'chang lung ston gdugs 'bul dang/ /b+hanmha stan pa nang gi rtags/ /mgon po'i sku ston gri gug dang/ /mkha' 'gro tshogs dang ca co 'don/ dngos grub ster bar
16b2(rgyud 'grel): rmi ba dang/ /stag dang seng ge 'phyong ba dang/ /shel gyi mchod rten bskor ba dang/ /gtor chen khyer 'phrad 'grub pa'i rtags/ /mtshon? cha'i char dang a car/ /'khrug rgol khrod du zlog rtags so/ /jo bo rjes mdzad pa lags /yang skabs su 'di ltar byed do/ /oM ma hA
16b3(rgyud 'grel): kA la kA na hA na badzra Na bdag la srungs shig srungs shig hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bdag gi zhal nas mgon po'i zhal du zhugs/ /mgon po'i lte ba nas byung nas bdag gi lte bar zhugs te 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du phyar la nyon mongs ba dang/ rnam rtog
16b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nad dang/ gdon la sogs pa'i gnod ba thams cad mthon zhing/ tshur la byin brlabs dang dngos grub 'byung bar bsam shing/ brgya'am stong dam grub tshad bzlas/ gzhan yang/ oM mahA kA la ha na ha na badzra na bdag la gnod bar byed pa'i rgyal 'gor? ?
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dza dza hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la ha na ha na badzra na ba su puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ bdag gi 'byor pa puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ 'byor pa snga dro/ /dgra bgegs 'dul na phyi dro gsung/ /e mahA kA la b+ha li hUM ril rbad bu ni dza/ ma hA ka la tra ga shad sid+d+hi yam du ti dza/ gling byin tshal/ snying nas?
16b6(rgyud 'grel): tshal/ dgra bo 'di mar ya dza dza/ log rtags byung na brgya rtsa tsam gsungs/ sngags kyi phreng ba 'di rnams kyang jo bos mdzad/ /hUM srin po'i gzugs kyi gdug pa can/ /tshar gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jigs byed pa'i/ /
16b7(rgyud 'grel): gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do/ /hUM 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /bstan pa srung bar zhal bzhes pa'i/ /nag po khyod ni yin pa ste/ /gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen brdzes pas/ /steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed/ / 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan bgrad ljags 'dril mche gtsigs pas/ /bar gyi lha tshogs brdegs pa byed/ /g.yas na gri gug bsnams pa ni/ /dgra dgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod/ /g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa ni/ /gnod sems can gyi rkang
17a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag gsol/ /khros pas zhabs gnyis brdabs pa yis/ /gnod sems can gyi lus la gnyed/ /gang gi dkon mchog gsum gnod dang/ /bstan pa la gnod mtshams med byed/ /bdag gis bsgo ba kun khug la/ /ling+ga 'di la myur du khug /'di yi sha zo
17a3(rgyud 'grel): khrag la rol/ /rus pa klad pa nang khrol drongs/ /rigs brgyud rtsad nas chod la shog/ mdza' bo kun dang khrol la shog /yang na 'di yi phyir 'brangs nas/ /til 'bru tsam du mdzad du gsol/ /'di yang jo bo rjes mdzad// //
17a4(rgyud 'grel): */ dpal nag pa chen po'i bstod pa 'phreng 'dzin chos kyi nyin byed bzhugs so/ /
17a5(rgyud 'grel): cha si shwAm+b+ha? dza s+tha sUrya sphu Ti ta ki ra Na hUM bI dza b+hU badzra kA ya/ daSh+TA? b+hi rbi m+ba pI TaM bi kri te b+ha ya ka rA syo gre ro Shan+t+ra rA dza/ sa byA sa byI a rI Na tra sa ya b+ha ya ka ra kart+tri kA pA la d+hA ra/ bandai? A lI Dha pA daM tri b+hu ba naku ma tiM ni gra haM d+harmma dA naM/ nA gASh+Tau b+hUShi tAng+gi? tri b+hu ba na bi
17a6(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs ? skyes nyi ma la gnas 'od zer rab 'gro'i hUM gi sa bon las byung rdo rje'i sku/ /brag? po'i dbang po rnam par 'byung zhing mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku ni 'jigs pa'i gdong dan gsum po'i rgyal?/ /dgra rnams skrag mdzad g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin cing 'jigs byed pa/ /nga yas brgyad? zhabs kyi blo ngan srid gsum nges par 'dzin cing chos sbyin mdzad ba rtag tu rab bdud ?/ /'jig rten chos brgyad la soD sa gsum dug sbyin ?
17b1(rgyud 'grel): Sha dA la ke d+harmmaSh+Ta d+hE ra/ as+thA langkA ra ing+gi tri b+hu ba na a pa da dzA ti mra tyu dzi khA raM/ kart+tA kA pA la na mdya tri b+hu ba na sa pa do ShA ya su dz+nyA b+hi d+hA na/ ping+ga rnga(rgyud 'grel): ka sha pA shaM ku ma ti ga ta na d+h+ragdza yya dA tra na mA mi/ kriSh+Na dzA mU ta mU rt+taM gu Na ga Na pa ra ga shA sa na s+tho pa kA ra/ tsaN+DA rkA lo ka tA mra dza ga ti
17b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rnams kyi yan lag rnams la rgyan char 'dzin/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba'i skye dang 'chi ba las rgyal rus pa'i rgyad kyis ? dang phyag zhabs sbras pas gsum skyon gyi tshogs rnams legs par mkhyen nas gcod pa'i gri gug dang? thed drug? ta bar bstams/ /dmar ser ska yi? zhags pas ? gyis ngan pa 'chi mdzad rgyal? ba'i snor? la gus pas phyag bgyi'o/ /yon tan tshogs kyi pha? rol son zhing bstan pa nye bar bnas mdzad sku ni? char?
17b3(rgyud 'grel): da sha di sha sarbba d+harmma pra kA shA/ lam+ba brtUl kuk+Shi swa dza ga ti ba su de bA su da pA gra ba sha/ kA lA kA le dza gat+mA bi ga me bi m ti tassanme hA kA la banda/ hUM hUM hUM gardza rA ba ba ra hi ta ra tatA nduSh+Ta sa twaM b+ha yaM kriTa/ g+ha g+ha g+ha duSh+Ta branda pra ba tsa na ra hi tAnsa dwa pI DA na dA la? cha cha cha duSh+Ta mAnsa pi pa ru d+hi ra ba sha anda?
17b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrin lta bur gnag/ phyogs bcu'i skye 'gro kun la chos kyi snang ba rab tu gsal mdzad gtum zhing dmar ba'i nyi 'od can/ /mtho ris rol pa'i nor lha mchog gi cha byad bzhin tu lto ba zlun zhing legs par rab 'phyang ba/ /glo gros bral bas dus dang dus min log par byams pa'i' gro ba mdza' dag nag po cha la 'dud/ hUM hUM hUM sgra? srogs pas rnam par tshe ba'i gdug pa'i sems cam 'jigs gzhan la phan mdzad pa/ g+haM g+haM g+haM zhes
17b5(rgyud 'grel): mi phan smra zhing sems can rtag tu 'tshe byed gyur pa'i lpang? ba'i tshogs rnams kun/ /chod chod chod cig gdul pI sha za khrag 'thung tshil
17b6(rgyud 'grel): mA lA kraM tAdgi/ b+ha b+ha b+ha sha tru kA yaM gi la gi la sa ka la ta na mo duSh+Ta da myaM/ b+hIM b+hiM b+hiM duSh+Ta rA shIM? ku ma ti ku tu ha laM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta pI TaM/ moM moM moM kalpe brindAM ku ki ka ha ma na saM ni gre ha sarba driSh+TiM/ kAM kAM kAM kriSh+Ne band+haM
17b7(rgyud 'grel): dang sgyu ma'i 'phreng bas yan lag rnam brgyan pa/ zhig zhig zhig cig dgra bo'i tshogs rnams mdza' dag ming cing ming nas gdug pa 'dul mdzad phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs 'jigs 'jigs mdzad lus ngag yid la rnam par 'tshe ba'i bla ngan sdang ba'i dpud tshogs 'khrugs pa rnams so/ /rmongs rmongs rmongs pI kun rtogs tshogs kyi nges par bcings pa'i yid can lta ba mdza' dag gang rnams dang/ /kaM kaM kaM zhes nag
18a1(rgyud 'grel): mu d+ha bi ma ti ma naM mA ra bak+ShaMbinA sha /kaM kaM kaM mA ra b+hU baM ma gri ba da ha ba tso mA ra nA shaM naM mA mi/ nrA muN+De gran+thi kaN+Tha b+hu ba na ta la tsa la a'u na pany+tsA sha bA yu/ trya ksh+ya langkA ra bak+tra tri b+hu ba na ba sa na darshi tu sa twa rA shA/
18a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i rtsal ga blun zhing rmongs pa'i blo can bdud kyi phyogs ? nyams byed pa/ 'dar 'dar 'dar byed bdud kyi yul rnams thal bar rlog cing 'joms par dam bcas khyod la rab tu 'dud/ /sa 'og g.yo ba'i rlung 'ching lnga bcu nga gcig 'chang mgrin pa dang bcas mi mgo'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'byang/ /srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can phung po ma lus gzigs su? phyir spyan gsum gyis brgyan zhal kyi dkyil 'khor
18a3(rgyud 'grel): pa pa pa b+hud+d+ha shA sna di na ni shi sa ta ta k+Sha tra pA lany+tsa kuryA ta/ ra ra ra darmmA kA ya ku sha la g+ha T a dza ga drak+Sha b+h+ri k+twA na mA ma/ suM suM suM kradshu d+hA nAM swa sha pu sila kri taM b+hA ba nA b+hirbi lA shAM/ ma ga lyo pa s+tha yA nA me paM ku la gu tu pA de dza gansu pra 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong skyong skyong zhig zhing skyong khyod kyis nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong bar mdzod/ /bsrung bsrung bsrung zhig dge ba la sbyor 'gro ba bsrung zhing 'dzin mdzad chos kyi sku can khyod? phyag 'tshal/ /bde bde bde mdzad dge ba la sogs bde rgyas zhi? dang grub pa'i dpal mdzad yangs pa'i mchog stsol ba rigs kyi bla ma'i zhabs sogs 'gro ba kun kyang legs par rab tu bskris nye bar gnas mdzad
18a5(rgyud 'grel): kuryAta/ k+Sha? k+Sha k+Sha d+hyA ya mA nA su ga ta ba tsa na d+h+raksarbya Arya kpa? tha Shu/ dzwa dzwa dzwa ba sha nA nA pa ra hi ta ba hi tatwA dza gatpA na mA mi/ no sa twA na ha ma hA kA la a ra ti bi ma tI to b+ha yo pa dra ba b+hya:/ mra tyu ra go pa sarga b+hyo a ri a hi ta
18a6(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /'cho 'cho 'cho mdzad bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab klog cing 'dzin pa'i yid can 'phags pa'i lam gzas dang/ /phan dang me phan skye bo sbyong? mdzad 'bar 'bar 'bar ba'i cha lugs can khyod gus pas phyag bgyi'o/ /kye kye nag po chen po dga' bral log ba'i? blo can sems can rnams kyi nyer 'tshe'i 'jigs pa dang/ /nad dang 'chi ba'i gnod pa phan bral dgra bo dang ni 'dud kyi las la
18b1(rgyud 'grel): kranmA ra karmot+su ka b+hya:/ de pA yak+Sha gra hA dyA pra ti g+ha ma na kri ta(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Ta nA gA dya karmma:/ shAn+ta puSh+Ta? tsa rak+ShA sha ra da sha di sha na twa ku rU sarbba kA la/ /bud+d+hA nA d+harmma pA la sta ba pa da ra tsi ta bIrya a'ut+sA ha tsi tyaM/ d+hArmmA da tya na tsindya pa ra hi ta ma na sA sarba
18b2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar sbyor ba rnams/ lha dang gnod sbyin bza' dang klu sogs gnod byed rab tu snang ba'ilas kyi yid can mdza' dag kyang// khyod kyi dus dang phyogs bcu kun tu zhi zhing rgyas dang bsrung dang bsrung dang skyabs pa nyid du rab mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam chos skyong la nye bar bstod pa'i tshig gang bkod pa'i spro ba btson 'grus mchog/ sems can thams cad la ni phan pa'i yid
18b3(rgyud 'grel): sa twe tu pAny+tsa/ yatpu N+ya ta na labd+ha bi bi d+ha hi ta su kha dz+nyA ne ta twa ma yA tsa/ sa twA she ShA tri lo ka hi ta su kha ma hi ta twa su la bd+hA sa dA syu:/ dwi b+hu dza mahA kA la sto traM sa mApta mi ti/ kri ti ri yaM sh+rI mat+sad+d+harmA di tya s+tha bi ra pA dA nA mi ti/ de yid+ha rmo yaM pra ba ra ma hA
18b4(rgyud 'grel): can chos kyi nyin byad zhes byas gzhan la phan pa'i blos/ /bsod nams thob pa gang das sna tshogs phan dang bde ba'i rang bzhin bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ /smon pa'i gnas gang 'jig rten gsum na rtag tu phan bde'i de nyid ye shes legs par thob gyur cig/ nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so/ /ces pa 'di ni gnas btan dpal ldan pas pa chos kyi nyin byed zhabs kyi sbyad
18b5(rgyud 'grel): ya na yAyi na ma ma mA ta pi tri pUrbbang+ga ma sa ka la sa twa rA shi ra nut+ta rA yAM sa myaksaM bo d+d+hau pha la prApta yetra// //dpal sa skya lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong rigs sngags 'chang 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams grags pa rgyal mtshan
18b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'dir ba mchog theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pa bdag gipha mas gtso byas sems can mdza' dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob par gyur cig/ dpal bzang pos/ me mkha' rgya mtsholo dag pa'i gzhi bzhag nas lo drug cu bskor brgyad dang nyag ma nyi
18b7(rgyud 'grel): shu bsre ba kun 'dul ces bya ba me mo phag gi lo nag zla ba'i tshes gcig gi nyin/ mkhan chen chos kyi rje bsod nams lhun grub legs pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bkas gnang ba bzhin/ /dpal sa skya bzhi thog tu dag
19a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsgyur ba'o/ /rgya skadma dag pas 'dud cung zad dpyad par bya rgyu yod do// //mgon po tra gshad kyi dbang bzhugs so// dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa'i lag len byed par
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas /khang pa phyag dar lrgs par byas la mchod pa lnga bsham gtor ma ni/ /dang po yi dam dang nag pa chen po ye shes pa la bsngo/ /gnyis pa dpal can srog bdud 'khor bcas la/ gsum pa chos skyong spyi la/ bzhi pa dkar gtor
19a3(rgyud 'grel): cig /rigS drug gnas pa rnams la bsngo/ ka pA la gcig tu chang la bdud rtsi/ a mri ta sbyar la bzhag /tshil chen gyi mar me/ sha chen slos dud/ gu gul gyi dud pa/ spyan gzigs sna tshogs/ chogs mchod sna tshogs mdun du bzhag
19a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ rdzas bsham pa'/ /de nas rang yi dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas sa bon las 'od 'phros/ dpal nag pa chan po yab yum lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba spyan drangs te/ mgon po'i shar du pu tra mo/ /lhor ka ri ma/ nub du re'u tri ma/ byang du las
19a5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma/ nub byang rtsa u tri/ byang shar pe ta mi'o/ /sprul pa mon pho bdun/ mon mo 'dun/ yang sprul phyi mo drug /lho phyogs gshin rje brgya/ byang gnod sbyin brgyad/ bdud dang srin po la sogs pa rang rang gi kha dog dang 'thun pa/ gdan pad nyid pa?
19a6(rgyud 'grel): srin po/ dbyung po ro langs la sogs pa'i steng du/ zhabs brkyang bskum gar gyi tshul du bskyed/ mchod gtor phul la mnyes par bsam/ de nas bdag gi slob ma 'di rnams la mgon pos dbang bskur du gsol/ /zhes gsol ba lan gsum
19a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ de nas rigs drugu dang/ gnyug mar gnas pa'i gtor ma 'byung gtor bzhin dbul/ /yi dam dang ye shes pa la gtor ma dbul/ nag po chen po srog bdud 'khor bcas la/ 'di rang gi byin rlabs rgyas bsdus gang rung gis phul/ bstod ?
19b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ 'phrin las gzhol lo/ /mgon po nI? gtor ma dbang gi don du bzhag /chos skyong spyi'i gtor ma btang/ yig brgya grub tshang gcig bzlas/ de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam gyi snying po dang/ oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud d+ha d+ha kri ni sha ri
19b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): ces pa stong phrag gcig bzlas so/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la phyag dang yon dang maN+Dal phul la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /dri ma ma lus ngag bya'i phyir/ /ma smin
19b3(rgyud 'grel): smin ba'i dbang rnams brtsol/ zhes gsol ba lan gsuM gdab bla mas gnang ba bya ste/ da ni sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo yin/ /da ni khrag thung kun gyi rje/ /da ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gtso/ /khyed la nga'i mthu sbyin zhing/ /byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro//
19b4(rgyud 'grel): ces das dbang sbyin gyis bsgrubs cig gsung bar bsam mo/ /de nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbog ste/ dangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang/ /bla ma yi dam lha tshogs dang/ /bde gshegs rnams la skyabs
19b5(rgyud 'grel): su mchi/ /ces lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub du ni nges mdzad cing/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis sems bskyed do/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i don sgom /de nas thod pa bdud rtsi dang bcas
19b6(rgyud 'grel): pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ dpon slob gnyis kas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ srog bdud yab yun la lha mo bdun dang/ sprul pa mon mo bdun/ yang sprul khyi mo drug /sbas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bsams la gsol ba gsum gdab/ 'di skad
19b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ dus gsum sangs rgyas spyan lam du/ /mos gus dang pas 'dud pa la/ sku'i rang bzhin byin par byed/ /'gyur med nag pas dbang bskur zhing/ /ngar 'joms byed pa dug 'dra ba'i/ /zil gnon seng ge lpags pa'i gos/ /mi 'gyur g.yung drung mun pa'i
20a1(rgyud 'grel): gos/ /gsod byed drag po dbang gi gos/ /mgon po'i gos kyiS dbang bskr ro/ /ces mgo thog du bzhag/ yang gong gi gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /gsung gi dbang bzhi dag la bskur ro/ /gzhad pa ha ha gad mo'i dbang khrod
20a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dza la phaT kyi dbang/ /zhi mdzad swA hA sbyor ba'i dbang/ /bsdud pa hUM mdzad pheM gi dbang/ bshugs pa'i bod pa b+hand+ha'i dbang/ /bod rbad rnam bzhis dbang bskur ro/ /yang lan gsum gdab/ thugs kyi dbang bzhi sems la bskur/ /nyon mongs zil gnon
20a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag med dbang/ /sdug bsngal gdung 'dren snying rje'i dbang/ /sred med sbyor ba gnyis med dbang/ /'bras bu dang chas 'gro don dbang/ /'gro don dgongs pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /yon tan 'phrin las des pa'i dbang bskur sbyin/ /rang don longs spyod rdzogs
20a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan gter/ /gzhan don dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i yon tan gter/ 'bras bu 'phrin las nges par dbang bskur ro/ /zhi mdzad zhi ba'i 'phrin las dang/ /rgyas mdzad rgyas pa'i 'phrin las dang/ /dbang sdud dbang gi 'phrin las dang/ /mngon
20a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyong drag po'i 'phrin las bzhi/ /las bzhi mdzad pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /zhes brjod pas/ rang yi dam lha dang nag po chen po'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros bas/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas nag po 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ bar snang gi dam tshig pa la
20a6(rgyud 'grel): bstim la/ /dpal nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi phyag na/ rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba thogs te/ slob ma'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur te/ smin mtshams yan gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/ lus kyi dri ma dag par bsam /mgrin pa
20a7(rgyud 'grel): yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang thob/ dag gi dri ma dag/ snying ga yan chad gang bas shes rab ye she kyi dbang thob/ sems kyi dri ma dag/ lte ba nas gsang gnas yan chad gang bas dbang bzhi pa thob/ /lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ma dag /sku gsum gyi don thob par gnyis kas bsam mo/ /dngos su slob dpon gyis sngar gyi thod pa'i bdud rtsi de mgo thog tu blugs te khrus byas 'thung du bcug pas/ lus sems thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang bar bsam zhing/ sngags
20b2(rgyud 'grel): drag tu bzlas te/ sarba ta shA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba badzra badzra phaT/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A:hUM traM hI:swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba bud+d+ha badzra phaT/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A:hUM traM h+rI swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba radNa? badzra phaT/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A:
20b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+raM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba pad+ma badzra phaT a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba karma badzra phaT/ a b+he Sheny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM triM h+rIM(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba pa paM shin+twaM ku ru yaM swA hA/ a b+hi Shiny+dza? mi?
20b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba puSh+TiM ku ru ye swAhA/ a b+ha Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM h+rI swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba ba shaM ku ru swAhA/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM h+rI swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra sarba mA ra ya hUM dzAs
20b5(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bang yang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /de tshe las kyi gnyer dag gtad/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa gsrung bar mdzod/ /ces rjes gnang sbyin/ /las kyi gnyer gtad mlud
20b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan par byas te bkris brjod do/ /bla ma rgyud pa'i mtshan brjod/ /bden pa brdar/ de nas nag po chen po yab yum 'kho dang bcas pas/ ka pA la sha khrag gis bkang ba bzung nas/ slob ma'i mgo thog tu bzhag te/ bod rbad gsang gsum dang gtor
20b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags ring po di ri ri bzlos shing/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung gcig zer bar dpon slob gnyis kas bsams la/ dngos su gong gi gtor ma de mgo thog tu bzhag la/ srog thigs la sogs pa'i sngags dang gtor sngags ring po brjod
21a1(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyis/ lha ma srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol/ srid gsum zil gyis gnon cing nag po chen pos gzi brjid mi thub pa'i lha 'jigs byed dam yi dam gang byed cig tu dpon slob gnyis kas bsgom mo/ /'di ni mgon po'i
21a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma la brten nas 'phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba yin no/ /de nas gtor ma gcan zan yod par gtang/ yi ge brgya pas lhag chad ba bskang/ /dbang bskur gyi lha rnams rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs so/ /de nas bla ma la yon phul la phyag dang bskor
21a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bya'o/ /de ltar dbang rnam pa bzhi sku gsum 'phrin las dang/ gtor dbang dang bcus/ srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba slob dpon d+ha lin a tsa ryas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad
21a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyas pa cig dang bzhugs skad// //mang+ga laM/ dpal nag po chen po'i las tshogs paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas spas pas mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rdo rje can/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid gsum gus
21a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje nag po chen po yi/ /bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis/ /gdug pa can rnams tshar bcad pa'i/ /drag bo'i las kyi rim pa bshad/ /gang zhig bstan pa 'jig pa dang/ /bla ma la ni rgyab phyogs shing/ /sems can du ma 'tshe byed pa/ /de la brnam gyis
21a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du min/ /de la sngags pas grub bya bsad par 'dod na/ /de'i rim pa 'di yin te/ dang po ling ga bya ba ni/ chu 'gram sa dang shing gcig pa/ /grog mkhar tshwa sgo can gyis/ /gang la dmigs pa'i bshad gcig dang/ /mtshan ngan thod par bsres pa las
21a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub bya'i gzugs ni sor brgyad pa'i/ /snying khar dug khrag dur sol rnams/ /sbyar bas bris pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/ /snying khar sngags dang gang dmigs ming/ /bskul tshig mdza' rten can bris bzhug /de nas mtshan ngan thod pa yi/ nang bzhug mi
21b1(rgyud 'grel): shi'i sgra yis bcing/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste/ /rang nyid lho phyogs kha bltas nas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor byas pa yis/ /snying kha'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i/ /mgon po'i tshogs ni dpag med pa/ /dog dmar zhal gtsag khyag gnyis pa/ lcags ?
21b2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa 'dzin pa yis/ /sgrub bya bkug nas mdun gnas par/ /bsams te kha sbyar phye ba dang/ /bltam nas gnyis su med par lta/ /de nas bzlas pa brtsam pa ni/ /oM badzra mahA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ zhes bzlas sngags kyi yig 'bru rnams/
21b3(rgyud 'grel): yang gi kha nas 'thon pa dang/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i mgon po'i tshogs/ /mdog nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa yis/ /sgrub bya rnam par 'bigs pa dang/ /gcod dang gtub pas phung po ni/ /til 'bru'i tshad tsam phyi mar bsgom
21b4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sgom dang bzlas pa ni/ /bdun gsum bar bya rdzogs pa dang/ /gzugs brnyan phyung ste gtubs pa dang/ /dug gi chu la spags pa yis/ /tsher ma can gyi shing me la/ /gsang sngags bzlas shing sdeg par bya/ /des ni sgrub bya tshangs pa dang/ /dbang po yin
21b5(rgyud 'grel): yang nges par ni/ /tshe yi du byed 'jig pa la/ /the tshom yod pa la/ /the tshom yod pa ma yin no/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las bsad pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byor pas bsgrub bya gnas nas bskad par 'dod ni/ /de yi rim pa 'di yin te/ /dang po
21b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor bri ba las/ /gzhi ni rlung gis phab pa yi/ /shing lo bar snang nas blangs te/ /dug khrag dur khrod sol ba rnams/ /mi shis thod pa'i snod du sbyar/ /rab tu ltogs pa'i sgri rtsa yis/ /'khor lo rtsibs drug lte ba dang/ /bcas pa dris te rtsibs
21b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /sngags drug dgod bya lte dbus phaT/ /de mthar sgrub bya'i ming dang ni/ /uts+tsha Ta yi spel tshigs la/ /phaT kyi mthar brten sbyar ba bri/ /de nas mtshan dan thod pa la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris pa yi/ /nang du bzhag ste rnal 'byor pa/ /lho bltas lha
22a1(rgyud 'grel): yi rnal 'byor du/ /gnas pa'i mdun du nag po che/ /bskyed la ye shes dgug la sogs/ /byas te mchod pa gtor ma dang/ /bstod pas mnyes par byas pa dang/ /phrin las sgrub zhes gsol ba ni/ /bstan la sdang ba'i
22a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa can/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /bkug cing dbang du bsdu ba dang/ /gnas gzhan rnams su bskrad du gsol/ /zhes brjod ns ni sngags bzlas shing/ /oM badzri ma ? kA la cig mo dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho ? zhes pa dag tu bzlas pa'i tshe/ /mdun na/
22a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i mgon po las/ /sprul pa dpag med spros pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog dmar ba/ /lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin pa yis/ /snying phug mgrin pa bcings pa dang/ /bkug nas bstim pa gnyis med lta/ /de nas bskrad pa'i gsang
22a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ /oM mahA kA la che ge me uts+tsha tra ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas pa dang ting 'dzin ni/ /mdun gnas mgon po las sdul? ba'i/ /khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pha/ /lag na sna tshogs mchon rdzogs nas/ /bsdigs mo'i phyag rgya phyed pa des/
22a5(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo 'di yul gzhan du/ /da lta ny+d du mi 'gro na/ /rgyob song rnam par 'bigs pa dang/ /khub bur byed ces zer ba yis/ /sgrub bya rnam par rtsas nas su/ /rang gi gnas nas skrod pa dang/ /'og nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ /khro bo'i tshogs
22a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus las kyang/ /rlung gi rang bzhin 'od 'phros pas/ /bteg cin rgyab nas 'phul ba dang/ /skad cig ci yang ma thoD par/ /gnas gzhan dag tu khyer 'phangs na/ /de ltar sgom dang bzlas pa ni/ /stong phrag bdun bya rdzogs pa dang/ /'khor lo
22a7(rgyud 'grel): rta'am rnga mo yi/ /rnga mas bcings te bya rog gi/ mgul par bcings nas spur ba na/ /sgrub bya rang gi gnas de nas/ /gzhan du skrod par the tshom med/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las bskrad pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byor
22b1(rgyud 'grel): pas sgrub bya phan tshun dbye bar 'dod na/ dang po 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni/ /rta dang ma he'i rus pa la/ bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis su/ /sgrub bya gnyis kyi gzugs bris pa'i/ /snying khar sngags dang sgrub bya'i ming/ /bskul tshig mdza' rten bcas pa bri/ /de nas
22b2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa mchan ngan du/ /gzugs gnyis mgo 'jug snol ma ru/ /brtsegs nas gzhag tsang bya rog dang/ /'ug pa rta dang ma he yi/ /khrag dang 'jug dogs phan tshun sa/ /sbyar ba'i phye ma bar pu bzhug/ /lho phyog kha bltas rnal 'byor pas/ /rang nyid lha'i rnal
22b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor du/ /gnas pa'i snying ba'i sa bon las/ /spros pa'i sprul pas sgrub bya gnyis/ /bkug ste rang rang gzugs la bstim/ /de nas dbye ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /oM badzra mahA kA la che me dang ? po dwe ShA ya hUM phaT/ ces bzlas te dus ting 'dzin ni/ /sgrub bya ba mtshud
22b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chad 'bru zhing/ /gcig gcig nyes pa sna tshogs brjod/ /gcig la gcig gis brdeg pa dang/ /phan tshun rmas par byas pa yis/ /so sor gnas par bsam par bya/ /sgom dang bzlas pa'i rim pa des/ /stong phrag bdun du sngags bzlas te/ ./mthar ni
22b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan gcig la gcig/ grud pas phan tshun nyams byas nas/ /phye mar byas te chu bo la/ /dor bas 'byed par gdon mi za/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las/ /dbye ba'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byor pas sgrub bya'i
22b6(rgyud 'grel): lus rengs par bya bar 'dod na/ /dang po 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni/ /dur khrod pa la yung ba dang/ /dur khrod sol ba bsres pa yis/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor bris pa yis/ /steng du sgrub bya'i gzugs bris te/ /snying khar sngags ming bskul cha gi dang/ /? rten
22b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bri bar bya/ /yan lag bzhi dang mgo bo la/ /laM yig ser po'i steng gnas pa'i/ /su yig ljang gu bri bar bya/ /lte ba'i dbus su lam ser dang/ de steng gnas pa'i suM yig ljang/ /la gnas hUM yig nag po bri/ /rang nyid lhor bltar mdun
23a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi char/ /'khor lo maN+Dal steng bzhag nas/ /sgrub po lha ? rnal 'byor du/ /gnas pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las/ /sprul pa spros pas bsgrub bya ni/ /bkug nas gzugs la bstim pa dang/ oM badzra mahA kA la hUM phaT/ laM che ge mo'i kA ya stam+b+ha ya
23a2(rgyud 'grel): laM/ ces pa'i gsang sngags bzlas bya zhing/ /rengs byed ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas/ /bsgrub bya dbang chen steng gnas pa'i/ /lus gnas lam yig yongs gyur pas/ /sprul pa'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi/ /steng du suM yig yongs gyur pa'i/ /ri bos rnam par mnan
23a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /lte bar ri bo la gnas pa'i/ /hUM gyur pa las rgya gram gyi/ /rdo rjes rnam par mnan pa ru/ /bsgoms shing stong phrag bdun bzlas na/ /sgrub bya'i lus ni rengs 'gyur bar/ /the tshom yong ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las lus rengs par byed pa'i
23a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byo pas dag rengs par bya bar 'deod na dang por 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni/ /dur khrod ras la yung ba dang/ /ra las sbyar ba'i snag tsha yis/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sgrub bya'i gzugs
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bris de yi lce/ /phyir la drangs pa'i lto ba'i steng/ /khabs pa'i rnal pa can bris te/ /de'i steng laM yig ser po la gnas pa'i suM yig ljang khu yi/ /steng du hUM yig nag po la/ /laM yig ser po la gnas pa'i/ /suM yig ser pos bskor ba bri/ /sgrub pa rang
23a6(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid lhor bltas pa'i/ /mdun du maN+Dal steng bzhag ste/ /lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i/ /snying kha'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i/ /sprul pa sgrub bya mdun bkug nas/ /gzugs la bstim pas gnyis med lta/ /de nas ngag rengs bya ba'i phyir/ /bzlas
23a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ laM che ge mo'i ngag stam+b+ha ya lam/ zhes bzlas sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /dbang chen la gnas sgrub bya'i gzugs/ /dpag tshad brta stong? tshad tsam la /rang lus 'od 'phros las byung ba'i/ /khro bo
23b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /lag na lcags kyu 'dzin pa yis/ /lce ni phyir la drangs pa dang/ /dpag tshad brgya yi tshang tsam gyis/ /lto ba'i ? rnams khebs pas sgom/ /de stengs laM yig yongs gyur las/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng gnas
23b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /suM gyur pa las ri bo'i steng/ /hUM gyur rdo rje mnan pa la/ /laM gyur pa las dban chen steng/ /gnas pa'i ? yig gyur pa las/ /grub pa'i gser gyi ri bdun g yis bskor bas rnam par mnan par sgom/ /gzhan yang rang lus las sprul ba'i/ /
23b3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshogs ni dpag med kyis/ /sgrub bya'i le yi steng gnas nas/ /mtshon chs dum bur byed pa dang/ /de dag 'dus khas bskal pa yis/ /me bzhin tsha ba'i 'od byung nas/ /bsregs par bsgoms pas stong phrag bdun/ /bzlas pas gdon mi
23b4(rgyud 'grel): za bar 'grub/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las dag rengs par phyed pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byor pas yid rengs par bya bar 'dod na/ /dang po 'khrul 'khor bri ba ni/ sngar bstan gzhi ? tsha yis dbang chen dkyil 'khor
23b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni bris pa yis/ /snying khar lam yig ser po las/ /gnas pa'i huM? yig ljang khu yi/ /steng du hUM yig mthing kha bri/ /rang nyid lho phyogs pa bltas pa'i/ /mdun du maN+Dal steng bzhag ste/ 'dod pa mi lha'i rnal 'byor la/ /
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sa bon las spros pa'i/ /sprul pas bkug nas/ bstim pa dang/ /yid rengs byed pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /mnyam pr bzhag pas bzlas pa ni/ /oM badzra mahA kA la hUM phaT/ lam che ge mo tsit+ta ya stam+b+ha ya lam/ zhes sngags bzlas dang ting 'dzin ni/ /
23b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng gnas ba'i/ /sgrub bya gan rgyal gnas pa yi/ /snying khar laM byung dbang chen dang/ /sum byung ri bos mnan pa yis/ /steng du rdo rjes mnan pa yis/ /dran pa rnam par nyams pa dang/ /brgyal ba lta bur bsgom bya zhing/ /rang lus
24a1(rgyud 'grel): las spros khro bo'i tshogs/ /dbyug tho gtun shing tho ba dang/ /rdo rje khu tshur gdengs pas kyang/ /sgrub bya'i snying khar bsnun pa yis/ /dran pa nyams par byas pa de/ /ro bzhin gnas par bsgoms pa dang/ /gsang sngags
24a2(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag bdun bzlas na/ /yid rengs par ni the tshom med/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las yid rengs par byed pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te rnal 'byor bas sgrub bya srid skams par 'dod na/ /dang po gzugs brnyan bya ba ni/ /sngar bstan sa sna
24a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po dang/ /sgrub bya'i bshad gci bsres pa las/ /gang dmigs gzugs ni sor brgyad pa/ /byas pa'i skye gnas nang du ni/ /gro ga'am ni shing lo la/ /sna tshogs dug dang tsha ba gsum/ /lcags kyi snod du sbyar ba yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /'khor lo
24a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyas lte ba dang/ /mu khyud ldan pa bri bya ste/ /rtsibs rnams la ni sngags bri zhing/ /lte bar ming dang bskul tshig dang/ /mdza' sten raM yig bcas par bi/ /mu khyud la ni raM yig gi/ phreng bas bskor ba bri ba dang/ /gzugs kyi nang du bcug byas nas/ /rang nyid lhor
24a5(rgyud 'grel): bltas 'dod pa'i lha'i/ /rnal 'byor gnas pa'i snying kha yi /sa bon las spros sprul pa yi/ /chogs kyi sgrub bya bkug la bstim/ /de nas srid skems ting 'dzin dang/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /sgrub bya mdun nas bltas pa yi/ /skye gnas nang du nyi ma la/ /'khor lo
24a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bcas bltas pa dang/ /ngag tu gsang sngags bzlas payis/ /kha nas 'od zer 'phros pa dang/ /'khor lo'i ri yig spas pa yis/ /'khor lo mgar gi so mal gyis/ /lcags bzhin bsregs par bsgom pa dang/ /sngags dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las/ /byugn 'od me
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin tsha ba yis/ /sgrub bya'i mngal skems pa sgom zhing/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam pa ni/ /oM badzra mahA kA la hUM phaT /che ge mo'i mngal sho Sha ya sho Shu ya raM/ /ces sngags stong phrag bdun bzlas pas/ /sgrub bya'i mngal ni skem pa dang/ /srid nyams par ni byed pa la/
24b1(rgyud 'grel): the tshom yod pa ma yin no/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las srid skam pa'i mngon spyod rdzogs so// //gal te mngon spyod de rnams kyis/ /sgrub bya rnam par skrag gyur nas/ /sdig las yongs su ldog pa dang/ /sgrub pa po la gus byed na/ /slar yang zhi bar byed pa yi/ /phrin las
24b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa pos brtsam pa/ /sde dro yi ni dus kyi char/ /gtsang ma'i ra saM dge ba yi/ /shing gi lo ma gang rung la/ /gur gum yang na gi waM ni/ /dngul gyi snod du 'o ma dang/ /sbyar te 'o can shing snyug gis/ /rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo lte ba dang/ can shing snyug gis/ /rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo lte ba dang/
24b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ /lte bar sgrub ming bskul tshig dang/ /mdza' rten bcas pa bri ba dang/ /rang nyid shar du kha bltas pa'i/ /mdun du dngul laM dud las su/ /byas pa'i gnod du bzhag pa dang/ /rang nyid rnal 'byor zhi ba yi/ /sems dang ldan pas zhi ba'i las/ /sgrub byed gsang na?
24b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa ni/ /oM badzra mahA kA la hUM phaT swA hA che ge mo shan+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes bzlas zhi ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ /rang nyid kha nas 'od zer ni/ /kun de ltar dkar 'phros pa yis/ /mdun gnas 'khor lo'i sngags rnams la/ phag nas de las shel god ltar/ /dkar zhing zla b ltar bsal?
24b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /'od 'phros sgrub bya'i lus phog pas/ /zhi bar byed par stom pa dang/ /gsang sngags stong phrag gsum bzlas te/ /mthar ni 'khor lo dri zhim chus/ /bgrus te sgrub bya'i lus bkrus pas/ /zhi bar byed par gdon mi za/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i las mngon spyod slar gso bar
