24b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa zhi ba'i las rdzogs so// //gal ta bsad sogs mngon spyod kyis/ /sgrub bya rnam par skrag byas kyang/ /sdig las ldog dang sgrub po las/ /slar gus par ni mi byed na/ /sngar bstan mngon spyod de dag rnams/ /mthar phyin bya phyir sbyin sreg ni/ /rnal
24b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yis brtsam par bya/ /cha sga can nas sa blangs te/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa yi/ /dbus su skye gnas dbyibs can gyi/ /khru gang chad kyi thab khud bya/ /der ni gdug pa'i shing brtsigs te/ rngon pa'i khyim nas me blangs la/ /lhor bltas lho yi rnal
25a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor du/ /gnas pas thab tu pad+ma dang/ /nyi ma'i gdan la ri yig las/ /me lha mdog nag khro bo'i gzugs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /phyag na dbyig pa spyi blugs can/ /bsgoms te khrag gi yon chab dang/ /til dang yungs?
25a2(rgyud 'grel): nag las byung mar/ /dug dang ske tshe smyon pa yi/ /'bras bu mi shis skra dang gos/ /dum por byas nas khyi phag dang/ /bod pu'i rus pa lpags pa rnams/ /lag pa g.yon pas blangs pa dang/ /sngags 'di brjod la dbul par bya/ /oM badzra agne? ye raM raM che ge mo la
25a3(rgyud 'grel): mu kaM hUM hUM phaT raM raM/ /de nas me lha mchod pa lnga/ /drag por sbyar bas mchod pa dang/ /'bar chen me yi rang bzhin du/ /bltas pa'i dbus su nag po che/ /sgrub thabs nas 'byung bzhin bskyed la/ /ye shes gzhug dang sku gsung thugs/ /byin gyis brlab pa rgyas ?
25a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /dug khrag me tog gu gul nag/ yungs dkar sgog skya sbyar ba'i sbos/ /bod bu'i chu sbyar dri chab khrag/ 'bru nag dang sbyar sha chen bshos/ /rang rang sngags kyi slad du ni/ /badzra mahA kA la sbyar/ /sngags rnams brjed cing lag g.yon pas/
25a5(rgyud 'grel): thab tu blugs te dbul bar bya/ /de nas khrag gi yon chab sags/ /sngar bstan pa yi rdzas rnams ni/ /gong du bstan pa'i cho ga yis/ /sngags 'di brjod cing dbul brgyad?/ oM badzra ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ ces pa la ni sgrub bya'i ming/ /las gang yin pa de yin ni/
25a6(rgyud 'grel): bskul tshig mdza' rten bcas brjod pas/ /thabS tu nag po che la dbul/ /de nas sngar bzhin mchod pa dang/ /las kyi gsol pa gdab pa ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa la/ /gdug pa tshar bcad srung bar zhal bzhes pa'i/ /nag po chen
25a7(rgyud 'grel): po khyod kyis mngon spyod kyi/ /las 'di myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /ces brjod rkang pa brgyad pa yis/ /bstod de yi ge brgya pa la/ badzra mu:zhes brjod pa yis/ /gshaD pa dang ni dmi dmiD lta/ de nas slar yang me lha ni/ /sngar bstan pa de bltas pa dang/ /khrag gi yon
25b1(rgyud 'grel): chab la sogs rnams/ /sngar gyi rim pas dbul ba dang/ /mchod pa lnga yis legs mchod de/ /las kyi gsol pa gdab pa ni/ /drang song chen po gdul dka' ba/ /ma rungs gdug pa 'dul ba po/ /khyod kyis bdag gi sgrub bya yi/ /las 'di myur du bsgrub tu gsol?
25b2(rgyud 'grel): tsam brjod nas ni gshegs gsol la/ /badzra agne mu:zhes pa/ brjod de ye shes lha gshegs la/ /dam tshig lha ni mi dmigs lta/ /de nas thal ba bsdus pa dang/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdul bya yi/ /gdon gyis bzung ba'i thod pa ru/ /blugs te mnan pa
25b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'am/ /yang na chu bor dor ba dang/ /rlung la phyar bas las kun ni/ /grub pa la ni gdon mi za/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg rdzogs so// //rdo rje nag po chen po'i mngon spyod kyi las nyi tshe ba/ /slob dpon 'phag pa klu sgrub kyi
25b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas brgyud pa'i man ngag/ jo bo a b+ha ya kA ras bkod pa/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po sin d+ha ba sangs rgyas grags pas bsgyur pa'o// //kha sbyar dbye ba ni/ /de la rang gi snying kha'i hUM las 'phros pa las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshigs
25b5(rgyud 'grel): spros la/ de rnams kyis de la ye shes lha'i kha sbyar yod na/ gtang bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /sdig can las ngan sems can 'di/ /mnar med rgyud la gnas pa ni/ /rtse bas bdag gzhan zlog byed pas/ /khyod kyis bsrung ba btang du gsol/
25b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes dngos su rang gi blos de dag gis brjod par bsam/ /ye shes lhas gsan nas de btang de mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsams la/ snying kha nas 'phros pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod la rang gnas su gshegs/ /de nas 'jig rten
25b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams khro bo'i tshogs de rnams kyi snying kha nas lcags kyus drangs te/ rgyab nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pas 'debs pas dpag tshad du bskrad par bsam/ gzugs gu gul gyis bdug go/ //yum tsaN+Di? ka'i sgrub ? kyi rgya bzhud dang dpe'i ga len ? ge rang
26a1(rgyud 'grel): ? 'o?/ //he ru ka dpal yab yum dang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i chogs/ /nag po che la phyag 'tshal nas/ /las kyi lha mo'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /thab khung tshad ldan mdog bsgyur bya/ /'thun pa'i dam rdzas tshogs par bsag
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu tshogs ling ga 'dzub gang te/ /rims bzhin mnor steng du bzhag /zur gsum tshil chen me? gsum gsum/ /logs gsum gtor ma mchod pa bsham/ /rang nyid bde mchog 'khor lo'am/ /yang na ye shes mgon por sgom/ /logs gsum du naM lha mo ste/
26a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog la sogs zhal las shes/ /de nas bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya/ /oM ma hAkA li de wi grih+Na pA li a mu kaM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ da ha da ha/ pa ca pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ya/ spo Ta ya/ spho Ta ya/ khaM hi hUM phaT/ gsang sngags de brjod rtags rnams 'byung/ /des kyang
26a4(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnams ma byung na/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bya ste/ /shin tu drag po'i las byed na/ /mchod rten nag po tshad? ldan dang/ /sgrub bya'i li dag tshul bzhin bya/ /rtags kyi dang ru gnyis kyang gzugs/ /thun rdzas drag por brteg par bya/ /oM kA li kA li mahA kA
26a5(rgyud 'grel): li rak+ta li nri rbang sh+rI b+h+rak+Sha swa ra bA li stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT/ /de nyid drag tu bzlas pa yis/ /sgro las me stag 'byung ba ste/ /de tshe drag po'i las rnams ni/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /des kyang las byed ma 'chun na/ /dpa' bo'i nga rgyal sngags
26a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di bzlas/ /sarba sha tU? lam thibs thibs swAhA/ sbyin sreg dag gi las la bzhug /'thun pa'i rdzas kyi btang rag btang/ /mgon po'i gsang ba'i srog thig/ dam nyams kyi snying 'byin/ /bstan la sdang ba dgral ba'i las/ /tsaN+Di ka'i tshig sgrub ces
26a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rdzogs so// //rang glings lo tsA ba rdo rje dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// //nag po chen po'i dbang bzhi bsdus pa/ gtor ma'i byin brlabs dang bcas pa 'di/ /grub chen rdo rje dril gungs mdzad par gcig tu 'di ches bar dka' yang yi ge snyings yin pas ko/
26b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa len par 'dod pas/ /gnas khang phyag dar bya mchod pa lnga bsham/ /der gtor ma gsum bya ba ni/ /dang po gtor ma dpal can cig bya/ /yi dam dang nag po chen po ye shes pa la bsngo/ /gnyis
26b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dpal can cig nag po chen po bya rog gdong can la sogs pa'i phyogs skyong rnams la bsngo/ /dpal med pa'i dkar gtor cig rigs drug dang gnyug par gnas pa rnams la bsngos? ka pA la mtshan dang ldan pa gcig tu chang dang bdud rtsi sbyar la
26b3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bzhag pa ni rdzas bsham pa'o// //de nas rang lhan skyes su mos pa'i thugs kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/ /skad cig gis mdun du dpal nag po chen po yab yum lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba can drangs te/ de yang/ shar
26b4(rgyud 'grel): du bya rgod gdod can ma/ /byang du khyud gi gdong can ma/ /nub tu khwa'i? gdong can ma/ /lho ru 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /shar lhor phag gdong ma/ /lho nub tu khyi gdong ma/ /nub byang du sbyang gdong ma/ /byang shar du stag gdong ma'o/ /lha mo de thams cad
26b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar mo/ /pad nyi'i steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom/ /de dag gi mdun du phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod la/ slob ma 'di rnams la dbang bskur du gsol/ /ces pa'i gsol ba lan gsum du gdab po/ /de nas rigs drug dang
26b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyug mar gnas pa la gtor ma 'byung gtor bzhin byin gyis brlabs la btang/ de nas nag po bya rog gdong can la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di rang gi lugs kyi byin brlabs rgyas bsdus gang rung byas pas phrin las gzhol zhing gtor ma
26b7(rgyud 'grel): bya gcan zan gyis za bar btang/ /yi dam dang ye shes pa'i gtor ma de gtor dbang gi rten du bzhag go/ de nas yi ge brgya pa grub tshad cig bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes la/ ka pA la'i bdud rtsil dmigs la/ /oM h+rI:ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la
27a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI shwa ri hUM dza:ces pa sum sbrel du bzlas pa stong phrag gcig bya'o/ /de nas slob ma nges bla ma la phyag dang maN+Dal dang yon phul te gsol ba gdab ba ni/ rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /
27a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /dri ma ma lus dag bya'i phyir/ /ma smin smin pa'i dbang rnams gsol/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ de nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbog pa ni/ slong dpon gyi rjes zlos byed du bcug ste/ sangs
27a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/ /byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag gis dge ba bgyis ba 'di dag gis/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces lan gsum du brjod/ /de nas slob dpon gnyis kas
27a4(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ nag po chen po yab yum la lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba gong ltar bsgoms la/ de rnams kyi phyag nas ye shes kyi bum pa'i chus slob ma la dbang bskur ngas/ smin mtshams yan chad gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/ lus
27a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dri ma dag par gnyis kas mos pa bya/ mgrin pa yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang thob/ dag gi dri ma dag par mos pa bya/ snying kha yan chad gang bas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/ sems kyi dri ma dag par mos pa bya/ lte ba nas gsang gnas
27a6(rgyud 'grel): yan chad gang bas dbang bzhi pa thob/ lus ngag yid gsum ka'i dri ma dag par mos pa bya zhing/ dngos su slob dpon gyis ka pA la'i bdud rtsi slob ma'i mgon mar blugs te/ khrus byed pa dang 'thung du bcug pas/ lus thams cad byang chub
27a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems kyi chus gang bar bsam zhing gong gi sngags sum sbrel la a b+hi Shiny+tsa yA mi zhes brjod mthar bde mchog gi bkra shis brjod pa tsam gyis dbang bzhi rdzogs su thob pa yin / de nas nag po chen po yab
27b1(rgyud 'grel): yum lha mo brgyad dang bcas pas ? pA la sha khrag gi gtor mas bkang ba bzung nas/ slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste/ rkang pa brgyad pa dang gtor sngags sgra'i ri ri brjod cing/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrungs cig/ ces zer bar dpon slob gnyis kas
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing/ dngos su slob dpon gyis/ yi dam dang nag po chen po'i gtor ma cig tu byas pa de slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste/ rkang pa brgyad pa dang gtor sngags lan gsum brjod pa cam gyis snang srid kyi lta ma srin thams cad bran du 'khol ba
27b3(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i nag po chen po gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug na lhan skyes bzhugs pa gcig tu dpon slob gnyis kas sgom pa ni gtor ma la brten pa'i phrin las kyi dbang ngo/ /de nas gtor ma bya
27b4(rgyud 'grel): gcan gyis za sar btang/ /he ru ka'i yi ge brgya pas la? bskang/ /dbang bskur mkhan gyi lha rnams rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'am/ mi dmigs par bsgom/ de nas bla ma la bskor ba lan gsum byed du bzhug/ phyag dang maN+Dal phul ba
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin che zhes zer du bcug la ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /de ltar dbang bzhi phrin las gtor ma'i dbang dang lngas nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa bskur ba'o/ /dbang bskur gyi cho ga rin chen phreng 'dra zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rdo rje dril bu bas
27b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ithi// //mgon po bsang pa mdzod kyi las byang bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri mahA ka la hi si ta/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal 'jigs byed phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dur khrod dang ni dben
27b7(rgyud 'grel): ? sar/ drag po'i las kyi sgrub pa bya/ /dang po yid dam rdzogs par snyen/ /gtor ma'i sbyin pas rigs drug sdu/ /rgya chen mchod pa'i srid du phul/ /'dri dang klog dang sku gzugs bzhengs/ /grangs sogs khrag sngags sgo phug rtags/ /yar gyi ngo la tsam par bya/ /me dang lcaD
28a1(rgyud 'grel): ni dang ba dang/ /mtshams lon gzhan du mi smra'o/ /lho ru ltas te sgrub pa'o/ /tshogs nyid dag pas rgyu nyid sbyangs/ /'dun du tshogs bsags 'khor lo sgom/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa sdu/ /zur gsum las sbyor 'dod lngas brgyan
28a2(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod ras la khrag gis so/ /sbral bar rdo rje mthu chen no/ /thugs dang 'gren par sgrub sten lha/ /dmar smug mdangs gyi de nyid gsol/ /mngon spyod 'grub pas rab tu gnas/ /sdom bzung gtor mar bcas te'o/ /sku dang gtor ma sba bar bya/ /phur pa phyag
28a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nye bar bzung/ /mgon po bzhi la snyen pa gsum/ rim par phye te bshad par bya/ /gang rung gcig gi kun 'grub cing/ /drag po la ni gril bar bya/ /chu las skyes pas nyin mtshan sbyar/ /dgra dang bgegs nyid dgyel par bya/ /gri gug nag po hUM gis
28a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /'bar ba yod kyis sreg par bya/ /de nyid lha ru bya ba yin/ /dur khrod gnas nas de nyid 'bod/ /phur pa me 'bar nam mkha' 'char/ /ber nag sdus mo g.yas su rjes su/ /dur khrod rgyan zhing thod khrag g.yon/ /spyi bo'i gnas su mi skyong rgyan/ /cung zad
28a5(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis non bar bya/ /hUM gi rang gi snying po dang/ /lha'i sng+gs gyi de ni mthar/ /spro sdu zhal nas thugs su bsdus/ 'od kyi sprul pas las la bskul/ /snyen pa'i rtags kyi rim pa yis/ /de nyid bdag la sdu bar bya/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag rang nyid do/ /thugs las
28a6(rgyud 'grel): sprul te mdun du bsam/ /dmar smug btshon 'chang ba can/ /las byed phyi'i mgon po ste/ /snyen dang sgrub pa nang dang gsang/ /drag po sgrub pa phyi ?/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yin/ /rgyun chags kyis ni phrin las sngags/ /mtshan ma gzhung bzhin byung
28a7(rgyud 'grel): bdar?/ /rang nyid yi dam gsal bar skyed/ /'dun du las kyi mgom po pas ma/ /sku gsung thugs su lha nyid dgod/ /gru gsum nang du ling ga bca' / /sku las sprul pa'i 'khor lngas 'gug zer/ /thod rnga bdud zhing skul bar bya/ /gdug pas lha lnga dbye bar
28b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /e las gru gsum dmar nag 'bar/ /e raM(rgyud 'grel): rdzas lnga 'tshogs pa'i ling kha la/ /spra pe sha phaT:dam/ mas dgra 'o dgug par bya/ /a pe sha a(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs sprul ba yang sprul bcas/ /lha rnams thams cad spang mdzaod cig:nyams pa 'di ni bstan
28b2(rgyud 'grel): la sdang/ /mgo pa'i lha rnams da bzung cing/ /rdzas la zhan na rlag par bya/ /gru gsum nang du mon pa ni/ /'khrid byed nag pos bzung bar bya/ /gnas lcags 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'dis/ /dmigs pa'i dam nyams ru tra 'di/ /thar par bya ba'i go med do/ /sprul pa
28b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i lha lnga dbye/ /gru gsum khyung na drag po sgrogs/ /gnas pa'i lha ni gshags par bya/ /thugs kyi mgon pos tsho mdangs bsdud/ /sku yiS nyos bcing gzir bar bya/ /gsung gis rnam shes dbyings su par/ /thugs kyi sha khrag zan du rol/ /lha mo bzhi
28b4(rgyud 'grel): phung po bzhi/ /rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas gnas su'o/ /man ngag 'di dang mi ldan na/ /dmyal ba'i gnas dang nye bar 'gyur/ /'di nyid sngags pa ces 'dar bya/ /lha ru gru gsum nag po la/ /nang nyid dpang du khrag gis byug/ gdug pa can gyi rdzas cig /
28b5(rgyud 'grel): dug khrag mtshon nag byug par bya/ /bzhi la thal chen 'bar pa'i snod/ /nyer gcig chad kyis sgrub bya la/ /nyer gcig phul pa'i suM gnyis byug mon nag 'bar ba'i lcags kyu can/ /kha khyer dag la dgod pa yin/ /cha gsum gtor ma phrin las sngags/ /
28b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis bden pa phyogs bcur bdar/ /'bar ba'i lha nyid 'phros pa'i mdog/ dmar nag bsgrang phreng tri shul can/ /kha dog rang nyid gdan du bya/ /ag tshom drang srong rnam pa'o/ /slob mas 'bar par byas pa dang/ /chos gos nag pos lho ru lta/ /lcags
28b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyar bur mi glangs so/ /stegs bu'i steng du 'dug par bya/ /yi dam sngags dang nyungs dkar gyis/ /'bar ba'i snod nyid bskrad cing gsang/ /shan pa'i khyim nas 'bar ba'o/ mchod lnga chang bar g.yas g.yon no/ /mon nag skyo gsum rdzas nyid 'dun/ /rgang? 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): gzar gnyis ni khyud mo la/ /hUM gis sgra yis phyogs su bskul/ /'bar ba'i lha nyid dang srong che/ /'jig rten las 'das sku bzhengs cig /mngon spyod phrin las bsgrub slad du/ /gnas 'di spyan drang byon par 'chal/ /spyi bo rdo rje sems
29a2(rgyud 'grel): dpas brgyan/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /g.yas kyi rnam lnga de la 'bul/ /til sran rdzas ni nyer ? gcig te/ /'bar ba'i lha khyed 'thu bo che/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /phrin las kun gyi bdag pos te/ /rig 'dzin kun gyi bsrungs ma che/ /drang
29a3(rgyud 'grel): srod mgon la bstod par bgyi'o/ /mngon spyod phrin las sgrub slad du/ /'di nyid du ni 'bar bar mdzod/ /ag ni dza la dzaM:? 'bar ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gsal/ /rgang blugs gsum gyi gso bar bya/ /gzhung ni las kyi lha nyid bskyed/ /phrin las bzhin du bzhugs su
29a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mchod pa lnga yi gtor ma dbul/ /gong bzhin sreg rdzas brgya rtsa gcig /drug cur dbul bas 'phros pa yis/ /zhag nas khrag zhag 'khyil bar bsam/ /stod pa bya zhing me glang nang/ /mar nag blug pas 'bar bar bya/ /bdud rtsib la sras ba dang
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dug khrag gis ni hoM bya zhing/ /gro khal ni khrag gis so/ /dam nyams phung po lnga 'di nyid/ /ye shes lnga yis 'bar ba yis/ /phrin las lnga'i dbyings su sbyang/ /dug lnga rtsad nas bcad par bya/ /las mgon nag po'i zhal du spyad/ /drag po'i sngos
29a6(rgyud 'grel): rjod thod lnga bdud/ /smon lam stobs kyis snang ba sbyad/ /ling kha'i las ni gong bzhin sbyar/ /slar yang mchod cing nyer gcig sdeg/ stod bskul rgyas gdab gshags par bya/ /'bar ba'i lha yang de nyid do/ /me glang steng du dgab par bya/ /rgya raM lam 'aM ka
29a7(rgyud 'grel): rten 'og/ rdo rje rgya raM byung ba bzhin/ /lha'i pho brang bsam par bya/ /da nyid he'i gsung byung tshe/ /rdo rje lag tu gtad pa na/ /de tshe khyod n yid gtang bar bya/ /nga'i bka' byung bar du ni/ /skal pa'i bar du gnan par bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgom par bya/ 'di
29b1(rgyud 'grel): yis the tshom med par 'grub/ /zlum dang bru bzhi zla kham mo/ /dkar ser dmar ba'i lha dang gnas/ /tsanda dkar po shugs pa'o/ /'o ma yi ni byug par bya/ /'bras chan dngul phyed ma tog dkar/ /'o mas bsdus pa'i gtor ma'o/ /mar dang til dkar 'bras ? kar
29b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ zhi ba la ni rab tu sbyar/ /thams cad khru gang zabs su phyed/ /kha khyer sor bzhi rab tu sbyar/ /'khor lo nor bu pad ma dang/ /rdo rje gdengs bas rim bzhin brgyan/ /u duM 'ba' ra'o? nam can/ /me tog ser po ser phye dang/ /zho dang ldong ros pro chen no/ /zas kyi bye brag
29b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ba teg/ /yaM shing dmar po chang la sogs/ /bu dam zangs phye shing thog dmar/ /rab bu pad ma rag tas sbru/ /bad pa rag tas byug pa bya/ /dbang gi rdzas te kha phye ye shes/ /rgyas pa la ni byug pa'o/ /dug shing tsher ma can la ni/ /tshol bu yis ni byug par bya/ /dub
29b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag lcags phye rdo phye'o/ /mi dang pa glang khyi dang nga/ /sran ma'i chan ni gsod byed do/ /khrag gis sbags pa'i gtor ma'o/ /bdud rtsi nor bu 'bar ba dang/ /lcags kyu tri shul mtshon pa ni/ /phan phyir rab tu bsam pa'o/ /brgya dad brgya rtse nyer lnga dang/ /drug bcu yi ni
29b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya/ /zhag bdun nyer gcig zla ba gsum/ /zla ba gcig nas nges bar 'grub/ /mkhas pas dkrugs te gnas pa 'di/ /phyes ste nyams su blang bar gyis/ /gzhan du smra ba mi bya'o/ /bud med bu chung chu la ni/ /sbal sprul bong bu'i khrag du sbyar/ /zhag bdun
29b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis thod par blugs/ /b+hyo:steng 'og phyogs la mtshams brgyad na/ /dus gsum bde gshegs sprul par bcas/ /bka' bsrung chos skyong mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ /dam can thams cad spang mdzod cig/ mon pa nag po zor lam phye/ /lha mo bzhi yis
29b7(rgyud 'grel): zor sgo rgyas? por? lam dgra bo'i snying la grongs/ /sde brgyad bka' i dmag dpung skyed/ /phyogs na bzhugs pa sku zur cig/ bdag ni rnal 'byor dam la gnas/ /nyams pa 'di yis snyam rtsugs nas/ /mthu stobs bden pas dam du ba dang/ /bcol ba'i las 'di grub
30a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /chang phung phyogs bcur gtor bar bya/ /mu stegs 'bar ba'i thod pa la/ /rdzas ngan dug gis mtsho dkyil te/ /drag sngags mchon gyi me dpal 'phro/ /dmigs pa'i rlung gis bcun pa bya/ /dam nyams dgra bgegs 'khor bcas
30a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /sa'i lte phur bshig par bya/ /gnam gyi 'ju thag bcang bar bya/ /'khor bcas rdul du rlag par gyis/ /drag sngags bzlas cing gos nag gdag /ral ba sprug cing thod lnga brdung/ /thal chen thun dang bur pa sgril/ /tha ma'am zla ba gcig gis 'grub/ /
30a3(rgyud 'grel): skul bas mgon po 'khor bas kyis/ /rdul du rlag nas 'ong du sdud/ /yi ge gsum du bdag nyid ni/ /yi dam bsal ba'i gnas su sdu/ /bsrung pa'i 'khor lo sgom par bya/ /mi ldog nad kyi gdam pa 'di/ /dpe la bzhag par mi bya'o/ /phyag gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor
30a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /sprul ba'i khro bo phyogs mtshams sgo/ /lan gsum du ni ? bdab par bya/ /phyi ru mi lta nang du lta/ /dbyings las sprul ba'i mgon po yi/ /be con las sbrul pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa'i srog yin no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po ni/ /nag po'am yang na las
30a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyar/ /rtags nyid la thob las byed pa/ /g.yang le nye ba'i mig med bzhin/ /rang lus ma smin ? gzhan la sems/ /sgyu ma skyes pa'i byi'u bzhin/ /dam tshig med pa'i sngags pa de/ /shing tshig thal ba'i mtshon bzhin no/ /slob dpon gsod pa'i
30a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa de/ /ma med dgun gyi khyi'u bzhin/ /dbang ma thob pa'i sngags pa de/ /sgra bu 'bar ba'i 'ong bzhin no/ /man ngag med pa'i sngags pa de/ /tshod med chu'o rgal 'dod bzhin/ /rdzas ma sogs pa'i sngags pa de/ /rgyud nyid med pa'i gzhu bzhin no/ /
30a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor tshogs med na g.yel bar 'gyur/ /skul dang gdung ba'i ngag med na/ /ma sring dam can g.yel bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig rdo rje snying la bzhag /yi ge gsum gyi mna' chu sbyin/ /sngon dang da lta'i dam tshig 'di/ /lta khyod 'da' bar ma byed cig
30b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das na dam tshig rdo rje 'dis/ snying gi dkyil nas rlag par byed/ /de bas rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrungs/ /rnal 'byor sngar yang lte 'di bsam/ /za bshos rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /lta nyid gzhan ni rten mi bya/ /slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya/ /nyams pa rnams
30b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sra ba min/ /rtags dang nyams tshod 'das pa na/ /sngags pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// //sdags pas las 'di rtson par bya/ /'byung ba bzhi'i sa bon la/ /nag po'i tshen gyis gso bar bya//
30b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bcu bsgral ba'i rab ta 'dis/ /maM sa bdal ba'i sa bzhi 'dis/ /drag po'i sgras chag chag btab/ /rin chen sna lnga rak ta dang/ /kham pa nag pos bsdu bar bya/ /bang rim bzhi la dur khrod brgyan/ /lcags mkhar gnag sgo gcig pa la/ /gru gsum
30b4(rgyud 'grel): nag pos rgyan par bya/ /zor la shan pa'i rgyun la ni/ /bud med gtsang mas srang bu bya/ /zur brgyad srang bu'i gur phub la/ /nam mkha' nag pos rgyan par bya/ /bya rog nag po'i phod gtsugs te/ /rgyad bu nag po lnga dang ni/ /bzhi dang brgyad brgyad brgyad nyid
30b5(rgyud 'grel): do/ /bcu gsum rim par bya nag go/ mda' nag ltong dmar mdung nag dang/ /bdud rtsi rak ta bshos nag ni/ /lha'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten/ /rim pa bzhin du gong bzhin sbyar/ /zur bzhi thong 'khor rgyud bu bzung/ /zur bzhi gsal zhing 'bar ba a/
30b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing gi rgyal mchan re re gzugs/ /stag gzig dom spyang khyi nag dang/ /mi nag mchod pa tha ma la/ /gling bzhi nyi zla rtsi ta dang/ /gter ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang/ /lha dmag phyogs bzhir re re'o/ /go mtshan nyungs dkar la sogs dang /rin chen lnga dang
30b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bru sna lnga/ /dang tshon lnga dang mchod lnga dang/ /zas kyi bye brag dpag med kyi/ /mdza' bzhi rgyan cing rta lug dang/ /ra dang g.yag sogs tshang mar bsham/ /sgu 'am phyag mtshan bgod pa ni/ /dbus su gtso bo 'khor lnga dang/ dur khrod sring mo ma
31a1(rgyud 'grel): mos skor/ /dbang po tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang/ /'dod pa'i dbang po bdag po dang/ /'bring gi ri ti ka ti ka/ dbyang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ /dkar ser mthing kha smug po dang/ /dmar po ljang khu ser dang dkar/ /zla ba pad ma
31a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin/ /be con phub dang pi wang dang/ /shol 'da' nyi ma snam pa'o/ /g.yon pa thams cad phur pa 'dzin/ /bang rim dang por dgod par bya/ /lha klu gnod sbyin lto phye dang/ /mi 'am ci yin lta ma yin/ /bdud dang btsan dang dri za'i tshogs
31a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sna tshogs mtshon cha snams/ /pang rim gnyis par gnas pa'o/ /mdza' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu/ /dung skyong rigs ldan nor rgyas dang/ pad mchu lha sprul dre bzang bzhugs 'khyil/ /rin chen utpal sprin dpung dpung dung/ /rin chen lto bye zer re
31a4(rgyud 'grel): gser 'phreng pad+ma dmar /pad dkar 'dzin cing ro stod mi/ /g.yon pa thams cad sprul zhags so/ /sku mdog ser dmar sngo zhing ljang/ /dkar ser dmar dang dkar po'o/ /drag po'i dus su rim pa bzhin/ /dkar dmar nag po phros pa'i mdog/ bsam
31a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab 'khor dang bcas/ /phur pa ral gri skyal pa ni/ /rim pa bzhin ni 'dzin pa yis/ dmigs pa'i lus dag yid gsum 'dzoms/ /dam can rgya mtsho ma lus pa/ /bzhi pa la ni dgod par bya/ /nam mkha' rlung bzhu rgya mtsho dang/ /ma sa'i
31a6(rgyud 'grel): keng rus me 'bar ba/ /dkar ser dmar ljang kha dog go/ dur khrod lcags mkhar gru gsum nang/ /zhing chen nags tshal g.yang bzhi'i gur/ /rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya/ /phrin las gzhung srang gnas su sba/ /rgyun du sman rag gtor ma
31a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /zor du byed na ye shes sdu/ /dang po gnas dang mchod rdzas te/ /tha ma dmag dang mtshon cha'o/ /gong bzhin zar gyi las rnams so/ /drag po la ni 'khor lA nyid/ /srin po'i gzugs nyid rang gi 'go/ gri gug thod khrag shin tu khros/
31b1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po stag la zhon pa skyid/ /ma hA ka la 'khor bcas kyis/ /thugs dam snyan po skang ba ni/ /nam mkha' mthing nag g.yang gzhi'i gur/ /bya rog nag po'i phong rtsugs te/ /zhing gi rgyud bu bcu gsum gyis/ /sku'i thugs dam skor gyur cig/ mahA
31b2(rgyud 'grel): ka la 'khor bcas kyis/ /thugs dam snyan po skeng ba ni/ /mda' nag ldog dmar bcu gsum gyis/ /mdung nag dpol dmar bcu gsum gyis/ /gsung gi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ ma hA ka la 'khor bcas kyis/ /thugs dam snyan po skad ba
31b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdud rtsi rak ta'i rgya mtsho dang/ /bshos bu nag po bcu gsum gyis/ /thugs kyi dam tshig skong gyur cig/ ma hA ka la 'khor dang bcas/ /phyi'i mdos kyi skad ba ni/ /nam mkha' 'thing nag phang ki rgyan/ /rtsis brgyad nag po'i gur gyis phug/ /
31b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyad bu nag po so gnyis kyis/ /sku'i dam tshig snyan po skang/ /ma hA ka la 'khor dang bcas/ /nang gi mdos kyi skad ba ni/ /chos nyid mi 'gyur nam mkha' la/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi gur phub te/ /mtshan nyid so gnyis rgyad bus brgyan/ /gsung
31b5(rgyud 'grel): gi dam tshig snyan po skang/ /ma hA ka la 'khor dang bcas/ /gsang ba'i mdos kyi skad ba ni/ /nyi zla skar gsum nam mkha' la/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i gur chen phub/ /zhing chen nags tshal rgyad bu yis/ /thugs kyi dam tshig snyan po skad//
31b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang skad bshags rgyas par bya/ /stod pa dam tshig gzhung bzhin no/ /yi ge lnga'i spro sdu dang/ /a li ka li'i phreng ba yis/ /rgyun gyi bshags pa mchog tu sngags/ /sbyor ba thabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //
31b7(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi zlum po pang 'dab brgyad/ /las kyi lha dang glu chen dgod/ /klu sman dkar gsum gtor ma dbul/ /ting 'dzin 'phro 'dus 'phrin las bcol/ /zhag gsum la ni nges par 'grub/ /ma grub klu nyid gnas pa'i sar/ /klu'i bzung ba'i dbang
32a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni /skra nag gcod pa'i dbang la sogs/ /dbang rigs drag po sbyar byas te/ /klu las skyes pa'i nang du blugs/ /kha nyid bsdams la sba bar bya/ /gzugs nyid la ni thun gyis brab/ /'dis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med
32a2(rgyud 'grel): gong gi rdzas nyid ling khar bcal/ /dmong zlas gnas der spas byas na/ /klu yis 'dzin par the tshom med/ /rgyu lam g.yas su dmigs pa yi/ /khang pa'i rtsa bar sbas byas nas/ /'gas par 'gyur bar gdon mi za /bdag dang mgon po'i 'phro 'du yis/ /khyab 'jug
32a3(rgyud 'grel): sde brgyad las la sngags/ /zhags bdun bar du sgrub pa bya/ /rgyu ba'i dus su gtor ma dbul/ /gong gi rdzas la dmod pa zlas/ /rgyu pa'i dus su dmigs pa yis/ /yul nyid klu gnyan gnyan pa'i sar/ /yul lha la sogs gzu spang ba dang/ /rdzas nyid de'i phyogs su
32a4(rgyud 'grel): su'o/ /zhag bdun par du nges par 'grub/ /bdag dang lha'i sprul pa yis/ /dmigs pa'i yul nyid gar bsam/ /me dang rlung gi 'khor lo bskor/ /bden pa bdar zhing sngags nyid ni/ /lan bdun zlas na chu 'khyags 'joms/ lha 'di gzhan la bsdu ba dang/ /gzhan nyid
32a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la sdu bar bya/ /gcig tu mkhas pas sre pa'o/ /gcig tu 'du na spyi gtsugs te/ /gzugs kyi bshad pa'i lam du'o/ /smra ba phyi'i gtsug du'o/ /gnyis kyi snying kha me dang chu/ /rnam nyid spro bsdu'i nus pa dbye/ /rengs bkug las ni phur ba'i gzugs/ /hUM gnyis
32a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis rgyur/ /chags pa'i mdog mtshungs spro bsdus chags/ /rta dang g.yag yang mthun par 'gyur/ /g.yas kyi 'og nas blangs byas te/ /sngags nyid dmod pa bdun du bzlas/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su gtor par bya/ /lus nyid lcags kyi rdo rje te/ /
32a7(rgyud 'grel): cis kyang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon nag la ni lnga nyid dang/ /gsum la gsum dang bzhi la bzhi/ /'dud pa'i phyogs su sngags nyid btab/ /gtor ma dbul zhing na ma gtags/ /yar gyi ngo la mchod pa bya/ /mar gyi ngo la bzlog pa bya/
32b1(rgyud 'grel): phur bu sor bzhi mgon por skyed/ /mgul du btags na nges par 'grub/ /mtshon nag la ni sngags bzlas zhing/ /de yi phyogs su gtor bar bya/ /'gro kyis mtshon la sngags bzlas te 'ug ma nag por sdu bar bya/ /mdud pa nag pos bcing bar byas lcaD kyi khang par tshung par bsam/ /'di
32b2(rgyud 'grel): yi 'ching bar the tshm med/ /ji srid ma grol bar du'o/ /mo phag la ni snyen pa'i gzugs/ /khru 'am sor brgyad phyogs su bstan/ /dmigs par bya ba zhabs kyi lte/ /dur khrod sa yi snod du bsam/ /rgyun du dmags pa'i gtor mar dbul/ /sbyor ba ngan pa
32b3(rgyud 'grel): zlog par 'gyur/ /dbyings las sprul ba'i mgon po yis/ /nyen nyid ral gris bcad par bya/ /rdzas la bcug na sel bzlogs 'gyur/ /dug khrag gis ni byug par bya/ /gang la seng ldeng phur bu de/ /smug cing 'khums par 'gyur ba yin/ /mtshan
32b4(rgyud 'grel): mo rgyu ba'i gzugs rnams dang/ /nags la gnas pa mi dang ni/ /sa la gnas pa 'bul ba yi/ /skyes dang khrag la gong gi gzugs/ /gri khrag gyis byug phyogs su rba/ /zla ba phyed nas cho 'phrul 'ong/ /gru gsum khrag gis gang ba yis/ /skong po'i zor
32b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi phyogs bzhir bya/ /sde brgyad byams pas sring du bcang/ /yi dam lha yi rtsi ta ru/ /las kyi lha nyid dmar po te/ /kha dog dmar po por gyon zhing/ /? zer lhung dmar po zla bas brgyan/ /a nyid dkar dmar sngags kyis bskor/ /dbyangs yig gi ni
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnas/ /mthar gnas bzhi'i dang po la/ /dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan par bya/ /gsal byed sde chen gnyis pa yis/ /bzhi pa gnas zhing sde tshan bzhi'i/ /lnga pa bzhag pa'i yi ge ste/ /sid d+hi b+h+ruM gyis mdza' nyid rten/ /sngags kyi sham bur
32b7(rgyud 'grel): gtags par bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi bcing bar bya/ /rigs dang mthun pas rgyas btab cing/ /bsrung bya dmigs dang snyen po sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi'i nus pa yis/ /da lta nyid du tshe zad yang/ /lan gsum gyis ni zlog par 'gyur/ /dang dmar brgyan pa'i 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' dar g.yab/ /thugs las sprul pa'i lha nyid spro/ /shar gyi phyogs nas skul ba ni/ /shar phyogs lha mo gcig /'jigs pa'i bud med dkar mo ni/ /sku'i sprul pa 'bum dang bcas/ /lcags kyu zhags pas tshe khug la/ /sa'i
33a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su tsho sdus cig /lha mo gsum la rigs 'dre'o/ /me chu rlung ces 'don ba sgyur/ /sku las sprul pa'i 'khor lnga yang/ /sku'i sprul pa 'bum dang bcas/ /lcags kyu zhags pas tshe khug la/ /mkha' i phyogs su tshe sdus cig /gsung las skyes pa'i lha
33a3(rgyud 'grel): srin yang/ /sku'i sprul pa 'bum dang bcas/ /lcags kyu zhags pas tshe phug la/ /rnam shes brgyad la dpal skyed cig /gong gi sngags kyis dgug par bya/ /bdud rtsi dmar po 'od zer 'phro/ /lus nyid gang ba'i mgon po yis/ /bu ga kun tu gang 'dzags
33a4(rgyud 'grel): sam/ /sprul pa yang ni sdu bar bya/ /mi dmigs pa ni dam pa'o/ /gtor ma dbang nyid las kyi lha/ /snying gar gong bzhin spyi bor bzhag/ gong gi las kyi gzhan la'ang bskur/ /gtor ma dkar po zhi ba'i rdzas/ /nad gdon bgegs rnams zhi ba'i rten/
33a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i gtor ma'i dbang skur bas/ /zhi ba'i rig 'dzin thob par shog /gzhan gsum la rigs 'dre/ /be con nor bu sman rag dang/ /thun bur yang na gtar mas sa/ /mgon po 'chi med gdams pa 'di/ /bla ma'i zhal las blang bar bya/ /dar mi
33a6(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsas nad sel zhing/ /mtheb kyu yis ni gdon grol 'gyur/ /char bu yis ni bgegs zhi te/ /zur gsum gtor mas bar chad sel/ /bzungs chu yi ni grib sel 'gyur/ /spral ba mgrin pa snying kha ru/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /'od 'phros lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /grib sogs 'dan du nag po byung/ /rdzas nyid la ni rim bzhin stim/ /khru gang ba'i ngar mi la/ /gter ma la sogs sbyin par bya/ /sngags nyid rdzas kyi brgya rtsa bya ba/ /khrus nyid rol mdza' ?
33b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ /nad pa'i gos kyi g.yogs byas ste/ /lho 'am rgya ram lam du skyal/ /'byung po sngags kyis 'chi bdag chim/ /me dang chu yis spyad par bya/ /'dir ni gong gi tshe mchog bya/ /mgon po 'chi slu grib sel 'dir/ bla ma'i zhal la blang bar bya/ /?
33b2(rgyud 'grel): mthod rtsa ba'i man ngag yin/ sbyor ba gnad kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //gtor mchen po las la sbyar/ /mgon po'i phrin las gzhung ? te/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar mgon po bsam/ /maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /gru gsum nag pos rgyan
33b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /'bru'i phye dang sna lnga dang/ /srid pa'i ma mo khru gang bya/ /mdog nag ral pa nag po la/ /gri'i khrag ga thugs par bya/ /dam mi mtheg kyu chang bu dang/ /gtor ma la sogs nag po la/ /gri khrag gis phyugs sha khrag gam/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags kyi ?
33b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po gtor ma gso zhing dbul/ sngags pas mgon po'i sngags nyid zla/ /slob ma gnyis kyi btab par bya/ /rol mo rgyun du bya ba yin/ /bar du bdud bzlog lan bdun sbyar/ /dgra'i phyogs su gtor ma 'phang/ /bzung chus phyogs su gtor bar bya/ /ma
33b5(rgyud 'grel): mos las kun sgrub par 'gyur/ /mgon po'i stong bskul drag po bya/ /dbang dang gtor ma'i las rnams kun/ /las bzhin ma ni rab tu sbyar/ /las dang mthun pa'i mdo yang sgrags/ /de yiS las kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan byed las kyi mgon
33b6(rgyud 'grel): po te/ /sprul pa de'i phyogs su'o/ /der dmar brgyan pa 'di nyid do/ /Ni nyid hUM gis dgug par bya/ /kang nyid bka' dang dran bzhin bsam/ /lha 'dre mi gsum 'du bar 'gyur/ /gong gis mkhas spyod rnam nyid bstan/ /khams gsum kun 'dus lte bor/
33b7(rgyud 'grel): las dga' grub par ? cham med/ /las kyi lha las mgon po spro/ /'bar ba'i na khams kun sreg /sa la rlung dang chu las/ /mi la chu dang rlung la ni/ /rdo rje rgya raM gnan par bsam/ ting 'dzin sngags kyi 'phrul 'khor gyis/ /mi 'grub pa ni gang
34a1(rgyud 'grel): yang med/ /'phrin las kyis ni las la sbyar/ /gtor ma yis ni las kun 'grub/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /nyan pas smod byed bden pa brdar/ /rni nyid spus na the tshom med/ /spra ba rigs pa ling kha'i gnad/ /brlas
34a2(rgyud 'grel): pas gzhan la smra mi bya/ /gcig las spel par mi bya'o/ /bla ma'i man ngag sngon du phyung/ /'di las lhag par mi bya zhing/ /khri ba yang ni mi bya'o/ /gal te 'das na lha 'di yis/ /klad pa'i rgya srubs 'gems par 'gyur/ /de bas chul bzhin
34a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrungs/ /lha 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba yan lag gi le'u bzhi pa'o// //dpal mgon po chen po'i sgrub thabs gsang ba mdzod kyi las byang rdzogs so// //bla ma bram ze bde bas rang 'gyur
34a4(rgyud 'grel): du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //tshul khrims shes rab kyi man ngag ltar sgyur ro/ /te rtso'i dpe'o// //dpal mgon po'i gsal yod bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri na ma u pa d+he sha/ ma hA ka la sa ma ya /bod skad du/
34a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal mthu chen thob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i sgrub pa'am sgrub rdzogs/ bstan pa srung byed las byed pa/ /de yi sngon byung 'di ltar ro/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
34a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid ro langs bde ba yis/ /stan la dbab phyir sgrub pa gtsugs/ /phyag na rdo rje ge pi don nyid kho bos mthong/ /phyag na rdo rje srog yi dam gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag drag pa'i nag po de sngon gyi rgyus byung/ /srog gi snying po de phul nas/ /stan dang sgrub pa
34a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa slob dpon yi/ /khyod kyi brgyud pa/ stong gi sangs rgyas sto bzhi/ rin 'byung khu? du chos kyi gnas lugs/ mthar lam thob bstan pa'ang kho bos srung/ /de yis yid gzhungs zhags bdun bsgrubs/ /nga nyid sa rnams sngon du chos ? badzra yak+Sha cas so the tshom med/ /sbyar bstan pa na? khyod?
34b1(rgyud 'grel): las dang las kyi rim pa bgyis/ /srog snying phul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //pa nyid dga' rab dbang phyug go/ /ma nyid dur khrod me ta li/ /mdog nag gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /sde brgyad ma mo bran du 'khor/ /brjod? pa tsam gyis skrag par byed ?
34b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i las/ sreg gnam sod sku la bas the tshom ci byar yong/ /skye rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //mgon po sngon byung gi le'u rdzogs so// //? byin mas byin //bas phyin nas phyin dpal phyag bsam brjed bcas na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
34b3(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /nyams dga' dkra? rlag bar bar chad med pa dang/ /dur khrod gnas sogs shin tu shis / sha lnga ra sha khrag la sogs /'bru'i snying po bdud rtsi shis/ /maN+Dal zlum po gru gsum nag /bsa' phor gri thod thod rnga shis/ /rten dang be con
34b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i dus gnas mchog bstan pa'i ? phur dang/ /pa'i gnas sed las sbyor gyi dus lded phur pa g.yab dar shis gtor ba'i rgyu/ /re'i gnas dang sgrub pa'i yo byad bstan pa'i le'u ste dkyil 'khor dang po'i// gtor snod //bdud rtsi'i snod rol mo sngon du gong gis yan lag
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrubs/ /mdun du skyed la bcun par bya /rgyun du mchod dang gtor ma bya/ /dom dang khyi nag bya nag go/ a ca ra dang ston pa dang/ /ban d+he nag po 'od bar 'gyur/ /mdog nag ral gri thod pa 'dzin/ /sgrub pa'i dus su yi dam gyi bsnyen bsad nas bdag nyid
34b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub/ /gzhon po chog bzhin srog snying gar mchogs mar mthu chen thob pa'o/ /yi ge brten pa'i dus lnga'i nus pa sdu/ /sgrub pa'i dus snying po gnyis pas bcun par bya/ /nag po phur pa thod pa 'dzin/ /snying po dang pas btsun par bya/ /snyen pa'i yan lag can du
34b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /sngags kyis gtong ma dbul bar bya/ /rtags dang snyan ? san sgrub kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bya nag ?/ /sku'i 'khor lnga sde brgyad dang/ gsung gi thugs las sprul pa'i bdra? lha mo bzhi/ /gzhan yang bka' 'og ma 'dus med//
35a1(rgyud 'grel): nag po du ma phyogs bcur 'phro/ /'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //mdun du mgon po be con thogs/ /ber nag phod kha 'chad ba can/ /las kyi rim pa de la bcol/ /skul rbad gsang pa'i cho ga bya/ /
35a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg gnan zor gyi las rnams kyi/ /bstan pa srung bar 'di dgos so/ /nag po mdes bya nyams ba skad/ /dag pa yis ni dmar rlab rgyun bshags bya/ /cig la spel bar mi bya'o/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag sngon du dang po shin tu ces/ /mon nag spungs pa
35a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar bo 'byung/ /las mdza' i rim pa tshul bzhin bya /las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //dang po yi dam gzhung spang la/ /las kyi mgon po 'khor bcas bskyed/ /bsnyen brtags thon cho ga rim pa tshul bzhin bya /khrus byas
35a4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal phul nas ni/ /slob ma de nyid bzhugs par bya/ /sngon 'gro dag las rgyud sbyangs la/ /gus pa bstan pos mdun na 'dug /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes dbab/ /sngags nyid byin pas grol bar 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi stod pa bya/ /
35a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje de la bstod/ /gtor ma'ang spyo bor bzhag par bya/ /yon skyabs 'gros mas bskyad bshags pa phul chos pa gsang par gdams par bya/ /dal rnag pa'i phyogs su ni/ /ming tsam smra bar mi bya'o/ /rjes su snang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //
35a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gi las kyi lha de nyid/ /rin chen rgyan can be con no/ /b+ha su d+he ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /gtor ma rgyun du btang bar bya/ /gang 'dod rdzas de rteg la dbul/ /gang 'dod gsol btab sngags nyid gdags/ /rtan gyi rgyal mchan rgyun du rten/ /lus
35a7(rgyud 'grel): dang grib ma ltar du phrag /rgyun du gnas su brten pa'i bya/ /nor sgrub pa dang/ rgyun du rten pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //bstan pa bsrung ba'i dam du bzhag/ mig gi 'bras ltar gces par chongs/ mon nag gcig oM dkar a dmar hUM mthing/ sku gsung
35b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi'o/ /oM badzra yaksha d+he ba mahA kaM la kha tro ta hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM d+he ba a su ra pra ti dza/ g+hu h+ni? dza ho b+ha d+hu ta ra tsa hi na da/ kur b+hi dzi dza hUM/ trag rag sha sa ma ya daM daM dza ja hUM hUM/ sgrub pa'i snying po'o/ /oM d+he ba a su ra a ro ka laM
35b2(rgyud 'grel): yakshi du na ma ka ra sha Sha bcad hUM truM mar mar chin d+ha chin d+ha b+hud ta b+hud ta hUM phaT/ las sngags btsun pa'o/ /sa ma ya dza dza/ spyan drangs ba'i 'o/ /dza hUM baM ho/ stim pa'o/ /oM d+he ba a su ra hUM/ skyed ba'i sngags so/ /thun ka la rag sha rni lha mi'am ci ?
35b3(rgyud 'grel): la shin rje srin po/ rig 'dzin/ klu ma mo btsan? ? thad kyi/ /dgra mod/ sod/ chod da/ chod ? dza rbad/ dgra bo'i snying la thun b+hyo/ thun gi sngags so/ /oM d+he ba a su ra hUM prati dza g+hu hi dza/ d+hu ta ra tsa g+h+ri na hUM phaT/ bod ba'i sngags so/ /oM d+he ba a su ra ni ri mar snying snying/ /dgra bgegs
35b4(rgyud 'grel): snying la lhaM/ /ma ra ya thums/ snying khrag thang la phyung/ nyos khyer yeng khyer/ snying khrag kha ru lhug /gsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ag nai dzwa la raM/ mi lha'i sngags so/ oM dzaM haM ni/ me ha ni/ taM pa ni/ b+ha lin ta kha'i/ gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM da ma chad gi ni i a/ 'dro bra ba rna'o 'bras pa ti sa che ta so
35b5(rgyud 'grel): b+hi ba sa d+ha'o hUM tha tha/ glu blang zhing dgyes par btab pa'o/ /dra ya ba kha dza dza/ ma hA u pa kha nI bA tha na hUM hUM phaT/ zor gyi sngags so/ /oM ag nai dzwa la raM/ mi lha'i sngags so/ /spur ya u gu tsag sha rni tri snying la tsa kra dza la ra yaM paM rga ling kha sreg pa'i 'o/ /oM
35b6(rgyud 'grel): d+he ba a su ra hUM ki la ya hUM/ phur pa'i sngags so/ /trag rag sha ru ra ti ba ra rni tri thun rbad phaT/ phur pa gdab ba'i sngags so/ /trag rag sha rad na sid+hi ma gu sha hUM/ srung ba'i sngags so/ /trag rag sha kur b+hi taM taM tri ma ra ya rbad/ khams thums
35b7(rgyud 'grel): rbad/ trag rag sha sa ma ya phrom shar phob/ trag rag sha/ a b+hi ni rag sha a h+ril zil phrom shar phob/ dgra bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags so/ /oM d+he ba/ a su ra hUM/ b+ha su bus ting ku ru ye swAhA/ nor sgrub pa'i sngags so/ /rnaM traM stwaM pa a nan/ /gnan
36a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags so/ /las kyi sngags rnams sham bur gdags/ sngags gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //bdun du sgrubs na so cig nas/ /dgra de nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sring mo bzhi'i sgrub pa bya/ /mchi
36a2(rgyud 'grel): ba can gsum smra ba can/ /sha dang khrag gi gtor ma bya/ /thun bzhir sgrub cing rbad par bya/ /oM a ka la tsa'u d+has a d+ha ri hUM/ oM a sa ma hUM/ sa ka ma ma ri hUM/ oM a b+ha ma hA/ then ka pa la d+ha re na hUM/ oM a g+ha tra ru ru b+hi ra pi lnga hUM/
36a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o/ /bong pri badzra sa ta pa la ti/ ma sa kha'i/ rag ta kha'i/ sarba kha'i/ hUM ga la hUM/ gang ga la/ las kyi sngags so/ /sreg mnan gtor ma zor du 'phang/ /thod rnga brdud zhing skul cing rbad chas goS nag po bgo bar bya/ sring mo bzhi'i le'u ste brgyad
36a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //shin tu gces pas srog ltar gcas/ /'di nyid gang la yod pa des/ /bskul na dgra de'i srog la rgol/ /khros na dgra bo'i rta phyugs dang/ /'khor rnams rlag cing cho 'phrul ston/ /des na 'di nyid lus la bcad/
36a5(rgyud 'grel): yod pa tsam gyi dgra kun thub/ /smra na gshags las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /ces pas bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //dpal nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i yan dag/ slob dpon ro langs bde bas gdams pa rdzogs so// //
36a6(rgyud 'grel): bram ze chen po la rim par brgyud nas/ tshul shes sgyur pa'i man ngag gi rgyud do/ /mgon po 'di man ngag gi dbang du byas pa yin pas/ /sgrub thag nye'o rdzogs so/ /bla ma rin chen 'od pa'i phyag dpe la/ bla ma sang 'od pa'i zhal zhus so/ /de'i dpe la dag
36a7(rgyud 'grel): par byas te/ rim par ban chung gis kyang zhal zhus so// //dam tshig 'dus pa'i dbang bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa ma yA/ a b+hi she ka ta/ ke du:/ bod skad du/ dam tshig 'dus pa'i dbang/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
36b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul gyi grangs kyi mgon po bkug/ sha khrag rgyan pa'i gtor sogs dbul/ /bstod sogs dam tshig rdo rje gtad/ /snang ba zhus pas snang bar bsam/ /hO hO(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i dpal mgon
36b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang lha mo rnams snyan gsan cing thugs btang du gsol/ khyed rnams kyi spyan sngar/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung/ dkon mchog gi dbu phangs bstod/ dam pa'i chos kyi chul 'dzin/ dge 'dun gyi sde skyong/ daM tshig tsig la gnas par khas bslangs
36b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du/ bdag dang slob ma sangs rgyas ma rgyas gyi bar du/ srung skyob ba dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /rten cig la 'du ba dang/ snying po cig la 'du ba dang/ chos nyid cig la 'du ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ gtor ma cig la 'du ba dang/ dam
36b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig cig la 'du ste/ phan tshan 'khu ma ldog/ zhe ma sdang/ phrag ma dog/ 'khon dang sel med par mdzad du gsol/ /de las 'das na/ khyed rnams rang sha rang gis za ba dang/ rang khrag rang gis 'thung pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang blus sta/
36b5(rgyud 'grel): gnar med par gyur te re/ de bas na bdag dang slob ma la 'go ba dang 'dres pa dang gnas par mdzad du gsol/ /mgon po rnams kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so legs so de bzhin du bya'o/ /thabs yin no gsung/ legs so brjod/ da ni dbang bskur te/
36b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mgon po kun la byin ba'i gtor ma ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bden stobs kyis/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ma lus kun/ /dam tshig cig la 'du ba'i dbang thob shog /'di ni mgon po kun gyis myangs pa'i bdud rtsis te//
36b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mgon po kun gyis spyi bor khur ba'i dam chos ste/ /'di ni mgon po kun gyis bltas pa'i mar me ste/ /'di ni mgon po kun gyi snying la gnas pa'i srog yin te/ /'di ni mgon po kun gyi lag tu gtad pa'i rdo rje ste/ /lhag ma sbyar te
37a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /gang bzhin gsol gdab byin gar bsam/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig sgrub pa'i rigs yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ma lus kun/ /
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rig 'dzin 'di la 'go zhing 'dres gyur cig /oM mahA ka la sarbA(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yA:sid+hi hU(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): h+ri sa brgyan par dmar dbu thod dbul/ /'gro ba 'du ba'i rten 'brel thob/ /mgon po 'dus pa yi ge bcu ces byas so/ /rdzogs so/ /bla ma bam rbas mdzad pa
37a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //tshul shes rgyud ro/ /gtor ma dbus ? gcig pa'i sngags so/ /yon du h+re yal g.yas su bdud rtsi/ mdo rgyud po ti/ g.yon du mar me/ yi ge bcu pa/ mdun du rdo rje dang mchod pa'o lag len no//
37a4(rgyud 'grel): bskad? gso mi mngon ma bzhugs so// //dpal mgan po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal nag po chen po bya rog ma la bskang gsol bya bar 'dod pas/ /dang por mgon g.yag dang lug dang bya nag gi rgyal mtshan dang/ tshogs dang gtor ma dang mchod pa thams
37a5(rgyud 'grel): cad tshogs par byas la /'di skad du gyer bar bya'o/ /hUM mi mngon nam mkha' i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /bcom ldan dpal chen bde mchog 'khor lo la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la/ /phyi nang gsang
37a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bcas pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs 'bul/ /sku gsung thugs dad 'gal ba ci ma chis bzod par gsol/ /bskad do bskal bar thugs dam bskur/ /hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /ye shes mgon po bya
37a7(rgyud 'grel): rog ming chen nang/ po che /zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gang dad bcas/ /sku la dur khrod rgyan dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs/ /do nub sbyan 'dren 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /bskang do bskal par thugs dam bskang/
37b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i yum/ /dkar mo glog phreng sku yi yum/ /dmar mo rtsa 'jib gsung gi yum/ /nag mo can ti thugs kyi yun/ /bskad do/ /hUM dmad nag gtum drag 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas/ /sprul
37b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgon po bya rog gdod can bzhi/ /shar nas srog gcod ltas ngan gtor pa'i bya rog gdong/ /tshangs ris mgon po 'bum dang bcas/ /bskad do bskal par thugs dam bskad/ /lho nas za byed smye 'bog gtong ba'i bya rog gdong/ /ba? byed
37b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje nag po 'bum dang bcas so/ /bskang do bskal bar thugs dam bskang/ /nub nas khrag nad ngal yams 'gyed pa'i bya rog gdong/ /'phung byed sbas ba ma mo 'bum dang bcas/ /skad? do bskal par thugs dam bskad/ /byang nas bdud rgyud rtsad nas
37b4(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa'i bya rog gdong/ /snang srid lta srin sha rba 'bum dang bcas/ /bskad po bskal bar thugs dam bskang/ /hUM keng rus me dpung 'dar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /mkha' 'gro drug dang lha mo brgyad/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang zhi byed ma/ /bsrung
37b5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma dang chos sku ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /tshor gsang nag mo bya rog mgo /'gugs byed sngon mo stag gi mgo /gsong byed nag mo seng ge'i mgo/ 'jig rten las grub mkha' 'gro ma/ /bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang/ /'jig
37b6(rgyud 'grel): rten 'dzin pa'i dbang mo che/ /las kyis sprul pa'i lta mo brgyad/ /dbang mo tha byed 'gugs byed ma/ /myos byed gsong byed rkos mkhan mo/ brlag byed ma dang mgyogs ma'i tshogs/ bya rgod la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs su sprul/ /bskad do
37b7(rgyud 'grel): bskal bar thugs dam bskad/ /hUM sbrul pa'i mgo brnyan bcu drug ni/ /stag dang gzig dang dom dang dreng/ /seng go sbyang ki chu srin mgo/ 'phar ba khyud dang 'ug ba'i mgo/ /bra dang bya rgod kaM ka'i mgo /sprul dang sha wa ngag gi mgo/ phag gi mgo can
38a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i/ /bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang/ /gzhan yang mgon po'i 'khor chogs kyi/ /seng ge gdod can la sogs pa'i/ /pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ /mkha' 'gro sgrol byed la sogs pa'i dbang phyug nyi
38a2(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa brgyad dang/ /gang po mdzes pa la sogs pa'i/ /dregs pa sum cu'i thugs dam bskang/ /legs ldan nag po la sogs pa'i/ /dpal mgon bdun du rtsa gnyis kyi/ /bskad do bskal par thugs dam bskang ka hUM sha khrag mtsho ltar ? ba'i
38a3(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod nas/ /ro langs mang po bsnol ba'i khri stengs nas /drag po smyon pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /nag po gcer bu sbrul gyis brgyan/ /bya la zhon nas dgra bgegs 'dul/ rgyal bo sha la za ba'i ro langs bcu/ /bram tsha ? pa
38a4(rgyud 'grel): po khrag la 'thung ba bcu/ /rje rigs gser mdog tshil la 'jab pa bcu/ /gdol pa nag po rkang gcog rus pa mur ba bcu/ /dmangs rig sngo skya bags pa za ba bcu/ /dge slong gtsang ma dbang po za ba bcu/ /sngags pa nag po don
38a5(rgyud 'grel): snying nang khrol za ba bcu/ /khyi'u gzhon nu dri chu skom du 'thung ba bcu/ /bud med sngon mor ras gos su gyon pa bcu/ /ked rus 'jigs ba sha med pags med bcu/ /de ltar ro langs nag po brgya yi thugs dam bskang/ /bskad do bskal par
38a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs dam bskad/ /hUM nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang ba ni/ /mgyogs byed nag po bya nag zhon pa brgya/ /mon ba nag po phag nag zhon pa brgya/ /ser skya nag po sbrul nag zhon pa brgya/ /bdud po nag po rta nag zhon pa brgya/ /do zan nag po
38a7(rgyud 'grel): 'brod? nag zhon pa brgya/ /khyab pa nag po lug nag zhon pa brgya/ bon po nag po dre'u nag zhon pa brgya/ /sgo ba nag po rlung nag zhon pa brgya/ /shan pa nag po khyi nag zhon ba brgya/ /lings pa nag po sha nag zhon pa brgya/ /de ltar nag po
38b1(rgyud 'grel): stong gi thugs dam bskad/ /bskad ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang/ /hUM gnod sbyin khri yi thugs dam bskad ba ni/ /dgra bo'i bla srog mdza' nas 'gugs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra bo'i dbugs len srog la 'jam pa'i 'byung po gzhod
38b2(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo'i lo thog 'bru bcud 'jib pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra la mi nad phyugs nad gtong pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /skye 'gro rtsis la 'debs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra po'i dbugs len srog la 'jab pa'i 'byung po gnod
38b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin stong/ /dgra bo'i sha za rkos la 'debs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra po'i bdun rgyud mdza' nas bsdud ba'i 'byung bo gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra bo'i rjes gzhi dur nas slong ba'i 'byung bo gnod sbyin stong/ /dgra bo'i gnam pa skor gyis
38b4(rgyud 'grel): 'debs ba'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong/ /de ltar 'byung po gnod sbyin khri yi thugs dam bskang/ /bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang/ /hUM ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang ba ni/ /dgra la gar 'phog blu bring byed pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /dgra bo'i
38b5(rgyud 'grel): mdangs 'phrog bcud la 'jib pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /dgra bo sha'u khram la 'debs ba'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /dgra po'i srog la 'dab pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /dgra la nang rgyal mtshon drub 'phen pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /gling bzhi stong gsum
38b6(rgyud 'grel): nyul ba'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /dbugs 'phrog srog la brgyug ba'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /sha za rkos la 'debs pa'i ma mo nag mo 'buM/ /khrag 'thung rkang la ldag pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /stong gsum brlag par byed pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum/ /de ltar
38b7(rgyud 'grel): ma mo nag mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang/ /bskang ngo bskal bar thugs dam bskad/ /hUM sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang ba ni/ /bar snang ro la lding ba'i bya rgod khri/ /sha za khrag la 'thung ba'i lce spyad khri/ /pags glang rgyu ma 'khyer ba'i wa khyi khri/ /
39a1(rgyud 'grel): ro la khyur ming byed ba'i stag gzig khri/ /ro za ro gos gyon pa'i srin po khri/ /keng rus rdzes la snom pa'i gzhad kir khri/ /skad dang dri la brgyug pa'i dri za khri/ /khrag 'thung sha rus 'byed pa'i 'phar pa khri/ /nang khrol don
39a2(rgyud 'grel): snying za ba'i sprul gdug khri/ /mdun bsu phyi la 'brang pa'i yi dags gzugs can khri/ /de ltar sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang/ /bskad do bskal par thugs das bskad/ /hUM thugs dam bskang pa'i dam rdzas ni/ /thams cad sbyar ba'i
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dang/ /rak+ta dmar gyi arga dang/ /sha khrag dkyil ba'i gtor ma dang/ /snang gsal 'od kyi zhun mar dang/ /sha chen spos kyi dud sprin dang/ /tshogs kyi zhal zas mang po dang/ /mgon lug nag po spyi dkar dang/ /bya mo nag mo gser
39a4(rgyud 'grel): mig dang/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i dam rdzas kyis/ /chos skyong nag po 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang/ /bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang/ /hUM sku yi dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /bya rgod mda' yiS thugs dam bskang/ /rak+ta rnam gsum gsung
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gi rten/ /gsung gi rten gyis/ tsit+ta rnam gsum thugs kyi rten/ /thugs kyi rten gyi thugs dam bskang/ /g.yag lug nag po phyi yi rten/ /phyi yi rten gyis thugs dam bskang/ /bya nag rgyal mtshan nang gi rten/ /nang gi rten gyis thugs
39a6(rgyud 'grel): dam bskad/ /gri rgod snying chen gsang ba'i rten/ /gsang ba'i rten gyis thugs dam bskad/ /'bod pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /g.yab dar nag pos thugs dam bskad/ /dam tshig gnyan po bsre pa'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi sman gyis thugs
39a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bskad/ /rak+Sha zhal du gsol ba'i phyid/ /dmar chen argas thugs dam bskad/ /phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /su ra chad gis thugs dam bskad/ /rtag tu mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i phyir/ /rtag btor chen po'i thugs
39b1(rgyud 'grel): dam bskang/ /rgyun du phrin las bcol ba'i phyir/ /rgyun gyi gtor mas thugs dam bskang/ /rbad ba'i dam rdzas yin ba'i phyir/ /khyi nag snying gis thugs dam bskad/ /gsang ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /gri rgod snying gis thugs dam bskad/ /
39b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgral ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /lug nag snying gis thugs dam bskad/ bskad ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lug nag spyi dkar thugs dam bskad/ /dgyes pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /mkha' ldid nag pos thugs dam bskad/ /nal
39b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sha khrag gtor chen 'dis/ /yum chen gsum gyis thugs dam bskad/ /bsang pa'i sha khrag snying sna 'dis/ /bya rog gdod can bzhi'i thugs dam bskad/ /tshogs phud sha sna 'bru chen 'dis/ /mkha' 'gro drug dang lha mo brgyad kyi
39b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs dam bskad/ /bshos bu dmar nag snying gis brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dris/ /legs ldan seng ge gdod can la sogs pa'i/ /pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig thugs dam bskad/ /khrag sna sman sna sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis/ /mkha' 'gro sgrol
39b5(rgyud 'grel): byed la sogs pa'i/ /dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang/ /dkar gsum sman gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /gang po mdzes pa la sogs pa'i/ /dreg pa sum bcu'i thugs dam bskang/ /'bru bcud bdud rtsis bkang ba'i gtor ma
39b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis/ /legs ldan smyon pa la sogs pa'i/ /dpal mgon bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thugs dam bskad/ /'bru gsum dkar dmar brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /ro langs las byed rnams kyi thugs dam bskad/ /nag po bdun gyi sha khrag spung pa'i
39b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma 'dis/ /nag po stod gi thugs dam bskad/ /sha khrag sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis/ /gnod sbyin 'byung bo khri'i thugs dam bskad/ /rak+ta bdud rtsi sman gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /ma mo nag mo bye ba'i thugs dam
40a1(rgyud 'grel): bskang/ /lhag gtor kha chus sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /sprul pa gza''bum gyis thugs dam bskad/ /hUM de ltar mgon po'i lha tshogs rnams/ /'du ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /mi rkang gling bus thugs dam pa snang//
40a2(rgyud 'grel): maM sa zas su za ba'i phyir/ /sha chen bdud rtsis thugs dam bskad/ /spyan gyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i/ /tshil chen mar mes thugs dam bskad/ /shangs kyis dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i/ /bsur chen dud pas thugs dam bskang?/ /ljags kyi
40a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po chim mdzad pa'i/ /bshos bu snying gi gtor mas thugs dam bskad/ /snyan gyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i/ /rnga dang dril bu cang te'us thugs dam bskad/ /mthun pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /gos nag zhwa nag dag gis blugs dam bskad/ /
40a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir/ /nya sha la phug sgog tsong la sogs thugs dam bskad/ /dgyes shing dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/ /tshogs dang gtor mas thugs dam bskad/ /g.yag yug nag po mar gyis byugs/ /dang nag du mtshon rwa la
40a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /phrag par dgra bgegs ling ga bskyon/ /gser skyems bdud rtsis bran pa 'dis/ /nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang/ /zhes brjod la bshags pa bya ba ni/ /dpal ye shes kyi mgon po bya rog gi ming can la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
40a6(rgyud 'grel): yum gsum dang/ /phrin las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong can bzhis bskor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma drug dang/ lha mo brgyad dang/ mgo brnyan bcu drug dang/ phyag brnyan legs ldan seng ge gdod can la sogs pa pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig/
40a7(rgyud 'grel): DA ki sgrol byed la sogs pa dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ klu'i rgyal po gang po mdzes ma la sogs pa dregs pa can sum cu lags ldan nag po la sogs pa dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa gnyis/ drag po smyon pa la sogs pa ro langs chen po
40b1(rgyud 'grel): brgya/ /mgyogs byed nag po la sogs pa nag po stong/ /dgra bo'i bla srog 'gugs par byed pa la sogs pa 'byung po gnod sbyin khri/ /gar byed nag mo la sogs pa ma mo bye ba/ khyud dang bya rgod sprul la sogs pa sha za 'bum gyis bskor ba rnams kyi spyan
40b2(rgyud 'grel): sngar/ /bdag gis bka' ltar ma gyur te/ gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs pas/ bsnyen sgrub tshad du ma byin par las la sbyar ba dang/ tshogs dang phud gtor dus su ma grub pa dang/ mchod pa'i 'byor tshogs chungs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar bzlas
40b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gra chag pa dang/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rdzas ma tshogs par gsang ba bsgrags pa dang/ /sku gsung thugs dang phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams pa thams cad mthol lo bshags so/ /dpal nag po chen po ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa/ khrag
40b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thud gi rgyal po/ bstan pa'i bka' bsrungs/ dam nyams kyi srog gcod/ rig 'dzin gyi srog shing/ rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha/ dug gsum gyi sman pa/ gtsug lag khang gi bsrungs ma/ bdag gi rnal 'byor bsrungs shig /tshe dang dbang phyug spel
40b5(rgyud 'grel): cig /dpal dang grags pa bsgrubs shig /'khor dang gang zag skyongs shig/ sdang ba'i dgra dang bar chad kyi rkyen rnams thul cig/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bzlog cig /nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zhi bar mdzod cig/ ltas ngan brgyad cu
40b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bzhi bsgyur cig /ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu bzlog cig /lo'i keg dang zla ba'i keg dang zhag gi keg dang za ma'i keg dang bA kwa? mi shis pa thams cad bzlog cig /ces brjod par bya'o/ /yi ge brgya ba ci nus bzlas par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams
40b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la longs spyod par bya'o/ /de nas smad las kyi drag po'i las sbyor yang bya'o/ /dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho ga'i rim pa/ bla ma a b+ha ya kA ras/ dpal nA len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du/ rdo sku rang byung gi tsar mdzad pa'o/ /phyis bla ma chen po
41a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rga los rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// //dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub dang ? ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI mahA ka la sid+d+hi k+Sharya gi ra dza d+ha na ma/ /bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i dngos
41a2(rgyud 'grel): grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang dang man ngag thob pa dang/ /bsnyen bsgrub sngon du song ba yis/ /rang nyid nag po chen po dang/ /he ru ka dpal dbyer med bsgom/ /sum gril rgyan can bsnyen pa bya//
41a3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du thugs mgon 'khor bcas bskyed/ /bsnyen pa tshad la phyin pa dang/ /gzhan gyi rigs sngags bzlog par bya/ /rtsi dug gi shing la rnga yong bdun bya/ /zan bshos dmar nag lnga/ /khrag gi gtor ma lnga /zan changs lnga/ ngar mi chen po lnga/ nam mkha' 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ gdugs lnga la ngar nag rnams btags la/ rtsug bal sna lngas 'phan gdugs bya/ /'phar ba/ spyang khu/ khyi/ phag/ seng ge/ stag /dom/ bya/ lug /rnams lnga tshan re re bya/ khyad par du bshos bu khru gang ba zur gsum pa dmar nag khrag gis
41a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa cig bya/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bri/ /bsang pa'i 'khor lo brgyad bre?/ /gnan pa'i ling ga gsum bri/ /de nas gtor ma zangs zhong la sogs par bshams la/ rang kha nub tu blta/ lhor ho ljang/ byang bu'i phreng bas bskor/ yi dam chos 
41a6(rgyud 'grel): skyong gi thar sku dgram/ dmar gtor/ dkar gtor gnyis bshams/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ngar mi'i gnas gsum du sba/ gnan pa'i 'khor lo sha khyi'i thong par gzhugs/ bsang pa'i 'khor lo haM la bsreg go /de ltar rdzas rnams la me rlung gi sbyor ba
41a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bdag mgon por bskyed/ thugs khar he ru ka bsgom/ /ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/ mchod pa dang gtor ma 'bul/ rin po che sna tshogs dang/ 'bru sna tshogs dang/ sman sna chan? dang bcas pa 'bul/ de nas bgegs la gtor ma sbyin/ /
41b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gcad/ de nas stong pa'i rim pa thams cad bya/ /thugs dam bskang/ /rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/ /de nas gtor mdos de thugs mgon la las mgon bzhis bskor bar bskyed/ 'khor nag po stong/ sha za 'bum/ ma mo bye ba/ mkha' 'gro ma 'bum/
41b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin khri/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas ha? sgrogs ma'i chung bsdud dal kha g.yas su sgyur zhes pa yan? chad dang/ rin chen dpungs pa 'don/ de nas sngags ni/ oM mahA ka la
41b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra mahA ka la ya bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM mahA ka la gu na h+ri ta bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM mahA ka la ga na pa ta bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM mahA ka la si ti yaM du dza bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ha ha hUM hUM/ /ki li ki li che ge mo bzlog?
41b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo/ phreM pheM phaT che ge mo bzlog b+hyo/ kraM kraM kraM che ge mo/ traM k+ShaM? shuM che ge mo/ ka ha ka ha che ge mo/ h+reM h+reM kraM gnod byed bzlog b+hyo/ pa tsa pa tsa che ge mo/ hUM hUM phaT phaT che ge mo/ ha ha ha ha che ge mo/ raM raM d+haM che ge mo/ k+ShaM k+ShaM che ge mo/ /khaM khaM khaM che ge mo/ d+hiM d+hiM d+hiM che ge mo/ k+ShiM k+ShiM k+ShiM
41b5(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo/ kaM kaM kaM che ge mo bzlog b+hyo/ tsaM tsaM tsaM che ge mo/ yaM yaM yaM che ge mo/ saM saM saM che ge mo/ pheM pheM pheM che ge mo/ b+haM b+haM b+haM che ge mo/ b+h+ruM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM che ge mo/ k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM che ge mo/ kluiM kluiM kluiM che ge/ paM paM paM che ge dza dza dza zlog zlog b+hyo b+hyo rbang che ge mo bzlog b+hyo/ thun re la sngags lnga lnga
41b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul zhing bzlog par bya'o/ /byang bu la ming spel dang bcas pa bris la rtags par bya'o/ /byang bu ni mtshon cha'i rnam par 'bri ba 'am/ gzugs su byas te/ mnga' dang/ mdung dang/ ral gri dang/ dbyag tha dang/ rtse gsum dang/ tho ba dang/ rdo rje rgya gram dang/
41b7(rgyud 'grel): gri gug du bya'o/ /de bzhin du zhag gsum mam/ lnga 'am/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bya'o/ /yang zhag gcig la yang nyan no/ /rbod rbod? bca' o/ /de dmag dangbcas pas dgra phyogs su btang ngo/ /de nas ho bsreg go /dar mi 'khor lo dang
42a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa lam rgya gram du gnan/ /gcig kho'i mgul du mnan/ /sbyin sreg thal ba zor du 'phang/ /yang na gnan pa bya'o// //yang gtor ma bsdus pa byed na/ /zangs gzhod la sogs pa'i nang du ri rab bang?
42a2(rgyud 'grel): rim gsum pa bya/ /de'i steng du gtor ma zur gsum pa gcig bzhag /de la bya rog gi dbu mdzugs/ /de la nam mkha' dang/ gzugs lnga lngas bskor/ yang na brgyad kyis bskor/ bshos bu bzhis bskor/ sha khrag sna tshogs dang/ sman dang/ 'bru sma'i
42a3(rgyud 'grel): chan dang/ dug sna dang/ byang bu dang/ ling kha dang/ dar/ stag gis brgyan no/ /byin brlabs sngags dang 'dra ba la/ /bsnyen bsgrub gong du bstan pa bzhin bya'o// //shin tu bsdus pa ni/ thod pa'i nang du gtor ma dmar nag bzhi bcas la/ sha khag gis
42a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan dmigs pa dang bcas pas/ dgra phyogs su 'phang ngo/ /de ni zla ba gcig la lan bzhi bya'o/ bsang par byed na gtor chen byas te/ bcas bar ma de bya /sha sa na'i sngags la dgra bo kha kha khA hI /brgya rtsa brgyad khrag gis bris/ yang pas
42a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon gyi sngags gsum po la ming thems bcug la brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ gtor ma re re'i nang du sngags re gzhug /ngar mi dang 'theb kyu dang/ sha khrag dang/ 'bru sna'i chan la/ yungs dkar long thun rdzas btab la brgya rtsa brgyad de byas na
42a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs dgug gzhug byas la/ rdzas sha khrag tu byin gyis brlabs la/ mdun bskyed thugs mgon la sogs pa thams cad kyis gsol bar bsam/ khyad par du kho'i lha srungs rnams gsol bar byas la/ kho rang gi sha khrag rnams 'bul lo/ /de nas
42a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa gtad/ rdzas dang khyad par sbyar ba rnams shes par bya'o/ /mgon po'i gtor mdos/ gtor bzlog /brgya gtor/ bsang pa'i las/ slob dpon nag po paS mdzad pa/ dpal rga los/ phag mo grub pa la/ gsungs pa 'di ni shin tu
42b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyan pas dam tshig med pa la mi bstan/ gang rung rung du mi bya'o// //dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtor ma'i phrin las ni/ /stong khog rgyas par byas la/ bzlog rkang gnyis btang ba ni/ de nas gos nag po gon/ rnga dang dud dang
42b2(rgyud 'grel): rol mo'i sgra bsgrags/ dar 'phyar/ gsung chen gyi dud pa btab la 'di skad du'o?/ /hUM bdag ni rig 'dzin bsgrub pa po/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dam tshig can/ /bdag ni dpal chen he ru ka /khyod ni nag pa chen po ste/ /chos kyi srungs ma thugs dam can/ /bstan?
42b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyan po bsrung ba dang rnal 'byor dam can bskyang ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /rnal 'byor bdag la dgra byung na/ /ye shes spyan ldan dus la bab/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /dpal ldan nag?  po chen po
42b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod/ /chos kyi dbyings nas sku bzhengs la/ /bstan srungs legs ldan nag po ni/ /dur khrod gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /ngo nub bzlog pa'i dbud la byon/ /mgon po srog bdag nag po ni/ /bdud kyi gnas naS sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung
42b5(rgyud 'grel): la byon/ /mgon po 'chi bdag nag po ni/ /gshin rje'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po tshe bdag nag po ni/ /klu'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po sgrol ging
42b6(rgyud 'grel): nag po ni/ /srin po'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po srog chan dmar po ni/ /btsan gyi gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po sha zan nag po ni/ /gza' yi gnas
42b7(rgyud 'grel): nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po sgrol ging nag po ni/ /dpe kar gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po sha zan nag po ni/ /smu'i? gnas nas sku bzhengs la// /do nub bzlog pa'i
43a1(rgyud 'grel): dpung la byon/ /mgon po dug blangs nag po ni/ /klu'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po cho 'phrul nag po ni/ /the'u rang gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /mgon po
43a2(rgyud 'grel): nang kyi bdag po ni/ /ma mo'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon?// //hUM nag po stong gi tshogs dang bcas/ /dur khrod gnas nas sku bskyod cig /dpung gi tshogs rnams sku bskyod cig /go mtshon 'chas pa sku
43a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod cig /do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ /sha za 'bum gyi tshogs bcas rnams/ /dur khrod brgyad nas sku bskyod cig dpung gi tshogs dang sku bskyod cig /go mtshon 'chas pa sku bskyod cig /do nub ma mo? bya ba'i tshogs dang bcas/ /rgya
43a4(rgyud 'grel): mcho'i gling nas sku bskyod cig /dpung gi tshogs dang sku bskyad cig /go mtshon 'chad pa sku bskyod cig /do nung bzlog pa'i dpung la byon/ bcom ldan dpal chen spyan snga ru/ /ji ltar khas blang dam bcas pa'o/ /bstan srungs ma lus sku bzhengs la/ /do nub bzlog? pa'i
43a5(rgyud 'grel): dpung la byon/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi grogs/ /dam rdzas sha khrag sna tshogs dang/ /'bru'i chan dang khur ba dang/ /la du la phug shing thos dar/ khrag sna dug sna a mri ta/ /dgra bgegs ling khar byas
43a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di/ /mchod par 'bul la bzhengs su gsol/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang/ /'dza gang dpa' bo'i mchod pa dang/ /khrag gi yon chab dug gi me tog dang/ /sha chen spos dang zhun chen mar me dang/ /dug gi mthor 'thung khrag gi phyug pa
43a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha bshos dmar po zung? gsum dang/ /rkang chen dung dang ban d+ha'i sgra/ /phyi nang mchod pa rgya chen 'bul/ /ye shes mgon po 'khor dang bcas/ /gnas 'dir sprin ltar stibs mdzod la/ /thugs dam bskang ngo bzhes su gsol/ /thugs
43b1(rgyud 'grel): dam gnyan po bskongs nas kyang/ /phrin las gnyan po bcol ba? ni/ /drongs cig nyams pa'i snying nas drongs/ /bzlog cig byang kha dgral bzlog /mgon po'i dmag sna dgra la drongs/ /mgon po'i ru? dang dgra la phyor?/ /mgon po'i mdun drangs dgra la chos/ /mgon?
43b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i khram kha dgra la spos/ /mgon po'i khram sna dgra la sgyur/ mgon po'i bshugs pa dgra la long/ /b+hyo/ ma ye ma d+ha nag po che/ /khyod kyi thuD dam dus la bab/ /bdag cag sgyu sbyor 'khor bcas la/ /dgra dang byad kha pung? kha byung ba 'di/ /dam can khyed kyis ma
43b3(rgyud 'grel): tshor ram?/ /ye shes spyan dang mi ldan nam/ /sngon gyi dam bcas ma bsnyel lam/ /rig 'dzin rnal 'byor mi skyong ngam/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa mi bsrung ngam/ dam nyams log 'dren mi 'dul lam/ /khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ /bas chad bzlog pa'i dus la
43b4(rgyud 'grel): bab/ /hUM rang la chen krag 'thung rngam pa'i sku/ /dur khrod chas kyis sku la brgyan/ /sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /dus 'dir bzlog pa'i las mdzad cig /hUM me ri dmar nag 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod chen po nas/ /thod chen
43b5(rgyud 'grel): kaM rlon baM chen gsar rnying dang/ /keng rus sngo skya gdug pa sprul gyis brgyan/ /steng na sprin nag 'khrig cing 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /byung dang dur bya la sogs mkha' la lding/ /gcan zan ce spyad tshogs rnams phyi la rol/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog de nyid na/ /
43b6(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum mthing nag 'bang ba'i ?/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan/ /bam chen ru tra brtsegs pa'i steng/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis dor thabs can/ /dgra
43b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs? bdud ? cad bzlog du gsol/ /dbu? sgra kham nag gyen? du 'bar? ba yi/ /ye shes lha yi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /thod kaM lnga yis dbul brgyan pa ni/ /nyon mongs dug lnga'i tshogs rnams bzlog du gsol/ /rgyal rigs sprul gyiS dbu skra?
44a1(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa yis/ /'jig rten mkha' 'gro'i gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /rin chen dbu brgyan dang gyi cod? pan gyis/ /lha rnams yongs kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /spyan gsum dmar zlum phyogs bcur gzigs pa yis/ /dug gsum mi dge
44a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /shangs nas rlung byung khro gnyer bsdus pa ni/ /khro bo pho nya'i gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /smin ma glog stong 'khyugs nas gzigs pa yis/ /gcan zan la sogs gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche
44a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gtsigs ba yis/ /za byed brgyad kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ /zhal nas hUM phaT /b+hyo dang bso dgra yis/ /dran sngags gnod pa'i thun sngags thams cad bzlog/ ag? tshoms dmar po me ltar 'bar ba yis/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i bag chags thams cad
44a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /phyag g.yas gri gug rab tu 'bar ba yis/ gzhan gyi mtshon cha'i dan sbyor byed pa bzlog /g.yas kyi 'og ma ral gri 'bar ba yis/ /khams gsum rmad ba'i lha 'dre thams cad bzlog /g.yon na thod khrag dmar po 'cho ba yis/ /ma mo'i khrag rims
44a5(rgyud 'grel): dal kha thams cad bzlog /g.yon gyi 'og ma kha TwaM lha dmag bskang ba yis/ /ye shes 'jig rten pho nya'i dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog /khrims kyi cha lugs gsum dang ldan pa yis/ /theg pa gsum gyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog /sku stong glang chen ko
44a6(rgyud 'grel): rlon gsol nas 'gying ba yis/ gti mug rmongs pa'i bag chags thams cad bzlog /zhing chen g.yang gzhi sku la gsol ba yiS/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i bag chags thams cad bzlog/ /stag gi thags pa'i pa bsdul chen po yiS bang? rgyal dregs pa'i bag
44a7(rgyud 'grel): chags thams cad bzlog /gdug ba sgrul gyis dbu la brgyan pa yis/ /dam nyi mas zhe sded gdug pa'i sbyor ba thams cad bzlog /rak ta'i thig les rab tu brgyan ba yis/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i rgyu gzer thams cad bzlog /zhag gi zo ris rab tu brgyan
44b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ ging dang bdud kyi sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad bzlog /thal chen tshom pus rab tu brgyan ba yis/ /dur khrod bdag po'i bo nya thams cad bzlog /zhags gnyis dpa' bo'i stangs kyis bzhugs pa yis/ /dregs pa lha chen rnams kyi chad pa thams cad
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis/ /log par blta ba'i dgra bgegs thams cad bzlog /sku la ye shes me dpung rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /las ngan 'khor ba'i bud shing thams cad bzlog /dpral pa'i dbyingsnas bya khyung lding ba yis/ /sa
44b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag klu'i byang stems thams cad bzlog /sprul pa'i pho nya sku las 'phro ba yis/ /snang? srid lha 'dre'i rbod stong thams cad bzlog /sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang/ /sha chen spos kyi dud sprin dang/ /dmar chen rak+ta arga dang/ /tsi ta snying chen rgyal
44b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang/ /dgyes pa'i dam rdzas sna tshogs kyis/ /nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang/ /thugs dam bskad ngo byad kha bzlog// //hUM steng gi phyogs kyi pho nya ni/ /lcags kyi bya khyung nag po la/ /spyan ni khrag mdog ba se yi spyan/ /rwa ni rdo rje pha laM
44b5(rgyud 'grel): rwa/ /gnam lcags thog gi bu yug tshub/ /thog dang ser ba'i bdag po byed/ /dam nyams yul du thog ser phob/ /bshog pa me yi bu yug 'tshub/ /khro bo grangs med me yi tho ba 'dzin/ /sprul pa'i khro bos rbod stong thams cad bzlog /bshog pa g.yon pa rlung
44b6(rgyud 'grel): gi bu yug gis/ /sprul pa grangs med 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu can/ /sprul pa'i pho nya rnams kyis rbod stong bzlog /gnam lcags zhun ma'i mchu sde la/ /me yi tsha tsha 'phro ba yis/ /bshog pa sdabs pa'i rlung gis rab nged nas/ /'jig rten khams kyi
44b7(rgyud 'grel): rmod ngan sbyor ba rnams/ /bzlog cig bsgyur cig rang la b+hyo cig /skye rgyud rtsad nas chod cig /gshog pa ral gri 'bar ba yis/ /rlab pas ngan sngag chod cing bzlog /the'u yu 'khor lo 'bar ba drag 'khor bas/ /thod stong ma lus thams cad g.yul du cod
45a1(rgyud 'grel): cing bzlog /gzhug sgro gnam lcags 'bar ba yis/ /dam nyams lus ngag yid gsum bzlog cing stubs/ /kri kri h+ri gyi sgra chen rab sgrogs pas/ /sprul pa drag pos dgra bo dbang bsdud pho nyar bzlog /sha khrag dmar
45a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtor ma dam rdzas dang/ /sha chen dud sbrin bdud rtsi a mri ta/ dmar chen rak+ta rtsi ta snying chen gyis/ /sprul pa khyud chen thugs dam bskongs gyur cig /thugs dam bskangs la byad kha thams cad bzlog /oM mahA ka la/ mad sa la khA hi/
45a3(rgyud 'grel): rak+ta la khA hi/ go ro tsa na la khA hi/ ba su ta la khA hi/ srog adz+nya la khA hi// //hUM ma hA ka la bya rog gdong/ /thugs dam gnas nas bskul pa ni/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir 'phrin las mdzod/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan snga ru//
45a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis khas blangs dam bcas pa/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar byas/ /dam chos legs par skyong bar byas/ /dge 'dun bar chad bzlog par byas/ /sgrub mchog rnal 'byor skyong bar byas/ /dus la bab po byad kha bzlog /phyi nang
45a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang pa'i mchod pa dang/ /dgra bgegs sgral ba'i sha khrag dang/ /dza gang sman dang bdud rtsi 'di/ /bya rog gdong gi zhal du bzhes/ /rnal 'byor bdag la dgra byung na/ /mgon po nag pos raM d+ha logs/ /bya kha bzlo gcig bya rog gdong/ /
45a6(rgyud 'grel): khraM kha phyis cig bya rog gdong/ /dgra bo sgrol cig bya rog gdong// //hUM mahA ka la mthu po che/ /sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa la/ /zhal gdangs ljags 'dril klog ltar 'khyug /gtum rdaM rab tu 'jig sba la/ /ha ha hUM dang phaT
45a7(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs /ram nyams byed kha rang la bzlog /dus la bab po bya rog gdong/ /shin tu gtum zhing rab tu drag /khrag 'dzag mgo bo'i ngo shal can/ /stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can/ /dug sprul gdug ba'i sge rags can/ /phyag na gri gug thod
45b1(rgyud 'grel): thag thogs/ /dam nyams bzhes la byad kha bzlog /dus la bab po bya rog gdong/ /bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bo 'di/ /dbang du bsdus la byad kha bzlog /rings par khug la byad kha bzlog/ //hUM ma hA ka la bya rog gdong/ /khros pa'i gad ma sgrogS
45b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /lha srin sde brgyad 'dar zhing dngangs/ /rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /khrag du skyug cing las la bdud/ /nag po stong dang sha za 'bum/ /ma mo bye ba'i 'khor bcas rnams/ /rang dbang med par las la sgyug /do nub dam nyams dgra
45b3(rgyud 'grel): bo sgrol/ /'jig rten mi dang mi men gyi/ /rig sngags byad kha rbod stong bzlog /dus la bab pa bya rog gdong/ /mgon po 'di ma las ma 'da' cig /mgon po'i dam las 'das gyur na/ /dam tshig snyan po'i chad pa 'od/ /khyod kyi dam tshig snyan
45b4(rgyud 'grel): po 'dis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yin/ /dam nyams sdig can dgra bo 'di/ /bstan pa bshig cing dbu? 'phang smad/ /rdo rje slob dpon sku la rdos/ /rgyal khams phung zhing sems can 'tshe/ /'di la thugs rjes mi gnas kyis/ /da lta nyid
45b5(rgyud 'grel): la sgrol las thod/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu'i/ /rig sngags byad kha rbod stong bzlog /rig 'dzin rgyu sbyor 'khor bcas kyi/ /bar du gcod pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog /bzlog cig sdang ba'i dgra la bsgyur /ye shes lha yi
45b6(rgyud 'grel): spong pa bzlog /lha srin sde brgyad smod pa bzlog /lo skag zla skag zhag skag bzlog /ban bon ngan sngags byang kha bzlog /mu stegs rbod stong thams cad bzlog /sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang/ /sha chen dud sprin a mri ta/ /dmar chen rag
45b7(rgyud 'grel): tu? snod? chen gyis/ /mahA ka la'i thugs dam bskang/ /thugs dam bskongs la skyen ngan bzlog /bya rog gdong can dus la bab/ /skye bo'i ya gar ma btang cig /mi nag gi 'char kar ma btang cig /mdos dang gtor ma 'di long la/ /
46a1(rgyud 'grel): byang kha phur kha thams cad bzlog/ //hUM steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /byang khyung 'bum ni lding zhing 'phyo/ /gzhang dang dur bya grangs las 'das/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen
46a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan bzlog /shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /nal po stong gis ru dar 'phyar/ /b+hyo b+hye sngar ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen ngan bzlog /lho'i phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /sha za 'bum gyi dmag dpung 'chas/ /b+hyo b+hyo sngar ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /
46a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen rnamS bzlog /nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /ma mo bya ba raka ta rlob/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdad pa'i dgra la b+hyo/ bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen ngan bzlog /byang gi phyogs nas bzlog ma ni/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro'i chogs rnams kyis
46a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen rnams bzlog /ma hA ma da sa la khA hi/ ma hA tsi ta la khA hi/ ma hA go ro rtsa na la khA hi/ mahA ba su ta la khA hi/ a mri ta srog adzha la khA hi/ /hUM shar phyogs mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i
46a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas nas/ /bam chen ro dang nyi stengs su/ /srog bdag nag po bya rog gdong/ /sku mdog mthing nag char sprin mdog /mi bzang gdug pa'i 'od zer 'phro/ /phyag g.yas 'bar ba'i gri gug 'phyar/ /phyag g.yon ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang
46a6(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i snying khrag zhal du gsol/ /shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog /dgra bo'i mgo phreng do shal can/ /yan lag rags cing lto ba 'phyang/ /dug sgrul gdug pa'i ske raD bcings/ /zhe sdang rigs kyi pho nya thams
46a7(rgyud 'grel): cad bzlog /ging chen bco brgyad 'khor gyis bskor/ /dam nyams srog la mnga' mdzad pa/ /shar phyogs dregs pa'i dmag dang bcas/ /dam nyams dgra'i sha khrag? dang/ /sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma bzhes/ /shar phyogs byang kha thams
46b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog// //hUM steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /bya nag mang po mchu sngar bdar/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byad kha phur kha bzlog/ shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /mon? pa nag po'i ngang? 'bod/ /b+hyo b+hyo
46b2(rgyud 'grel): sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha dgra la bzlog /lho'i phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /gshin rje khram kha thogs la rngam/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang pa'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog /nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /mon pa g.yas? dong?
