46b3(rgyud 'grel): lings se lings/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byad kha dgra la bzlog khyad gi phyos nas bzlog pa ni/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas/ /seng stag rgyud 'gral rngam bar byed/ b+hyo b+hyo sdan ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog
46b4(rgyud 'grel): byad kha phur kha bzlog /dam nyams dgra bgegs sha khrag dang/ /sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang/ /sha chen dung sprin a mri ta/ /rak+ta rnams dang dud sprin gyis/ /srog bdag 'khor bcas thugs dam bskad/ /thugs dam skongs la byad kha
46b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /ban bon ngan sngags byad kha bzlog /lha srin sde brgyad chad pa bzlog /mahA mang sa la khA hi/ /ma hA rak+ta la khA hi/ mahA tsi ta la khA hi/ mahA go ro tsa na la khA hi/ mahA ba su ta la khA hi/ /mahA zhing chen la khA hi/
46b6(rgyud 'grel): a mri ta srog adz+nya la khA hi/ //hUM byang phyogs ljang nag gru gsum gzhal yas nas/ ljang nag me dpung klong dkyil nas/ /gnod sbyin nag po bya rog gdong/ /sku mdog ljang nag dug chen 'khyil ba 'dra/ /kha rlangs sngo dmar
46b7(rgyud 'grel): nad kyi na bun 'khrigs/ /mi bzad gdug pa'i tshe cha bu yug 'tshub/ /khrag gi ral pa dmar po gyen du 'khyil/ /ral ba'i bseb nas thog dang ser ba 'bobs/ /g.yas kyi gri gug dam nyams srog rtsa gcod/ /g.yon gyi thod khrag dgra bo'i snying
47a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung/ /sku smad dpa' bo stag gi sham thabs can/ /dgra bgegs ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /ljang nag sprul gyi ske rags bcings/ /gnod sbyin nag po'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /dam rdzas dmar gyi gtong
47a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'di bzhes la/ /las kyi rigs kyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog /sdig can dam nyams dgra bo la/ /nang dang mtshon gyi char pa phob/ /byang kha phur kha bzlog cig bya rog gdong/ /dus la bab po bya rog gdong// //hUM steng gi phyogs
47a3(rgyud 'grel): nas bzlog pa ni/ /khra dang bya klag bshog ldang 'khrigs/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog /shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /khro bo mthing nag bya rog gdong/ /sha log cod byed sdang mig lta/ /b+hyo b+hyo sngar ba'i
47a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog gnod ba'i bgegs la bzlog /lho yi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /seng stag dom dred ce spyad gzig /spyan zan mang pos sa gzhi gang/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang pa'i bgra?  la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog gnod pa'i bgegs pa bzlog /nub kyi
47a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /khyi nag mang po du zugs byed/ /g.yag rog mang pos ngar zhing bsdud/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha pur kha thams cad bzlog /byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /srin po sha zan cho nges 'debs/
47a6(rgyud 'grel): skye 'gro yongs kyi srog bcod pa/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog /dam nyams sdig can dgra bo yi/ /mgo lus phros cig khrag ral can/ /sha rus dum bur da phye cig /dam nyams dgra'i sha khrag dang/ /sha
47a7(rgyud 'grel): khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang/ /tshil chen dud sprin a mri ta/ /dmar chen sha khrag rtsi ta yis/ /gnod sbyin bya rog gdong gi thugs dam bskang/ /thugs dam bskongs la bar chod bzlog /ma hA mang sa la khA hi/ ma hA rtsi ta la khA hi/ raka ta la khA hi?
47b1(rgyud 'grel): go ro? ca na la khA hi/ ba su ta la kh'hi/ srog rtsal khA hi/ /hUM nub phyogs dmar nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor nas/ /tshe bdag bya rog gdong can ni/ /zhing chen ro'i gdan la bzhugs/ /dur khrod rol pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /mthing nag sku la rngam pa'i zhal/ /
47b2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi mche ba dgra la rtsigs/ /dug gi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro/ /phyag na gri gug thod khrag thogs/ /las mkhan nag po dgra srog gcod/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog /ye shes lha'i
47b3(rgyud 'grel): rbod stong thams cad bzlog /'jig rten dregs pa'i rbod stong thams cad bzlog /bdud dmag bye pa'i? 'khor gyis bskor/ /lha srin sde brgyad rbod stong thams cad bzlog// //hUM steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /khyung dang khwa da shang shang rab?
47b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhad dang dur bya ba shog pa sdeb/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog /shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /dung gi mon pa 'bum ni ral gri 'phyar/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog lhas ngan dgra la
47b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /lho yi phyogs nas bzlog ba ni/ /lcags spyad 'bum ni du zugs byed/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog /nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /bal mo 'bum ni g.yab mo sdeb/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog
47b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog /byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /stag gzig 'bum ni rgyug 'dral byed/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog /dam nyams dgra bo'i sha khrag dang/ /dmar gyi gtor ma a mri ta/ /sha
47b7(rgyud 'grel): chen spos dang/ zhun chen dud sbrin dang/ /dmar gyi ra ka ta tsi ta snying chen gyis/ /bya rog gdong gi thugs dam bskang/ /thugs dam snyan po skongs nas kyang/ /'jig rten lha 'dre mi gsum gyi/ /rbod stong bsam sbyor ngan pa rnams/ /bzlog cig sgyur cig
48a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs stengs su b+hyo/ /ma hA ma pas la khA hi/ rtsi ta la khA hi/ rak+ta la khA hi/ ba su ta la khA hi/ go ro rtsa na la khA hi/ zhing chen la khA hi/ srog rtsa la kha raM khA hi// //hUM b+hyo lho phyogs ser nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor nos?
48a2(rgyud 'grel): bam chen ro yi gdan stengs su/ /las mdzad ma mo'i klong dkyil nas/ /bdud mo rtsa 'jib khrag 'thung rkang ldag ma/ /sku mdog dmar nag khrag gi mdog /sngo dmar nad kyi tsha tsha 'phro/ /khra nang rgyu gzer na bun 'thebs?//dmigs pa'i dgra la dmag 'dren? pad+ma?
48a3(rgyud 'grel): sku la/ /blag? zhag thig les brgyan/ /gsod ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs/ /rtsa chen bzhi nas rak+ta 'jib/ /nag mo grul bum pho nyar 'gyed/ /srid pa'i ma mos dmag sna 'dren/ /dgra bo'i sha khrag stob cing 'chad/ /dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhas
48a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rin chen rigs kyi rbod stong bzlog /las kyi rlung dmar chibs su cibs/ /dam la gnas pa'i groD mdzad ma/ /bdud mo bye ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /lho phyogs rbod stong bsam sbyor ngan pa bzlog /nad rims
48a5(rgyud 'grel): dal kha thams cad bzlog /dus 'dir bzlog pa'i dus la bab/ /dus la bab po khrag 'thung ma// //steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /ye shes ma mos nam mkha' gang/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog /mdun gyi phyogs
48a6(rgyud 'grel): nas bzlog pa ni/ /ma mo 'bum gyis g.yang mo sdeb/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog /g.yas kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /ming po las kyi gshin rje 'bum/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur?
48a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /rgyab kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa na/ /dug sprul gdug? pa shigs se shigs se?/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog bsam ngan dgra la bzlog /g.yon gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni/ /mon mo bal mos stong khams gang/ /b+hyo b+hyo sdang ba'i
48b1(rgyud 'grel): dgra la b+hyo/ /bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog /dus la bab po rtsa 'jib ma/ /dam nyams dgra ba'o? sha khrag dang/ /sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang/ /sha chen spos kyi dud sprin dang/ /rak+ta snying chen rgyal mtshan rnams/ /rtsa 'jib? ma chogs thugs bam
48b2(rgyud 'grel): bskang/ /thugs dam bskongs la byad kha bzlog /ye shes lha yi rbod stong bzlog /'jig rten lha 'dra'i thod stong bzlog /ban bon bsam sbyor ngan pa bzlog /tshe dang srog gi bar chod bzlog /khar rje ba lha'i bar chod bzlog /mnyes ngan sgrib
48b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog /bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad bzlog /mahA mar sa la khA hi/ rak+ta la khA hI/ rtsi ta la khA hi/ go ro rtsa na la kh'hi/ ba su ta la khA hi/ zhing chen la khA hi/ srog ma dz+nya la kha raM khA hi/ ces pas phud dang rak+ta sbreng/ stab pa bya'o// /
48b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mgon po'i gtor ma snying po can brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la/ sngags pa rnams kyis sha za na'i sngags kyi mthar bzlog ces pa re dang/ /gtor ma re sbrags la man ngag ltar 'bul la/ /drag po'i phrin las 'di btang ngo//
48b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM ma g.yel ma g.yel chos skyong rnams/ /khyed kyi thuD daM dus la bab/ /nag po stong gi thuD daM dus la bab/ /sha za 'bam gyi thugs daM dus la bab/ /ma mo bye ba'i thuD daM dus la bab/ mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ /gtor ma sha chang la phug dang/ /'bras
48b6(rgyud 'grel): chen ling khar bcas pa 'di/ /re re la yang brgya rtsa brgyad/ s/mchod gtor 'bul lo mnys par mdzod/ /dgra bo'i sha la kha raM khA hi/ /bzlog cig byang kha phur kha bzlog /bdud dang gshin rje'i rbod stong bzlog /gnod sbyin ma mo'i rbod btong bzlog /
48b7(rgyud 'grel): klu dang sa bdag khram kha bzlog /gza' dang rgyu skar byang stems bzlog /btsan dang rgyal po'i chad pa bzlog /smug dang 'god po'i gnod pa bzlog/ /hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /steng gi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe/ /sprin
49a1(rgyud 'grel): phung 'khrugs pa'i dur khrod du/ /tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdud/ /lha bdud 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyod/ /de bzhin rigs kyi mgon po ste/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'dir zhes la/ /steng gi phyogs kyi byang? kha bzlog/ /
49a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su byon pa'i tsho/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po ste/ /gtum drag can gyi dur khrod du/ /dri tha ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /srog bsdus 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhis la/ /shar gyi phyogS
49a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi byang kha bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /byang gi phyogs su byon pa'i cho/ /las kyi rigs kyi mgon po ste/ /tshang ching 'khrigs pa'i dur khrod du/ /gnod sbyin ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /gir shan ma lus pho nyer?
49a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /byang gi phyogs kyi byang kha bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe/ /pad ma rigs kyi mgon po ste/ /'ur 'ur 'bar ba'i dur khrod du/ /klu bdud ma
49a5(rgyud 'grel): lus dbang du bsdud/ /tshe bdag nag po pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor mdos 'di bzhes la/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi byang kha bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /lho yi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe/ /rin chen rigs kyi mgon po ste/ /dur khrod
49a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi nags tshal du/ /gshin rje ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /shan pa 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /lho'i phyogs gyi byung? kha bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// shar lho'i mtshams su
49a7(rgyud 'grel): byon pa'i tshe/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ste/ /ha ha rgod pa'i dur khrod du/ /mi lha ma lus dbang du bsdus/ /'dud rigs 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /shar lho mtshams kyi dgra bgegs
49b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /lho nub mtshams su byon pa'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i mgon po ste/ /mun pa mi zad dur khrod du/ /srin po ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /sha za 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di?
49b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes la/ /lho nub mtshams kyi dgra bgegs bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /nub byang mtshams su byon pa'i tshe/ /dam nyams sgrol ba'i mgon po ste/ /ki li ki la'i dur khrod du/ /rlung lha ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /phral?
49b3(rgyud 'grel): dgu khri pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /nub byang mtshams kyi dgra bgegs bzlog/ //hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /byang shar mtshams su byon pa'i tshe/ /tshang tshing 'khrigs pa'i dur khrod du/ /tshe dpal
49b4(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rgyas par byed/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod du/ /dbang ldan ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /bgegs chen 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /byang shar mtshams kyi dgra bgegs thams cad bzlog/ //
49b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni/ /'og gi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe/ /rgyud srungs mdzad pa'i mgon po ste/ /bsil ba 'chal gyi dur khrod du/ /sa bdag ma lus dbang du bsdud/ /klu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed/ /sha khrag gtor ma
49b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di bzhes la/ /'og gi phyogs kyi dgra bgegs bzlog/ //hUM nag po stong gi dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ /byang kha phur kha thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la b+hyo/ /sha za 'bum gyi dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ /
49b7(rgyud 'grel): ltas ngan thams cad sdad pa'i dgra la b+hyo/ /ma mo bye ba'i dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ /rbod stong thams cad sdang pa 'di gra la bzlog /mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ /bsam sbyor ngan ba sdang ba'i dgra la
50a1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /gnod sbyin khri'i dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ /bar chod thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog /lha srin sde brgyad dus la bab po mchod par bzhes/ byol kha thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog/
50a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo b+hyo dgra dang bgegs la b+hyo/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /dam nyams las ngan dgra po yis/ /bsdags cing thad pa'i lha 'dre rnams/ /'dir byon blung dang gtor ma bzhes/ /dkon mchog bden pa'i bka' dang ni/ /chos
50a3(rgyud 'grel): skyong mgon po'i bden pa yis/ /bdag la gnod pa ma byed par/ /byang ma rang gi thog du song/ /rang nus rang la smin par gyis/ /rang mtshon rang la bzlog par gyis/ /rang srog rang giS gcod bar gyis/ /rang sha rang giS za bar gyis/ /
50a4(rgyud 'grel): rten pa'i lha rnams bdud du phob/ /grogs byed rnams kyang dgra ru slong/ /'dis ni bstan pa bshig cing dbu 'phangs smad/ /dam can khyed la do rdos bas/ /'di'i sdong grogs ma mdzad par/ /mthu dang nus pa rtsal thon la/ /rtsad
50a5(rgyud 'grel): nas chod la drung nas phyung/ /snang sring lha 'dre'i chad pa rnams/ /dam nyams dgra yi thog du bzlog/ snang srid dregs pa'i rbod stong rnams/ /dam nyams dgra'i steng du b+hyo/ /ces thams cad kyis byos btab gzhan yang bzlog pa'i
50a6(rgyud 'grel): phrin las rnams btang ngo/ /zor bskul gzhan rnams kyang btang ngo/ /de nas mngos ki lam bstan pa ni/ /bdag ye shes par gsal bar bsgom// //hUM rnal 'byor dbang phyug zor 'phen no/ /bla ma dkon mchog gzu
50a7(rgyud 'grel): dang spang/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas gzu dang spang/ /yi dam lha tshogs gzu dang spang/ /chos skyong srungs ma gzu dang spang/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro gzu dang spang/ /'jig rten lha klu gzu dang spang/ /da yis ma nyes kho yis nyes/ /nga yis ma
50b1(rgyud 'grel): lan kho yis lan/ /nyes byed 'di la chad pas chod/ /dgra bgegs dran pa nyams su chug /b+hyo drag po las kyi thor mdos 'di/ /steng gi lha la mi 'phen no/ /'og gi klu la mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i thor? khar ma byon cig /sa gdag sku la
50b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig /rgyal chen bzhi la mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig /phyogs skyong bcu la mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i zor khang ma byon cig/ lnga?  srin yongs la mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i thor khang ma byon cig /drag po'i
50b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsan la mi 'phen no/ /drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig /lha srin sde brgyad sku zur cig /drag po'i zer khang ma byon cig /'jig rten lha tshogs thams cad kyis/ /nyams pa'i mgon skyabs ma mdzad cig /lha srin sde brgyad ma rtogs cig/ mchod ? gser
50b4(rgyud 'grel): skyems 'di bzhes la/ /'dos lam phye la zor sna drongs/ /nyams pa'i mgon skyabs ma mdzad cig /gal te mgon skyabs mdzad gyur na/ /gzer nad khrag skyugs nyam thag chod/ /mtho ba rnams kyang zhabs yar skums/ /dmar pa rnams kyang
50b5(rgyud 'grel): dbu mar chums/ /bar na gnas pa sku zur cig /pho brang rnams kyang sgo chod cig /na bza' lha ba lhub mdza' bsdus cig /sku zur de ni spyan byol cig /zor dang mdos kyi lam phye cig /sgo ba rnams kyis sgo phye cig/ 'phrang ba rnams kyis 'phrang sol
50b6(rgyud 'grel): cig /da ni zor 'phen gang du 'phen/ /rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas la/ /sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la 'phen/ /byang kha phur kha stong la 'phen/ /gnod pa byed pa'i bgegs la 'phen/ sgo na gong kha phye la 'phen/ /phugs na khyim chags che
50b7(rgyud 'grel): la 'phen/ /nang 'dre cong skri? byed la 'phen/ /mo ngan chags kha phyed la 'phen/ /rmi lam ngan pa la sogs pa'i/ /gang la dmigs pa de la 'phen/ /dgra bgegs thal ba'i rdul du bzlog //hUM da ni mngos chen ? re ran?/ /nag po chen po
51a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i las mkhan sku skyod cig /lha srin dmag sna sku skyod cig /phyibs kha dgra po'i yul du bsgyur/ /dgra bo'i yul khams dmag gis khong/ /spang byed dgra la sku zur ston/ /bka' i chad pa dgra la chod/ /thun zar sdang ba'i dag
51a2(rgyud 'grel): la chos/ /drag byed 'khor bcas dgra la chos/ /dgra bo'i mi nor cham la phob/ /dgra bo'i yul khams rlag par mdzod/ /oM ma hA ka la thun b+hyo/ oM ku ru rbang b+hyo/ pra mo ha b+hyo/ mahA ka la thun b+hyo/ kaM ka la thun b+hyo/ /ka la ra tri thun b+hyo/ zhes
51a3(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba'i dus su zor sngags las so/ /mgon po bya rog gdong gi gtor 'dos/ /slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //gnod sbyin nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// //
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ka la yak+Sha mahA sa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /thugs kyi sras cig gtum po la/ /gus
51a5(rgyud 'grel): pas btud? de de'i sras/ /gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub thabs bri/ /nyon mongs gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /ma lus pa las sgrub pa rnams/ /skad cig tsam las grol 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de las dang por sgrub
51a6(rgyud 'grel): ba pos dbang dang dam tshig thob cing/ /dad pa phun sum tshogs pas/ bla ma la gdams pa yang dag par blangs cing/ the tshom rnam par spangs pas sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /gnas ni dur khrod dang/ brag nag po dang/ ri rtse dang nags kyi
51a7(rgyud 'grel): phug dang/ mi ma yin 'du ba'i sa lha brten can du bya'o// //der dang po bkra mi shis pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya ste/ lte ba gru gsum pa mo ri dang bcas pa// rigs kyis mtshon pa'i sgo dang ldan par bri //
51b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ gnas brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas dur khrod kyi ras la lta bzo mkhas pas gnod sbin gyi sku bzhengs la/ de'i snying khar dam tshig bskul ba'i sngags bris te/ oM badzra yak+ShA ka la tsan d+ha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra
51b2(rgyud 'grel): sid ti hUM ces bri'o/ /de nas phyag gnyis dang zhabs gnyis la dam tshig bskul ba'i sngags ni/ yak+Sha pa ta li ces bri/ /k+ShaM maM b+ha ra ces bri'o/ /de'i rgyab du/ tad tha tad ya tha/ a'oM b+ho b+ho ban yak+Sha/ a ti pa ta ye/ i dan ni laM b+ha ra b+ha ra
51b3(rgyud 'grel): sha ri raM/ badzra pa ni h+ri ta yan/ yas ma ti kra ma te/ u sa d+ha naM/ b+ha bi shud d+he/ tad ya thA/ a'oM b+hud+ha b+hud+d+ha/ bi b+hud+d+ha bi b+hud+d+ha/ ma hi phrab ta ha ra ha ra yak+Sha na na/ pra ha ra pra ha ra yak+Sha na na/ /tshin d+ha tshen d+ha yak+Sha h+ri ta ya ni/ d+hin d+ha d+hin d+ha yak+ShA d+ha ma ni/ /bi
51b4(rgyud 'grel): si ma ti/ yak+Sha shar ri ni/ bi pho ta ya/ yak+Sha na ya ni/ ta da ya thA/ a'oM A:hUM phaT / yak+Sha bi da ra na ya hUM phaT / yak+Sha kro ta swA twA na ya hUM phaT/ ni lam b+ha ra sa na ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta pa la ya hUM phaT/ ba ra kra ma ya phaT/ kri
51b5(rgyud 'grel): tan twA ya phaT/ kri tan twa ru pa ya phaT/ ro sha na ya phaT/ tra sa na ya phaT/ ku sman na d+hod sa d+ha na ya phaT / pre ta bi sha rtsa/ bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa sma ra bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ /ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ na sha
51b6(rgyud 'grel): ya na sha ya/ sarba lhag na na bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ sarba sha truM saM g+ha bi na ka ra ya phaT/ ni laM b+ha ra b+ha ra badzra pa ni rat dz+nya pa ya ti swA hA/ ces rdo rje'i lte ba la bri'o// //dam tshig 'chags pa sku'i rten no/ /gsung mi 'gyur ba
51b7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi rten no/ /gro ga'am ras la 'khor lo bris nas 'chang ba'o/ /thugs gsad? ba'i dam tshig gi rten no/ /khyi nag po'i snying du bla rten du sku bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas gtor ma la bcugs te/ dar nag pos gur phub la bzhug go// //
52a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas byang chub sems bskyed la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /der rjes dkyil 'khor khang pa ru/ /sum las rin chen ri rab steng/ /hUM dam k+Sha 'am yaM las ni/ /'phros 'dus gyur pas rdo rjer bsam/ /
52a2(rgyud 'grel): de dang rten gsum rgyu rkyen las/ /gnod sbyin nag po zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug 'jigs pa'i zhabs gsum pa/ /g.yas pa 'jigs byed stag gi gdong/ /g.yon pa stobs chen seng ge'i gdong/ /rtsa zhal khro bos thams cad bsgol/ /spyan
52a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /dmar ser khrag gi ral pa brdzes/ /phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis pa rtse gsum thams phur/ /g.yon pa dri la bu lcags kyu 'dzin/ /thod chen khrag ldan zhal du rdub /g.yas bskum
52a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud mo 'ching byed gnan/ /g.yon pa brkyang pas nyi gdong brdzis/ /phur zhabs me 'bar tsha ba yis/ /bsgrub bya gang yin mgor btab nas/ /tshangs pa'i bu gar phug par bya/ /thod rlon ro'i lpags pa gon/ /dur khrod rus pas lus la brgyan
52a5(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag la dgyes ha har bzhad/ /mthing nag mi bsrun 'jigs pa yi/ /sprul pa gnod sbyin bye bas bskor/ /bka' nyan las la thogs pa med/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /shar nas nyi ma'i gdong pa dang/ /skar mda' gdong
52a6(rgyud 'grel): dang lnga con dang/ /ku be ra rnams g.yas kyis bskor/ /dbang ldan gtum 'byin yang dag rgyal/ /yang dag shes dang 'bar gdan bris/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa ni/ /rtse gsum pa dan 'phyar ba bsam/ /oM A:hUM gis gnas
52a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum brlab/ /yi ge bzhi yis ye shes bstim/ /thugs kas rdo rje dbang bskur byas/ /'bru nag la sogs gtor ma yis/ /gnod sbyin mchod pa gtor mar brjod/ /slar mnyes bya phyir sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra yak+Sha ka la tsa na d+ha
52b1(rgyud 'grel): ni laM b+ha ra d+ha ra sha ri raM hUM phaT/ rtsa sngags 'bum las mi nyung bar/ /rtags dang sbyar la bsnyen pa bya/ /nag po'i chogs dang snyan pa'i sgras/ /bya dang ba dan sngon po mthong/ /gnod sbyin gnas dang gos gter dang/ /gzhon pa'i mchog tu
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs gton/ /de byung las la sbyar bar bya/ /rjes dang tsha ba'i 'bru dang tsha/ /'gal pa'i rdzas la ling ga bya/ /gnod sbyin skud pas 'khor lo gdags/ /dmigs pa bkug bstim 'bru ba khung gzhug /nyungs dkar la sogs
52b3(rgyud 'grel): thun rdzas kyis/ /dus drug sngags kyis steng nas brab/ /oM badzra yak+Sha ka la tsan d+ha ni laM d+ha ra d+ha ra sarba sha truM bi da ra ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hi na d+ha phaT/ bi spo ta ya bi spho ta ya phaT/
52b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba sha truM ka ya bag tsi ta bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ sems can ba sad dang shing bcad dang/ /dmag 'dren dbang gdon za ba dang/ /bya khras sems can bsad pa dang/ /rtags byung gnan pa yang na bsreg /drag po'i sngags btub par bya//
52b5(rgyud 'grel): des ni nges par bsgrub bya rnams/ /longs spyod dang bcas brlag par 'gyur/ /gal te las rnams gul ba na/ /rten gsum sa ga gtam bcug la/ /steng nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /rdo rje'i thogs chen 'bebs par bsam/ /seng
52b6(rgyud 'grel): ldeng me la gso bar bya/ /phrin las sngags kyiS gzir bar bya/ /de'i mjug la sngags gsum bzlas /gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo yang/ /rdo rje thogs la brdung bar bya /nges par las rnams thogs pa med/ /gal te las kyi tshogs
52b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par 'dod na/ rgyal rigs kyi thod pa la/ hor ram bye khra'i khrag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs phrin las dang sbyar la bris te/ rtsa ba'i sngags la gang 'dod pa'i ming sbel byas la/ rgyas pa la g+hi haM/ dbang la li khri/
53a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la mon sran dkar po'i khu ba/ drag po la dur khrod sol pa/ bsad pa la bya khra lcags kyi khrag / rengs pa yung ba/ bkrags pa lug gi khrag gis bris la/ ke tshe'i mar dang/ chang dang/ sbo so 'cha' dang/
53a2(rgyud 'grel): pri yang ku'i thang chus bris te/ de thang kar byas la rdo rje 'dzin par bsam/ gcer bu skra bshig la/ rgyas pa la me tog ser po/ dbang la dmar po/ zhi ba la dkar po/ drag po la nag po/ bsad pa la dud ka/ rengs pa ser skya / klugs
53a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar nag/ sngags la gang 'dod pa'i ming dang spel la/ nyi ma re la thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad du brdeg na/ zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// //bsrung ba'i 'khor lo byed par 'dod pas / dar ram ras la lte
53a4(rgyud 'grel): bar rdo rje gtum po'i sngags la che ge mo la rag k+Sha rag k+Sha swAhA/ zhes rtags te bri'o/ /de'i phyir rtsibs brgyad la gnod sbyin rtsa sngags bri/ /mu khyud la bsad pa'i sngags bri/ /de'i phyi rol re dmig bcu drug la/ gtso bo'i gsung gi sngags dang /
53a5(rgyud 'grel): rag k+Sha re re la sku dang spel la bri/ de nas mu khyud la phrin las bri/ de'i phyir spyan drang ba'i sngags bri/ de'i mthar ka li/ de'i mthar a li bri/ de'i mthar chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags bri/ de gur gum gyis bris la/ la cha'i sbugs su bcug la
53a6(rgyud 'grel): btags na/ phan yon brjod kyis mi lang ngo/ /bsad par 'dod na skar ma mgo la bab pa dang/ shing lo la sha khog par tshud par bris la/ de nas khyi nag po'i glo ba'i shas gtums te/ gnod sbyin gyis bsad sngags la u tsa ta ya /
53a7(rgyud 'grel): btags he ri lu brgya rtsa brgyad la rtsa brgyad bzlas nas byin naS/ bya rog mthong pa'i bar du yang bzlas te/ ri lu brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas gsod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rams dang me tog sngon po'i khu ba la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya tsa brgyad bzlas khwa skad mi
53b1(rgyud 'grel): 'don pa la/ spral bar thig le byas na kun gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras chang dang g+hi haM dang/ lta gor sha sna rnams la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas? nas rang gi snying kar k+Sha bris nas gnod sbyin rnams kyis stobs dang longs
53b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod sbyin par byed do/ /mthing ril gyi sge nga dang/ khwa ta'i gung zlo dang/ khyi nag po'i chu dang/ mtsho bya'i mthu rnams la sngags gtab la /mi khyi'i sgra mi grags pa'i gnas su sbral bar byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bcud
53b3(rgyud 'grel): lan nam mkhar 'phur/ /gnod sbyin gter dang longs spyod dang/ /phrin las bya ba sna tshogs pa/ /rdo rje gtum po mnyes pa dang/ /gnod sbyin rig pa rdzogs pas na/ /rgyud dang bla ma'i gdam ngag las/ /rim pa rgyas par rtogs par bya/ /
53b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni/ /bla mas gdams pa'i gdams pa yis/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i rim pa 'di/ /rang dga' ma yin nyes pa med/ /gal te 'khrul par gyur pas na/ /bla ma dam pa mkhas rnams dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las grub
53b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rmi lam sgyu ma lta bu'i blos/ /bdag gis nyes tshogs bzod par mdzod// //bdag gis sgrub thabs brtsams pa yis/ /dge ba dri ma med pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i bag chags gzhom slad du/ /byang chub chen por
53b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod shog /gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub thabs /slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes kong kha na'i 'od ma'i tshal du / rang gi slob ma rje btsun chen po thang lo pas gsol ba btab nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN Di
53b7(rgyud 'grel): ta wa la tsan tra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba glun chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis gus par bsgyur ba'o// //dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri mahA ka las d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen
54a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro bo gtum po gdug pa 'dul/ /thugs kyi sprul pa nag po la/ /gus pas phyag byas dgra po rnams/ /bsad par 'dod pas sgrub thabs bri/ /dur khrod
54a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dben pa'i gnas/ /'byung po gnas par dkyil 'khor brtsigs/ /gru gsum khru phyed mthur bkos la/ /sgrub bya'i rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin bsams la/ /mdun du e nad ro stengs su/ /hUM las nag po chen po
54a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /g.yas pa gri gug nam mkhar gdengs/ /g.yon pa thod pa dmar gyis bkang/ /gsol ba'i tshul du thugs khar bzung/ /mgo bo'i phred bas do shal byas/ /kha nas hUM brjod dgra bo gsol//
54a4(rgyud 'grel): sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam lnga yi/ /gtor mas mchod la bstod bya ste/ /de rjes phrin las bcol bar bya/ /a'oM ma hA ka la b+ha ling ta pu tsa b+ho di kha kha khA hi khA hi/ /gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags su gsungs/ /oM badzra kro ta ma ha ka la yaM/ sha truM tsi ta kro ting
54a5(rgyud 'grel): dun dza/ drag pos gsad pa'i sngags so/ /a'oM mahA ka la g+hu na h+ri ta hUM phaT/ /yi ge'i grangs kyi bsnyen pa bya/ /rtags byung las la sbyar bya ste/ /tsha ba gsum la ling ga bya/ /sgrub bya'i ming rus snying gar bcug /'brub gnas bcug la shi skras
54a6(rgyud 'grel): btags/ /phur bu dag la stong bya la/ /nyin mtshan cho? mthun? gyis brab/ /rtags byung nas ni bsreg pa'am/ /gnan pa byas par gyur na ni/ /gang yin des par brlag par 'gyur/ /skabs su phrin las 'dis yis bskul/ /hUM dpal ldan nag po
54a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni/ /bskal pa'i me dpung nang nas bzhengs/ /mi ro'i steng nas sku byung ba/ /mdog nag thung la bsus pa che/ /yon tan rdzogs pa'i lha khyod kyis/ /dgra bgegs gdug ba myur du bsgrol/ /g.yas kyi phyag gi gri gug gis/ /bstan
54b1(rgyud 'grel): la gnod pa'i snying rtsa chod/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gi thod pa yis/ /dam nyams rnams kyi snying khrag gsol/ /mche ba zla tshes rab gcigs pas/ /'jig rten ma lus za tshul ston/ /spyan gsum me'i tsha tsha 'phro/ /gdug pa can rnams bsreg par byed/
54b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor yongs gyi dgra lha yin/ /bdud 'dul rnams kyi dmag dpon yin/ /dam nyams rnams kyi gshed ma mdzad/ /mna' zan rnams kyi srog dbugs len/ /dam pa chos kyi bsrung ma yin/ /dag po gtuM po las la gshegs
54b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la 'khu sems can 'tshe/ /ma lus skad cig tsam gyis kyang/ /'di nyid du ni rings par khug/ sha khrag nang khrol ma lus la/ /dpa' bo chen pos myur du gsol/ /sha khrag til tsam ma lus par/ /khyod kyi zhal du gsol bar
54b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /gal te de ltar ma byas na/ /khyod kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur te/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bka' 'das te/ /khyod kyi snying khrag thang la 'thig /de bas dam tshig ma 'da' bar/ /gdug pa'i dgra 'di myur du bsgrol/ /zhes pas drag tu
54b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba yis/ /gang la dmigs pa myur du bsgrol/ /thod pa mtshan dang mi ldan par/ /ming rus gris te sngags bzlas pa'i/ /nyungs dkar dug dang bcas blugs te/ /dgra'i sgo khar sbas gyur na/ /zla ba drug na rlag par 'gyur/ /
54b6(rgyud 'grel): ka ka'i thod bar ming rus bcug /sngags bzlas zhing la sbas pa na/ /de'i lo thog nyams par 'gyur/ /rabs chad thod par 'khor lo bri/ /sngags kyi btang te dur du sbas/ /rigs brgyud ma lus 'chad par 'gyur/ /de la sogs
54b7(rgyud 'grel): pa las kyi rim/ /yon tan sngags kyis byed 'gyur bas/ /rtag tu sngags la 'bad par bya/ /gal te las rnams ma grub na/ /lha'i snying khar rdo rje bsam/ /de las me byung bsreg bya zhing/ /sngags rnams bzlog la bzlas pa ni/ /
55a1(rgyud 'grel): las de thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /grub nas bdud rtsi lnga yiS mchod/ /de la sogs pa'i las kyi rim/ /bla ma mnyes las blang bar bya/ /nag po chen po'i yon tan gyi/ /bsgrub pa'i rim pa bris pa 'di/
55a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhal las gsungs pa 'di/ /de'i dge bas phrin las rnams/ /'bad pa med par 'grub par shog //dpal nag po chen po yon tan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
55a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la can? tra dang/ lo tsha ba slan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ yag k+Sha ka la mahA stung ta rad na nA ma/ bod skad pung nod sbyin nag po chen po la rin po ches bstod
55a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'chang la gus btung nas/ /thugs kyi sras gcig gnod sbyin rgyal/ /nag po g.yung drung chen po la/ /gus pas bstod pa bri bar bya/ /hUM dpa' bo chen po gnod sbyin
55a5(rgyud 'grel): nag po ni/ /ri rab chen po'i lcog bzhi nas/ /khros pa'i sems kyis sku bzhengs la/ /dgra bgegs bsgrol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs chen mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku/ /gsang byed g.yas pa stag gi mgo/ 'joms byed g.yon
55a6(rgyud 'grel): pa seng ga'i gdong/ /gdug pa tshar gcod phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bar ba'i phyag drug g.yas pa na/ /ye shes rdo rjes 'byung po 'dul/ /rtse gsum nyon mongs dug las rgyal gsong pa'i phur bu phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yon pas shes rab
55a7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu 'khrol/ /'gugs par byed pa'i lcags byu 'dzin/ /gdug khrag kha ru 'dren mdzad pa/ /g.yon pa'i phrin las phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhabs gsum g.yas pas shes rab bdud/ /'ching byed 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod/ /
55b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyis nyi gdong thabs kyi bdud/ /zhe sdang rtsad gcod phyag 'tshal lo/ /phur bus dgra bgegs dmigs pa'i mgor/ /gnyis med bde chen rol pa'i zhabs/ /ma rig rtsad nas gcod mdzad pa/ /rtog med ye shes phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs
55b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan ldan ha ha ra bzhad/ /log par blta ba rtsad nas 'byin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' nyan la/ 'jigs byed khro bo phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig bla ma la smod dang/ /sangs rgyas bstan la smad 'byin la/ /las ngan sems can sdig can
55b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe/ /bsgrub pa po la gdung ba rnams/ /skad cig rtsam gyis gnod sbyin gyis/ /'dir bsdus ling ga 'di la bstims/ /nus pa med par srog dang phrol/ /snying la sogs pa'i nang khrol rnams/ /rang gi snyim pa bkad nas kyang/ /gtso bo nyid
55b4(rgyud 'grel): la bstims pa dang/ /ma lus khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung/ /rus pa rkang mar glad pa zhag /ma lus par ni gsol bar mdzod/ /bdag la gnod pa'i bgegs chen rnams/ /bsod cing bcing ba ma byas na/ /gnod sbyin dam tshig nyams
55b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' ma gcag /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dam ma bsgral/ /khyed kyis dam bcas dam bskral na/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas te/ /snying yang dum bu stong du 'gyur/ /bus? la bskal pa'i me 'bar ste/
55b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal 'gyur bar nges pas na/ /da'i phrin las myur du gyis/ /bskal du bsnyer pa'i phrin las 'di/ /? lta nyid du thogs med kyis/ /k+Sha ma na ti dgra po ma lus pa bi da ra ya bi da ra ya/ phaT/ hUM gnod sbyin chen po las la ya/ /
55b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po las la ya/ /mkha' 'gro chen po las la ya/ /'jigs byed gtum po las la ya/ /thugs kyi sras cig las la ya/ /yak+Sha rno dpal las la ya/ /hUM k+Sha yak+Sha sa ma ya phaT/
56a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bstod pa 'di byas pas/ /nag po'i phrin las grub nas kyang/ /skal dang mi ldan sems can rnams/ /chos dang 'gal ba tshar gcod shog /gnod sbyin nag po la bstod pa rin po che zhes phyug
56a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ka na ri pas bstod pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma wa la tsan tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba slan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur pa'o// //mgon po phyag drug pa'i gzhung ?
56a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsod bral snga 'gyur la 'gyur chad bsabs shing 'gyur bcos pa bzhugs so/ /oM na mo ma hA kA lA ya/ rgya gar skad du/ swas+than mahA kA la sAd+hanaM/ bod skad du/ rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdul dka' 'bul ba sdang mthar?
56a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /de yi sgrub pa rab bshad de/ /lha dang 'byung po 'jigs byed cing/ /dgra dang bgegs rnams rnam par nyams/ /ma zhes bya ba naM sgyu ma'i dra ba dang sngags can no/ /ha zhes bya ba ni haM yig dang srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'phrog
56a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /a zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni am yig dang skye ba med pa'o/ /kA yig ni rgyu las grol ba bde ba dang snying rje chen po'o/ /la zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ nges skye ba med pa la rnam par rol pa'o/ /de la dur khrod la sogs par nag po chen po bsgrub
56a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /sgron ma lnga dang myos byed la sogs pa dam tshig lhag par gnas pas sh+rI he ru konyhaM zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /yi ge hUM las yang dag par byung ba sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje'i gur dang/ phyogs thams cad du rdo rje'i me'i 'khor
56a7(rgyud 'grel): yug bsam mo/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bgegs rnams dgug cing bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung la/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM phaT /
56b1(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya kI la ya sarba pa paM phaT hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra a dz+nya pa ya ti sarba big+h+nan kA ya wak+tsi ta badra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bus btab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI la a ko Ta ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ brdung ba'i sngags so /de nas ji
56b2(rgyud 'grel): skad bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun dang/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma konyhaM/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ 'jig rten mgon po 'o sa
56b3(rgyud 'grel): bon h+ri:zhes nam mkhar bzhag go /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam/ /rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyes pa/ /de ru yi ge b+h+ruM bsam mo/ /phyi rol du ni dur khrod chen po'o/ /ngos bzhi dang ni gra bzhir ldan/ /
56b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi par na rnam par brtag /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rab tu zlum po bri bar bya/ /nyi ma dang h+ri:yig 'ongs pa hUM du gyur pa las rdo rje gri gug go /de la nag po chen po/ /mun pa'i zhal can spyan gsum pa/ gri gug dang phreng ba
56b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang cang te'u ni g.yas pa'i phyag gsum gyis 'dzin pa/ de bzhin du thod pa dang/ mdud rtse gsum pa dang/ zhags pa ni g.yon pa'i 'o/ /mnyam pa'i stabs kyi gaM yig las byung ba'i log 'dren nan pa sbrul ni mi rus dang
56b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i phreng ba dang/ mgo po'i ngo shal can/ stag gi lpags pa grol ba/ char 'khrugs pa/ 'bar ba chen po'i sku/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa pha rol 'joms pa'o/ /dpral bar sind+hu ra'i thig la'o/ /nag mo chen mo h+ra:?
56b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba/ /kha TwaM ga dang/ thod pa 'dzin pas phrag pa nas 'khyud? pa/ /des byin pa gnyis kyis mkhyud pa'o/ /g.yas su ni gshin rje chos be con dang/ zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon du ni dus mtshan ma'o/ /mdun du ni tri shu la dang ka pA la 'dzin pa dzwa li nA'o/ /cang te
57a1(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa bsnams pa/ zhing skyong ma ni rgyab tu'o/ /khu ba dang/ khrag dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang/ sgron ma lnga ni mtshams su'o/ /sgo rnams su ni lcags kyu mo dang/ /zhags pa mo dang/ lu gu rgyud mo dang/ 'bebs ma'o/
57a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams su ni/ gshin rje sreg ma dang/ pho nya mo dang/ mche ba mo dang/ be con ma'o/ /ma mo dgu ni/ gcer mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /oM A:hUM/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM
57a3(rgyud 'grel): gaM skaM/ paM yig la sogs pa'i sngags so/ /ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya'o/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar rtsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu sgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje
57a4(rgyud 'grel): ding bdag stsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /gsang gsum rdo rje las byung ba/ /khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin/ /gsol ba bya ba dang dbang bskur ba rdo rje'i tshig go /mi bskyod dam
57a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig dbu rgyan la/ sgom na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi/ /'da' ? bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go /oM badzra sa mA dza:sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /dza:hUM baM ho:byin gyis brlabs pa ste phyag rgya'o/ /de la sngags 'di dag ni las
57a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /oM badzra mahA ka la k+ShiM k+Sha tra big+h+nan bi nA ya ka hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM sh+rI mahA ka la shwa sa no pa ha ri Ne e Sho pa shtsi ma kAnya lo ya maM daM ratna tra ya a pa ka ri NaM ya daM pra ta dz+nyA sma ra si/ ta dA /i daM duSh+TAM?/
57a7(rgyud 'grel): kha kha khA hi khA hi /ma ra ma ra/ grih+na grih+na /rtsa sngags 'di la rgya dpe gsar pa na 'dra man du 'dug kyan sngar gyi bod na yod pa nyid dbang btsan par byas so// band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ dI na me ki na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra nA ra kraM kraM? hUM hUM
57b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ swAhA/ mkha' 'gro mas dbang du byed ba'o/ /oM hUM sh+rI ya/ de bi kA lI kA lI mahA kA li hUM b+hyo/ nag mo chen mo'i'o/ /oM A:mahA kA lI de bi kA la bikrAn+ta kA rA tri tsaN+Da rU pi NI hUM phaT/ dus mtshan ma'o/ /oM h+rI:kA la rU ba hUM khaM/ nyi ma'i bu'o//
57b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags? 'di yang snga 'gyur bod ded? dbang bcan par byas so// oM A:kro d+hai ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dzaM hUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /thal mo sbyr pa ni gang chen po'i dam tshig go /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni nag mo'i phyag
57b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /b+ha ga ltar byas pa ni dus mtshan mi'o/ /'dzub mo brkyang ba ni chos kyi rgyal po'i 'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag gis spyan drangs shing/ mdun du dam tshig sbyin pa ste/ oM badzra ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni sngags
57b4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /lte bar b+ha ga la gnas pa'i/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsam par byas na/ /bde ba chen por 'gyur te/ 'jigs byed chen po dang/ dus mtshan ma mnan pa /gri gug dang thod pa kha TwaM ga 'chang ma/ steng du lta zhing dmar mo ?
57b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus can ma'o/ /'di la ni bzlas pa med de/ gzhan du 'di nyid sngags so/ /gshin rje gshed ni nag po nag dkar dmar ba'i zhal/ /'khor lo dang ral gri dang be con dang/ mdung dang/ sta re dang/ thod pa bsnams
57b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dur khrod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa ma he la zhon pa'o/ /gal te dam tshig nyams pa la/ slob dpon rdo rje sems dpas bdag nyid la sogs pa bkru bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig dran pa bzlas pas gsol ba bya'o/
57b7(rgyud 'grel): cod ban gyis/ bdag la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba bsgom na/ las dang dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa bshad pa/ dbugs dbyung ba dang/ dgang ba dang/ rengs pa dang/ bum pa can gyi las
58a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis lus dag par bya'o/ /de nas gdol pa mo 'am/ gzhan pa'i rigs kyi'o/ /pad+ma can nam/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i mi mo/ /b+ha ga bzang ba/ rtsa mchog dang ldan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma la sogs pa blangs nas dag par byas te
58a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog /spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang/ /A:dang phaT ni rab brtag bya/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yaM/ /pad+ma rdo rje rab bsgom bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg
58a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /tsum pa na dang rtag par mkhrud/ /ye shes pad+ma kha bye ba/ /rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag /'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te/ /rdo rje'i phur bu nges par gdab/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par
58a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de nas dpa' bos me tog chu/ /'thungs nas sngags ni rjes dran bya/ /dbugs 'byin brgyal dang rgod pa dang/ /sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas/ /phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos/ /myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /bu mo yang gsungs
58a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin/ /des kyang grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /rig ma chen mo spyan la sogs/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub//
58a6(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs so/ /las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /pa lang sha dang rta sha dang/ /khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /gtum mo rang gi lus las byung bas dbyer med pa'i sems bsgom bar bya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'o
58a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med la sgom pa med/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /de ltar dngos po dang sa med pas/ /sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /chos rnams dngos po med pa la/ /chos gyi de nyid kun bshad pa/ /e ma ngo mtshar las byung ba/ /
58b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/ /phyag rgya chen po'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/ /rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom/ /lus dang ngag sems la spros pas/ /rdo rje 'jam ba 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od
58b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan? pa yis/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur/ /'di nye bar mtshon pa ni kun brtags te/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de dag ni bsnyen pa'o/ /de ltar rtag tu goms pa na rig? pa'i brtul?
58b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs spyad pas bdag nyid nag po chen por 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rje btsun gyi sku gzugs zla mtshan gyi ras sam/ g.yul gyi rongs? la gsang bas bris te byin gyis brlags nas/ /nag po chen po gang yin bde rdo rje slob dpon du bsam pas/ ri mo'i?
58b4(rgyud 'grel): mdun du mchod pa dang/ 'dug dang sha chen po dang gu gul gyi gdug pa phul nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /oM badzra mahA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nan bi na ya ka A gats+tshi A gats+tsha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ nag po chen po nyid 'ongs nas ci 'dod ces smra'o/ /de?
58b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang nag po chen por mdzod cig ces byas na/ bdag nyid nag po chen por 'gyur ro/ /ril bu dang/ mig sman dang/ ro dang/ ral gri la sogs dang/ las thams cad ster ro/ /cho ga 'di kho nas nag mo chen mo la sogs pa 'grub par bya'o/
58b6(rgyud 'grel): yang lang tsho dang ldan pa'i bu mo'i mgul nas 'khyud nas nag mo 'am/ dus kyi mtshan ma'i gsang sngags dang bcas/ dzrA la ya dzwA la ya zhes brjod na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzung ste spyod pa spyad pas bdag nyid nag po chen po dang mtshungs par
58b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phyag mtshan rnams dang/ lha dang 'byung po thams cad nag po chen po'i bkas mdag gzhug tu bya'o/ /oM badzra mahA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nan bi nA ya ka badzra a mu kaM? sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ mtshon cha sgrub
59a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mahA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+Nan bi nA ya ka A dz+nyA ya a mu kaM /A karSha ya A karSha ya a mu kaM sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /yang na rdul? tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil
59a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bris nas kyang sgrub ste/ mtshan ma mthong zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ma grub na drag shul sbyor ba bya'o/ /de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o/ /gzhan yang las kyi sbyor ba phra mo dag kyang
59a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub ste/ rtse gcig tu ma gyur pas kyang ngo/ /gshin rje'i 'khor lo dur? khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag ? she tshe dang/ lan tsha dang/ d+ha du ras bri'o/ /lte ba dang khang pa suM cu rtsa gnyis la yi shes? bcu bdun dag nag po chen po dang gshin rje gshed kyi sngags
59a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bskul ba dang bcas pa bri'o/ /yak+She ma me da dza sa do ru yats+tsha ni rA Na yo ni ra/ de nyid nya phyis gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag nas bskul bar byas na nyi ma bdun gyi gsod par byed do/ /de bzhin du de dang nga'i cho ga las thams cad
59a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa ste/ 'khor lo 'di ni chen po'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ lte bar rtsa ba'i sngags dang/ phaT a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT ces bris/ kha kha khA hi khA hi ya mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ ces bya ba la sogs pa yang rab tu
59a6(rgyud 'grel): bris/ phreng ba'i sngags kyis phyi rol nas bskor ba'i 'khor lo 'dis kyang drag shul thams cad sgrub par byed cing/ sngags dang 'khrul 'khor 'ching ba dang gcod pa dang/ byis pa'i gdon rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad dang/ nye bar
59a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba thams cad dang/ /mi mthun pa thams cad bsrung par bya'o/ /nag po'i bkas ma mo rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gshin rje rnams dang/ srin? po rnams dang/ lha min rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/
59b1(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer skyong ba rnams bskul nas kyang las sgrub po/ /nag po chen po la gtor ma sbyin te las rnams bsgrubs par bya/ /sreg blugs dag kyang dbul lo/ /mi rus las byung phur bu 'am/ /yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes/ /lcags
59b2(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'i phur bu dag /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /phur bu btab na myur du 'chi/ /dgra bo'i bshad gci las gzugs brnyan byas te/ A karSha ya dza:sa bkug nas/ oM badzra mahA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nan bi nA ya ka badzra ki li kI la/ ya
59b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba sha trun band+ha hUM phaT/ 'dis gdab po/ /da ni drag shul gyi sbyor ba thams cad pa bshad pa nam mkha' rdo rje'i srin po ni/ drag cing khro bo rab gtum dang/ /wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang/ /bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom/ /me yi
59b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dgra po rnams ni skrag par bsgom/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la/ dgra bo bsang par bsam nas su/ /de nas las rnams brtsams par bya/
59b5(rgyud 'grel): de la dkyil 'khor pa de rnams kyis de'i lus btang zhing/ de'i bsrung pa'i lha rnams kyang bkug nas rang nyid la thim par bya'o/ /phur bus btab cing mtshon chas bcad par bya'o/ /bsod nams gang gis tshe 'dir srung ba rnams kyang sngags
59b6(rgyud 'grel): pas blang bar byas la/ 'byung po gang dag srung ba byed pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin pa dang/ phur bus gdab po/ a mu ka k+Sha sampu TA di rak+Sha man+t+ra de ba nAM/ kI la ya kI la ya hUM phaT/ /phur bu bskul ba'i sngags dang/ phreng ba'i sngags
59b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa ni gdab pa'i sngags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis de'i lte ba bcang cing/ /snying ga'i thig le dbye bar bsam mo/ /rgyu ma rkang dang khrag la sogs/ /thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas
60a1(rgyud 'grel): mnan/ /bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi man ngag gis mtshon cha drug po dag gas sprin gyis char dbab pa'o/ /gzhan yang mnan pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ srin pos 'dzin pa dang/ rims dang/
60a2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad ba dang/ rmugs pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ bu mo 'gugs pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa la sogs pa/ de de'i cho gas bya ste skad cog gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dbang bskur ba la 'di sbyin bya/ /gzhan du khro bo
60a3(rgyud 'grel): gtum pos gsod/ /dngos grub kun gyi sbyor sgrub pa/ slob dpon bka' las don yod yin/ /zhes pa 'jigs rten dbang phyug ma ha kA la'i sgrub thabs rang gnas pa zhes bya ba de bA a ka ras mdzod pa'o/ /'di'i 'gyur rnying grub chen tshul
60a4(rgyud 'grel): mgon nyid kyis mdzad pa las/ /sngags rnams phal cher zhal bzhes kyi dbang du mdzad pa'ang bas dkyus na med/ mdzad byang bram ze ratna pha las mdzad ces 'byung ba la bar skabs su mchan bu dkyus su shor ba sogs lhag chad nor spyod?
60a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mang po snang ba/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta pu rta? badzra ba'i zhabs kyi rgya dpe dang bstun nas/ rgyal khams pa tA ra nA thas 'gyur chad mang du bas bas shing/ g.yar khral du zhus thug byas pa'o// //
60a6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun nag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs man ngag mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po zhi ba smas? pas mdzad ba'o? //rgya gar skad du/ b+haTTa ra ka sh+rI mahA kA la sad+hO na pa de sha sadk+Shipta/ bod skad du/ rje btsun dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs
60a7(rgyud 'grel): man ngag mdor bsdus pa/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa'i me yi 'phreng bas rab bskor sngar dang lha min gsong byed gtum po ste/ /char sprin mtshungs sku glug dmar rje 'gro ro 'dzin/ ral gri skyong pas phyugs rnams
60b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /mi bzad mtshon chas bdud tshogs bcom nas thod par khrag 'thung mchog tu brgyan mdzad pa/ /grub pa kun gyi mchog stsol 'jigs byed nag po chen pos 'gro 'di skyong bar mdzod/ /sgrub pa po dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas te/ dkyil
60b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru bzhi la gnas ba'i zlum po bya'o/ /der zur drug pa b+ha ga'i rnam pa dgod par byas nas/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham mo/ /de yang nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ khrag gi yon chab dang me tog la sogs pa nga rgyal? pa?
60b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mdun rnam par dag pa dang/ gtor ma dang bstong pa byas la/ oM mu:zhes gshegs su gsol/ /de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la gnas par byas ma/ slar yan bdag med pa'i don la gnas pas stong? pa
60b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /oM shu n+yA ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma konyhaM/ de nas mdun du gsang ba'i bris sku dgram pa dang/ /bsgom zhing bzlas pa bya'o/ /de'i rim pa ni thogs mar dur khrod kyi gzhir mos pa bya'o/ /phyi nas chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ?
60b5(rgyud 'grel): ro'i gdan no /der zla ba dang nyi ma la hUM dang gri gug las skyes pa'i nag po chen po rab tu 'bar ba can/ sprin nag dang mtshungs pa/ bya rog dang khyi dang ce sbyang gi tshogs spro ba/ spyan gsum pa/ sma ra dang smin ma 'bar ba/ /skra ser po brjod?
60b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ srin po'i lus can phyas g.yas dag gis gri gug dang/ ral gri'o/ /g.yon dag gis tri shu la sprul dang bcas pa dang thod pa khrag can no/ /stag gis lpags pas smad dkris ba/ sprul dang/ ni rangs? brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang thod pas
60b7(rgyud 'grel): cod pan bcings pa/ mgo bo'i do shal can/ drag po'i gang rgyangs sgrog pa /sems dpa' i skyil krungs saM yang na mnyam pa'i stabs su'o/ /de la yi ge gsum dgod ba dang/ go cha bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes pa bkug cing 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te/ mi bskyod pas rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /yang mchod cing bstod nas sngags bzla ste/ so sor bzhi 'bum du bzla'o/ /thun mtshams su yang bris sku la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o/ /de dag ni bstan pa/
61a2(rgyud 'grel): chung du'o/ /de'i rjes su nag chen po'i 'khor bskod de/ dam tshig dbang mos mgul nas mkhyud pa/ de ni cang te'u dang thod pa can gcer mo mchog tu sgag pa mgo bo skam po'i thod pa dang 'phreng ba can/ seng ge dang/ na chung dang/ gdol? pa
61a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dab chags spro ba nag mo chen mo'o/ /mdun du tsa muN+DI? bung ba'i mdog can/ tri shu la dang/ dung chen po thogs pa/ g.yas su dka' bzlog ma 'od dmar 'khrug pa mo/ /gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon du phag mo sngo skya kha TwaM ga
61a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o/ /nag mo chen po'i mdun du bshin rje nag po ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /g.yas su srin bo dmar nag lag na gri gug dang thod pa'o/ /g.yon du 'byung po'i dbang po thal mdog cang te'u dang rtse gsum 'dzin
61a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag ni h+rI:tsa ha:he la ra b+hai zhes pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o/ /da ni sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ oM mahA kA la hUM phaT/ dang po'o/ /oM mahA kA la yan mo hUM phaT/ gnyis pa'o/ /oM A:maM haM raM hUM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po
61a6(rgyud 'grel): ste gsum pa'o/ /na ma:sma shan bA si ni/ mahA kA la a ru tsa rA la/ tadya thA/ tsa le pra tsa le la la lA ya/ de ba ling+ga swAhA/ snying po ste bzhi pa'o/ /oM mahA b+hai rab sarba sid d+hi dA ya ka DaM hUM d+hwaMT:? dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul bskul ba ste lnga pa'o//
61a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sh+rI mahA kA la ya/ shas no pa ha ri Ne/ e Shonyra? pa shtsim kalonya yaM i daM/ ratnatra yA pa ka ri NaM/ yati pra tidz+nya/ sma ra sitadI/ idaM duSh+TaM/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+na grih+na/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/
61b1(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa / dI na me ke na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nag po chen po thams cad kyi 'phreng ba'i sngags te las thams cad byed pa'o/ /oM su ra tAs ma ye sh+rA rI hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ nag mo chen mo sbyangs shing bod pa'i sngags so/ /oM kri/ bliM/ dziM phaT
61b2(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ nag mo chen mo'i snying po'o/ /oM tsa muN+De /d+hu ma ke shI bid+hu tdze he/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ de bangt+ta A na ya swAhA/ tsa muN+DI'i'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha hUM? sh+rI phaT swAhA/ u ma'i'o/ /h+ri:ha ha mtha mtha ha swAhA/ phag mo'i
61b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o/ /oM h+ri:kA larU pa hUM khaM/ gshin rje'i'o/ /oM badzra rak+Shas kru ra da ha pa tsa TuM TuM swAhA/ srin po'i'o/ /oM rutra ya ma he shwa rA ya ma ma hu ti hUM phaT/ drag po'i 'o/ /oM A:hUM byin gyis rlob pa'i 'o/ /oM ha/ nama:hi/ swAhA hUM/ bau ShaTrahe/ hUM hUM
61b4(rgyud 'grel): ho/ phaTra? haM/ oM baM/ haM yoM/ h+rai/ moM/ h+reM h+riM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT /ces pa go cha'o/ /oM ka la sha ab+hi na ya na naM/ snA naM oM shuAn+ya tA ad+hiSh+Tha te swAhA /lha dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /hUM h+rI:byAM? dyAM/ zhes pa ni rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis
61b5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'o/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o/ /'dir nag po chen po shes rab ma dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni/ bsnyen pa chen po'o// //de bzhin du 'khor lo bsgom pa ni/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa chen po'o/ /de dag tu sngags
61b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig ni bye ba'o/ /gzhan dag ni 'bum phrag bzhi la sogs pa'o/ /nag mo chen mo la sogs pa'i ni 'bum du'o/ /de nas ni sgrub pa brtsam bar bya ste/ dur khrod la sogs par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi par dbus su zur? drug
61b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de dag tu dbus dang nang gi zur gsum la yi dags kyi gdan no/ /gzhan ngos kyi grwa la/ ma he dang/ khyi dang/ stag gi gdan no/ /de dag tu mtshan ma bkod la/ tho ba dang/ dbyug pa dang/ pad+ma dang/
62a1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ni sgo bzhir ro/ /thod pa ni grwa bzhir ro/ /bum pa dang ka pA la dang sindu ra'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gtor ma yang dgod par bya'o/ /'dir ni mung+ga rab+hai rab la sogs pa dang/ kul+le dang/ ku ru kul+le dang/ ki lI yaM dang/ ha ri yaM
62a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ lcags kyu dang/ mda' dang/ phur bu dang/ shak+ti'i lag can no/ /zhes pa man ngag go /bdag nyid de'i dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na/ nag po chen po'i drung du/ bdag nyid kyang der bsam ste/ zla ba drug tu
62a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas ni/ /sgrub pa'o/ /de dang bdag nyid gcig tu bya bas/ zhag bdun du rgyun mi 'chad par bskul ba ni/ sgrub pa chen po'o/ /de'i rjes su dngos grub blangs la dkyil 'khor gshegs nas ci bder 'dug par bya'o/ /gang zhig sgrub pa la gnas pas
62a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dang mchod pa dang/ /sbyin sreg rgyun mi 'chad par bya ste/ /de la gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /gang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ bsrung ba dang sbyin pa'i tshe/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'phreng ba'i sngags bzlas la/ na ma:saman+ta kA ya wA k+tsit+ta?
62a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra NaM/ oM A:hUM oM maM maM haM haM kaM kaM de daM? mahA mahA kA la da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa gardza gardza ke shawarta mane /i maM bA ling+graM? h+na grih+na grih+na pA ya oM A:hUM sarba big+hInpa nA ya ka/ oM AkA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM adya nu tpan+na twata/ oM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ 'byung pa'i tshogs pa
62a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni/ oM sarba k+She tra pA la sa ha ga NadA tI bA ling grih+na grih+na kha kha hUM phaT swAhA/ gang gtor ma sbyin pa dang bzlas pa dang/ mchod pa la 'jug pa na dam tshig bskul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra mahA kA la/ dri sh+yadza:hUM baM ho sa ma yastwaM/ samaya ho(rgyud 'grel): thal mo
62a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bcing ba dang/ rdo rje thal mo naM? nag po chen po bud med dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas las kyi rim pa ste las kyi don du mchod pa'i nyin mo bdun no/ /de nas dug dang drag dang lan tshwa dang nim+ba dang/ ske tshe btags pas/
62b1(rgyud 'grel): ro ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gnyis bri'o/ /lte bar snying po bskul tshig dang bcas pa bri'o/ /'og ma la g.yon skor du/ kha kha de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces pa la sogs pa'o/ /rtsibs chen dag la/ dI na me ke na de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM
62b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ ces pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol du mu khyud la yang de dang 'dra bslar yang mu khyud gnyis pa la/ phaT de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT ceS? pa'o mtshon cha nang du ltas pas kyang ra ba'o/ /de'i bar du gzugs brnyan sngags kyis bskor ba'o/ /bdag dang bris sku lha'i rnal
62b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la gnas pas 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nyid thod par bcug la sgrub bya dgug pa dang/ snying po dang 'phreng ba'i sngags drag tu bzla'o/ /dug khrag dang/ yungs kar dang/ ske tshe dang/ lcags dang/ dur khrod kyi thal ba dang/
62b4(rgyud 'grel): ro bsregs pa'i rdo dang/ gtum po'i thal ba dang/ bra bo dag la bzlas pas kyang gtor ro/ /gal te bsrung ba dang bcas par gyur na /kha sbyor dbye'o/ /de nyid bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin sdang bar byed bde ster te/ khwa dang 'ug
62b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la gnas pa bri/ /'khor lo rta dang ma he dang/ khwa dang 'ug pa'i khrag gis bri'o/ /lha dang sgrub bya'i rdzas kyis kyang byug go /kla klo rnams kyi dur gyi khad pa'i rdzas dang/ rus pa dang/ ma Sha ti kyi khrag dang bcs pa nyid lha min gyi rdzas so/ /de nyid
62b6(rgyud 'grel): gu gul dang/ rang byung dang/ bshang ba dang/ khyi dang/ phag gi rus pa dang/ ka ping dza'i rwa sregs pas bdug go /de yang/ dong bur sgrub na bzang po zhes pa man ngag go /yang logs shig tu/ gzugs brnyan dang 'khor lo
62b7(rgyud 'grel): bri'o?/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la snyan gsan phab? ste mchod nas sngags kyis bskul lo/ /srung ba rnam dag ni/ de ba dat+ta kla sam+bu TiM rak+Sha man+ta de ba tany+tsa A karSha ya dza:zhes bkug la 'khor lo dang sngags phur bus
63a1(rgyud 'grel): gdab po/ /de'i dge ba de dag/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lhas skye ba gzhan du 'phang ba'i don du 'chang cing/ bdag la rab tu dgug ste/ de ba dat+ta'i srung ba po lha dang lha min ston mos mi
63a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gu ba de dag dgug cing gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab po/ /de nas rab tu bskul na/ 'grub par mi 'gyur pa dag kyang nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig na 'chi bar the tshom med/ /yang na 'khor lo de dung chen kha sbyor du bcug la dur khrod du sba
63a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am sreg blugs su bya'o/ /'khor lo 'di ni drag shul kun byed pa ste/ skrad pa dang/ dbye ba dang/ gnan pa dang/ lkugs pa dang/ ma ning du byed pa dang/ rims kyis gdab pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang srin pos 'dzin
63a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa rnams so/ /smras pa/ dang po dang ni gnyis pa gnyis ni 'bum dang gsum pa de nas bzhi pa bye bar bzlas/ /lhag ma yang ni 'bum phrag mda' dang 'khor ni 'bum gyi bzlas pas bcu gnyis lo grangs kyis/ /dngos grub
63a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni las kyi sngags rnams 'bum bcas bye bas phra mo thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /zla drug brtson pas bgegs nyams nyes pa'i zla bas 'byung po thams cad mdag gzhug 'gyur pa 'di ko /gzhan ni gang la 'grur 'gyur ba de de'i
63a6(rgyud 'grel): rnga mo dang zung rus sbal dang ni lug /ma ning de dang ro langs sngags can ma sogs lus gnas mkhar gnas mgrin rings khrag dang gzhan/ /lag dang yung pa sbal pa'i khrag bsres tshim gi'i rtsa ba gzhan ni sngar mtshungs snag tsha
63a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de yi srad bus bcings dang so sor mtshon cha bskul tshig bcas pas las kun rab 'grub 'gyur/ /ro 'dzin ral gri traM yig ljang khus mtshan pa'i snang bas dngos grub kun bsdus te/ oM dang traM h+riM de nas ka pa la dang ra tra?
63b1(rgyud 'grel): de rjes swAhA'i rab sngags ni/ /bzlas pas rigs sngags mnan dang bcas pa tshig par bsams na de yi las rnams thal bar 'gyur/ /bgegs dang sdig pa yang yang sbyangs shing/ bdud rtsi'i bum pas sku gzugs rab bkrus?
63b2(rgyud 'grel): sman mchog gis/ /dbang bskur mchod dang gang gang 'khor lo de ltar mchod nas bsrung dang zlog pas gzi nyams 'joms/ oM badzra karTika ha na ha na sha truM mAr ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra khaDga mAr mAr ya mAr ya sarba big+h+nAnda hUM phaT/ oM badzra traM?
63b3(rgyud 'grel): shUl b+hinda b+hinda ma na mtha phaT ho/ oM pad+ma ka pA la sarba d+hAn puSh+TiM ku rban+tu oM/ oM badzra DA ma ru ke Na sarba DA ki nI bahA ya bahA ya h+ri:dza(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni mtshon cha ste sprin 'thug po spro pas las/ thams cad 'grub pa'o/ oM pra wa raha:dgug pa'i sngags
63b4(rgyud 'grel): so/ /oM pa su g.ya li hUM/ skrod par byed pa'o/ /oM khaT pa tsa tra h+ra(rgyud 'grel): gsod par byed pa'o/ /oM ru a swA bi du pa(rgyud 'grel): rmugs par byed pa'o/ /oM maM raM ha/ 'byung po 'dul ba'o/ /oM dzaM raM/ me rengs par byed pa'o/ /oM dzaM dzaM dzaM chu rengs pa'o/ /
63b5(rgyud 'grel): oM haM dzaM yaM swAhA/ ral gri rengs pa'o/ /oM he tiSh+Tha he wa hUM/ mkha' 'gro ma 'dul ba'i sngags so/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rang rang gi sngags bskul pa dang bcas pa dang/ lte bar snying po gsum bskul ba dang bcas pa'o/ /
63b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga thams cad ni sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor pa shes pas brtag go /chu dang me rengs pa ni khyim dang lus sam gnas la gdags so/ /ral gri rengs pa ni lus la gdags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po gzir ba ni rtag tu bskul
63b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing? mnan pa'am bsregs lugs bya'o/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo klu rigs brgyad kyi snying gar bri/ rab tu bkug la /nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu bcug /ri dags lte ba dang rma bya'i khrag dang/ phag gi mche
64a1(rgyud 'grel): ba btags pa'i chus thal ba dang yungs kar la bran te/ oM mahA naM ta hUM ta/ sarba band+ha band+ha adz+nyA pa ya tI swAhA/ ces 'bum bzlas so/ /'khor lo bcangs shing yungs kar dang thal ba gang la bsnun pa'i sprul 'bros pa'am 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /oM mu khaM staM b+hA ya a mu kAM baM hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i dbus su lce bcings pa spu ti la'i snying gar bcug ste lce la phur bus btab ste/ sngags 'dis bskul ba na lkugs pa las gzhan ma yin no/ /oM h+ri maM? tsamuN+DA ha:sh+rI ?
64a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bum du bzlas nas bskul chog? dang bcas khri bzlas la/ /sngon dang 'dra ba'i 'khor lo bcing ba dang/ gnam lcags kyi rdo rje la lan stong du bzlas te bcangs na mtshon cha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /snying po'i mthar/ oM dza la ya lu hUM /ces ?
64a3(rgyud 'grel): shing/ mchod rten gyi drung du gtsang sbrar bcas pas shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /snying gar rdo rje rnon po sgoms la/ snying po'i mthar/ oM ba ra ba ra pra ba ra pra ba ra hUM/ zhes bzlas pas blo gros mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /spyan sreg saM?
64a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gzhan du bstan pa'o/ /gtor ma nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa khrag dang chang dang sha dang 'bras bu dang dzam+bu lis brgyan pa brgya dang/ bkra shis kyi grangs dnag/ drug cu dang/ nyer lnga sbyin pa/ 'byung po'i pA la ta dang bcas
64a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin na las tha dad pa thogs pa med par 'grub po/ /gang zhig lcags dang seng ldeng dang mi rus kyi phur bu mang po dag byas la/ kI li yaM bsgrub par bya'o/ /oM tshinda tshinda/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dIpta tsakra hUM phaT/
64a6(rgyud 'grel): ces pas bsnyen nas/ phur bu rnams la so sor bzlas pa stong dang/ thams cad du khri bzlas pa'am 'bum du bzla'o/ /phyis mu stegs byed la sogs pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la zhag bdun du dgug par bya'o/ /phur
64b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gtso bo la mchod pa dang gtor ma dang sregs blugs dbul bzhin du gzuD brnyan gyi gnas gsum dang/ dbang po rnams la phur bu rnams kyi phur bus gdag po/ /dug dang khrag gi dbus su sbyings la mchod rten dang ri bos mnan par bya'o/ /
64b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni dgra bo'ang phur bus gdab pa rig par bya'o/ /phur bus bcings pas ser ba'ang srung bar byed do/ /yang k+Sha yig las langs ka'i bdag pa be con dang zhags pa dang ral gri dang thod pa thogs pa bsgom shing yang dgug ste/ oM krang
64b3(rgyud 'grel): ke ri phaT da sha khrI ba a karSha ya dza:zhes bzlas la/ bshad ba'i dkyil 'khor dang sha dang khrag dang myos byed/ thod dus kyi bdug pa 'bul lo/ /oM badzra ka pa? bI? rak+ta sI hi ri mi ri swAhA ru lu ru lu b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): srin me rnams kyi sngags so/ /'dis ni
64b4(rgyud 'grel): rbod gtong grub bar byed do/ /oM ha ri tyai mahA yak+Shi NI ye ha ra ha ra pra be sha ni swAhA/ lcags kyu dang 'brus dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'i 'phrog ma dmar mo gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bskor ba spyan drangs te chang bu dang shing thogs la sogs pas
64b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya'o/ /'dis ni gter chen po dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang/ /'byung po la sogs pa mdag gzhug gi rtogs pa ji ltar 'byung ba ltar sgrubs na thams cad 'grub par byed do/ /yang nag po chen po mkha' lding gi
64b6(rgyud 'grel): lus can du byas la/ badzra pita tad+haM kar haM ta swAhA/ zhes 'bum bzlas shing/ phyis klu brgyad kyis rjed par byas pa/ nges par sgrubs te/ bka' tsam gyis char 'bebs pa dang gcod par byed do/ /gal te 'khor lo bri bar
64b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na/ dbus su snying po bskul tshig bcas pa bya/ rtsibs brgyad la yang snying po bskul ba dang bcas pa bris ? mu khyud gsum du byas la gsum pa'i rab sngags la sogs pas bskor te/ phyi rol 'dab ma brgyad la phu(rgyud 'grel): 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bkod/ /re re'ang ming bskul ba dang bcas pas bskor / phyi rol du sbrul gyi phreng ba dang nag po'i gzungs kyis dkris pa bA ru Na'i snying gar bcug la klu gnas su mchod pa dang drag tu gzir na nges
65a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub pa'o/ /oM a mri ta pra b+he a mrita hUM/ oM badzra kau wa mahA kA lA ya hUM tsirA nyzI bkur ru ku ru hUM phaT swAhA/ ces 'bum bzlas pas dus kyi mun pa bzlog cing ring du mtsho bar 'gyur ro/ /oM gau rI haM b+hand+ha mu traM sarba gau rita dz+nyA naM dad
65a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal le sphAT ye hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ bud med byin gyis brlab pa ste bzlas pas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de nas ni nag mo chen mor 'gyur te grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du phyag mtshan dang gzhon pa la sogs pa bsgrub
65a4(rgyud 'grel): ste /aM? mu kaM sAd+ha ya sA d+ha ya adz+nyA pa ya tA ye swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /bdag nyid ha ri yaM giS /'khyud pa klu brgyad dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor las/ sngags kyi mthar nA ga rA dza(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): phu(rgyud 'grel): dzruM dzruM dzruM sbyor
65a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams las rdo rje dang pad+ma so so'i 'od kyis rab tu bkug na pho dang mo so so'i mdangs 'phrog par 'gyur te/ the tshom med do/ /thod par ma mo dang bcas pa nag po chen po'i sku rdo las grub pa bzhag ste/ nor dang 'bru dag
65a6(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi shu lnga pa'i thum por bya'o/ /khrag chen po dang bcas arg+ha brgya dang brgyad gtor mar bcas pas mchod pa dang/ lcags sbyangs pa'i gri gug /ha na ha na badzre Na'i sngags kyis bsngags pas kha zas dgra bo'i lus su byas
65a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bcad bzos pa dang/ arka'am/ ko bidA ra'i shing gi ral gri 'bar pa'i sngags kyis bsdags pa dang/ kha dI ra'i shing la tri shUl byas la dgug pa dang/ dbang du byed pa'i sngags kyis bsngags na go rim bzhin du/
65b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ gdon rnams 'jig pa dang dbang du byed do/ /mi'i thod pa las cang te'u byas la/ ce sbyang gi klad rgya drang ri bong gi pags pas g.yogs te/ g.yul du bsang pa'i rgyus pa dang/ rA DI ska satra ba byas la
65b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bar mchod nas/ markaTa'i dbang po lnga der blugs na/ /sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma dbang du bsdu pa dang/ 'byung po 'bros pa dang/ nag po chen po 'bebs par byed do/ /da ni bris sku'i cho ga 'di yin te/ g.yul gyi las chen
65b3(rgyud 'grel): nam/ dpa' bos rin gyis nyos pa me tog dang khrag chan gyis byugs la/ arg+ha'i mchod pa dang/ bA la ta lan gsum byas la gsol pa gdab po/ /ji ltar he ru ka'i bris sku'i cho ga ltar byas la mchod pa dang gtor mar bcas te
65b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas ba 'bum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po dag gis rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas pas/ nag po bka' mngon du thob ste dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/ /rab sngags a kid badzra dza ya dza ya hA hA swAhA zhes pa dang bcas pa bzla zhing
65b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gser gyi kha dog/ bum pa dang thod pa dang/ lcags kyu 'dzin par bsgoms nas bdag dang gzhan la dbang bskur na che mchog tu ring bar 'gyur ro/ /'khar lo rtsibs brgyad nag po'i sngagS lnga pa bskul pa dang bcas pa lte
65b6(rgyud 'grel): par oM hI kI/ de badt+ta bA shaM ku ru oM h+rAM /k+ShliM ces pa bri'o/ /de'i phyi rol utpal la'i 'dab ma brgyad la ku ru kul+le'i yi ge brgyad do/ /de nas phyi rol du 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma la oM h+raM? k+ShliM brtsegs mar bris te gro ga la go ro tsan dang/
65b7(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan gyis so/ /'khor lo 'di bskul ba dbang du byed do/ /gzhan yang lha mo kul+le gur gum gyi mdog can ro langs ma skra 'phyang ba mo/ /khrag dang/ gur gum dang/ pu tro dzi ba'i maN+Dal du dgug go /oM bai tA li pu tA sid+d+hi swAhA/
66a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bum bzlas so/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dbus su ling+ga nag po'i sngags bskul tshig can gyis bskor/ rtsibs la ni rigs can ma'i sngags so/ /bar bar du ni bskul tshig go /phyi rol du a sogs dang/
66a2(rgyud 'grel): ka sogs dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sngags kyis bskor ba bris la/ bud med sbyang ba dang bkru ba byas la/ de lha mor bsam pas mngal du 'jam dpal bsam zhing/ dgug pa dang dbang bskur te mchod nas 'khor lo btags ma
66a3(rgyud 'grel): srid 'phel lo/ /phag mo dang tsa muN+Di sngags bcas kyi b+ha ga'i rnam par nag po dang bshin rje'i sngags kyis ling+ga gru gsum byas la mchod na/ nor dang dbang phyug dang bsad pa'i las 'grub po/ /sa hi ka la h+ri:au ma'i lte bar yis?
66a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga bsgoms te 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas la/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhi la yi ge bzhi dang bcas pa dbus su b+ha ga dang ling+ga'o/ /de la h+ri:yi phreng bas bskor/ ling+ga h+ri:? che ge mo A karSha ya h+ri(rgyud 'grel): /ces pa bris la
66a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bskul ma dbang dang dgug pa mdza' dag 'grub cing nges par bung mar 'gugs bar the tshom med do/ /'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgoms pa'i dbus su zur drug pa la gnas pa'i nag po chen po gdugs dkar po dang 'khor lo thogS
66a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ snying gar rdo rje gtsug tor ? gtsug tor gyis yang dag par 'khyud pa steng dang 'og tu nag po chen po dang phyogs brgyad du dbang po 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams ro langs chen po'i rnam par gnas pa rang rang gi chung ma can no/ /dang
66a7(rgyud 'grel): por gtsug tor chen po dang/ rdo rje gtsug tor chen po'i rigs sngags bzlas la nag po'i gzungs kyis byad ma bsad par bya ste/ mahA kA la b+hair ba bAspa sha /b+ha b+hi b+hu b+h+ri b+hmi b+he b+ho b+haM b+ha:b+haiM b+hai / byad ma a mu kaM mAr ya hUM phaT/ ces
66b1(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang ngo/ /phyir zlog chen po'o/ /da ni man ngag cung zad brjod par ba ste/ de la kha cig dpal sdom pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom mo/ /gzhan dag ni sems dpa' gsum gyi tshul smra'o/ /lhag ma ni phra mo dang thig la bsgom
66b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /'ga' 'ga' dag ni/ 'di ni las tsam gyi don te/ de'i phyir gsang ba chen po'i rim pa mi 'dod do/ /zhes smra ba ni yang dag pa ma yin no/ /ci phyir zhe na nag po chen po'i rgyud la mi 'jug go /slob dpon ngag gis
66b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang dngos grub dag gi sgrub pa'i thabs byas shing/ 'grub par mthong pas 'di ni phra mo kho na ma yin no/ /'dir smras pa/ lte bar rdo rje dbang mo rnam par gnas pa me ma dang/ gnyid ma dag gnod pa b+ha gar ni nag po chen po'o/ /spyi bo la yang he?
66b4(rgyud 'grel): dug gdan rnam par gnon pa'o/ /zhal nas zhal dang/ rdo rje dang pad+mar 'bar ba dang 'dzag pa'o/ /ma rlung giS lus ni dri med byed/ /hA/ rdo rje'i lam nas gad rgyangs sgrog /kA/ rkyen dang bral ba dmigs su med/ /la/ rol pa phyag rgya'i bde
66b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog can/ /lus dri ma med par byed pa ni bum pa can la sogs pa'o/ /thur sel byed pa rnam pa gnyis bcing ngo/ /gad rgyangs brgyad ni/ hla hla/ hIng hIng/ hUM hUM a'i(rgyud 'grel): i(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /'di dag phyag mtshan brgyad kyi rim pa yang ngo//
66b6(rgyud 'grel): rkyen dang bral ba ni rang gzhan gyi de kho na nyid do/ /rol pa ni phyag rgya gsum la sems ma log par mtshon pa'o/ /gzhan yang zhing skyong gi sa bon dag kyang gsang ba'o/ /ces pa ni rje btsun nag po nyid kyi nges pa'o/ /bzhi pa lnga pa de'i rjes
66b7(rgyud 'grel): su/ yan lag drug ldan stob dpon 'dod/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i rim pa las/ /byung gang bde chen rdo rje smras/ /mi bzang srin po gdon dang bgegs kyi mthar byed nyid/ 'jigs byed nag po gzhan gyis mi thub sgrub thabs gtso/ /
67a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa nges kyang sgrub po rnams la grub rtsol zhing/ myur du gter dang rdzu 'phrul grol ba'i 'bras thob shog /ces pa rje btsun nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs man ngag mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon
67a2(rgyud 'grel): shAn+ti gupta'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /shar phyogs gau ra'i paN+Di ta ni rbA Na sh+rI dang/ slob dpon pUr+NA? badzra'i zhabs dang/ rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos bsgyur nas/ slar yang rgya dpe dang gtugs te 'bru ?
67a3(rgyud 'grel): yang yang byas ba'o// // mang+ga la/ slob dpon ? gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs/ /na mo badzra DA kA ya/ rgya gar skad du sh+rI mahA kA la sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun sangs rgyas la
67a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs byed dgra rnams nyams byed pa/ /lha min mthar byed nag mo'i bu/ /de la btung nas sgrub pa'i thabs/ /mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya/ /de la dam tshig dang ldan pas/ /dur khrod dang ma mo'i khyim dang/
67a5(rgyud 'grel): ling ga gcig pa'am/ yang na khyim du sgrub po/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor du myos byed dang sha dang gtor ma dang/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ bdun rnam par dag pa bya'o/ /de nas oM mu:zhes gshegs su
67a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya'o/ /oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa at+ma konyhaM/ zhes brjod de thams cad dmigs su med pa'o/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pas yang dag par bskul te/ chu skyes dang nyin mor byed pa la gnas pa'i/ mchog gi dbang
67a7(rgyud 'grel): phyug bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de las bdag nyid nag po chen po/ /sprin dang mtshungs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra ser po/ lag pa g.yas dag gis gri gug dang ral gri'o/ /g.yon dag na tri shu la dang thod pa khrag can no/ /
67b1(rgyud 'grel): stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dkris pa/ /sprul gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang mi'i thod pas thod byas pa/ /mgo bo bcang pa'i phreng ba can/ /rab tu 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'o/ /mgo bo dang lce'i rtsa ba dang/ nu ma'i dbus su/ /rigs byed
67b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dang po dang/ rnam par bcad pas mtshan la dang/ mchog gi dbang phyug rnams bsam mo/ /de la sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang nag po chen po dgug par bya'o/ /? dam? mchod nas bzlas pa bya ste/ oM mahA kA la ? phaT/
67b3(rgyud 'grel): lus bskul ba'o/ /'bum bzlas pas bsnyen pa'o/ /de bzhin du oM mahA kA lA ya na mo hUM phaT /phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /oM A:maM haM raM hUM phaT swAhA/ tshig bskul ba'o/ /na ma:shmAs na bA si ni/ mahA kA la a nu tsa rA ya /tadya Tha?/ ? tsal ?
67b4(rgyud 'grel): la la la yang be ling+gA swAhA/ thugs bskul ba'o/ /oM mahA b+hair bas rba sid+d+hi dA ya ka DAM hUM kuM d+hwaM Ta(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub stsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM tsa muN+Da d+hu ma ka shI bid+hu tdzi? he ha ha na ha na da ha da ha bca btsa de badt+ta A na ya swAhA/ tsa muN+Da'i 'o/ oM h+ri:ha hUM sh+rI phaT
67b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ dka' zlog ma'i'o/ /tri:ha ha ma tha ma tha swAhA/ phag mo la sogs pa ma mo'i sngags so/ sha dang til dang zan dang chang dang sran ma dang/ dzam+bu la khrig dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni 'di yin te /na ma/ sa man+ta k+Sha ya wAk+tiTTa?
67b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra NaM/ oM A:hUM oM maM maM haM haM kaM kaM raM raM rar ma hA ma hA kA la da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa ga rdzag ke sha wa rta man ? bA ling ? grih+Na grih+Na pa ya grih+na pa ya oM A a'uM sarba big+h+nan bi nA ya ka oM a kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harma NAM a dyan tpa na twA da/ oM A:hUM phaT swA hA/
67b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang bcas pas sbyin no/ /de nas rab tu bskul bar bya ste/ rje btsun nag po chen po'i phreng ba'i sngags bzla'o/ /rkyen gyi gnas rig bla ma ni/ /byed po de yi lung bsdus pa/ /sgra can 'dzim
68a1(rgyud 'grel): 'zang? gus pas te/ /'bad pas 'di ni gsang bar byos/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /nam yang brjod pa ma yin te/ /ti da'i rigs la rgyud bzhin du/ /bstan na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /
68a2(rgyud 'grel): ces pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs dpal ldan klu'i zhal gyi rim pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhams pa ni nA Na sh+rI'i zhal snga nas dang/ rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos g.yang khral du bsgyur pa'o// mang+ga laM
68a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du / b+hai ra ba mahA ka la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du / 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' po bdud bzhi las rgyal ba/ /gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba po/ /ma mo'i
68a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi kun nas bskor/ /'byung po ro langs tshogs btung nas/ /de nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya'o/ /dpa' po'i g.yul gyi sa'am/ dur khrod kyi gnas su/ ro'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas/ snying kha'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa
68a5(rgyud 'grel): bon gyi 'od kyi nag po chen po bkug nas mchod par byas te/ phyis rang nyid la bsdu'o/ /de nas ni stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o/ /phyis ni rdo rje'i gur gyi dbus su/ bdag nyid nyi ma la hUM mig sman ltar gnag pa bsam par bya'o//
68a6(rgyud 'grel): de las nag po chen po dbyar gyi char sprin dang mun pa star gnag pa /skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ mi bzang pa'i zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa/ gtum zhing rab tu 'khros pa/ gyis pa'i lus can/
68a7(rgyud 'grel): sbom thung sus pa 'phyang ba/ mi'u thung/ phyag rgya lnga dang/ mi sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ dang po'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje gri gug dang/ mgo bo'i thod pa khrag dang bcas pa bsnams pa/ lhag ma g.yas pa'i phyag gi ni/ ral gri dang
68b1(rgyud 'grel): mdud rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyi rab bod gi gdan la 'dug pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal can/ /stag gi lpags pa'i smad g.yogs can/ /bskal pa'i mdza' i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'byung po'i
68b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi mchog tu brjed par byed pa/ de nyid kis dpral bar ni thig le'o/ /mgrin par ni rnam par bcad pa'o/ /snying gar ni hUM yig go /dur khrod kyi gnas thams cad nas 'jigs byed chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug ste bdag nyid la stim
68b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi dpung pa gnyis dang lag pa gnyis dang/ brla gnyis dang/ rkang pa gnyis rnams la ni rim pas nag po'i yan lag bsgrogs byed/ gtum po khros pa/ yid myos/ thod pa can/ 'jigs rung spro byed ste/
68b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed brgyad po ni rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa nus ma rnams la yang dag par mkhyud pa gri gug dang thod pa'i phyag can no/ /lte ba dang/ snying kha dang/ mgrin pa dang/ spyi bo dang/ smin mtshams dang/ gsang ba rnams su /kA li
68b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ kA pA lI nI dang/ kul+le dang/ ku ru kul+le/ bi ro d+hI nI dang/ bi pra tsit+tA rnams lha mo'i mtshan nyid rdzogs pa/ 'jigs byed chen po rnams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /kha dang/ bshad laM dang/ lte ba dang/ spyi bo rnams su/ phyag na dbyug pa
68b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ phyag na ral gri dang/ zhing skyong dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams ral gri dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /de ltar sems brtan par gyur gyi bar du sgom par bya'o/ /gal te yid skyo bar gyur na/ sngags bzla bar bya ste/ hUM mahA kA lA
68b7(rgyud 'grel): ya na mo h+ri phaT(rgyud 'grel): 'brum phrag gcig gis 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed do/ /bye ba bzlas pas ni nag po chen po nyid mngon /du 'od ngo/ /der ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo/ /ro langs dang srin po 'bum snyed kyis bskor te ha ha zhes 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog par byed do/ /der 'jigs par mi bya ste/ khrag chen po dang myos byed kyi arga dbul bar bya'o/ /'jigs byed nyid kyi mngon du/ sgrub pa po ci 'dod ces bi bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos smras pa/ bdag nag po chen?
