69a2(rgyud 'grel): por mdzod cig ces brjod na de nyid dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i don thams cad byed do/ /oM a sitang+ga? b+hai rang ya rnam(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Sha Na b+he rang yan ma(rgyud 'grel): saM har ster ba yan ma(rgyud 'grel): ru ru b+her ya na ma:tsaN+Da b+he rab na ma/krod+ha b+ha ngan ma(rgyud 'grel): un mang b+her bsams(rgyud 'grel): kA rA? lIb+ha? rang yan ma(rgyud 'grel): ?
69a3(rgyud 'grel): wi n+ye na ma(rgyud 'grel): kul+le den ma(rgyud 'grel): shu ru kul+le de na ma? bi do d+hi? na? ma(rgyud 'grel): bi bra tsit+ta yai na ma(rgyud 'grel): /pa/ DaN+Da na ma(rgyud 'grel): ni b+he nam(rgyud 'grel): khaDga ? ni b+he na ma(rgyud 'grel): k+She na ma(rgyud 'grel): gnan ma(rgyud 'grel): 4 man+d+ra 10 swA hA sh+rI ma hA kA la b+he ra'i tarba? ya mi na ma(rgyud 'grel): ? sh+rI mi hA kA lad+he ? dza yA min ma:sA yud+hA ya sang han ya/ sa pa ri bA rA ya sh+rI rak+Shi Na kA li kA sa hi ? ya sh+rI mahA kA la ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): ?
69a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir nyin zhag so sor mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dra ba ra ba rta babs mdzes/ /zur bzhir mdung thung brgyad ldan pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i 'phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad
69a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /zur gsum rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnam gnyis rtse mo rna bar ldan/ /sha rus la sogs rab ldan pa/ /dkyil 'khor shin tu 'jigs pa yi/ /dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rab tu bkod/ /de nas
69a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad bkug nas rang rang gi stan la gnas par bya'o/ /lha thams cad kyi ming la/ mgo bor oM dang/ tha mar ni na ma zhes sbyar ro/ /de nas dang por ni mchod yon
69a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa ci bde bar phul zhing bstod nas/ /gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /'dir myos byed kyi btung ba dang/ khrag chen po'i mchod yon dang/ sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ tshil chen po dang gu
69b1(rgyud 'grel): gul bdug pa rgyun mi chad par mchod par byed na de la mahA kA lA dgyes so/ /de nas ni sngags bzla bar bya zhing phyis nas mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /gal te slob ma kha cig la byin gyis brlab par 'dod na/ lha'i drangs nyid kyi thod par khrag chen po dang myos byed
69b2(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa'i chu rang gi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa bzhag par bya'o/ /gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i sid+d+hi? phrad ma he shA na ka li kA pra ? bla ste sid+d+hi de ti kraM bsrungs sA kA la na mo stu te/ stod pa'o// slob ma nang du 'ongs pa la bdud rtsi lnga'i chus dkrus te gnas rnams su thig le sgyu'o?/ /
69b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha thams cad kyis sngags kyi chus dbang ? bya'o/ /slob ma nag po chan po lus kyi la'i tshogs dang bcas par 'dug pa la sngags kyi bsngags pa'i cod ban dang/ mtshon chad pa/ rgyan dang/ stan rnams sbyin nas/ phyos gsang sngags kyang sbyin nas
69b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o/ /de la slar yang chus dbang bskur nas/ gtor ma la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod par byas nas 'dis ni bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa yin no/ /de nas slob mas kyang yon dbul bar bya zhing/ /slob dpon gyis kyang byang ba thamS cad
69b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ces pa ni byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ /ma yig gis ni sgyu 'phrul che/ /hA yig 'di la gzhom med pa/ /kA yig rgyu dang bral ba ste/ /la yig rnam par 'phyang ba nyid/ /ces pa ni/ 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub
69b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dpa' bo rgyal po'i zhal snga'i rim pas grub pa'i slob dpon pa ga la'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta pur+N+Na nan dang/ dge slong tAr nA thas g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o// //
69b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam sras kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+hai sh+ra pa a nu dzA pa b+hi ti b+ha li na ma/ bod skad du/ rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba
70a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa gsum mgon po 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad bcom ldan gos sngon can/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi gter 'chang gnod sbyin kun
70a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rje/ /gang gis mtshan thos skyob mdzad lha'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal nas/ /de mnyes bya phyir gtor ma'i rjes bzung nas/ /rjes su 'brangs pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /khro rgyal gos sngon rnal 'byor pas/ /yi ge bco lnga'i snying po la/ /bya ba lnga
70a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum sngon song nas/ /sngon du 'gro dang byin rlabs sogs/ /gtor ma'i cho ga sngar bstan bzhin/ /sgrub pa pos ni 'dir shes bya/ /de nas mdun du bruM las ni/ /gzhal yas khang gi nad nyid dbus/ /paM las pad ma 'dab brgyad bsam/ /
70a4(rgyud 'grel): lte bar bcom ldan gos sngon dang/ /bka' sdong rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /sa bon gnyis las yang dag skyed/ /de'i phyi rol 'dab brgyad dang/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad sum cu gnyis/ /sa bon gnas las de rnams dbyung/ /'dab brgyad gnod sbyin
70a5(rgyud 'grel): gong ras klu/ /phyi rol nyi shu rtsa brgyad la/ /sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskyed/ /de'i phyi rol 'dab ma la/ /stobs chen sum cu so gnyis sgyed/ /gzhan yang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams/ /bye ba 'bum 'phrag 'khor bcas bsam/ /de nas
70a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying ga yi/ /sa bon hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon dang/ /rgyal chen 'khor bcas spyan drang bya/ /hUM ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas/ /pad+ma mdzes
70a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdan stengs nas/ /klu brgyad lus snol nyi zla'i gdan/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sku bzhengs cib?/ /sku la ye shes 'od 'phro bas/ /bskal pa'i me dpung chen po 'bar/ /bcom ldan gsang bdag gos sngon can/ /rnal 'byor sprul pa'i gzhal
70b1(rgyud 'grel): yas 'ding/ /gdug pa snol ba'i gdan stengs su/ /'phrin las mdzad phyir gshegs su gsol/ /a'oM ni lam b+ha ra d+ha ra badzra pa ni/ /sa ma ya dza:hUM baM ho:/ dgug gzhug bcing dang dges par bya/ /de rjes dbang bskur byin gyis rlabs/ /de nas
70b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po spyan drang ste/ /hUM ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas/ /rin chen spungs pa'i gzhal yas nas/ /khro rgyal gsang bdag spyan snga nas/ /dpal ldan rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /btsun mo sras dang blon por bcas/ /bye?
70b3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'bum phrag 'khor bcas rnams/ /sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs la/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bspung? ba dang/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams/ /yid bzhin sgrul pa'i gzhal yas 'dir/ /'phrin las
70b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad phyir gshegs su gsol/ /a'oM b+hai sha rA man ye sa pa ri ba rA/ badzra sa ma ya dza dza/ dza:hUM baM ho:/ brda' rgyud phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /b+hai yig sum cu rtsa bdun srid/ /snyod snying 'dod dang mgo spring dang/ /rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dbul/ /
70b5(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug dbang bskur byin rlabs bzlas/ /a'oM ni lam b+ha ra d+ha ra badzra pa ni hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ a'oM b+hai sh+ra ma na ye swAhA/ a'oM dzaM ba pa dzA d+ha ya swAhA/ a'oM pu rna b+ha kra ye swAhA/ a'oM ma ni b+ha tra ye swAhA/ a'oM ku be ra ye swAhA/ a'oM sa ma pra dza na ye swAhA/ a'oM gu ha sta na
70b6(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA/ a'oM pan dzi ta ye swAhA/ a'oM pi tsi kun d+ha li ye swAhA/ /sarba yag k+Sha/ nag /arg+haM/ du pa/ pus paM/ di'i? gan d+haM/ ni pe te/ shapta/ oM aM hUM/ i daM b+ha li g+h+ri han du/ sa ma ya rak+Sha du/ ma ma sid+d+hi/ me pra yad tsa/ sarba karma/ swa ta a mo ka/
70b7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad/ /bza' btud longs spyod ji snyed kun/ /tshogs mchod rgya chen dbul bar bya/ /rta dang glang po khang bzangs dang/ /gser dngul la sogs nor gyi dbyig /phyi nang gsang gsum rten rnams kyang/ /mgon
71a1(rgyud 'grel): po 'khor dang bcas la dbul/ /ne ra d+ha na dza na sreg pa rlab/ /ling kha bcas pa dgug gzhug bya/ /phur pas gdab cing mtshon gyis bcang/ /de nas bka' sgo 'phrin las bcol// //
71a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM bzhengs cig bzhengs cig sku bzhengs cig /ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas/ /gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /dregs pa snol ba'i gdan stengs nas/ /bcom ldan khro rgyal gos sngon can/ /mi bzad drag po sku bzhengs
71a3(rgyud 'grel): cig /khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed kyis dam nyams dgra bgegs 'byung pa'i tshogs/ /dbang sdud rdul du brlag pa'i phyir/ /byed kyi phrin las dus la bab/ /phyogs bcu kun tu khyab byed pa'i/ /sprul pa drag po 'gyed mdzad pa/ /khams
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum za byed rngam pa'i hUM sgra can/ /shin tu mi bzang khro chen 'jigs pa'i sku la ye shes 'od 'bar bas/ /bskal pa'i me 'bar lam sel mas/ /gdug pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum khro bo'i
71a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhugs/ /dregs pa stobs chen ma lus gdan du mdzad/ /rigs drug sems can phyogs skyong bcu/ /lha chen brgyad dang klu chen brgyad/ /khro bcu 'bar pa'i gdan stengs na/ /klu chen brgyad kyi lus bsnol nas/ /pad ma nyi zla 'bar
71a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbus/ /bcom ldan sku'i cha lugs bstan pa ni/ /shin tu mi bzad khro po 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad phyag mtshan sna tshogs bsnams/ /g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'bar ba na/ /gsod cing sgrol ba'i phyag ca ni/ /rdo rje
71a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyug tho glang chen mche/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo lcags kyu dang/ /sdom zhing 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /zhags pa gsal shing gril chen dang/ /bya khyung 'phan dang rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /zhal bzhi shin tu khros pa ni/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi
71b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par mdzad/ /rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon pa'i phyir/ /zhal gsum/ khro rgyal rngam pa'i zhal/ /chos nyid mi 'gyur steng zhal gnag /ral pa dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /mi bskyod rigs kyi bdag por bzhugs/ /gdug pa 'bar ba
71b2(rgyud 'grel): thod du bcings/ /sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/ /rtse gsum 'bar bas dbul brgyan/ /smin ma dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /stobs chen ma lus kun 'dul bas/ /sma ra ag tshom dmar ser rtsug? /gdug pa'i dgra bgegs 'jomS
71b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /zhe sdang chen po 'khrugs pa'i rtags/ /spyan rtsa me ltar 'bar ba yis/ /'gro drug thugs rjes gzigs pa'i rtags/ /spyan gsum sdang dmigs bgrang pa yis/ /srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags/ /khro gnyer dpral bar
71b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa ni/ /dregs pa chen pos 'dul ba'i rtags/ /shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung nag 'tshubs pa ni/ /stong gsum log 'dran thams cad 'thor ba'i rtags/ /ljags ni glog dmar 'khyug pa yis/ /zhal nas sngags rgod drag po 'don pa'i rtags/ /
71b5(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'gyu me ltar 'bar ba ni/ /'khor ba'i bag chags sreg pa'i rtags/ /'jigs pa'i ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni/ /khams gsum dregs pa dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /a la la yi gang rgyangs sgrog pa ni/ /log 'dren bdud sogs
71b6(rgyud 'grel): rengs par mdzad pa'i rtags/ /mthing nag zhal du sprul nag gsol ba ni/ /log 'dren gdon gsum zhal du gsol ba'i rtags/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i khro mchog sku nyid la/ /klu rigs sprul brgyad sku la brgyan pa ni/ /rigs
71b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i klu rnams dbang du sdud ba'i rtags/ /rab 'jigs stag gis sku smad dkris ba ni/ /zhe snga ba srin po dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /dar kha sngon pos stong g.yogs byas pa ni/ /rdo rje rigs kyi khro bor bzhugs pa'i rtags/ /
72a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi sdug gshin rje'i cha byang can/ /bskal pa'i me dpung nang na dregS shing 'bying/ /dbang po nyi ma 'phrag pa 'khur ba ni/ /yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs pa'i rtags/ /zhabs brgyad rdo rje'i gzhi la btams
72a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /sprul pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /bcom ldan sku yi cha stod nas/ /khyud dang khra 'ug 'ol ba dang/ /shang shang dur bya kang ka'i tshogs/ /nam mkha' lding gi tshogs chen 'phro/ /gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu sngar
72a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /gdug pa'i dgra bgegs snying nas 'dzin/ /khro rgyal thugs dang skyed pa las/ /rdo rje 'byung tho btun shing thogs/ /'khor lo rtse gsum bsnams mdzad pa'i/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs su 'phro/ /dam las 'da' byed dgra bgegs la/ /lnga phud
72a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rdul du rlog /khro rgyal sku yi cha smad nas/ /stag dang ngom dreng glang chen sbrul/ /seng ge chu srin 'jigs pa'i tshogs/ /pa Nan? gzan gdug pa'i tshogs su 'phro/ /bstan pa gshigs pa'i dgra bgegs kyi/ /sha khrag rus pa'i lta ba chom/
72a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sbrul pa 'gyed mdzod pa'i/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can/ /dri med skyon bral phyag 'tshal stong// //hUM sngon tshe bskal pa dang po la/ /'dzam gling 'gro ba'i mi rnams kyi/ /tshe lo brgya pa'i dus kyi tshe/ /shakya seng ge'i
72a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan snga ru/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang/ /thugs dam zhal bzhes dgongs mdzod pas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ /'gro ba kun la phan rtags phyir/ /ri rgyal lhan po'i byang phyogs nas/ /i la ni 'da' i? zhing khams su/ /lcang
72a7(rgyud 'grel): la can gyi pho brang der/ /yab cig rnam mang thos pa dang/ /lha mo dpal tshul bzang mo yi/ /sras su skye bar smon lam btab/ /smon laM laS dang mthu stobs gyis/ /byang phyogs skyong ba yongs kyi rje/ /lha gyal sras kyi thu bong 'khrungs/ /lcang lo
72b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi pho brang der/ /gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje yis/ /mthu stobs rtsal bar dbang yang bskur/ /bstan pa bsrung bar dam yang bcas/ /sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs la/ /mgon po nor 'chang stobs po che/ /pho brang lcang lo ldan pa'i bdag/
72b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus ma'i pho brang sum rtseg gi /rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan/ /zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs dgu /rnam pa bco lnga'i mchog gis spras/ /rin chen khang brtsegs sgo bzhi ste/ /ka ba stong phrag bcu gnyis brgyan/ /po brang phyi rol phyogs
72b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams na/ /bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing/ /rin chen rdzing bu 'dod 'jo'i pa/ /spos kyi glang chen thal skya dang/ /g+hi pa ban glang ma he 'i tshogs/ /rta dang shing rta skad snyan dang/ /de na lha rdzas rol mo 'byor/ /phyi rol dpag tshad
72b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu na/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rabs bskor/ /dbus ma'i rin chen pho brang na/ /gter skyong rgyal po gzi brjid can/ /sku la rin chen brgyan gyis spras/ /bcom ma gser mdog 'od zer 'bar/ /chibs su seng ge dkar mo chibs/ /na bza' chu dang
72b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po gsol/ /phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug to bsnams/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rdul du rlog /phyag g.yon gser gyi ne le bsnams/ /sgrub pa po yi re ba bskong/ /zhal nas rin chen 'chang pa 'bebs/ /thugs rjes phongs pa sgrol bar mdzod/ /phrag gong
72b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon nyi zlas brgyan/ /nyi ma 'bum gyis gzim dangs can/ /dbu skra ral pa'i thor rtsugs la/ /sna tshogs rin chen brgyan gyis spras/ /sku la gser khrab ser po gsol/ /zhabs g.yas sems dpa' i dkyil krung bzhugs/ /seng ge kha
72b7(rgyud 'grel): dangs yal le yal/ /lca ni bar snang glog pas 'khyug /g.yur la sngon po me stag 'phro/ /lcags kyi sder chan shad de shad/ /seng ge'i 'khyug tshul zhungs se zhungs/ /seng ge'i nga ro cher sgrogs shing/ /dar zab stan cha phu ru ru/ /ha dang lcang sngon 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): lha? bse? ltabs/ /rgyal chen sku'i g.yas phyoD nas/ /lha mo tshul bsrung zla 'od bzang/ /rgyal chen sku'i g.yon rol nas/ /lha mo mdangs ldan me tog bzang/ /btsun mo yang g.yog me tog bcas/ /bu mo stong phrag drug cu ste/ /la la rgyan dang rol mos
73a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor/ /la la ltab lhub na bza' i tshogs/ /rgyal chen steng na lding ba ni/ /tshangs pa'i bya rgyal ka ru na/ /gser gyi khyad chen 'dab gshog bzang/ /gnam lcags ra dang mchu sdeng can/ /mkha' lding rgyal po gser gyi spyan/ /sder mo gnam lcagS
73a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yis/ /klu rgyal 'dab bzangs zhal du gsol/ 'khor na tshengs pa'i bya rgyal 'bum/ /lus ngan rgyal po'i sras chen po/ /kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon/ /sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la/ /na bza' mdza' ber 'khor lo ris/ /phyag na zangs zhags
73a4(rgyud 'grel): mdud thung bsnams /srin po zangs kyi ral ba can/ /'khor mang gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum/ /btsun mo sras dang blon por bcas/ /nang mi dmag dpung gzhon par bcas/ /pho nya yang g.yog dran mo rnams/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /dbang
73a5(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po lha chen po/ /chibs su seng ge sngon po chibs/ /sku mdog dmar ser 'thing gi ral pa can/ /drang song stobs chen phyag bzhi pa/ /seng ge dkar po'i stong g.yogs la/ /phyag na rtse gsum 'khor lo bsnams/ /u ma dang yang lhan
73a6(rgyud 'grel): cig bzhugs/ /'khor dang lha dmag bye ba 'bum/ /khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dang phyor/ /glang chen rab tu brtan pa la/ /legs ldan nag po'i dmag dpung zhon/ /lha dang gnod sbyin dmag sdud cing/ /grong khyer sum rtseg
73a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig par byed/ /lha min g.yul las rgyal mdzad pa/ /phyag na gser gyi be? chon bsnams/ /'khor ni lha dmag bya ba 'bum/ /khyod ni dmag dpon dpung chen ste/ /dmag dpung bskyed la ru dar byor// //hUM rgyal chen las la
73b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod tsam na/ /chibs su sngon po phur kar chibs/ /bse? sga smug po wangs se wangs/ /gse mthur smug po khyugs se khyugs/ /mi mgo rta mgo phru lu lu/ /gser gyi blo nan khyugs se khyugs/ /mu men yod chen khra la la/ /na bza' mdza' ber dmar ljang lo//
73b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul nag sha chings brengs se brengs/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser sga la/ /rin chen mang po'i rgyan cha can/ /stag ral g.yas la gzig zhubs g.yon/ /sku la bse khrab smug po gsol/ /stag gi g.yang gzhi phru lu lu/ /phyag na bse mdung smug po rnams/ /
73b3(rgyud 'grel): bse mdung gnam lcags rdo rje rtse/ /rgyal po chen po'i phyag g.yon na/ /rin chen shel gyi mchod rten bsnams/ /mi'i rgyu zhags sha rar/ /rgyal po'i 'phrag gong g.yas g.yon na/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro/ /sku mdog mthing nag gzi byin can/ /dbu skra
73b4(rgyud 'grel): mthing ral thor tshugs la/ /rin chen bse yi rmog zhu can/ /zab chen 'phan dar lhabs se? lhabs/ /rgyal po'i snyan cha g.yas g.yon nas /sbrul nag chun 'phyang phru lu lu/ /khros pa'i spyan gsuM sdang dmig gis/ /ltas pa tsam gyis srid gsum 'jig /khro gnyer smin
73b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dbral bar bsdus/ /khros pa'i shangs ni dub kyin 'bung/ /sma ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar/ /zhal nas drag sngags ku cho 'byin/ /rgyal po'i bka' lung thang cig gis/ /klu rigs 'bum sde'i dmag dpung sdud/ /rgyal po'i bka' lung thang gnyis kyis//
73b6(rgyud 'grel): lha dmag bye ba 'khor du sdud/ /nyid kyi bka' lung thang gsum gyis/ /gnod sbyin 'bum phrag dbang du sdud/ /rgyal chen bzhugs pa'i sku mkhar ni/ /rin chen bse'i sku mkhar la/ /mi mgo'i kha bad yengs se yengs/ /sku mkhar de yi rtse mo na/ /bse mdud
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ldems se ldems/ /bse'i mdung bzang rtse mo la/ /mi snying rgyal mtshan ye re re/ /bse'i mdung bzangs skyed pa la/ /dar nag ba ngan lhabs se lhabs/ /dar nag du? mtshon phyar tsam na// lha min 'bum sde g.yul ngo bzlog /sku mkhar de yi zur bzhin//
74a1(rgyud 'grel): mi snying rta snying h+ri li li/ /sku mkhar de yi logs bzhin/ /mi khrag rta khrag sha la la/ /sku mkhar de yi 'dram bzhi la /mi ro rta ro brams su brtsigs/ /sku mkhar de'i nang shed na/ /rta btags skad 'don rtse re re/ /mi btags 'dod
74a2(rgyud 'grel): dang lhang nge lhang/ /srog gcod du skad stongs se stongs/ /brag cha skad dan tse re re/ /sku mkhar de yi g.yas rol na/ /gnod sbyin zangs kyi ral pa can/ /'khal ma snying gi nang khrol gyis/ /snyim pa dag ni yongs su bkang/ /lag na zangs kyi bcu sta thogs/ /yid la
74a3(rgyud 'grel): gnag ba'i dgra bo la/ /bcu stas rdeg cing zhags bas bzung/ /sku mkhar de yi g.yon logs na/ /gnod sbyi nag po skad rdangs can/ /ral pa spyi bcings lcags kyis so/ /mi lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gon/ /lag na lcags kyi dgra sta bsnams/ /yid
74a4(rgyud 'grel): la rnag ba'i dgra bo la/ /dgra stas mgo dang yan lag chod/ /sku mkhar de'i rgyab logs na/ /phung byed sbas ba'i ma mo bzhi/ /kun kyang srin mo khrag mig ma/ /khrag gi ral pa sa la 'drud/ /kha nas khrag lang gron mo skyug /lag na zangs kyi spu gri
74a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /yid la rnag ba'i dgra bo la/ /spu gris mgo dang snying rnams gshogs/ /sku mkhar lcags kyi sgo mo la/ /zangs kyi tha ram si li li/ /sku mkhar de yi sgo srungs la/ /srin po zangs kyi mche ba can/ /byu ru'i ral cig gnam du 'greng sbrul
74a6(rgyud 'grel): nag pags pa'i stong g.yogs la/ /lag na lcags kyi tho chen thogs/ /yid la rnag pa'i dgra bo la/ /tho bas snying dang yan lag chom/ /sku mkhar de yi g.yas logs na/ /lcags sed g.yal gyin mche ba 'dar/ /sku mkhar sgo mo'i g.yon dos na//
74a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi dom nag du zhing zugs/ /sku mkhar ya khang rtse mo la/ /lcags kyi khyud chen sngon po cig/ mchu sdeng dgra bo'i snying la 'jums/ /sku mkhar ba gam logS bzhin/ /bya nag mang po phur zhing lding/ /sku mkhar de yi yang stengs nas/ /rgyal poS
74b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yab mos btab con/ /gnod sbyin gdug pa'i blon po brgyad/ /rgyal po'i mdun na rgyug pa ni/ /gnod sbyin chu dbang bum pa'i lto/ /sku ni gser mdog 'bar ba la/ /mdza' ber ljang sngon shing lo ris/ /gser gyi ska chen khyugs se khyugs/ /
74b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag na ban d+ha sbu gri bsnams/ /chibs su dmar nag zhur po chibs/ /klu rigs 'bum sde'i dmag dpon mdzad/ /khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /rgyal po'i g.yas nas rgyug pa ni/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon gang
74b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzang/ /sku mdog ser nag 'jigs tshul can/ /mdza' bar smug nag glang chen ris/ /byi ru'i ska bzangs khro la la/ /mu men chun 'phyang sha ra ra/ /phyag na bum pa bzang po bsnams/ /dmar ser 'dongs po chibs su chibs/ /'khor dang gnod sbyin
74b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bum gyis bskor/ /khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste/ /dmag dpung bskyed la ru dar phyor/ /rgyal po'i rting nas rgyug pa ni/ /sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang/ /sku mdog dmar zhing gdangs pa la/ /mdza' ber sngon po seng ge ris/ /zangs kyi ska bzangs
74b5(rgyud 'grel): khyugs se khyugs/ /phyag na shel dkar sku gdung bsnams/ /chibs su sngo nag zhur po chibs/ /'dod khams lha bran gtso bo ste/ /'khor du lha bran 'bum gyis bskor/ /khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /rgyal po'i
74b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon nas rgyug pa ni/ /rta bdag chen po ku bar/ /sku mdog sngo nag 'gyid ba la/ /mdza' ber dkar skya gzha' tshen ris/ /dngul gyi ska bzangs khro la la/ /phyag na bse phub ral gri bsnams/ /dbu la dar smug 'gying zhu gsol/ /chibs su
74b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshal dmar 'dongs po chibs/ /'khor du gshin rje 'bum gyis bskor/ /khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /sde dpon rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ni/ /sku mdog dmar skya 'jigs tshul
75a1(rgyud 'grel): can/ /seng ge dkar po'i stong g.yogs la/ /stag chen rngam pa'i sham thabs can/ /sbrul nag ska chings khyugs se khyugs/ /lcags kyi rnga mo chibs su chibs/ /gnam lcags 'khor lo phyag na bsnams/ /g.yon pa/
75a2(rgyud 'grel): zhags 'debs sha ra ra/ /'khor dang gnod sbyin drug 'bum ste/ /khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /sde dpon chen po lngas chen ni/ /sku mdog ser skya rab 'jigs byed/ /mdza' per kar ljang skar mnga' 
75a3(rgyud 'grel): ris/ /dar nag ska bzangs bdun yug 'byar/ /phyag na rin chen khang bzangs bsnams/ /dbu la dung rmog sul mangs gsol/ /le brgan cod ban lhabs se? lhabs/ /tshibs su rag pa phung mar chi bas/ /'khor ni dri za bdun 'bum ste/ /khyod ni dmag
75a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po yin/ /dmag dpung bskyed la ru dar phyogs /gnod sbyin dbang po yang dag shes/ /sku mdog ser zhing dangs pa la/ /na bza' mdza' par lcags thag can/ /le brgan dar gyi sku rags can/ /dbu la rin chen rmog zhu gsol bya ban? gnam?
75a5(rgyud 'grel): lcagS? sgra sta bsnams/ /dkar po rdog dmar chibs su chibs/ /'khor ni ma mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /'brog gnas rgyal po ser skya ni/ /sngo zhur 'khyug pa chibs su chibs/ /sku la dar
75a6(rgyud 'grel): nag bar chen gsol/ /rin chen gser gyi ska bzangs can/ /phyag na bse mdung smug po bsnams/ /zab chen ba ngan lhabs se lhabs/ /dar sngon cod pan pu ru ru/ /mi zhon rta zhon srin po'i dmag /drug 'bum brgyad khri dag gis bskor/ /khyod ni
75a7(rgyud 'grel): dmag dpon chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyor/ /dmag dpon pi tsi kun d+ha li/ /sku mdog dkar gsal gzi brjid ldan/ /na bza' ha dar pho long ris/ /bser? rmog rin chen dngul sga can/ /phyag na gcod pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /
75b1(rgyud 'grel): chibs su ngang ba phung dmar chibs/ /'khor ni drang srong 'bum gyis bskor/ /khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste/ /dmag dpung skyed la ru ngar phyor/ /gnod sbyin gdug pa'i blon po brgyad/ bye ba 'bum phrag bcas 'khor bcas bsnams/ /sngon
75b2(rgyud 'grel): che bde gshegs spyan snga ru/ /bstan pa bsrung bar dam du bcas/ /'dod pa sgrub par zhal gyis bzhes/ /thugs dam skul lo rgyal po nyid/ /gdug pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs/ /las la skos so sha ra ra/ /rgyal po rta dmag gshegs tsam na/ /khu?
75b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra tho le lhabs se? lhabs/ /dga' ba'i gtam sgrogs cha ra ra/ /mi rkun sbyugs pa tshe re re/ /gsod gcod gtam ngan di ri ri/ /brda'? sgra drag po chems/ /rta rgyug rmig sgra h+rabs se h+rabs/ /srin po ma zin rdam ba'i gzugs/ /srin ?
75b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang tshe ngas 'debs/ /mchon thogs mang po gnam la 'phyar/ /la la lcags kyu zhags pa thogs/ /gzhu ba dungs mang po khyi li li/ /sbrul ba'i brda' sgra 'u ru ru/ /gnam lcags skar mda' h+ribs se h+ribs/ /srin po gnod sbyin bya gag gzugs?
75b5(rgyud 'grel): gcan gzan gzugs kyi sprul pa rnams/ /mi sdug bzhin ston tshe srog gcod/ /bye ba 'bum gyi dmag dpon rnams/ /las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung/ /zas su sha dang khrag la rol/ /snying brtse med par sgrol la brtson/ /longs spyod dbugs
75b6(rgyud 'grel): ? dangs la rol/ /thugs dam brgyud nas rnal 'byor bdag bskul lo/ /bcol ba'i phrin las myur du grub par mdzod/ /sdang ba'i dgra bo las ngan 'dis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di yis bshig /dkon mchog dbu 'phang 'di yis smad/ /sdang ba'i
75b7(rgyud 'grel): dgra? gongs? ngan? 'di/ /ri? rab zos dang rgya mtsho'i gting/ /gang dang gang du gnas pa der/ /mi dang lha ru khyed kyis phyes/ /lus dang sems su khyed kyis phrol/ /gnam gyi 'ju thag khyed kyis chod/ /sa'i rten phur khyed kyis phyung/ /dug mnga' 'thob?
76a1(rgyud 'grel): cig dus la bab/ /rgyal po las la bskyod pa na/ /rnga chen rdung zhing dril bu bskrol/ /dung 'dud zangs dung cha lang gdab/ /dar phyar sbyugs pas gdab par bya/ /rgyal po las la bskyod pa'i tshe/ /rta dul dang shing
76a2(rgyud 'grel): chag pa dang/ /dar phyar sngags pas gdab bar bya/ /blon po yul gyi rgan rabs rnams/ /'khro sbrug 'debs shing du ba dang/ /ltas kyi rim pa byung ba na/ /sbogs pa'i cho ga brtsam par bya/ /rang nyid khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis/ /rgyal po'i rten rnams
76a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og du gzhung/ /hUM dzhai shar ? ye/ a nu ra tsa ku ru hUM/ gsang ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sems dpa' dam tshig phyag rgya dang/ /dmag dpon las kyi phyag rgya dang/ /gnod sbyin gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /khro bo gzir ba'i gzungs sngags kyis//
76a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khu na sngon 'gro'i cho ga bya/ /rgyal po gzi brjid che ba dang/ /ltas kyi rim pa bzang ba ni/ /'dod pa'i don rnams 'grub pa'o/ /'phrin las drag tu bcol ba dang/ /gang 'dod don la gsol ba gdab/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyis

76a6(rgyud 'grel): po che la nor blang ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung ba'i rin po che/ /rin chen bdun las khyad par 'phags/ /gter mdzod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbul ? po che rin po che nor slang ba man ngag ba'i ces bya ba sdug bsngal sel 'dod
76a7(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /gang zhig nor rdzas sdub 'dod pas/ /gter mdzod 'di la 'bad par bya/ /glang po gter mdzod ces bya ba'i/ /nor sgrub gang zhig byed 'dod pas/ /bsreg thub rdzas bzang po la/ /rang na sna lnga bdar byas te/ /rgya gar glang po che'i gzugs//
76b1(rgyud 'grel): nyam phag cho shing lta na mdzes/ /yan lag thung shing gsus pa che/ /mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan/ /mkhas pas nang dang ldan par bya/ /de nyid me yi smin bya ste/ /de yi nang du gzhug pa ni/ /sngags dang rdzas su shes par bya/ /dang po sngags
76b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /grub na gser gyi bri bar bya/ /ma grub rgya shog dkar po la/ /rgya snag dag gis bri bar bya/ /dri bzang lnga yi tsa nan bya/ /de yi sngags ni 'di lta ste/ /oM ma ha ha sti rad na sarba sid+hi pha la hUM/ rang na pu na sid+hi sid+hi hUM/ rin po che
76b3(rgyud 'grel): gter gyi dngos grub chen po thob par gyur cig /d+ha naM me d+hi ti sid+hi hUM/ la rad na bsal nor zas dang longs spyod kyi dngos grub chen po thob par gyur cig /nan khed d+hi sid+hi sid+hi hUM/ kha rbas kyi mchog chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par

77b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bstim/ /bstim pa'i rdza'i glang po de/ /glang po rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ /gyur pa'i bdag gi 'dod pa kun/ /glang po de las 'byung bar ting 'dzin gyi spyan drangs bsam/ /dgos 'dod kun 'byung 'byung ba de/ /rang ha hi 'don? sam ya hUM ? zhes pa 'od zer ?
77b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bu gi mdzod dam phugs su gzhug /nas tshugs sam ni bang mdzod du/ /bzhag pa'i thabs ni 'di ltar te/ /dar sna lnga'i sna nas gdag /seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi la/ /glang po rin chen bstod la bzhag /de la rab gnas gong ltar bya/ /'brang rgyas

77b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ 'gom shing tho yugs mi btang bar/ /shin tu ces bkras glang po'i rtsa gzhi dang rab gnas byed tsan ldan par bya/ /mi lag 'brim par mi bya'o/ /de rang ltar byas pa'i yon tan ni/ /bdag nyid shin tu dbang phyug cing/ /longs spyod 'phrul dga' i lha dang mnyam

78a1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag /'byor pa smu yang gter dang sprod pa'i gdam dag/ shin tu zab pa'o/ /sngags kyi mchod/ /oM ma hA hA ste rang na sarba sid+hi pha la bshad ku ru hUM hUM/ ces shog bu la mang du bris la/ /glang po che'i nang
78a2(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug go/ bdag 'chang ba po'i longs spyod dang/ /'byor pa thams cad spel cig bya'o/ /'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad ba'o// //bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa'i tshigs bdag gi sgrub thabs lags so/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ga Na pa ti pa tra m hA sA d+ha nA ma/
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid tshogs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes/ /nor bu rin chen lta bu yi/ /gsang ba'i lugs mchog/
78a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bshad/ /mtshan nyid dang ldan sgrub pa pos/ /yid 'ong gnas su rdzas bsags te/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sa la ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru bzhi pa/ /ba yi rnam lngas dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bas legs tshogs bdag ? yang na'ang 'di dag ? gling ?
78a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa/ /dbus mtho dri yis pa'i gang zag de ? gyi don du blos ? la/ nyams dga' ba'i/ /gong 'du stan pa'i yo byad la sogs pa'i spras par bya/ /dkar la 'bol ba lha yi grangs bcud ma phyar ba bor sngags ? de dag la phyi dor bzhin me tog dgod/ bar? mchod pa bzang dang gtor ma'i tshogs//
78a6(rgyud 'grel): bshams nas dbyibs can dan la sogs pa'i gser sogs rin chen las/ /byas ba'i rten ni tshogs par bzhugs/ /de nas bdag nyid rnal dang kha dog 'byor pas/ /mgon po'i rol bas legs gnas/ lha'i gdan dkar po'o la/ rang ? nyid chen po la sogs ma mtsho
78a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes zla ba'i steng/ /dngu? ? chung bdag gi lha re re rten dang mchod ? re re la ? pa sbyor ba rdzas bsag ba'o/ /mtshang ba med par h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar las 'od zer 'sros? pa dang bcas pas ni 'od thugs ga'i ? yi ge las 'jig rten 'phros pas/ /'jig / par bstod pas rten mgon ? dang ba dro rje ? dpag tu med pa la skyon thams cad kyis go? par
78b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang/ /tshogs kyi bdag po 'khor bcas la/ /ming gi snying po sbyong bar bya/ /sae hya hi yi mdza' ma yis/ /spyan drangs bya lam khams dang ni/ /mdun gyi rtan la bzhugs par bya/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ /sdug bsngal bsal bas
78b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /cung zhig 'od dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs bsgoms tshogs bdag gi b+ha na ba te/? ya k+Sha la sogs ba'i 'jug tu 'di dag brtag kyu'i? phyag rgyas 'jig rten mgon po la sogs pa rnam dag sgram pa la yang bdun// byams pa la sogs 'chad ?  bzhi nor ? nas dbul 'phongs kyi
78b3(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ lan gsum brjod pas stong par bsam/ /snang ba'i rang bzhin sgyu mar gnas/ /gsogs sa bon yan lag 'od 'phros ba bya'o pas/ /sems can don byas na mkha' i mchod/ /chur 'dus dgra ste?
78b4(rgyud 'grel): tshan nyid kyi sngags/ /la sogs bsam/ /'od 'phros stong las khro bo'i tshogs/ /hUM hUM sgra las tshogs bdag gzugs/ /su gyur ? yang 'di ltar de la zhugs dam tshig pa bskyed pa yEk+Sha dpan ga la sogs pas pas 'od du zhu/ /lha yi bdag 'debs? pa bstan pa'i nas tshur 'dus mgon po de nyid la/ /po'i de ? ba phyag mtshan du gyur ba chu/
78b5(rgyud 'grel): yis bkrus/ /de gsos de sogs ngo bor pa'i sa bon bsam/ /dkyil 'khor kyi ? de nas oM b+ha ? pa ri? mchod pa phul nas ni/ /oM ba ra da ga hUM/ gnod sbyin la sogs 'khor de dag gi ngo bo de rnams la/ /khri dang gtso bo 'bum gyis rdzogs/ /rgyal po bzhi yiS bdud etsi'i? 'char ? pa'i
78b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa'i 'dus pa'i ?/ /de dge 'du ? sprin phung bsam/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su/ /mdun ? sham pa'i/ /gtso bo'i sgo nas bsnyen ba lan mo radna tra yA rgyal po bzhi dang klu brgyad ya/ /na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra sa ra pra sar nga ni/ ta thA ga ta bstan pa de oM badzre badzra/ mahA ba bi g+ha rgya rgya bdzres
78b7(rgyud 'grel): mahA b+ho dri tsita badzre/ mahA b+ho d+hi man d+ho badzre ra/ sarba karma a ba ra Na b+hi shed+ha Na badzrer/ ye swahA/ oM ga na pa ti puShpE ? d+hu be/ thos a lo ke /mar me/ /gan de/ dri cham ne bitya/ zhal zas/ mchod pa sbrin gyi gzungs 'di'i mgor rten gnon dang tshags bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan brjod la/ shapta chos so A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA/ /
79a1(rgyud 'grel): ming gi mjug du A:hUM la sogs brjed/ /re re la yang de bzhin bya/ /de nas gtor ma'i tshogs la ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /a kha ro mu khaM sarba d+harma adya nung pan na twad oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bdun dang ni/ glang chen phyag
79a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcas nas ni/ ming gi tha mar b+ha li oM badzra puShpe g+h+ri na kha khA kha hi mchod pa kha hi dang ni yag k+Sha sogs brjod/ ? shin tu ched po blos byung du chos oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM pas legs bdud rtsir 'grub po thams cad pa'i sngags 'od bar chim par bsam/ /de nas bdag nyid spos thogs te/ /rten
79a3(rgyud 'grel): la bdug nas sku khrus g+han ba ti la sogs kyi shas la bsten pa'i gsol/ /de nas brtags pa'i sa la ni/ /dkyil 'khor gong ltar byas pa la/ /thig gdab dkyil 'khor gi lha tshogs rnams le'u tshe brgyad ba yis/ /lte bar pad ma 'dab brgyad la/ /dgra sta ban d+ha'i mtshan ma
79a4(rgyud 'grel): gzungs chuAm lha chuAm yang na chu gtsang mdag gi rten la dgod/ /shar gyi le'u tshe bsgrub pa pos ser po la/ /tri ser gong ltar gtso bo yab yum gyi po yang de tshad thig la sogs pa'i la dgod/ /lho'i le'u tshe pad 'dab sngon po la/ /dbyug sna tshogs to sngon po legs par dgod/ /? mkha' 'gro ? phyag rgya yang
79a5(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi le'u tshe dmar po la/ /chus gang sprin phung ? 'dab zer dgong par bya/ /byang gi le'u tshe ljang khu la/ /rin chen ljang khu dgod par bya/ /byang shar le'u tshe dkar bad 'bab ya po la/ /mdud rtse gsum pa dgod par bya/ /shar lho'i le'u tshe dmar po la/ /dgra sta
79a6(rgyud 'grel): de la dgod pad ma zer par bya/ /lho nub le'u tshe nag po la/ /sprin phung glog du bcas pa'o/ /? 'dad? zer ro/ nub byang le'u tshe nag po la/ /rtse gsum po yang dgod par bya/ /sgo bzhi dag du ral gri bzhi/ /'dod yon la ni pad ma'o/ /de'i tshon ni rin gser dbul la sogs pa'i dang/ /
79a7(rgyud 'grel): tshon 'brang? le yang bzangs las bya'o tshon ni sbyar mtshon la sogs pa'i ngan pa de dag spangs pa'o/ /de'i mdza' 'bras bu can gyi shing la sogs pa'i mar mchod tshogs dang/ /gtor ma'i chogs grub na rgya che bas re re ma grub na? gtso bo ? gcig gnod sbyin brgyad la gcig klu brgyad ? gcig rgyal po bzhi la gcig bya'o/ /
79b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang bsham par bya/ /ral gri la sogs mtshon cha dang/ /shing bzangs bum pas bskor bar bya/ /dar gyi bla dres la sogs dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gzugs par bya/ /mgon po'i rol pas gnas nas ni/ /gong ltar sgom zhing dam tshig pa'i/ /
79b2(rgyud 'grel): sku khrus gsol ba'i ta gon ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i steng du ni/ /dgra sta las gyur tshogs bdag mchog /sku mdog sngon phyogs su ni go? zhal spyan ras gzigs kyi/ cig pa/ /khyu mchog phyag mtshan tshun chad thams cad mthun pa la khyad ?
79b3(rgyud 'grel): shangs ldan spyan khyad bar nang bsgrub la gsum pa/ /phyag bzhi dang pos mche ba ste/ /zhags pa g.yas pas rim par 'dzin/ /dgra sta kha trAM kha g.yon ni/ /rim pas 'dzin cing zhabs bzhi yis/ /klu bzhi mnan pas gsus pa che/ /a bsgyur rdo rje phag gdong
79b4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /sku mdog dmar mo gtso la mkhyud/ /dgra sta g.yas 'dzin b+han d+ha g.yon/ /khrag gis bkang ba gtso la stob/ /zla ba'i stan la yum dang ni/ /gnyis su med pa bsgom par bya/ /shar du khams gsum bdag po'i bdud/ /ser po la bum? phug g.yon
79b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la/ /dri ser g.yas pas gcod byed pa/ /lho'i phyogs su gnod yum gyi phyag mtshan sbyin ni/ /rdo rje mchu can ma he dang byi la sngon po'i stan gdong/ /tho ba g.yas ? lhan skyes su lhan skyes su 'khor bskyed pa 'dzin dbyug to g.yon/ /sku mdog sdo la 'jigs gzugs
79b6(rgyud 'grel): can/ /nub? du gnod sbyin sprin gyi bdag /g.yas pa chus gang sprin pa dang/ /g.yon pa zhags pa 'dzin pa dkar/ /byang du gnod sbyin nor gnas pa/ /ljang khu kha trAM ljang khu g.yas/ /rin chen thogs pa ser po'o/ /byang shar bgegs rgyal nag po naM/ /byi na yag? glang chen mgo /g.yas pa mdud rtse gsum pa dang/ /g.yon pa la phug thogs pa'o/ /shar lho'i yi dags drag po ni/ /g.yas pa dgra sta 'dzin byed cing/ /g.yon pa mi thod baM ril thogs/ g.yon ? mdog nag khros pa bsgom par bya/ /lho nub
80a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su sbrin gyi ni/ /sgron me zhes bya sprin phung g.yas/ /klog gi 'od ni g.yon na thogs/ /sku mdog sngon po bsgom par bya/ /nub byang 'tshams su bgegs rgyal ni/ /log 'dren snang g.yon zhes bya ba/ /rtse gsum g.yas 'dzin
80a2(rgyud 'grel): thod kaM g.yon/ /sha dang la phug gis bskang 'dzin/ /glang chen sna can bsgom par bya/ /lha rnams la ni sems dpa' ltar/ /klu brgyad thal mo sbyar gnas pa/ /a ba ra dang ba ru na shi ni// shar gyi phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /dud skyod 'jog po ldor gnas pa//
80a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ldan mdza' yas nub tu ste/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po ni/ /byang gi phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /sku mdog bzhengs? ba phyogs dang lha brgyad ni mthun par bsgom/ /shar sgor yul 'khor skyong zhes bya/ /sku mdog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /lhor ni 'phags skyes po zhes

80a5(rgyud 'grel): gi tshogs dang bcas/ /dbang bsgyur khro bor bsgom par bya/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud mdzes ldan pa/ /'dod yon sngon po legs par sgom/ /dam tshig 'khor lo de la ni/ /dri yi tshogs kyis bdug par bya/ /oM ga Na pa ti yak+Sha na ra dza e hye hi/ e hye hi/ e hye
80a6(rgyud 'grel): hi dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar gnas pa ji bzhin gzhug /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs gzhug /oM na mo ga Na pa ti ? ti yA rad na si ti swAhA/ shas la ye shes sems dpa' ispyan drangs de la bzhugs nas/ spos la sogs kyis rten pa ye shes sems dpa' ya sha ka pa lA/ ma hA b+he ra b+he/ tri pra tsa hUM
80a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM/ dam tshig sems dpa' / de ba yak+Sha na ga yA yA yA/ hUM hUM hUM/ rang na sid+ha ye shes sems dpa' de/ nas dam tshig sems dpa' la swAhA// //zla ba gsum gyis rdzogs pa yin/ /bsnyen pa dang de nas gong bzhin mchod pa dbul/ /bsgrub pa po ? ltar/ de nas gtor ma btad nas ni
80b1(rgyud 'grel): dri yi tshogs kyis de la bdugs/ /de nas dod pa'i gsol ba gdab/ /de nas nyin de thun bzhi ru/ /dus rnams rtag tu bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor rnying pa gso bar bya/ /de ltar byas pas don rnams 'grub/ /mchod dang gtor ma bstod payis/ /de dag bdag gi mnyes

80b3(rgyud 'grel): las tshogs gzhan las legs bsgrub pa'i lugs la mad na'ang lugs byad du 'phagS? 80b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi rgyas dbang bsad pa la sogs pa rnams po'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya rgyud dang man dag la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pas de rnams bsdus pa yin/ sgrub? thabs sgrub pa po'i ba slob dpon a ba d+hu mchog thun mong gi dngos sgrub/ ti ba'i zhal lnga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen
80b5(rgyud 'grel): po dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ? nag mthun rkyen thams cad tshar bas na tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/ /rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas la gtad pa'o// gser gling pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan yin/ /rgya gar skad du/ bI na ya ka na rA dza sa d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bgegs kyi rgyal po'i

82a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzir te thugs ka'i pad steng gi /raM las me 'bar tshig pa yis/ /skrag ste thal sbyar gus btud nas/ /bka' nyan dngos grub ster bar bsam/ /lha chen gzir ba'i man ngag gzhan/ /mi bri sdig che zhal las shes/ /grub pa
82b1(rgyud 'grel): brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa nag po spyod pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'brog gi shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //? rgyal kyi grub thabs/ /
82b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya ka rA dza sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon/ /ma mo'i khyim?
82b3(rgyud 'grel): dang nyams dga' i gnas/ /blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /sgom pa bzang po bya ba nyid/ /'bad pas bris sku dmigs nas ni/ /sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /skyil krung 'gying ba'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor cug
82b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gis brgyan/ /dmar po 'bar 'khyil 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yang dag bri/ /dgra sta gtun shing nyid dang yang/ /de bzhin du ni mda' dang gzhu/ /kha TwAM ga dang lcags kyu dang/ /thod khrag dmar po 'khyil ba dang/ /de bzhin rdo rje ral gri

83a1(rgyud 'grel): la lha yul nas dgug go /oM pad+ma ka ma la ye stwaM/ zhes yi ge bdun pa gsum gyiS gdan dbul lo/ /oM a ga(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dbru drug pa 'bum bzlas so/ /oM badzra a gu sha /badzra mahA gu hya sid+d+hi a karSha ya hUM ?
83a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dngos grub blang ba'i sngags yi ge bco brgyad pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM a mu kaM dzaM wi ma la ya/ mog+ha dzaM b+ha la a b+ha b+ha ye/ a mu kaM ma ra ya hUM phaT swAhA/ /zhes pa nor spel ba'i sngags yi ge nyer gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /
83a3(rgyud 'grel): oM mu le b+h+ruM zhes pa btsun pa'i sngags yi ge bzhi pa brgya rtsa re bzlas so/ /bgegs bdag chen po sku mdog dmar po zhags g.yas brkyang ba/ zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ g.yas brkyang ba/ zhal gcig spyan gsum pa /mche ba gtsigs pa/ spoM la thung ba/ gsus khyim che ba/ thor chugs
83a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil ba/ 'jigs shing rngam pa/ glang po'i gdong can/ dar dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu gnyis kyi g.yas dang po dgra ste/ gnyis pa gtun shing /gsum pa mda' gzhu/ bzhi pa kha TwAM ga /lnga pa lcags kyu/ drug pa
83a5(rgyud 'grel): thod la khrag gis gang ba/ /g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje /gnyis pa ral gri/ gsum pa thod pa sha chen gyis gang ba/ /bzhi pa phub chud /lnga pas ba dan rtse gsum pa/ drug pas 'phang mdung bsnams pa'o/ /pad ma dmar po dang nyi ma'i dbus na zhabs
83a6(rgyud 'grel): ? chos brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas phyung pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /lo
83a7(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba gyi ? zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// //cho ga ? bstod pa/ rgya gar skad du /Arya ga(rgyud 'grel): na pa ti stu ti/ bod skad du /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
83b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lo ka mgon mdzad gnang bar mdzad/ /dpal mdzad de bzhin phan par mdzad/ /mnyam pa med cing dpe med pa/ /tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags dbang phyug rigs sngags rgyal/ /longs spyod 'byung gnas gter gyi mchog /
83b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu mngon par ston pa po/ /tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud lag rgyal/ /stobs chen nyon mongs g.yul 'joms shing/ /bgegs ma gro mas du(rgyud 'grel): kha 'joms mdzad pa/ /blang chen sngar ldan gtso la bdud/ /rin chen chen po rin chen
83b3(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /rin chen chen po rin chen 'byung/ /rin chen bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa/ /glang chen snang ldan gtso la 'dud/ /tshogs kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha dmag dkar po'i dbugs 'byin cing/ /lha man nag po'i g.yul bzlog pa/ /glang chen sna ldan gtso
83b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /sku ni yon tan rin chen te/ /gsung ni yon tan ngo bo nyid /thugs ni yon tan bdag nyid can/ /glang cher snar ldan gtso la 'dud/ /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la bstong pa/ /slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
83b5(rgyud 'grel): ? rgyab kyi ? man ngag/ /rgya gar skad du /mahA bi na ya ka rU pa u pa de shar ngan nA ma/ bod skad du / bgegs bdag chen po'i sku bri ba'i man ngag yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo sdom pa la btung de/
83b6(rgyud 'grel): dgegs? bdag chen po'i bris sku bri/ /rol g.yogs pa'i ras si ni/ /mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i ras dang yang/ /bu btsas shi ba'i ras dang ni/ /ba glang ? sogs khyad par las/ /nag po'i brgyad dang bcur zhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /ri mo
83b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan yang dam tshig ldan/ /sgrub po dag gis bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo bsrung dag ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang ba/ /mchod pa lnga yis brgyan pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor nyams
84a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' bri bar bya/ /dbus su dkyil 'khor kun du ni/ /re kas bskor zhing shin tu mdzes/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /me tog dmar pos legs par mchod/ /dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par dang/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni gdab dang/ /ha
84a2(rgyud 'grel): dang sha dang chang rnams kyis/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor mas gang/ /de dbus khro bo chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /cung zad zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs/ /khro bcas zhal ni bzhad pa dang/ /sku mchog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng pas
84a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan/ /yi dags zhen zhing nyi mar gnas/ /gang ldan sum cu gsum 'jigs mdzad/ /stag gi lpags pa'i gos 'dzin zhing/ /spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can te/ /bdan gsum pa 'bar rdo rje/ /thod pa dang ni mtshan na bzhi/ /g.yas dang g.yon
84a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag dag la/ /mda' dang gzhu nyid de bzhin no/ /oM badzra kro ta Da ki hUM phaT/ ces bzlas so/ /de yi mdun du bgegs bdag che/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od 'bar ba/ /bcu gnyis phyag ldan 'jigs chen bri/ /'dab ma brgyad la gnod sbyin brgyad/ /bgegs bdag
84a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po ji bzhin bri/ /dang po ras chog tshul bzhin bya/ /de nas lha ? mtshan nyid ldan/ /mnyes bar byas te yid 'ong bri/ /rab gnas mkhan po byin rlabs ldan/ /mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor gyis/ /rab gnas cho ga tshul bzhin bya/ /byams pa snying 
84a6(rgyud 'grel): rje byang chub sems/ /rgya chen 'dun pa drag po bskyed/ /mchod dang bsngo ba rgyas par bya/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /rtag tu mched na dgos 'dod 'byung/ /'di ni bris sku'i gang mos ?/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub bya ba/ /de nas bzlas pa
84a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bum? byas na/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /rten dgram mchod pa byas nas ni/ /dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bar gsungs/ /bgegs bdag chen po'i sku bri ba'i man ngag /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po nag po
84b1(rgyud 'grel): pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang /lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// shu b+haM/ gtor ma'i cho ga/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya ga(rgyud 'grel): na pa ti li bi d+h+ri/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
84b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po yang dag par mnyes bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma 'dul bar 'dod pas/ /dang po rin po che'i snod phun sum tshogs
84b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'dras chan dang /khur ba dang/ dkar gsum dang/ dngar gsum dang/ la du dang/ la phug dang /glang sha dang /rkun 'brus la sogs pa bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kha dog dro bo phun sum tshogs pas legs par bkang skye mdun du
84b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rjes su dran pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms te/ b+h+ruM las rin po che'i snod ?
84b5(rgyud 'grel): shing rgya che ba'i nang du /khaM las zhal zas ro brgya ldan pas gyur bur gang bar bsam/ /de nyid gsum dang /oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA nI /adya nutpra nan twad? oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT /swAhA/ zhes bya bas byin brlabs la/ de nas rang gi snying khar sa bon gyis?
84b6(rgyud 'grel): ? la/ /de'i 'ang kyi ye shes ? tshogs kyi bdag po spyan drangs la/ /mdun du dmigs nas/ phyag rgya bstan te/ oM na mo tu te /na na(rgyud 'grel): ? sat ye /oM de ba liM kha kha khA hi khA hi swAhA/ zhes bya bas dbul zhing des kyang tshim par longs spyod nas dges par bsam
84b7(rgyud 'grel): mo /de nas 'di skad ces/ 'bras bu sman dang rin chen pos/ la dul phug glang sha dang/ /rgun 'brum rgun chad dkar gsum dang /mngar gsum 'bras chan khur ba sogs/ phyogs bcu lha mi'i yid 'ong sogs/ /yongs su bzung ba med pa 'bul/ /mgon
85a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod bdag la rab tu brtse ba yis/ /'di dag bzhes te dges par gsol nas kyang/ bdag gi las rnams 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /bar chad rab tu zhi bar mdzod/ /de nas bstod pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bstod de/ /rtsa
85a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags saM gzungs kyi phreng ba ci nus su bzlas te/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol la/ bsags pa'i dge rtsa yongs su bsngo zhing/ yi ge brgya pa bzlas so/ /'phags pa tshogS kyi bdag po'i gtor ma'i
85a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga /slob dpon chen bo mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa /nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /lo tsa ba gyi rdo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// // sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ rgya gar skad du /
85a4(rgyud 'grel): ho mag+hI bi di nA ma/ bod skad du/ bgegs bdag gi sbyin sreg gi chog rab tu bshad pa/ dang por sngon du 'gro ba brtsam/ /rgyas par ser po'i sa las ni/ /rin chen rnam pa'i thab khung ngam/ /yang na grub zhi mnyam par bya/ /rgya ru khrud? dpangs su gang
85a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang du sor mo brgyad/ /dor ba der ni kha khyer gnas/ /kun nas sor mo bzhi pa ni/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thab khung dbus ni ser po ru/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte ba la/ /rdo rje rin chen ser po drug /ser po'i sa dang dri yis ni/ /thab khung
85a6(rgyud 'grel): kun tu byug par bya/ /bud shing thab khung pas thung tshad/ /dgon pa yi ni gci ba nyid/ /'bu srin yongs su spangs pa'o/ /yaM shing 'bru dang bsreg pa'o// shing ni bshis pa'i cho ga'o/ /yam shing zhi ba bzhin du bzung/ /mdzes pa dbus kyi cha las skyes/ /khu
85a7(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcangs pa'i khru tshad tsam/ /zho dang 'o ma mar la brtag /zas kyi mchog dang zho'i zas/ /mar la sogs pa'i ro mchog dang/ /mar dang ldan pa'i sbrang rtsi dang/ /sa le chu blugs pad+ma dang/ /g+h+ri ha yan ge sar dang/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dur ba rnams/
85b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing sngon bzhin/ /rgyas pa'i las la sbyin sreg bya/ /tsam pa ka dang a sho ka /na ga ge sar ze 'bru can/ /ji ltar me tog la sogs pa/ /dri med rab dngas 'bras bur bcas/ /ljon sha'i dri ma med pa yis/ /shing gi me tog rab ldan pa//
85b2(rgyud 'grel): sor mo lnga pa rab tu ldan/ /ser po'i brgyan bcas snga dro ste/ /nor gyis phongs nas rgyas par bya/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyi bdug ste/ /yang na rgyal po rol pas so/ /'bum phrag gcig tu sbyin sreg bya/ /gling kun dbang bsgyur rgyal po yis
85b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal chen po la spyod par 'gyur/ /brtul shugs can sems mgu sems dang/ /byang du kha bltas dga' ldan pas/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rgyas pa yi ni cho ga bzhin/ /oM gyi mdza' can sngags bzlas so/ /thab tu me lha ser po
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /bsangs sbyangs mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /de rjes bgegs bdag rgyas par bskyed/ /dgang blugs rgyas par 'bul rigs bdag bar bya/ /dngos grub kun gzhan du bshad pa'i dang las rnams ni/ /sngags pas sbyin sreg med mi 'grub/ /de phyir sngags dang sbyin sreg
85b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'bad de brtsam par bya ba yin/ /rgyas pa'i las so/ /dbang gi las ni/ dbang la dmar ba'i sa dag la/ /zla gam dang ni mtsho skyes 'dra/ /rgyal khru do dpangs su gang/ /byug pa dmar po kha khyer ni/ /lcags kyu 'bar bas rab tu brgyan/ /dbus su
85b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mtsho skyes dmar/ /dbang la bshis pa'i shing brtsig go /'o ma can de de dmar po'i shing/ /ljon shing dri ma med pa ni/ /shing gi me tog dmar po can/ /dbang la bshis kha dog pa'i shing gis brtsig /mchod rdzas me tog dmar po sogs/ /zhal
85b7(rgyud 'grel): zas la sogs ci 'byor bsham/ /sreg rdzas ming gzugs me tog dmar/ /ba glang sha dang gi haM sogs/ /sngags pa'i cha lugs dmar zhing mdzes/ /dus ni nyi ma nub kha ste/ /chags shing gos ni dmar po gyon/ /sems dpa' i dkyil ? dag gis
86a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /chags pa rdo rje sbyor ldan pas/ /nub tu kha bltas thun dang por/ /sngags pa bgegs bdag nga rgyal gyis /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor las /btsun mo'i pad+ma 'jam gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya rjes su chags pas dmiD
86a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer bskul ba'i sbyor ba dang/ /sngags pas ho(rgyud 'grel): yig mdza' can bzlas/ /rnam g.yed mig zur gyis bltas pas/ /bud med skye can bzlas/ /rnam g.yed mig zur gyis bltas pas/ /bud med skye rjes la bgegs bdag dmar po bskyed/ /sreg rdzas
86a3(rgyud 'grel): dgang blugs legs par dbul/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ste/ /las kun gyi ni de kho na/ /bsam pa'i khyad par gyis ni bya/ /sal las dang rjes 'thun pa'i/ /thabs ? las rnams thams cad la/ /sngags pas ji lta bzhin du bya/ /gzhan

86a6(rgyud 'grel): tu sbyin bsreg bya/ /gling bzhi dbang bsgyur rgyal po yi/ /dpal chen po la spyod par 'gyur/ /de nas dgug pa'i cho ga bshad/ /li khri'i mdog dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /rlung du steng bltas phyogs gos can/ /bsgrub bya g.yog ba bsam bar bya/ /rol mo'i mtshams
86a7(rgyud 'grel): rngam gdan la gnas/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor bar ldan/ /dza'i mdza' can sngags bzlas te/ /bsgrub bya'i snying kha chu skyes dbug /'jig rten ? gsum po des par dgug /? du de nas gzhan gyi cho ga shes rig bshad/ /dgug sogs ji ltar
86b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yi/ /thod ba dum bu gcig pa'ang rung/ /mnyam par mdzes shing bzang po la/ /bsgrub pa bya ba'i lus gri zhing/ /de bzhin 'dab ma brlan can brgya'i/ /sngags dang ming ni lhan cig tu/ /gser gyis shing gi snyu gu yis/ /ba glang gi haM khrag gis bri/ /khrag gis
86b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa yi ni gos/ /bsgrub bya yi ni steng du g.yogs/ /snying po'i sngags ni go bzlog la/ /bzlas pa sbyin zer yang shing lo la bris ba'i thod pa dum bu gcig ba la/ 'dig sngags dang ? dang bcas pa bri ba mang po byas pas sreg bya ba ste/ sngags dang 'gying bar bca' lugs kyis//

86b4(rgyud 'grel): la byug/ zangs ma'i khab kyis bsgrub bya yi/ /snying kha lte ba gsang ba yi/ /gnas gsum po ni phug byas te/ /gang 'dod mtshan mo phyed na ni/ /de ni myur du dgug par 'gyur/ /gser gyi tsag gi b+ha ga ni/ /bris te de stengs lag g.yon gyis/ /mnan te gar gi ming ?
86b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas ni/ /de ni skad cig de la 'ong/ /steng du 'khor lo'i 'dab blangs te/ /bya rog sgro yi snyug gu yis/ /mig chu yi ming dang ni/ /spel ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /'bad de steng gi rlung sbur na/ /de ni skod pa'i cho ga nyid/ /spre'u 'i dus?
86b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin la/ /phur bu sor tshad drug bya ste/ /lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags pas/ /gang gi sgo ru brkos pas na/ /de yi rigs ni gcod par 'gyur/ /ba glang glang po rta bed dang/ /rnga mo dam he'i gnas rnams su/ /brkos te spas na brlag par 'gyur//
86b7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhon nas ni/ /mgrin rings steng du rab gnas ba/ /bsgrub bya phyogs kyi gos can lta/ /skra grol til gyi mar khus byug/ lha ru phyogs shing skyabs med pa/ /myos dang bcas shing du bzhin pa/ /zhags pa yis ni lag bcings te/
87a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyab nas bsnun bzhin pa ni bsam/ /mkhas pas de che me kha lta/ /khams gsum mnan pa'i bsam pa dang/ /gal te 'dod pa bsgrub 'dod na/ /dza'i mdza' can sngags bzlas 'grub rtad ma he ? bzhon pas/ gnyis po dag?
87a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag par bsam/ bsgrub bya mtshon chas rab spras la/ /phan tshun du ni brtsod par ldan/ /bsgrub po 'khrul 'khor bsam gtan phyogs/ /kun du brtse ba med sems par/ /ma he rta la zhon pa yis/ /char bcas 'khor gyi khyad par gyis/ /ming gi yi ge de rnamS
87a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /raM dang raM gyis kun nas spel/ /de bzhin spyi bo'i steng du raM/ /yan lag las ni shes par bya/ /ri yi rtse mor gnas gyur pa/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dkrung des bstan par/ /des ni bsgrub bya yang dag mnan/ /lus dang ngag dang sems ni gzir/ /des ni mngon
87a4(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs pa bzhin/ /ming gi mdza' mar spel bar bya/ /'di ni mnan pa'i tshe ga'o/ /las mdza' bsreg mnan 'phang gsum sbyar/ /bgegs kyi bdag po'i sbyin sreg /dpal nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang
87a5(rgyud 'grel): lo tsa ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyiS bsgyur ba'o// shub+haM //shin tu myur ba'i lha chen bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/ /rgya gar skad du/ pu Na de wa ma hA bi g+ha rA dzA sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ shin tu myur ba'i lha chen po bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub
87a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs shes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su/ /yid du 'ong ba'i khang par/ 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i bya ba brtsams pa ni/ /dang por thad ka dgram zhing// mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la//
87a7(rgyud 'grel): rang stan bde ba la rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug par bya'o/ /rang yi dam gang yin pa'i nga rgyal bya/ /de nas rang gi mdun du lha 'di bsgom/ /de'i sku mdog ni/ me 'bar ba ltar shin tu dmar ba gdong bzhi pa /spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thod gtsug
87b1(rgyud 'grel): sgril nas dkris shing bcings pa/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba/ shin tu 'jigs pa/ mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa/ /phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas pa dang po nas rim pa bzhin du dgra sta/ /mda'/lcags kyu/ rdo rje /ral gri/ 'phang mdung rnams so/ /g.yon
87b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po gtun shing/ gzhu/ kha TwaM ga/ thod pa khrag gis gdab/ sha chen gyis gang ba'i thod pa phub chung dang/ gdan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje dang thod pa thugs kar 'dzin zhing/ /gzhan kun 'char thabs su'o/ /oM ga(rgyud 'grel): ga(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+ha sid+d+ha /sarba artha sa d+ha me/
