87b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' pa dang /yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos mchod pa chen pos mchod cing 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad 'ching ste /lan tshwa chur btab pa ltar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad 'byer zhing drung du 'ong mi nus par
87b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad 'grub cing nor rnams brnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji skad smas pa'i cho ga la gzhan yid ches par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs sel ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon di paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub? thabs
87b6(rgyud 'grel): ? btso na'i dang 'gyur// rgya gar skad du/ su bud d+ha mahA bi g+ha bi gnan dA dza sA dta ni/ bod skad du/ shin tu myur ba'i lha bgegs chen po/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyams dga' ba'i sa
87b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su/ /yid du 'ong ba'i khad par 'dod pa rtsam pa ni/ /dang por tsan dan gyi thad ka dgram gzhan yang mchod pa bshams/ /'dun pa drag po bskyed/ rang stan bde ba la rol pa'i 'dug stangs su 'dug par byas la /de'i sku mdog ni/ me chen po ltar
88a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba/ gdong gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs sgril sgrigs shing bcings? pa/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa /gcig chag pa /phyag g.yas na dgra sta dang /gtun shin dang /mda' gzhu dang/ kha TwaM ga dang
88a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang /thod pa dmar chen gyis bkang ba'o/ /g.yon na rdo rje dang /ral gri dang/ sha chen pos bkang ba'i thod pa dang/ mun shun ti dang kha dan rtse gsum dang/ shag ti dang bcu gnyis so/ /oM dmag(rgyud 'grel): sid d+ha sarba a ? pra sa d+ha ya hUM hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ bsnyen pa'i
88a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni /oM a ga(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ bsnyen pa'i sngags brgya'am stong bzlas nas/ /phyis nas las byed pa na gang 'dod pa bya'o/ /til nag po la sngags la las kar 'dod pa bya'o/ /de ltar bsgrub pa'i sngags pa de ni thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dang /yid
88a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos rgyal por mchod cing 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad byer zhing drung du 'ong mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /las rnams 'grub cing don rnams brnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji skad smras pa'i tshig la mi gzhan dag yid ches
88a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs sel ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar kos la'i rnal 'byor ba/ brtul shugs spyod pa bai ro tsa nas rang 'gyur byas pa'o// //'khor lo'i ?? DoM b+hi he ru ka sa mdzad pa// rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri ga Na pa ti tsakra sU rya dbang 'khor lo'i gsal byed gi sngags pa bskal bzang yo byad
88a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po'i'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /btud de de'i man ngag ni/ /khri gzhi rab gnas bsgrub pa dang //bgegs dbang 'khor lo'i gsal byed gi sngags pa bskal bzang yo byad tshang/ /rgyu skar rgyal la las rnamS ?
88a7(rgyud 'grel): thog mar bri ba'i cho ga ni/ /sa dang nam mkha' rang gi/ 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /bsgrub po'i srog gi 'khor lo 'bar/ /khor yug rim pa dgu yi dbus/ /zhi rgyas zla ba nor bu dang/ /dbang drag nyid phyed gru gsum nyid/ /thog ma'i sde chan tha ma'i mthar/
88b1(rgyud 'grel): oM yig gis ni rab brgyan pa'i/ /ye ge drug ba nor bu'i gzugs/ oM a ga(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA /rims ldan thog ma mtsho skyes brgyad/ /dang po'i gsum po re re'i mthar/ /gang 'dod spal bas bskor ba'o/ /mig me rig byed byed mda' rim bzhin/ /oM ??
88b2(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi?/ sarba arthas d+ha me bra sa d+ha ye swAhA/ /oM bar taka ye swAhA/ /oM bag twe? ??? /oM gan par tsha ya swAhA /nye snying/ snying po ming gi snying po/ /ro ri klu rnams go rim bzhin/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed byed spel tshig bcas/ /a A la sogs pa dbyangs yig/ ka kha ga
88b3(rgyud 'grel): nga sogs gsal byed/ /ye d+harmA so? ni brten 'brel snying khu gang rgyas ba las bzhi rim pa ni /zla ba yid bzhin zhar la mtshon/ /bgegs bdag rol pa'i lto bar bri/ /phrin las bzhi yi rim pa'o/ /nam mkha' bzlog pa'i rim pa yi/ /rgya mtsho yang ni de bzhin
88b4(rgyud 'grel): no/ /de nyid bar nang tsa kra'o/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i tsakra yang/ /khor yug rim pa lnga dang ldan/ /lte bar ga la spel tshig bskor/ /dang po 'dab brgyad mtsho skyes te/ /brgya byin gshin rje gnod sbyin chur/ /yi ge bdun pa spel tshig bcas/ me rlung bden bral bgegs
88b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sar/ /nye snying snying po yang snying ngo/ /rtsa ba'i sngags rnams rim las bri/ /mig me mtsho mthar oM dbyangs gsal /rten 'brel spel tshig bcas pa bri/ /de lta'i bar mchog 'khor lo yang/ /las bzhi'i dbye bas so sor 'gyur/ /ras rgyas? nor bu'i mdog
88b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /yar ngo'i tshes la skal bzang gis/ /n+ya gro ta sogs dkar po la/ /'bras la sogs pa'i snag tsha yis/ /dur ba'i snyug sogs 'dzin las bri/ /shar tu phyogs te bris pas ni/ /zhi ba'i cho gas rab tu gnas/ /dngul la sogs pa'i gzhur gzhun
88b7(rgyud 'grel): mar dang 'o sbrad dag gis dgang/ /maN+Dal steng bzhag rin chen snod/ /'bru bcas dbus su gzhug par bya/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i ltar dmigs te/ /tsakra tshogs bdag rab dkar gzugs/ /thugs kar 'khor los brgyan pa bsam/ /bdag gi bzlas
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bas de nyid bskul/ /bdag la nang gdon lce 'bab sogs/ /mi 'thun phyogs rnams 'di? byed cing/ /'dod pa bsgrub par bsgom pa nyid/ /bzlas pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ /zhag bdun par du bsgrub? par bya/ /de nas gyur? dngad?/ ra dril/ /
89a2(rgyud 'grel): mchan/ bud g.yon bcad snga dro'i dus/ /ga'u mdun bzhag sngar bzhin bsgom/ /de yis nad gdon 'jigs pa dang/ /rgyal po tshom rkun lce 'bab sogs/ /bsam sbyor ngan rnams zhi bar byed/ /zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga'o/ /nA gro ta sogs ser po la/ /lha ?
89a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i slu? gu yis/ /'bras bu tshe dang bsod nams ster/ /rgyas par byed pa'i mdza' rten can/ /cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni/ /rgyas pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas/ /gser la sogs pa'i ga'ur gzhug /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsis bkad/ /maN+Da la?
89a4(rgyud 'grel): radna'i snod mdzes su/ bzhag la gser ldan chogs bdag ni/ /bskul bas don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /slar yang gser mdog can gyis dril/ /bcangs zhing spung la mdun bzhag ste/ /sngags kyis tshe bdag skul ba yis/ /'dod dgu 'byung zhing rgyas
89a5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /bsod nams tshe dang 'byor pa sogs/ /grags dang dpal ni rgyas par byed/ /rgyas par byed pa'i cho ga'o /grog gur kum gi haM chus/ /zangs sogs snyug gus nub byad bri/ /dbang dang dgug pa'i spel tshig bcas/ /de nyid cho gas rab tu
89a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /zangs sogs ga'ur pra tshil bsdams/ /mar sprang blugs te bsdam par bya/ /snod bzang maN+Dal steng bzhag la/ /tshogs bdag pad+ma ra ga'i mdog /bdag gi bzlas pas bskul ba dang/ /'jig rten gsum sogs 'byor pa bgug? /dbang
89a7(rgyud 'grel): dang dgug pa'i don grub bsam/ /gang zhig dbang dang dgug 'dod pas/ /cho ga 'di yis 'grub par byed/ /dur khrod ras sogs nag po la/ /mi rus sgro rkad sku gus dri/ /bsad dang rengs dan dbye ba dang/ /bsrung dang bzlog par ro ras nyid/ /snyug
89b1(rgyud 'grel): mas lho phyogs spel tshig bcas/ /drag po'i cho gas rab tu gnas/ /tshogs bdag nag po'i lus la'o/ /maN+Dal steng bzhag bskul ba yis/ /bdag la gnod pa'i skye bo rnams/ /bsad rengs rmugs dang bzlog pa dang/ /me mthun bsrung zhing don grub bsam/
89b2(rgyud 'grel): slar yang lcags kyi ga'ur gzhug /srong la mdun bzhag sngar bzhin bya/ /de lta'i bsrung 'khor cho ga yis/ /lha yang rung ste brlag par byed/ /nang gdon 'jigs pa ma lus bsrung/ /byang stems rig sngags ngan rnams bzlog /gsang sngags mgo bo nas
89b3(rgyud 'grel): du bstan/ /bsrung dang zhi rgyas phyi ru ste/ /de lta'i cho ga bzang po nyid/ /brtsams pa tsam gyis thun mong mchog /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /skal bzang rnams kyi don ldan no/ /dpal ldan gnyis med rol pa'i gzhabs/ /phung ba bdud rtsis tshim byas pa'i
89b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i cho ga'i dge ba des/ /'gro kun phun tshogs nyid gyur cig /dpal cho gas kyi bdag po'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed/ /slob dpon chen po DoM b+hi hi? ru kas mdzad pa rdzogs sto// shu b+haM// //sngags kyi rgyal po'i ? dngos grub ?
89b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ man+t+ra rA dzA sa ma ya sid+d+hi sA d+h+na nA ma/ bod skad du/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i dam tshig dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma dang ni lhag pa?
89b6(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /mkha' 'gro'i cho gsal phyag btsal nas/ /thun mong sgrub pa'i rim pa bri/ /phrin las sgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /gnas ni nags tshal dur khrod dam/ /rtse mtho brag dmar me tog ljongs/ /dben zhing nyams dga' sgrub pa'i gnas/ /de ru 'dug
89b7(rgyud 'grel): la spros pa bcad/ /shog bu gro ga dur khrod ras/ /dung dang gur kum sindu? pa/ dur khrod sol bas snag tsha'o/ /mu gyur gsum pa chu dkyil 'khor/ /dbus kyi ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sa dang chu dang med bye yis rdo rje bum pa lcags kyu yi/ /bsnol dang brtsegs
90a1(rgyud 'grel): pa go bar bya/ /gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa la/ /dang po'i hya gsum nang du bri/ /de nas re kha rnam bzhi la/ /mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa la/ /yi ge sum brgya rtsa gnyis kyi/ /hya kyi rim pa bri bar bya/ /hya rnams thams cad g.yon
90a2(rgyud 'grel): bskor bri/ /nang du ming yig bri bar bya/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi la/ /ngan nya na ma bzhi spangsnas/ /gzhan rnams 'khor lor dgong par bya/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dzha nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ ka kA d+ha ya
90a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ kha khA hi khA hi/ ga gArdzha ya gArdzha ya/ g+ha g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ tsa tsA la ya gnyis/ tsha tshA ta ya gnyis/ dza dzAm+b+ha ya/ dzha dzhA ta ya gnyis/ Ta TA la ya gnyis/ Tha ThA ka ya gnyis/ Da DA b+ha ya gnyis/ /Dha DhA ka ya gnyis/ Na NA sha ya gnyis/ ta tA
90a4(rgyud 'grel): ya gnyis/ tha thA b+ha ya gnyis/ da dA ra ya gnyis/ d+ha d+hA ra ya gnyis/ na nA sha ya gnyis/ pa pA ta ya gnyis/ pha phA tA ya gnyis/ ba bAnd+ha ya gnyis/ b+ha b+he da ya gnyis/ ma mA ra ya gnyis/ ya yo ha ya gnyis/ ra ro ha ya gnyis/ la lo ba ya
90a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ wa wA ha ya gnyis/ sha sho Sha ya gnyis/ Sha ShuSh+Ti ya gnyis/ sa sA d+ha ya gnyis/ ha hA na ya gnyis/ k+Sha k+Sho b+ha ya gnyis/ che ge mo wa sh+yaM krit+ta wa sh+ya ku ru ho(rgyud 'grel): shAn+ti d+hu ru /puSh+Tingku? ru/ /k+Sha maM ku ru/ k+Sho baM ku ru/ ma raM ku ru swA hA/ oM sid+d+hi sid+d+hi na
90a6(rgyud 'grel): hA sid+d+hi pU dza agni ta b+ha na ta mA ShaNi?/ ri Ni b+huM oM ku su ma mA li b+hi hUM dza:aoM badzra ku pa dzi kaM b+hai Tha:Tha:Tha(rgyud 'grel): oM gro ga ma krat+tiM? sarba sha trun nA ma/ rtsa ba'i hye dang sham bu'i hya/ /bsgyur dang 'don dang 'jug pa gces/ /dang po bsnyen te sgrub pa bya/ /las la sbyar
90a7(rgyud 'grel): te ma grub na/ /'khor lo ting 'dzin hya kyis spogs/ /DA ki ma yi rdzas sgrub 'di/ /sbog mi dgos te gdams pa'i mchog /dung dang ra gan zangs dang lcags/ /snod kyi bye brag bstan pa'o/ /lha dang 'od zer 'khor lo las/ /sgom pa'i rim
90b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de yis shes/ /thun mong lha dang khyad par lha/ /mchog tu shis pa'i lha zhes bya/ /brgyad dang nyer lnga'i dus su ni/ /rab tu gnas dang sgrub pa dang/ /spog pa'i dbye ba shes par bya/ /snga dro gung dang nyi ma'i zer/ /de bzhin dus kyang shes par bya/ /chu sa mo yi
90b2(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba yis/ /bgrang phreng gos dang rang mdeg shes/ /mar dang sprang rtsi bu ram dang/ /zho dang 'bru dang rin chen lnga/ /dug yungs khrag sogs dbye ba shes/ /ma rungs zhi dang longs spyod rgyas/ /dmigs bya dbang bsdud tshar gcod pa/ /nang re dus kyi dang po la?/ /
90b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /zla ba gcig dang gnyis dang ni/ /gsum dang bzhin 'grub pa 'gyur/ /gtor ma mchod pa sbyin sreg gis/ /thun mong khyad par mchog gi lha/ /mnyes par byas la dngos grub blang/ /par chad bsrung ba'i cho ga la
90b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'bar pas bsgrub par bya/ /lus ngag yid kyis sba par bya/ /hor pa mi ro rgyal po bzhin/ /shin tu gsang ste spyad na 'grub/ /bla ma dam tshig ldan pa la/ /lung sgrub pas ni 'dod pa 'grub/ /de yis man ngag shes par bya/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye
90b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /rang dang bsgrub bya'i bsod nams brtag /bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid de yis shes/ /grub nas gzhan la lung mi dpog /sgrub pos rab tu gnas pa dang/ /'khor lo'i rab gnas gso bar bya/ /chos dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /chos kyi
90b6(rgyud 'grel): don dang sems can don/ /bstan pa'i don du spyad pa ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ de las gzhan pas mi 'grub ste/ /lus ngag nyon mongs kho nar zad/ /rgyal khams gcig dang grong khyer gcig/ pho mo'i dbye ba shes par bya/ /chos
90b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhas dang ni gnas lnga mkhas/ /sa yi bdag po khyim gcig gi /dbye ba rim pas shes par bya/ /mchog tu 'phags pa'i sgrub thabS 'di/ /rang don bral bas gzhan don du/ bkod pa'i dge bas sems can gyi/ /'dod pa 'grub pas tshim gyur
91a1(rgyud 'grel): cig/ sngags kyi rgyal po dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ka li tsakra sUrya? wa shaM nA ma /bod
91a2(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ gsal byed nyi ma'i 'khor los dbang du bya ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdza' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa pos snod bcud dbang du bya bar 'dod pas /rang nyid khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po ltags? kyu dang zhags pa
91a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ sku mdog li khri'i phung po ltar dmar ba/ yum bde ba rgyas byed ma dang gnyis su med par bltas te/ hya 'di bya khwa ta'i skad mi grag pa'i dus la pad+ma'i phreng ba 'dzin pas bzla bar bya/ oM shAn+tiM ka ri Ni b+h+ruM/ oM ku su ma mA laM b+hi hUM dzA:
91a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ku pi dza kam+b+hai Tha:Tha:Tha:gro ge ma krit+te sarba sha truM nan/ ka kA d+ha ya nas/ mA ra Ni yan sngags rgyal dam tshig gi sngags dang 'dra'o/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ shing shun la dang po'i sngags gsum nang du bri/ gru bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan
91a5(rgyud 'grel): pa phyi rol du bri/ de nas mu khyud bzhi pa'i ye ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi hye rim pas bri/ thams cad g.yon skor du'o/ /mA ra ya btags nas gtor ma dmar po byin na drag por 'gyur ro/ /nga nya gnyis dang bral ba'i na ma gang rung spangs pa'i tsakra
91a6(rgyud 'grel): zangs sam/ kham sa'i ga'u sor drug par sbrang rtsi dang mar du sbyar ba bcug la/ /rkang pas mnan te bzlas na snod bcud kyis bsdus pa la dbang byed par the tshom med do/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'khor los gnad du 'bebs
91a7(rgyud 'grel): par byed do/ /sbyin sreg dang 'khor lo kha sbyor gyi man ngag bzhin du spogs pas de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'i sbyor ba rigs gsum gyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /mar ngo'i tshes bcu la rab tu gnas par bya'o//
91b1(rgyud 'grel): man dag bzhin/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo sngags kyis bsrung bar bya ste/ chu la yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya'o/ /'di ni lhag pa'i lha yis kyang bsgrubs na 'grub ste snga ma bzhin no/ /khyad par du sa sna gsum gyi mdag pa la bde ba rgyas byed ma'i sku
91b2(rgyud 'grel): legs par bya ste/ 'khor lo dang ril bu la man ngag bzhin du bsgrub nas bsgrub bya gang la byin pa dbang du 'gyur ba la the tshom med do/ /gsal byed nyi ma'i 'khor los snod bcud dbang du bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa
91b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta s+tha bi ra'i? zhal snga nas dang/ shAkya'i dge slong ba ri lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// shu b+haM/ //chogs? bdag dkar po'i sgrub thabs man ngag cha lag dang bcas pa bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri ga na pa ti shan ta nas d+ha na
91b4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ bod skad du/ dpal tshogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por gnas dben zhing yid du 'ong bar/ maN+Dal gru bzhi pa ba yi rnam lngas byug go /sman dang dri zhim po'i chus chag chag?
91b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag tsandan dkar po'i dri'i thig le? mi bya stog? dkar po'i tshom bu gcig dgod/ mar me dang dri dang spos dang lha bshos dgram/ /gtor ma chan nam bag bye la sprus pa'i zan dkar gsum mngar gsum/ la phug re re/ la du'i di lu de de bzhug /lugs sku 'am bris sku
91b6(rgyud 'grel): yod na bzhugs su gsol/ /de ltar bsham de nas dang po dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed/ da nas mdun du a las zla ba'i steng du yi ge hUM dkar po gcig bsam/ de las dpal tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog
91b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po glang po che'i mgo can phyag g.yas gnyis na/ la phug dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na thod pa nor bus bkang ba dang/ kha twaM kha snams pa/ rin po che dang lha'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ byi ba sngon po'i khril bzhugs pa gcig gsal
92a1(rgyud 'grel): bar sgom/ de nas bdag nyid kyi thugs kha nas/ 'od zer 'phros pas/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dpal tshogs bdag spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi de la bstims la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan/ /sku khrus gsol/ /mchod pa sngags kyis
92a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ de nas zlas pa bya ba ni/ oM ba ra ta ka swAhA/ oM ba ga ba te e ka daM ShDa? sin? d+ha sid+hi hUM/ oM bruM ga na pa ti ye swAhA/ zhi ba'i yi ge 'bru bdun pa/ 'bum phrag gcig zlas pa byas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gter/ bsams pa yang 'grub/
92a3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod che/ /yo byad kyang 'phel bar 'gyur zhi ro/ /khams gsum gyi nor thams cad rgyas pa 'ong ste phyug por nges 'gyur ro/ /nye ba'i snying po zla ba drug mch+d pa dang zlas pa byas na mi tha mal pa yang stong 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod
92a4(rgyud 'grel): nams mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /ming gi snying po zla ba drug du zlas pa dang mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po dang blon po dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med la b+ha ga ba te sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zlas pa thon nas/ dkar gtor la sngags
92a5(rgyud 'grel): btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ /dam tshig gan pa ti ni chos la gnas par bya dgos so/ /gtor ma ni khams las kha zas ro brgya pa/ nam mkha' khengs par sgom mo/ /de la gsol bar bsam mo/ phyag 'tshal dpal ldan chogs bdag dgyes
92a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal dpal ldan zhi ba che/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan khro bo che/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni bstsol bar mdzod// lha'i rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni/ /bsgrub pa po la bstsol bar mdzod/ /shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid las/ /
92a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag chen po thugs rje che/ /thugs rje chen pos dbul pa bskyob/ /nor lha chen po khyod nyid la/ /bdag nyid dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan tshogs bdag chen po ni/ /sku mdog dkar po glang chen dbu/ /g.yas kyi phyag na la
92b1(rgyud 'grel): phub bsnams/ /g.yon na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams/ /'og ma dgra sta kha traM ka /gsus chen rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan/ /zla ba byi ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan chogs bdag ba'o/ /la phug gtor ma 'di la zhes la/ /tshe dang longs spyod
92b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba dang/ /nad dang 'byung po zhi bar mdzod/ /mi dang lha klu gnod sbyin rnams/ /bdag gi bran du 'gyur bar shog /lha'i longs spyod mang po las/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung bar shog /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang phyug can/ /gdul bya'i dbang gi sku sprul pa//
92b3(rgyud 'grel): lha chen tshogs bdag chen po yis/ /'jig rten 'dir yang bsrung zhing dngos grub stsol/ /phyi ma byang chub thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig /zlas pa thon khar gtor ma sngags kyis btab te dbul bar bya'o de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs/ /dam tshig pa sdus la
92b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam bya'o/ /bsdus pa la dga' ba'i gang zag la bstan pa'o/ /'di rdo bos dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la rten nas mdzad pa'o/ /des 'brom/ des spyan snga ba la gnang ba'o// //nag po pa'i gdams ngag tshogs bdag gi sgrub thabs jo bo rje nas rgyud pa
92b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya ga na pa ti tsin+ta rad na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa la/ zhi ba dang/ khro bo gnyis las
92b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhi? bar sgrub pa'o/ /gnas dben par 'dug te/ maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhir byas la/ ba'i rnam lngas chag chag byas/ dbus su me tog dkar po'i tshim bu dgod/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i bris skuAm/ /lugs sku gang rung cig bzhugs su gsol/ /la phug
92b7(rgyud 'grel): ? la d+ha las byas pa'i gtor ma bzang du bshams la/ gtor gzhong dang/ gtor mas nam mkha' khengs pa/ ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas su byin gyis brlabs la bzhag /de nas rang yi dam gyi lhar bsamS pa'i mdun du/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ yi ge ga dkar po shel gong ltar dkar ba bsams te/ de 'od du zhu ba las lha tshogs kyi bdag po/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i mgo can/ mche ba ya cig chag pa/ phyag?
93a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang po na dgra ste?/ 'og ma na la phug /g.yon dang po na kha TwaM rtse gsum/ 'og ma thod pa rin po ches gang ba bsnams pa/ lhu tshigs thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ /byi la'i khri la bzhugs pa gcig bskyed do/ /de nas
93a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo'i rgyab du mdzub mo btsugs la/ g.yas pa'i gru mo gtsugs nas/ rang gi snying kha nas 'od zer 'phros pas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas/ lha g.yas brgyad? chen po cho gas bdag spyan drangs par
93a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ mdun skyed la stim mo/ /de nas bzlas pa byas te/ oM pa ra ta ka swAhA/ zhes pa mthil du nye ba'i snying po de 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor thams cad 'ongs te phyug por 'gyur ro/ /oM b+ha ga wa te/ e ka
93a5(rgyud 'grel): diSh+Ta bind+ha? hUM phaT/ snying gi snying po'o/ /de bzlas nas zla ba drug mched pa byas na/ mi'i mdza' yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /oM bruM ga na pa ti ye swAhA /zhes pa ming gi snying po'o/ /de zla ba gcig bzlas na/ skyes pa
93a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bud med rgyas pa'i thugs las?/ dang rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig tu chos la gnas par bya'o/ /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i bsgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi
93a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang? d+ha? ka brtul zhugs spyod pa nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shin tu zab par 'dug ste/ spyan snga rnal 'byor gyi zhal nas/ nga la mgon po dang/ nor lha mang po yod de/ 'di las myur ba mi 'dug gsung ngo//
93b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bsreg gam thab khung la rten nas bsgrub pa/ rgya gar skad du/ arya ga na pa ti/ ho ma bi sti? bod skad du 'phaD pa choD kyi bdag po'i? sbyin sreg gi? chog? tshoD kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po maN+Dal gyi stegs bu gru bzhi pa nistong par byas pa rtsib/ /de as sa ser pos sgo nub tu bstan pa cig
93b2(rgyud 'grel): bri'o/ /der 'khor lo bzhag /rdzas ni glang sha/ snum khur/ 'bras yos/ bu ram dang bzhi sbyar ba'i ril bu/ sran ma bcos pa tsam byas la par mthod? du rang gi g.yas su bzhag /mchod pa dang gtor ba'am? thab ga'i?dkyil du blus la rnam lnga? ? dri ? chag chag bya ma g.yon
93b3(rgyud 'grel): du me tog tshom du ? bsham/ de nas kha byang du ltas la/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom/ rang yi dam du bskyed/ thang du tshogs bdag rtsa sngags kyis bskyed la/ rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis/ chogs bdag ye shes pa spyan drangs la yi ge bzhis dgug gzhug bya'o/ /gnas
93b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum byin gyis brlab/ /gtor ma byin brlabs byas la mi btang bar bzhag /mchod pa tshar gcig 'bul/ bstod pa byaM/ de nas me spar la ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad po re re dang/ rtsa sngags spel tshig can re re dang bcas pa tshar bsreg /yang na rtsa sngags
93b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags re brjod la bsreg /ril bu brgyad dngos grub kyi sngags kyis bsreg pa bzhin bya/ /de yang ma 'byor na rtsa sngags kyiS ril bu bdun bsreg /dngos grub kyi rgyal po sngar bzhin te/ 'di la rgyas bsdus med la/ rtsa sngags
93b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyas bsdus de ltar shes par bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang/ me lha mdun gyi nam mkhar gshegs la thal ba phyir gsal pa/ ril bu bdun la rtsa sngags re bzlas la 'khor lo'i lte bar bzhag /de thams cad thal bas bkab la/ g.yam
93b7(rgyud 'grel): pas ma reg par kha bcad la bdag zhal legs par byas te/ me tog ser po'i maN+Dal byas te der? tshom bu dgom?/ mchod stod bya /dang po byin rlabs byas pa'i gtor ma de 'bul /bkra shis ril bu brgyad la dngos grub kyi sngags brgya rtsa bzlas la 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bzhag /
94a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod /de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ me gtong dus su rdza'i 'khor lo bzhug /'khor lo'i yi ge tshogs bdag me ltar bskyed/ oM grum druM ga na pa ti ye swAhA/ chogs bdag bang mdzod kyi phyogs su yon bdag gi tshul du bzhugs su bcug go /tshogs kyi bdag po'i sbyin
94a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg gi cho ga rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ arya ga na pa ti stu ste/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po dam thab la stod pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo
94a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon mdzad snang ba mdzad/ /dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/ /mnyam pa med cing dpe med pa/ /tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal stod/ /gsang sngags dbang phyug rig sngagS rgyal/ /longs spyod 'byung gnas gter gyi mchog /'bus
94a4(rgyud 'grel): bu mngon rtogs ston pa yi/ /tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /stobs chen nyon mongs g.yul 'joms pa'i/ /bgegs 'joms sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa/ /glang chen sna ldan gtso la 'dud/ /rin
94a5(rgyud 'grel): chen rgyal po rin chen skus/ /rin chen rin chen chen po 'byung/ /rin chen bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa/ /glang chen sna ldan khyod la 'dud/ /tshogs kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha dmag dkar po dbugs 'byin zhing/ /lha min nag po'i g.yul
94a6(rgyud 'grel): zlog pa/ /glang chen sna ldan gtso la 'dud/ /sku ni yon tan rin chen ste/ /gsung ni yon tan ngo bo nyid/ /thugs ni yon tan bdag nyid can/ /glang chen sna ldan gtso la 'dud/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i bstod pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi  mdzad pa rdzogs so// //cho gas kyi bdag po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar skad du/ g+ha na pa ti g+hu ha sa d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ shin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
94b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' 'gro don mdzad/ /bsod nams tshogs sogs dgos pa'i phyir/ /tshogs kyi bdag po bsgrub par bya/ /mi skad khyi skad mi thos pa'i/ /gnas ni gangs rim tho ba'i rtser/ /lha chen gnas pa'i sa yin te/ /tshogs kyi bdag po sgrub par bya/ /zangs ma'i maN+Dal gru bzhi
94b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ spyod pa skyed pa la dmar po bri phyi'i rig? dkar? po bya/ buM? pa lta bu'i dkyil tshad med ba 'khor bri/ /de stengs ka ra wi ti bzhag /nang du chu dang 'o ma blug /skyes pa'i sa bon shel mdog gzhug /ga pur dza ti tsan dan? gdab/ de stengs tshogs kyi bdag po'i rten/ byang shar kha ltas sa chu yang na brdal? dmar por bya la/ /
94b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku bzhengs te/ zhal rin po che'i thog tu gzugs bzhag rin chen tha? dad dun? rdzas kun/ bum pa yin gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dmar ?/ g.yas pa snang srid mes po 'dzin/ /g.yon na sogs ? rnams ra nu'i mtshan ma bsnams/ phyag ni 'dag? gnyis thal dang ? sbyar spos gdong
94b4(rgyud 'grel): skar ma rgyal la 'dzin/ /zhabs gnyis skyil spre'u'i krung phyed pas bzhugs khong par spre'u gzhug par bya/ /snying du gzhug par bya/ /gsang sngags bo rtags 'bru bcu snying khar gzhug /sku gzugs legs mo? par tshar ba dang/ /bum pa'i steng du bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod pa gtor ma
94b5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bshams/ /de nas rang gi yi dam bsgom/ stong pa'i ngang las yi ge g+ha/ ? snying du ma gcig/ de gyur spre'u phyag bzhi pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum ? shog la rin po ches dris ba/ dril la gnas nas ni/ /tshogs kyi bdag po spyan drangs bstim/ /rang bzhin dag pa lha'i yul/ /lha chen yab
94b6(rgyud 'grel): yum sprul pa'i sras/ /nor bu bri ma med pa ni/ /gzhon nu stobs mdun du ldan gcig gis sras/ /phyag bzhis ye shes pa gling bzhi khyab par nyul/ /lha dmag dkar po'i kha lo sgyur/ /gang gis khyod kyi mtshan 'dzin pa/ /de la nor gyi char pa 'bebs/ /thugs dam
94b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud bskul spyan 'dren na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas gshegs su gsol/ /oM g+ha na pa ti a karSha ya dza dza/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs bya/ /mchod pas mchod cing gsang sngags bzla/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i thugs kha yi/ /zla bar steng du g+ha yig dmar po
95a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bskor/ /oM g+ha na ma g+ha na swAhA/ oM rad na rad na/ rod na rod na/ g+ha na pa ti/ g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha g+ha pa ti swAhA/ oM tsu ru tsu ru ma nu ma tra/ tu ru tu ru g+ha g+ha ta ma g+ha na pa ti ye swA hA/ rtsa sngags
95a2(rgyud 'grel): gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ zhag gzugs? sngags bdun rtsa smra ba bcad la gzungs sngags bzlas/ /tshogs bdag thugs dkyil yi ge la/ 'od 'phros khams gsum nor bcur bsdus/ /lha chen zhal nas snying khar zhugs/ /gsang ba gzhal 'dud
95a3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni bum pa sprel bzhag bdun 'khyil/ /dngos grub tshul du btung bar bya/ /de nas las la sbyar ba ni/ gang 'dod rten ni phyar zhing g.yab/ /'khor lo las la sbyar bar bya/ /srid pa'i mes po zangs la bya nad bu po'o/ bar? du byas? bdod mtshan ma gzhug ?/ rtsa ba'i sngags
95a4(rgyud 'grel): la byung? nas las sngags bzlas/ ca rtsi'i? rnam par/ spel tshigs sham bu? ? bu bskyur bar bya/ /zhag bdun las la sbyar so so'i byas na/ /? nas srid pa'i ? bzhin du/ rgyal po dang snas brgyan/ /po rtags yul 'khor mthongbar 'phyar zhing g.yab/ /lha dang mi'i bu mo 'dud//
95a5(rgyud 'grel): yang na che ge mo bA shi ku ru swAhA/ ra nu mtshan ma la zhag ming? dang dbang ni bdun las la sbyar byas nas/ /dar ram 'phan shing rtse la 'phyar/ /lha dang mi'i bu mo 'dud/ /nyer gcig tshar nas rmi lam du 'byung ba dang/ yid 'phrog mis ma mthong bar sngags kyang 'di nyid do/ /oM g+ha na ma g+ha na dza ya swAhA
95a6(rgyud 'grel): oM b+ha b+ha seng seng /khaM khaM/ yer yer/ nga rab g+hu mi ha sa maM? khI/ che ge mo ba shiM ku ru ye yang na mthong sa nas g.yab bo// swAhA/ /de nas 'khor lo'i las sbyor ni/ /maN d+hal steng du mda' bzhi gzugs/ /de steng bzhag pa'i 'khor lo bsreg/ rtsa sngags?/ rtsibs drug? 'od zer lcags
95a7(rgyud 'grel): las sbyor sngags kyu ltar spros pa'i/ /bsgrub bya dbang med dgug par bya/ /dud pa gang du song ba'i tha mar sgrub? bya brag pa dang zas bsreg gnas/ /'od kyis bkug cing rang la bzhung/ /zhag rnal 'byor bas grangs bdun gyis 'dod ? 'tshong? 'das la bri/ smad 'tshong ma'i khyim gyi mas?//
95b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub/ de nas mchod dang gtor ma dang/ /bstod pa dang ni bzlas pa dang/ /dngos grub bslang dang gsol ba gdab/ /ye shes gshegs cing dam tshig bsdu/ /sku gzugs sba zhing mchod par bya/ /skar ma rgyal la zla re zhing/ /mchod nas gang 'dod gsol ba
95b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i mngon? du gyur ba'i bar du dkar gsum ma dang gsum la dul phub? gdab/ /brtson 'grus can gyi sgrub pa brtsam/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di sbyar ba las rgyun du mchod cing bsten na ye shes pa gshegs la dben par bzhugs la gang 'dod gsol/ /bsod nams gang/ /des ni 'gro
95b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus pa/ /'dod dgu'i dpal dang ldan 'gyur te/ /bla med byang chub thob pa'i shog /tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon di paM ka ra dz+nyA nas mdzad pa'o// rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ga na pa ti stod traM/
95b4(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po la stod pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dga' ldan lha yul nas/ /lha'i ded dpon tshogs bdag bzhugS pa ni/ /tshogs bsags smon lam stobs
95b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis lha chen sras su 'khrungs/ /thugs rje chen pos byin rlabs gling bzhi'i bdag po mdzad/ /'phags mchog spyan ras gzigs dbang gsprul sku khyed la stong/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi phyag bzhis 'gro don mdzad/ /gzhon nu phyed pa'i dkyil krung
95b6(rgyud 'grel): phyed pas bzhugs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i brgyan spras 'dod dgu char du 'bebs/ /thugs gtum dpa' brtul che bas lha min g.yul ngo bzlog /dregs gtum nga rgyal mchog mda' khyod la stong/ /nyi zla la phug bgrang 'phreng dgra sta phor pa snams/ /
95b7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi na bza' paN tsa li ka sku la gsol/ lha mchog khyed 'dra 'jig rten gzhan na mi bzhugs pas/ /khyad 'phags yon tan mthar phyin rjid pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal stod/ /dug gsum mun pa mi mnga' sku mdog dung lta bu/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan
96a1(rgyud 'grel): spras mthong ba tsam gyis lha mo 'du/ /lha dmag dkyil bzhugs bso sgra chen pos stong gsum ldeg? /gdug pa'i nga ro 'od zer 'phros pas bgegs rnams 'joms/ /rngam pa'i nga? ros rgya mtsho'i klu rnams
96a2(rgyud 'grel): bsreg par byad/ /'gran pa'i zla med stobs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal stong/ /rnam shes rags pa skye phyir spre'u'i sku ru sprul/ /spyan zlog spre'u'i zhal ni cung zad khro bo'i tshul/ /chags pa'i dbang gis byi ru lta bur sku mdog dmar/ /phyag gnyis thal sbyor
96a3(rgyud 'grel): spos ldong dri yis lha rnams bsdud/ /g.yas pa srid pa'i mes pos mo rgyud dbang du bsdud/ /g.yon par nu'i mtshan mas skyes pa las la 'khol/ /thugs las 'od zer bkye bas khams gsum bran du 'khol/ /skyi ser rlung bzhin nam mkha' 
96a4(rgyud 'grel): khyab par rgyu bar byed/ /khyod sku'i 'od zer lcags kyus 'jig rten nor rdzas kun/ /gcig char bsdus te sgrub po bdag la'ang nor gyi char/ /'bebs zhing dgos 'dod rol pa'i dngos kun bdud rtsir zhu/ /rtsa lam nas rgyud gsang ba'i rdo rje
96a5(rgyud 'grel): naS ster pa/ /rgyun rab sprengs pas ka ra wa ti stams pa las/ /'phongs pa sgrol mdzad bdud rtsi'i rgyun la skyabs su mchi/ /tshogs chen tshogs dpal tshogs dbang tshogs kyi bdag po la/ btsun mo ha ris mdun nas phyag dang mchod
96a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul/ /lha mchog khyed kyi sku la bdag giS bstod byed na/ /bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams khyed kyis sgrub du gsol/ /dpal gshin rje gshed kyi dngos grub rnyes pa/ paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra gyis/ dur khrod kaM ka ru spungs su/
96a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag zhal gzigs nas bstod pa'o// //
96b1(rgyud 'grel): [dr:]?
97a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs/ rgya gar skad du/ mahA ga na pa ti d+ha tu tri kar ta shi ku rus d+hA nAM/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
97a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas lha chen dbang phyug dpal/ /tshogs kyi bdag po sgrub par bya/ /nags tshal ri bo dmar po ru/ /nub lta sa dben par maN+Dal ni/ /zla khaM ra ga sta bu la/ /tsan dan gur gum dag gis phyug /me tog dmar po'i chom? bu mgon?
97a3(rgyud 'grel): sku dang bum pa legs par dgram/ /rnam lnga la sogs mchod pa ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pas ci nus bsham/ /la du la phug gtor ma yang/ /me tog dmar pos brgyan pa dgod/ /pad+ma'i sdong po'i phreng ba dag /legs par bzung la bzlas pa bya/ /dbu ?
97a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid mgon maN+Dal ste/ po ni/ /'od dpag med pa'i khro bor bskyed/ /de'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /maN+Dal steng gi tshom bu las/ /lha chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /sku mdog dmar po ri las skyed/ /g.yas pas zhal gcig phyag bzhi
97a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grang phreng dang/ /la phug 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang/ /la du'i phor pa rta mgrin du? g.yas logs su/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa'i 'og tu bsam/ /dgra ? steng gi sbu? sta dmar po g.yon yin par/ /glang chen gdong la ral pa can/ /mu tig la sogs brgyan gyis spras/ /sku
97a6(rgyud 'grel): smad dbang ? dang po g.yon? dang po sngon dar gyis blubs/ /do shal la sogs phreng bas mdzes/ /zla ba pad dkar steng na ni/ /g.yas rkyang ba yi tshul gyis ni/ /bum pa sngon po'i 'og ma khri la bzhugs/ /'od zer dmar 'phros lcags kyu can/ /ye shes dgug sogs tsho
97a7(rgyud 'grel): ga sngar? ni/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin byas nas kyang/ /spro sdu man ngag can gyis ni/ /sgrub bya gang 'dod yid la dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sgom/ /bzlas pas sku gsung thugs rnams bskul/ /oM sku bsdul ba'i snying po h+ri:Na pa ta ye/ mahA rak+Sha sa ma 'bum ?
97b1(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM mahA pad+ma ga:na pa ta ye bruM swA hA/ h+rI:ci ta gu Na sing d+hi ba ra ta ka swA hA/ oM mahA rak+ta gan la ta ye/ a karSha ya dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): swa d+ha ya swA hA/ zhes pa'i gsang sngags ma nor bzlas?/ /thun 'tshams gtor mas mchod par bya/ /stong pas
97b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos gsung bskul ba grub gsol ba gdab/ /dang po thugs? skul ba theg chen bsam pa las/ /nye ba'i snying pos gsum ka thul gsung? cho ga rdzogs nas dngos grub blang/ /'bum grag gcig rtags bzang mthong nas sbyin sreg ni/ /bla ma'i nan ngag bzhin du bya/ /de las dngos ?
97b3(rgyud 'grel): du ma 'byung/ /'di la the tshom yod min te/ /nges pa nyid du 'grub par bshad/ /yang na tshogs bdag chen po de/ /gtsug lag khang chen nang du ni/ /'dod yon du mas bskor ba ni/ /rab tu bsam bya spro bsdu bya/ /de ltar nyid 'dzin 'bad pa na/ /rgyal
97b4(rgyud 'grel): srid longs spyod dpag med ni/ /'khor lo sgyur ltar lha dang mnyam/ /mgon po nyid kyis ster bar ni/ /lung bstan rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ /dpal tshogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi bla ma chen po tsan Ta pas/
97b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal tshogs kyi bdag po'i rtog pa chen po dbang gi le'u la brten nas mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bai ro tsa na'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba ldi ri chos kyi grags bas sgyur ba rdzogs so// //bstod pa bya ba ni/ h+ri/ gsung
97b6(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i mgon po tshogs bdag ni/ /pad+ma ra ga nyi ma gzhon nu'i gdong/ /glang chen zhal la lha'i nor bus brgyan/ /spyan gsum rab mdzes ud pal ze 'bru ltar/ /rab rgyas gzigs pas 'gro ba'i dbul ba skyog mche ba dkar po rin chen mdangs dang
97b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /rin chen phyag rgya g.yas na bgrang phreng dang/ /zhal zas du ma la du'i bzed? zhal 'chang/ /gdug pa kun sgrol dgra sta dmar po 'chang/ /'byung po'i kha zas la phug g.yon na 'dzin/ /lha las spags pa'i rgyan dang cha lugs can/ /ral pa'i
98a1(rgyud 'grel): thor tshugs khro bo sprin ltar 'phro/ h+ri yi sgra 'byin gsung gi da ro yis/ /khams gsum dbang bsdud yid la re ba skong/ /dbang sngon nam bzas sku smad mdzes par brlubs/ /pad dkar zla ba'i 'od kyi gdan la
98a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /longs spyod bum pa sngon po pi dur mdog /rab tu mnan nas 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster/ /lha chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug khyod la stong/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa rab tu skyong la stong/ /mu stegs byed sogs dbang du byed la stong/ /longs
98a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod mi zang nam mkha' i mdzod la stong/ /dam tshig 'dzin la dngos grub ma lus rtsol zhes stong ngo/ /bla ma chen po tsaN+Da pas mdzad do// //rgya gar skad du/ ga:na pa ti kra d+ha ya sa d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag
98a4(rgyud 'grel): po khro bo'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig sdom pa la gnas pas/ /rang bzhin don gnyis sgrub byed pa'i/ /tshogs bdag chen po sgrub par bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi ser po'i steng/ /me tog ser po'i
98a5(rgyud 'grel): tshom bu dgong/ /spos kyi dri chus chag chag gdab/ /gur gum g+hing sa ser gyis/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad legs bris te/ /mahA ga:na'i ru pa ni/ /tsan dan la sogs khyad bar shing/ /rin chen gser la sogs pa'am/ /sa la de dag brdar
98a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /sbre ru gzugs thal sbyar khong stong nang/ /spre'u'i ci ta go ri'i rgyan/ /dang sna lnga dang ldan par bri/ /zhabs su gang 'dod ming spel bya/ /ratna 'bru sna dri sna bzhug /zhabs sdoms rab gnas legs byas la/ /dngos grub ste zhing
98a7(rgyud 'grel): ? thigs?/ /? brgyad 'khor gyi gnod sbyin brgyad/ /ser po phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar/ /rin chen thogs pa gtso la 'dud/ /tshad med bzhi po sgom bya zhing/ /bdag nyid yi dam lhar sgoms nas/ /rang bzhin gnas nas
98b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te/ dza:hUM baM ho:dgug bzhug bstim/ /dgyes gur mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /la phug pa du gtor mdzad?/ /tsan dan dkar po bi bgos par/ /ma ? hu ga dang/ a ga ru dang gu phul gyi/ /khyad par dri yi dri la bus bdag /'dod pa'i ?
98b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya/ /rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyin par gnas/ /zhag bdun sgrub cing rig sngags bzlas/ /oM rang na rang na rong Na rod Na/ ga:Na pa nyi? ga:ga:ga:ga:ga:ga:Na pa ti tsu ru tshu ru/ ma Ni b+ha dra tu ru hu ru gu g+ha ta ya/ ? Na pa te ye swa hA/ mdor?
98b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don rnams 'grub pa'i rtags/ /rin chen char 'bebs lo legs rtags/ /gter rnams rnyed cing dge rnams 'grug/ 'dzam gling nor rnams lag tu 'os de nas grub par gyur pa dang/ /sku de mchod pa'i gral du bzhugs/ /za ma ? du dar? gyi?
98b4(rgyud 'grel): dril/ /mil mi bstan spa bar bya/ /oM ba ra ta ka swAhA/ oM bruM ga:Na pa ti ye swAhA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti oM kar shTi b+haM d+d+ha hUM phaT/ gal te ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga ni/ zhag gcig skyar te/ nges kyang ma grub na/ gzugs mgo bzhug bzlog ste gu gul
98b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dud pas bdug cing mal 'og tu nyung dkar gyis brabs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// / /sbyin bsreg ni/ 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud le'u dgu pa nas/ dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po mchod pa na/
98b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mo'i gnas dang mkha' 'gro 'du/ /dben par tsan dan du ru ka/ si ? ga bur la sogs spos/ /me tog dmar po'i mchod pas mchod/ /sngags bzlas gtor mas 'dod don gsol/ /mkhas pas me la sbyin pa sreg bya/ /gsungs pas/ dkyil
98b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zla gam dmar po bya/ /de'i dbus su pad+ma dmar po ? 'dab brgyad bya/ /de'i rtsar yang zla kham dmar po gcig bya/ /'dab brgyad kyi dbus su shing 'bras bu can rtsigs la sbyin bsreg bya/ /ril bung mar po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /nas nag 'bru gu brgya rtsa brgyad//
99a1(rgyud 'grel): la du dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad rnams sngags gnyis sbrel la dbul/ /oM ga:ga:sid+hi sid+hi/ sarba artha me pra sa d+ha ya hUM hUM dza:dza:swAhA/ dgug pa'o/ /oM A:ga:hUM swAhA// bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma ka
99a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la ya staM// gdan dbul ba'o/ /rang gi yi dam gyi lhas tshogs bdag sngags pas/ tshogs bdag gis lha 'dre thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ ci bsams pa thams cad sgrubs par bsam mo rgyal ba'i bzhed pa sgrub pa dang
99a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal chu ? gnas pa yi/ /skye bo yun du skyab pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bgyi/ /nyi ma'i 'od bzhin gsal ba'i zhal/ /ma rig sgrib pa sangs pa'i sku/ /'jig rten 'dir ni don mdzad pa'i/ /chogs bdag nyid
99a4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum mchod gzungs bzlas pas/ /bgegs sel don kun sgrub byed ces/ /rgyal pa rnams kyis lung bstan gad /tshogs bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha
99a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams khyed la mchod par byed/ /tshogs bdag /byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog 'phreng sogs rin chen dbyig /la du la phug yid 'ong zas/ /can dan ga bur du ru ka/ si hla la sogs spos mchog dang/ /mar me rol mo la
99a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis/ /bgegs rgyal tshogs bdag 'khor bcas mchod/ /bdag la dngos grub rgya chen bstsol ces gsol ba gdab bo/ /dbu rgyan pa'i zhal nas/ 'di lha chen brgyad kyi yab yin pas/ spogs chog byar mi rung gsung/
99a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mi gtsang ba la 'dzem/ /ci za ci mthung gi phud kyis mchod/ /bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnams tshogs bdag gi rtogs pa gsum/ bsgrub thabs bzhi/ bgegs sel ba'i mdo/ de'i las tshogs/ 'di rnams bsgyur ba
99b1(rgyud 'grel): yin no /dngos grub 'byung ba ni lots+tsha la? rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'?/ /gzungs kyi bshad pa ni tswa ba ti sha las byung ngo/ / /rgya gar skad du/ g+ha na ba ti sa ma ma nu sma ra g+ha ha sa d+ha na ma / bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po dam tshig gsang pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal
99b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /thugs rjes gzhan la dus gsum du/ /gzigs par mdzad ba'i lha khyod kyis/ /thugs la sprul pa tshogs bdag gi/ bsgrub pa'i thabs chen
99b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur pa/ /bdag gi ji ltar rnyed par bri/ /'byung po kun gyi rgyal po mchog /bsgrub pa po la nyer brtse ba'i/ /tshogs bdag bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /dang po gnod sbyin bsgrub la dpa' / /bla ma la gus snying rje che/ /brtson ldan dang
99b4(rgyud 'grel): pa cher gyur pas/ /bla ma sngon du mnyes par bya/ /lung dang gdams ngag ldan pa yis/ /yid dga' ba'i gnas dag tu/ /maN+Dal chag chag mchod pa bshams/ /the rang byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs mchod/ ?
99b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas skyabs gsol gtor ma sbyin/ /dge ba bsngo ba byas nas ni/ /khams gsum ma lus sems can la/ //byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /tshad med bzhi yis nyon mongs rnams/ /ma lus par ni zhi bar bya/ /de rjes phyi nang chos
99b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun/ /stong pa nyid du bsam byas ste/ /oM swa b+ha wa bi shud d+ho sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa'i shud d+ho haM/ /sngags kyis dag pa bsam byas ste// de yang ye shes chad pa med/ /snying rje'i dang du bsam byas te// oM sha dz+nya na ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa
99b7(rgyud 'grel): a dam ko haM/ zhes pa'i dag pa bsgom par bya/ /stod pa'i ngang las rnal 'byor pa/ /yi dam gang yin gsal bar blta'/ /de'i mdun du zla ba dang/ /byi ba'i steng du tshogs bdag ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar/ /brkyang bskum
100a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyid ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /lha yin ma gza' bstod g.yog ste/ /rin chen rgyan gyis legs par brgya na/ /phyag g.yas na la phug dang/ /de bzhin dgra sta bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pas rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin/ /spyan
100a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum pa shin tu 'phyang/ /dbu yi steng na zla tshes la/ /'od dpag med pa bzhugs pa'o/ /ye shes bkug la yi ge gsum/ /rang rang gnas su bsam par bya/ /de la mchod cing gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas sku la dmigs pa'am/ /rang gi snying
100a3(rgyud 'grel): nas gsang sngags ni/ /skyes te kha nas tshogs bdag gis/ /zhal du zhugs pa snying khar bstim/ /bstod cing skul la lte ba nas/ /'thon nas bdag ge lte bar zhugs/ /mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed par bsam/ /de ltar bzlas pa'i sngags
100a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /bla ma'i lam las byung ba dang/ /rgyud kyi gdams pa ltar btu'ba/ /oM zhes bya ba dang pos ste/ /yid sbyin nor bu bsam 'phel la/ /me yi yi ge gdan la bzhugs/ /dbyangs yig drug pa 'og tu gdags/ /thig le:na das brgyan
100a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /mtshan gyi dang po blangs bya ste/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa yang sbyar bar bya/ /de nas lnga pa'i dang po bri/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/ /de yi rjes su bstan par bya/ /rlung gi sa bon de nas sbyin/ /dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan par bya/
100a6(rgyud 'grel): dro ba'i mdza' ma gnyis dag la/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pas brten par bya/ /de ni mtshan gyi gsang sngags pa/ /rang 'dod 'bras bu sbyin pa yin/ /oM ni dpal ldan bkra shis te/ /dad po bu la bzhugs par bya/ /yid sbyin bsam grub
100a7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gyis/ /yi ge de rjes bsam par bya/ /nyi ma'i sa bon de nas bri/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/ /de nas blo yis blang par bya/ /gsal byed dang po de nas brjod/ /rin chen sa bon de nas sbyin/ /las kyi yi ge de nas brjod
100b1(rgyud 'grel): ring par ston pa 'dod pa 'grub/ /oM ni dang po tshangs pa ste/ /de nas nor 'dod rin chen bzhag /gsal byed dang po de nas bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po'o/ /dbyangs yig brgyad pas steng brgyan pa/ /de nas gsal byed dang po yin/ /sde mchod?
100b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i bzhi pa la/ /dang po lnga pa sbyar bar bya/ /sde mtshan lnga pa'i dang po ni/ /gsum pa'i dang pos ston par bya/ /'dod pa skong pa'i yi ge la/ /dbyangs yig yi ge gsum pas mnan/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pas bsten bya'o/ /de rjes bzhi pa'i gsum pas?
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ 'khros pa'i sa bon chen po bzhin/ /drag po las dang sbyar bas na/ /rang 'dod lha dang phrad par 'gyur/ /de ltar dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /lha chen zhal ston bar dag tu/ /sngags la shin tu 'bad par bya/ /'di ni dam pa'i sngags so/ /gal
100b4(rgyud 'grel): te las la sbyor 'dod na/ /chad dang la phug la du dang/ /'o mas 'phags pa mchod par bya/ /bstod cing las kun gang bsgoms 'grub/ /'di ni lha chen mnyes pa yin/ /yang na zangs sam 'khar ba la/ /gzugs byas maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng/ /
100b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te mchod pas mnyes byas nas/ /des kyang bdag la dngos grub ster/ yang na gtsang ma'i ngas dag la/ /mkhas pas bris te rgyal bab la/ /mchod cing bstod na gang bsgoms gru/ /yang na me tog dmar po la/ /bsngags bzlas steng na
100b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor byas na/ /bdag gi re ba thams cad skod/ /yang na dngul lam shel dag la/ /phogs pa byas te mchod bstong na/ /spyi bor bzhugs la mi sngags bzla/ /khrod khyer dbus su 'ongs pa na/ /mi rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yang na glang chen
100b7(rgyud 'grel): chang dang ni/ /khrag dang myos byed thig le yis/ /mnyam pa'i ras la bri byas na/ /phyag 'tshal mchod bstod gsol ba gdab/ /nye ba'i sngags bzlas bskul byas na/ /'phags pa nyid dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /rten de kun la bstan mi bya/ /la phub
101a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab pa dbul/ /tsan dan chu'i sku khrus gsol/ /de ni 'thung bsam byugs pa yin/ /nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /zangs kyi tshogs bdag 'the 'ong tshad/ /byas ste lag g.yon ste bzhugs ste
101a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i bud me'i zho 'dzin nas/ /glang po'i sna yis phug byas te/ /bdag la nye bar brtse bar bsam/ /mtshan gyi rig pa bzlas byas nas/ /de nyid nges par 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu nyid du 'dod/ /gzhon nu mas bskul srad bu la//
101a3(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas/ /sngags re lha re bsam byas pas/ /dpung pa g.yas la bcings pa na/ /de nyid myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /g+hi hang ka ra bu ram dang/ /sbrang rtsi rang gi thig le las/ /tshogs bdag bris ste de la dmigs/ /yi ge brgya ba bzlas
101a4(rgyud 'grel): byas ste/ /de nas 'dod pa'i don dmigs nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas 'grub/ /de nas sku gzugs dar gyis dril/ /rang gi mchan khung g.yon par spa/ /des ni 'dod pa kun 'grub 'gyur/ /'o ma dang ni glang gi sha/ bu ram bca' yos bcas pas ni/ /ri
101a5(rgyud 'grel): lu byas ste tshogs bdag gi/ 'khor lo'i steng du tsan dan shing/ /bcer ste me la sreg bas ni/ /ming dang spel bas don kun 'grub/ /zhag bdun bar du byas pas ni/ /dbul po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /glang gi sog pa sha med la/ /gzugS
101a6(rgyud 'grel): bris de mdza' sngags kyis bskor/ /nam mkhar bstan pas ser ba 'chad/ /mnyam pa'i ras la tshogs bdag gi/ gzugs bris de mdza' sngags kyis bskor/ /shing rings rtse la phyar byas pas/ /pha rol dmag rnams bzlog pa yin/ /de sogs
101a7(rgyud 'grel): las rims ma lus kun/ /bla ma mnyes shing lha mnyes pas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di ni mchog du bsgrub/ /bdag gi tshogs kyi bdag po yi/ /bsgrub thabs rgyas pa gad brtsams las/ /'dod don 'bras bu legs 'grub ste/ /byang chub mchog la sems
101b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhol shog/ //dpal tshogs kyi bdag po dam tshig mchog du gsang ba zhes bya ba'i bsgrub thabs/ /grub pa thob pa'i bla ma tsa na kir tis mdzad pa'o/ /dpal tshogs kyi bdag po mnyes par bya ba rdzogs so// //
101b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi rnal 'byor pa chen po b+he ro tsa na dang/ lots+tsha ba d+ha ri ban d+he chos kyi grags pas/ /nyang smad rma lung gi gnas su bsgyur ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi rgyal po g+hu na so sgra pa des pan tri ta nag po dpal 'dzin/ des rnal 'byor ba ka na tsa na ra/ de bla ma
101b3(rgyud 'grel): tsan? kir ti/ des bla ma ta thA ga ta ra kri ta/ des bla ma dzin ka sh+rI la/ des bla ma d+ho ro tsa na'o/ /dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhus lan gyi rgyud dang/ /bla mnan ci ni ra'i gdams pa gsum la brten nas brtsams pa'o/ /bsgrub thabs
101b4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba yin/ /gzhan 'di bas chung ba mang po bzhugs so/ /zab mo yin zer/ 'di la yi ge logs pa ni ci yang mi bdog go /lung gcig yod na nyams su blangs pas chog pa yin bla mas gsungs so// //rim pa drug pa bzhugs? so/ /
101b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kra ma Sha Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro rnams rtag pa'i dngos grub rtogs gnas te/ /de la rtog cing dge dang mi dge 'dzin/ /dug dgra gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni/ /gru chad bzhin
101b6(rgyud 'grel): du dga' dang mi dga' skye/ /rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs/ /de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud/ /bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtogs de dran/ /de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes nges 'byung ba dang/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis nges par 'byung pa yin/ /
101b7(rgyud 'grel): dang po gnod sbyin gyi sgrub pa la rten nas gnyis yin gnyis pa bzhi ru snang/ /dang po bzlas pa grub pa dang/ /grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni/ /gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni/ /glegs gsung grub par rtogs rmi lam du bam du ma 'cher mthong lag gis
102a1(rgyud 'grel): len/ rnga dang dud dang cha lang dril bu dang/ /mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba/ /maNdal dkyil 'khor las byed chos 'chad nyan/ /glegs bam klog cing kyus lta 'dri ba smra/ /ras bris la ni bde
102a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs gzugs brnyan ni/ /du ma mthong zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong rang gis pa/ /rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdung stsogs? byed/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong/ /me tog sna tshogs gsal yi ge bar klu grub pa'i rtags su lha khang 'der ?
102a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong pa dang/ /nyi zla'i 'od babs gza' skar 'od mthong dang/ /mer tog du langs thubs grub pa'i rtags/ nam mkhar yang ni 'khrigs/ /gril su ral gri rdzing las chu 'dren khron pa las ni 'dren/ yon tan grub pa'i rtags /'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang/ /lce spyang
102a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs thul pa gos bzang g.yon/ /rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha snol 'dzin/ /de rnams byung gyur gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor pas sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste/ rim pa dang po'i/ /mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos srid
102a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum mthong/ /thos dang sde phyi'i phrin las grub pa'i rtags zhi? rgyas dbang drag bzhi rkyen dran rdzas kun 'dud/ /ras bris bzhad cing ro stsogs 'od 'byung dri/ /mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon snang/ /tshogs na chos 'chang mdun na glegs bam dpyad/ /nam
102a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra/ /'brug sgra klog 'gyu thog chen 'bebs pa dang/ /nam mkha' stong zhing sprin sngon rdzas pa mthong ba nas klog 'byung ba dang/ nam mkha' dang/ /sa? dang de bzhin 'thing mang po la nag sprin sngo nges 'gyur dang/ /nyi len pa dang zla'i
102a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'od lnga nas gzhi brdal/ /ras bris lugs ma la sogs rang giS gzhan du bde ? grub pa'i rtags gshegs gzugs/ /byed ba dang mchod cing skor ba byed dam rten la bskor/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod ? nar 'dug pa dang/ dam ? byed dam bzhan la
102b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba/ mdzes pa'i snod du me tog sna tshogs thu/ /rin chen sna tshogs me tog bai DUr snyed/ /shin tu skam pa'i sa la chu rdol pa/ /bdag nyid me dpung nang 'dug srog chags 'tshigs/ /ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dags gzugs la brtson/ /dben zhing nyams dga' i gaD?
102b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi nang du mthong/ /rtse gcig ston grub pa'i rtaD pa'i bsaM pa dang gtan byed/ /seng ge'i khri la gnas pa ? rmis/ /lha khang gnas gzhi rtsid dang tshuD? grub pa'i rtags gi mtshungs pa dang dang/ /chu po che dang bdag mi gsal na yid dga' zer rgya mtsho'i steng nas 'gro/ bar snang 'phur zhing sdig pa'i ltos
102b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro len/ /'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ pa dang 'phrin las grub pa'i ?/ rnal 'byor pas gsang sngags grub rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// //gnyis pa'i bzhi pa dang po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan pa dang 'byung rnal 'byor nyid
102b4(rgyud 'grel): sprul la'o/ /ri gzar dag la mi thar mthar zad lhung/ /ri brag 'dzul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang/ /phyugs lhas 'dam rdzas bshad gci ngan dang ni/ /kha dog dmar dang skya las bzhi yod pa las ba'i chu dag bzhi pa'i dang po la/ /rtsub dang gnag dang dmar po'i gos rang
102b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shin tu h+rul po tsa ti'i lpags pa g.yon/ /shing rtsi'i ri las lhung dog rten med 'dug/ gcer bur 'dug cing lcag cing chu nang 'gro/ gzung 'dzin yod pa'i rten sa de ru ni/ /brgal ba dang ro ba'i gos nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu
102b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rmis/ /glang nag glang dmar ba ? lug dug po gan nang pa dmar zhon/ /rtsub pa'i gos gyon g+ha d+ha la zhon pa/ /ma he ba glang khyus 'gro sogs lta sa bsam yas lta bu'i 'dre 'jog rmi pa/ /gnag dang ba glang khyus 'gro stsos mthong
102b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rta dang g+ha d+ha gong? bu dmig zlum khyus 'gro rtsos/ /zer? ra tsha? ta lug khyus 'gro rtsos re ba'i mthong bong bu ba/ /seng ge sbyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi/ /bse dang byi ba chags rmi 'gyur ba'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyi gnod pa 'byung ba rnal
103a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba la mtshan ma 'ong ba'i rim pa ste/ gsum pa'o// //gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni/ /bya dang byi ba sbrul
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug gnas pa'i mtsho/ /chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang/ /sdig pa sdom dang rtsar pa rkangs mangs dang/ /sbrang bu mchu la phun? po dang lnga dang po ? nas rings srog chags klu mi nub pa'i rtags phra mo rnams/ /de rnams chu tshul rmi 'gyur 
103a3(rgyud 'grel): bran rnams sbyor ba gnod/ /sgrul dang sbal pa sdom dang sdig pa dang/ /bya sogs lus 'byar mchu rje bas bshog sprul dang/ /de ta la sogs rdzi med mgo rgod rmi/ /mi thug rtags te bud med snyo ba dang/ /mi thub kun la rtogs ?
103a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog rgod ma/ /rgyan bzang mdzes? pa'i snod du zas sogs bkang ba/ rtag tu rgan mar 'ong 'gyur mi thub rtags/ /ltos 'gros lus ra lug dkris ldan zhing mi phral dang/ /sdig dang rtsad sogs 'byar zhing mchu 'dzugs pa/ /sbrang bu mcho?
103a5(rgyud 'grel): rings srog chags phra mo rnams/ /khrag 'jib lus nang zhugs nas 'gyur ni thub rtags/ /chu srin nya sogs chu chen 'phyo zhing 'khyug /gnag dang dmar sogs chu yis khyer ba rmi/ /de yang mi thub rtags de brtson pas bzlog /
103a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med/ /sbyor ba gzhan nas 'byung ba'i gnod pa la rnal 'byor pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// dang gis //brtson 'grus drag po gnyis pa'i bzhi pa
103a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal gnod sbyin ? pa'i 'byor pa yis thub cing non pa'i rtags/ /ma he gnag sogs rjud? cing ring pa dang/ /dud 'gro rnams ni btags sam gtod gyur pa/ /dung 'gro dgras khyer la gsum yod pa las
103b1(rgyud 'grel): dam rkun mos khyer/ /dud 'gro 'tshod dang 'bras kyi phug ma 'chag /dud 'gro 'khol dang rdzi yi skyong ba dang/ /dud 'gro yor dang dag pa thebs grub pa'i rtags/ /dud 'gro bsang dam bcos nas za ba dang/ /rang gzhan mi 'byung dud 'gro tshig 'gyur ba/ /de ni nges bar
103b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags/ /bud med dpung? cing ngo dma' shi ba dang/ /du zhing rgyan bzang brtags nas phyag byed dang/ /gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan/ /? sbrul la sogs pa srog dang la chags na du ma rnams /bsad dam ?
103b3(rgyud 'grel): sam shi 'am de 'gyur dang/ /skem dang 'tshig 'gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no/ /bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas rang gi mtsho skems/ /bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i klu thub ? non pa'i rtags rtags/ /sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsal gyis non pa'i
103b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsal gyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o// //gnyis pa'i bzhi pa chu bzhi chu pa'i mtshon nyid ni/ /pa'i sbyor gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni/ /rang nyid mi g.yo gnas na gnas ni/ /sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs ni ston cing phyogs 'khor
103b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ? pho nya 'gyed cing 'dug /rigs mdza' dgra bag bu la bzhi yod pa las chud rab byung gzugs/ /'od bdud grub pa'i rtag pa 'gyur rang nyid phyag rdor sgur? byas nas nam mkha' i dkyil na bdud dgar rab dbang phyug dang nam mkha' la gnas nas sdod pa yin pas de grub pa'i rtags su nang dkar po zer/ thad la skyes pa'i
103b6(rgyud 'grel): nya yin/ /de ni bzlog pa ? ting nge 'dzin gsuM/ bya thub ba'i rtags ba'i rgyal po thabs ni gsungs/ /blon po yul gyi rgan ? 'od 'gyur dang/ /bros pa bskyed pa gzhon nu bu mo'i gzugs/ /sngags pa'i gzugs su 'od 'gyur brag skyes yin/ /de bcos bya ba'i thabs
103b7(rgyud 'grel): ni bstan pa yin/ /dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yin/ /ba glang 'chi? zhing phyugs nad 'dug pa dang/ /ngal pa bzang po bud med ? nag rmi ba dag g.ya' ri gangs ri las gnang pa'i ma mo yin skye pho nya yin/ /de phyir bcos pa'i sngags phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin
104a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung sdud kyis/ thabs ni du ma gsungs/ /bud med gzhon zhing rgyan bzang rab byung la/ /ma dang srung mo sring mo ne ne mo'i gzugs/ /nye du nye 'brel khrom chen bud med dang/ /bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa yin/ /de ni gnan pa'i thabs ni
104a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ /de rnams zhi 'gyur 'ga' zhig dbang du 'dul/ /dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad las thar/ /khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyi pho nya yin pas bzlog /rang gi ngo bo sogs rmi ba ni gtso bo'i ? mtsho sman gzugs can te/ /?
104a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i gzugs rgyan ldan pa de nyid do/ /nam mkha' yi ni mthongs na gnas byas shing/ /sprul pa'i gzug sni brjod kyis mi lang ste/ /de yang dpag tu med pa'i rbad ba mdza' mi bdud mi thub pa'i rtags ni rtogs/ /de phyir bde gsheD 'dud dga' rab dbang ? tu smin/
104a4(rgyud 'grel): sprul? mthu dang mtshungs zhal gsum phyag drug tu'o// pa yin/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyi bka' yi pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa ste drug pa'o// 'di mdo tsam bstan pa'o// //? bla ma'i bka' dang lhag lhas gnang ba byin/ /'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig
104a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /de yis dge ba ci bsags pa/ /rtog pas nges de rnams thams cad shing des rtoD shog/ rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa/ nam gru'i rigs las ? byung ba/ ? dngos grub bsnyes pa sems can don la sogs shig pa'o// dza ba ris
104a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad sbyar ba pa rdzogs so// //bal po dE ba purna ma ti dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //dge'o// gnod sbyin ? sgrub thabs zab mo yang dag bzhugs/ rgya gar skad du/ a pa ra tsit+ta
104a7(rgyud 'grel): rang na pha las ta na ma/ bod skad du/ a pa ra tsi ta rin chen b+ha? gdab? ? gros bzang po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dben zhing yid du 'ong bar ma 'dal dang mchod pa bshams la/ sems skyed
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsam bar bya ste/ dkon mchog la mchod pa dang/ bla ma la zhabs rtog bya ba dang/ dbul 'phongs rnams la sbyin pa btang ba dang/ /rang sgrub pa byed pa'i yo byad kyi ched du gnod sbyin gter gyi bdag po sgrub
104b2(rgyud 'grel): snyam du sems skyed do/ /de nas yan lag bdun pa dang/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de la yan lag //gnod sbyin 'dir sgrub thabs la don gsum ste/ dang po rang la khu mdog mi yod pa'i phyir rang chas su bzhug pa dang/ sgrub
104b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ba dang/ las la sbyar zhing ma grub na spogs chog bya'o/ /gnas dben zhing yid du 'ong bar phyag na rdo rje'i sten thangs sku 'am/ lugs ma bzhugs pa'o/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ gtor mas bar chod sel gcig byas la rtag gtor
104b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// //de nas rang badzra pa ni skyed la ye shes sems pa spyan drangs la stim/ 'dun pa byas la gsol ba gdab de'i thugs khar a las zla ba'i steng hUM gi mdza' ma sngags kyis skor bar dmigs la/ a'oM tsan d+ha ma ha ro sha Na/
104b5(rgyud 'grel): chos skyong la hUM phaT ces zlas ba zhag lnga bya ba ni snyen pa'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bya ba ni/ tshes gcig la gnas der ma 'dal pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa gcig bri/ 'dab ma bzhi ser/ mtshams bzhi mdzes tshon/ /de'i dbus su kha dog dkar por skyed na nag
104b6(rgyud 'grel): por bri/ /kha dog nag por skyed na ser por dri/ lte ba la h+ri bri/ sgo gcig shar du lta bar bya/ /gtor ma gnyis byas la/ gcig rtar bzung/ cig 'phral btang ngo/ nor gang 'dod pa'i tshig zangs kyi byang bu la bri/ de yang 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod du
104b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ces bsam phun sum tshogs pa'i/ /dngos grub chen po bdag la stsol zhes bya'o/ /bla rdo rje bzung/ rtag gtor la 'bru sna dang/ rin po che/ de dar dmar ser kha ? skad dang dbang ? der gzhug/ med na 'tshal rin po che bri/ dang/ /shing thog dang dar zab
105a1(rgyud 'grel): /gzugs so/ mchod pa bsham/ rang phyag rdor snying po brgya tsam zlas pa ni snyen pa'o/ /dang 'dra'o de nas skad cig gis ma dal khar gnod sbyin sku mdog dkar po/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na
105a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu/ g.yon na rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa/ rin po che bum ba'i steng na zhabs g.yas pa skum pas bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dar sngon po'i sham thabs can/ spyan che ba lug la khad pa cig du bsams
105a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /de nas spyan drang ba ni/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang thugs kha'i hUM gi 'od zer dang/ /snying po'i zhabs la dza hUM baM ho rtags la ri rab kyi byang shar mtshams nas spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par stim/ de nas snying po'i zhabs su/ /pus
105a4(rgyud 'grel): ba pu tsa hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtags la mchod pa 'bul/ snying po'i zhabs la b+ha ling kha kha khA hi khA hi rtags pa 'am/ A kha ro rtags la gtor ma 'bul/ /de nas stod pa bya/ kho la dmigs pa gsal
105a5(rgyud 'grel): bas 'od gzer par 'phros bas mchod par bsam/ tshur 'dus pas nor ster bar bsams la zlas pa bya/ zlas pa rdzogs nas bu tsa bya/ /gtor ma 'bul stod pa bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba btab pa ni/ mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la/
105a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod dang/ /ci bsams lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub thams cad bdag la stsol/ /nga yi bka' las ma 'da' cig /nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/ /phyag na rdo rjes mgo'o khos/ mi yis sems brgul gcig
105a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas snying po'i zhabs su mu zhes bshags pa 'am/ yang na lus dang grib ma bzhin bya ba man ngag yin no/ /de ltar thun drug du zhag gcig bzhin sgrubs pas/ nya'i nub mo gnod sbyin byon te/ ? rang ltan mthon po'i phyag rgya mi gshig/
105b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis dngos su byon nas mchod pa bya/ /gtor ma 'bul gu gul sreg/ nya'i nub mo thud kyal dang sha khog la sogs pa tser la khol 'bul/ /gtor ma 'bul dus thams cad du h+ri las kho nag po 'am dkar por skyed la
105b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bul lo/ /rang der sgom pa'i lag len/ phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams sbos la sogs pa la gru me rgyun du gnyis sbyar te/ bsgreng ba la rang gi tshal ma rlan/ de bzung la tha tshigs bya ba ni dam sre ba'i/ dngos grub kyi tshig bris pa'i byang bu zung la/ sngar gyi tshig
105b3(rgyud 'grel): gis gsol ba btab pa'o/ /dngos grub gang 'dod blang ngo/ /rtags rab 'bring mdza' ma gsum gang byung yang/ mchod stong la sogs de ltar bya'o/ /de ni 'grub pa'o// //de nas las sbyar ni 'di'o/ /skya rengs shar
105b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtho rings kha lcags kyus rdzas ci 'dod dgug bar bsam nor dreng ba'i snying bo rblas so/ /sngar ltad gsol ? skad zer mdag gi mi smra'o/ ba btab go/ nam langs pa dang gtor ma thams cad btang ngo/ /ma lus gshags pa 'am lus dang grib ma bzhin du
105b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de ltar byas na kha zla ba phyed kyis 'grub bo/ /de ma 'grub na sbogs pa zla ba phyed bya'o/ /des kyang ma 'grub na yang zla ba phyed bya/ de mi 'grub mi srid do/ /des kyang ma 'grub na kho bdag mchi'o/ /gtor ma dkar gtor bya/ 'bras chan rnam pa
105b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis/ /dkar gtong bkar la gzhag /nya'i nub mo kha 'od bas/ shin tu 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya mi bshig gu gul sreg/ kho'i gzugs la nges pa med/ /res dga' byis ba khye'u'i gzugs/ /mig ni bag tsam ltung
105b7(rgyud 'grel): la khang/ /byon pa'i dus su dngos grub blang/ /shes tu 'jam shing bkra shis gsol ba gcig thub na sing rta? bya'o/ 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod dang/ /ci bsam phun sum tshogs pa dngos ji ltar byung yang dngos grub blang grub chen po bdag la stsol/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i miyis sems dgul
106a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig bya/ /'di mis snying sgul ba'i sngags/ /rtsa sngags nyid kyang 'di nyid yin/ /yid 'phrogs sngags kyang 'di nyid yin/ /a'oM h+ri dza a pa ra tsid ta ja dza/ srog rtsa breng breng thul thul/ thams cad 'dus par
106a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du bsdus/ /de bas bsod nams skyed ba yin/ /gang na 'dug pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dgra yi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo/ /khros paS mi rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di sgrubs yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /lha mo klu mo
106a3(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas skyel/ /lha min shing thog bdag la ster/ /rin chen ster rnams bdag la rang la ster/ /bdag la shin tu chags par 'gyur/ /de bas de mthong ngo mtshar che/ /bsgrub dus gsum la rab zla ba phyed/ 'bring
106a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ mdza' ma gsum/ sgrub dus gsum la rab kyi dngos 'bring stug chom/ mdza' ma sa 'og gi rmi lam du 'ong/ /dngos grub gsum ni /rab lung ston/ 'bring lha yul du lha mos khrid de/ mdza' ma 'khor dang nor 'du /de ltar
106a5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i rdzas de cha bzhir byas te/ cha gcig bla ma/ cha gcig dkon mchog/ cha gcig 'gro ba rnams la sbyin/ /cha gcig rang bshad do/ /de ni nor 'phel ba'i gdam dag yin no/ /bsgrub dus su dam tshig rtsa ba bzhi srung/
106a6(rgyud 'grel): sha chad sgog rtsod srung/ smra ba cad mtshams sdam/ zas dkar gsum mdar gsum la bya'o/ /'di bla rdo bcad ba ni gnyis te/ /bse byang la/ gser ram dngul gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris la/ rtsibs sngags bri/ dbus su rtsa ka
106a7(rgyud 'grel): la bris la dar du dril la bzung ngo/ /kho bo'i sku de sgrub dus na dril rba ldom du bcug la bsgrub khang du bzhug /byes su 'gro na gar 'gro khyer la 'gro/ yang rdo pha bar long bu la ri bong gi khrag gis bris te/ dar snying po du dril te rtag tu bcad ngo// //
106b1(rgyud 'grel): las grub pa 'am rtags ma byung na/ pha wang long bu de ri bong gi snying du bzhug /de ri bong gi thod par bzhug /de gnyis pra ba g.yag po rlung bur bzhugs/ /bris sku dang bla rdo rnams nyungs dkar gyi dud ba la bdug cing rang phyag na rdo rje'i bsdog pas gnan pas
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ye ge bcu pa la kho bo'i snying por log par rtags la gzer ro/ /de nas sgrub pa kyar na 'grub des so/ /nya nam byung gi skya rengs shar ba la kar btang zhing nor drad ba'i snying po zlas/ don gnyer ram nor dgos pa'i tshe/ dus nam yang 'dris te gtor ma
106b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin la ni ro drang ba'i snying po zlas la gsol ba gdab/ zas nam za ba'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la phul ba'i rjes la/ lha bshos kyi gzugs re byas la/ ne be te hUM zhes brjod la kho la 'bul lo// //hUM ri rab ri yi rtse mo nas/
106b4(rgyud 'grel): byang shar mtshams kyi rtse mo nas/ /phyag na rdo rjer rdzun 'phrul stobs/ /gter bdag chen po 'dir gshegs dang/ /nor bdag chen po 'dir gshegs dang/ /las rnams sgrub byed 'dir gshegs dang/ /mthun pa'i rdzas la 'dir gshegs dang/ /byon nas
106b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid bzhugs su gsol/ /dam tshig gnyan po srung ba dang/ /sgrub pa po la rtse ba'i phyir/ /'gro ba'i don la bzhugs su gsol/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po rin chen sbyin/ /dgyes pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs dang/ /dar sogs spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang/
106b6(rgyud 'grel): skyems sogs sna tshogs bzhes su gsol/ /zhes spyan drang ba'o// //h+ri las mkhan chen khyod nyid la/ /mos pa'i tshul gyis bdag stong do/ /lha rnams kun gyi kha lo sgyur/ /lha yi rgyal po khyod la stong/ /lha min mi rnams dbang
106b7(rgyud 'grel): du bsdus/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po khyod la bstod/ /gang na 'dug pa'i la phyogs su/ /rin chen char 'bebs khyod la stod/ /dgra'i bar chad sel bar byed/ /mthu stobs bdag po khyod la stod/ /khyod la mchod cing bdag bstod na/ /dngos grub
107a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag la stsol/ /stong pa'o/ /stod pa'o/ /a'oM h+ri dza A pa ra tsi da ta dza dza rtsa sngags so/ /a'oM b+hu da ta sh+ri A ba ra tsid ta dza dza/ /sarba ma ne tri sam rba tri swAhA/ /nor drang ba'i sngags so/ /dza dza ta tsi ts tsi ra ma?
107a2(rgyud 'grel): a dza h+ri a'oM/ gnad la 'bebs sngags so/ /a'oM sh+ri ri hUM/ sring mo'i sngags so/ /yang rigs gcig la rdo rje pha wang lor spu la srog sngags bris la gra ba'i blud bur bcug ste/ kha cings la rgun steng nang du bzhug /las ma stub na/ bcom ldan 'das
107a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje a pa ra tsi tas de'i las ma stub po/ /byas la langs la btab po/ /de nas kho phyur la zangs ma'i byang bu la/ /'dod don gsol pa'i tshig bris la kho la stan no/ /des ni bar du mi chod pa yin gsung ngo/ /rtags ni chod pa mang po dang
107a4(rgyud 'grel): nor dang longs spyod mang po ster ba dang/ rang dbang ba las rmi lam du 'byung ngo/ /de ltar byung na grub pa yin pas/ gtor ma kho la sngos la star bzung ngo/ /spogS chog mi dgos so/ /ma grub na sbogs chog bya ba ni bzhi ste/ gnan pa dang/
107a5(rgyud 'grel): gzir ba dang/ sbyin sreg dang bzung ba'o/ /de la gnan pa ni/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa byas la dkyil du kho bo'i gzugs bri/ mdza' ma la sngags bri/ phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo gcig gis steng nas bkab po/ /de gnyis kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang
107a6(rgyud 'grel): du gdug la gu gul gyi dud bas bdug/ rdo rje pha wang long bu dang/ dar zab dang rin po che brdar la der bzhug /rdo rje rgya ram bris la rang gi mal 'og du gnan pa bya/ de nas badzra pa ni zlas pa byas pas khom bzod de 'ong/ /de nas yang ston/
107a7(rgyud 'grel): la sngos khung du bzhag la snyen ba zla ba phyed bya'o/ /des kyang ma grub na gzir ba ni/ /ling ga de gtor ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gu gul dkar po'i dud pa dang mi gtsang ma'i sha chen sregs la/ lag du rdo rje thogs/ rang phyag rdor gyi sngags bsham
107b1(rgyud 'grel): la kho rang gi sngags rtags la gzir ro/ /des kho nyan na gtor ma kho la sdos te sbyin la/ gnod sbyin a par tsir ta mi'i snying skul cig/ nga'i grogs kyis bya'o/ /sbyin sreg la shing gang ? rung ba'i me blang dar stang la 'og ma'i 'khor lo de me lce la
107b2(rgyud 'grel): sreg zhing/ nyungs dkar la sngags la dang po thabs su sreg go /de nas kho la sbyin la longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas par gyur cig byas la /star bzung pa de kho la sngos byin mi stang ngo/ /yi dam lha'i zlas pa dang 'don 'dod kyi bzlas zhabs la kho'i zlas
107b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sum brgya tsam re ma rjod bar bya'o/ /des ltar byas na kho de bzhin du byed pa la lan gsung ngo/ /gu gul gyi spos sreg la nya la'o/ /nub rangs pa la zlas pa bya/ mtho rangs sgrub pa bya/ bdag gis ji ltar bya zer nas 'od ste/ de'i dus su bdag
107b4(rgyud 'grel): gi khol po gyis byas la/ mi byed na rdo rje'i dmyal bar song byas la gal bzung/ dang po maN+Dal mdzes pa'i thog du rgya phor gyi nang du chang phud mnyams pa dang/ gtor ma rgyan dang bcas pa dang/ sman dang a mri ta dang/ spyan gzigs sna tshogs
107b5(rgyud 'grel): dar dmar ser mdzes pa'i sman dang/ rgyan la sogs pa srog gi snying pa nas sgreng zhing stong btsal bya'o/ /rtags ni srang ba'i tshogs dang/ zhung can gyi tshogs dang/ btsun pa dang ban de nag po dang/ 'od rnams 'byung ngo/ /sman gyi dri bzang po

107b7(rgyud 'grel): du/ rang na bde ba g+hu hya sa d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ nor lha gsang ba'i sgrub thabs/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog dgos pa gsum dang bla ma mchod pa'i phyir/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa thob

108b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rtsi mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ bu ram dang/ 'bru sna tshoD rnaMs blugs so/ /de'i nang du lha rnams bskyed par bya'o/ /de la spyan drang ba dang/ gzhugs su gsol pa dang/ mchod pa rnams sngar ltar bya ste/ 'phro ? bya zhing rig sngags bar ma chad par

109b6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun lha dra'i? bstod pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba su pa ti u pa d+hya pany+tsa stot+tra ba su me g+ha a be sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ nor bdag gtso 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag
109b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /e ma/ 'jig rten dbang phyug nor bdag sku sprul 'phags pa ni/ /gti mug rnam dag chos dbyings ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dbu skra gyen rdzes nor bus brgyan/ /sha rgyas bsus 'chad sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): klubs/ /phyag g.yas be con 'dzin pas 'jig rten dbang du sdud/ /g.yon pa ne'u le 'dzin pas longs spyod char bzhin 'babs/ /sku mdog dkar la dmar pa'i mdangs chags /'phrug pa chims/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rin rgyan gyis mdzes la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /g.yon gyi gru mor rdo rje kha TwAM bsnams pa ni/ /nyid kyi sku la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum mchog mtshon/ /spyan gsum khro gnyer cung zad bsdus bzhi khro'i tshul/ /yid la re ba'i 'bras bu

110b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas nang kyi rgyal pa bsnams pa/ na bza' sngon po gsol ba/ kha nas khrag dang dug gi kha chu can spyan gsuM pa/ ral pas tsha ra'i rtsos po khar slebs pa can cig bsams la/ mdun du khrag sna tshogs pa dang/ /snying sna tshogs pa'i gtong

110b7(rgyud 'grel): ti ma du ya/ sha sha ma ma rbad pu ya /ni nam b+hyo b+hyo song song/ ma du ya ma du ya/ tshal pa rbad rbad yed yed/ sha thum sha thuM rbad/ mar dur ma dur rbad/ sha thuM mang sa b+hyo/ rtsa thum ma ya bzlog /yak+Shi ka li dgra bo la nang phob /ces drangs mang du

111b3(rgyud 'grel): na myos bying/ thum ril/ che ge mo ma ra ya tsi ta rbad rbad/ steng nas thun brab 'og nas kyang/ /gu gul la sogs rdzas kyis bdug /bar du bsgrub bya gsad par bsam/ /gdon dang bral bar ma gyur par/ /las de btang bar mi bya'o/ /thun par
