112a1(rgyud 'grel): bum par gnod sbyin ni/ /sngon po g.yas pa rdo rje 'chang/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub me 'bar ba/ /lnga 'am bzhi'i bcu bsams te/ /a'oM ma ha ni laM d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra pa ni ma ha ya ga sha hUM/ mu ru ta mu ru Ta/ bi ru
112a2(rgyud 'grel): ta bi ru ta/ spo ta yA spo ta yA/ sarba bi na swAhA/ gzungs thag sngon po dkris te/ zhag bcu bzlas pa'i chu yis ni/ /'dze la sogs pa'i nad chen rnams/ /de yi mod la 'byang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rnams la nya sha dang/ /chang gi gtor ma
112a3(rgyud 'grel): ci rigs sbyin/ /rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chang zhing /rams dang ra'i tshil lu dang/ /utpal g+hi hang chang bsres nas /rnal 'byor pa yi snying ka ru/ /rdo rje'i lte bar chud pa'i sngags/ /a'oM ni laM b+ha ra b+ha ra badzra pa ni yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nu shama ra a ma
112a4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyiM? hUM /'di bris nyin re ma chag na/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsgrub pa po/ /skad cig tsi yid mi g.yel bar/ /lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs/ de stsogs bsaM gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /gnod sbyin gyis ni byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bla ma mchod bya zhing/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ma tes?
112a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lha gzhan brnyas par ma byas na/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrubs thabs/ /slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma wa la tsan tra pa
112a6(rgyud 'grel): lo tsha ba slan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis b+hi Da na'i dgon par bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a mri ta kro ta tsu la mahA sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la
112a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa dbang chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /nag po'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas/ /gtum chen khro bo las kyi lha/ /de'i bsgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/ /chos rnams
112b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i ngo bor bsam/ /de yi rang bzhin rnam dag las/ /pad+ma nyi ma klu brgyad steng/ /hUM gi 'phro 'dus rdo rje 'bar/ /de las khro bo chen po bsam/ /in tra ni la'i kha dog can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhis mdzes pa ni/ /g.yas pa rdo rje las kyi khyud/ /
112b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga rnam par dag par bsam/ /cig shos dbyug tho phur bu 'bebs/ /brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gdug pa brdzis/ /rin chen klu yis sku la mdzas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i go cha can/ /bskal pa'i me'i nang na bzhugs/ /sprul pa'i khyud gis nam mkha' 
112b3(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /ye shes bcug la byin gyis brlab/ /dbang bskur khyud gi go dang ldan/ /skad cig tsam gyis gsal ba las/ /sngags kyis rang gi nus pa bsgrub/ /a'oM badzra kro ta a rmri ta kun d+ha li na ga ha na ha na hUM phaT/ gal te las la sbyor ba ni/ /a'oM badzra kro ta
112b4(rgyud 'grel): a rmri ta che ge mo ra na song song/ ma ra na bying bying /ma ra na mugs mugs/ /ma ra na ha la ha la/ ma ra na myos myos/ ma ra na myos bying/ thub ril ka ru na na ga ma ra ? dza dza/ /rtags la phebs par gyur pa dang/ /gang yin sbyin sreg las kyis bsad/ /yang na mi mthu
112b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyis brab/ /nang pa'i lus la brab bya ste/ /gzugs la yang dang yang bstims te/ /nges par klu'i nad rnams zhi/ /skabs su gtor mas lha mnyes bya/ /rin chen snod du klu sman blugs/ /rang sngags kyis ni byin brlabs dbu/ /zhi ba'i
112b6(rgyud 'grel): las de sngon 'gro yin/ /bum pa gtsang ma chus bkang la/ /khro bo khyud dang bcas pa bsam/ /rig pa gong mas gtab pa la/ /chu ni khol ba'am rlangs byung nas/ /nges par bkru ba byas gyur pas/ /'byung po ma lus nad zhi'o/ /gzhan yang gdon chen
112b7(rgyud 'grel): po rnams /gzhom par 'dod na rang sngags gzhug/ 'di ni bsrung ba dam pa yin/ /gro ga ras la bris pa yis/ /bsrung ba de'i du gdags/ /gla rtsi gu gul shu dag dang/ /dur ba khu byug 'dza' ti dang/ /tsan dan a ka ru dang bcas/
113a1(rgyud 'grel): byis pa'i chu yis sbrus pa ni/ /ri lu sran tshar gtor gtang bya/ /nang gi gdon rnams zhi bar byed/ /rgya tsha la phag pa sram gyi brun/ /gu gul rma bya'i sha dang ni/ /ra thug lug thug rmad kha dang/ /rta bon ra'i gzhi pa
113a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /nya'i glad pa me la bsreg /lus gos sna nas bdugs pa yis/ /bar gyi gdon las mchog tu shis/ /rtsan dug dri chen shing khun dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /bya rgod spos dang men spos dang/ gcan zan sku dang khrag
113a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /thar nu thang phrom spru nag dang/ /dri chus lus la byugs gyur na/ /nges par gdon rnams 'dros par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bya khyung rus pa sha/ khrag dang lpags pa spu rnams kyis/ /phyi nang par gsum klu nang 'joms/ /de la
113a4(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i sngags myed na/ /go cha med pa'i mtshan thogs 'dra/ /'di ni mi thub go cha mchog /sngags kyi nus pa sngar song bya/ /bag zan las ni sbal pa'i gzugs/ /khro bo kham por steng bzhag ste/ /klu chen rnams kyi sngags dag la/ /a'oM
113a5(rgyud 'grel): du mi pa ti sarba gdags/ /klu sman 'o mas lus la btig/ nyin re zhing yang zhag bdun par/ bsgrub pa byas te sbal pa de/ /gnod pa'i phyogs su bzhugs nas kyang/ /steng du mthun pa'i rdzas rnams sbyin/ /nges par gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur//
113a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bsgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /skal ldan klu nang byang nas kyang/ /khro bo chen pos lus ston cing/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa chen po'i bsgrub thabs/ rje btsun thang lo pas bla ma'i gdams pa dang/
113a7(rgyud 'grel): bya khyung las rgyud? la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsha ba slan chud dar ma tshul khrims kyis /rje btsun wa la tsan tra la gu/ lang gser gyi ma d+hal phul nas zhus pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
113b1(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri b+ha g+ha ban badzra su b+ha ma ha kro d+ha ra dzA? sarba duSh+Ta bi d+ha ra sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das? Da ki'i bzhi gnyis pa las/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug la soD pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so/ /yang na nyan ma ngas snga la soD pa'i bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das te/ dpal rdo rje gnod mnyam sbyor las shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/ zhi bas phan par ma ? te/ sher thabs kyi ngo bo
113b2(rgyud 'grel): yis khro de bzhin shes bya kun mdzad/ badzra Da ki'i rim pa phye ba bzhi pa las/ mi shes pa'i ri bo ? pas na ye shes de nyid ni rdo rje'o/ /mdzes khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sding ba thaMs cad bstad pa la rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/ thugs rje steng ba nyid kyi ye shes de nyid gdug pa can 'dul ba'i don du gsung ru ? chen po spyan ras gzigs shin tu paN? che'o?
113b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par mi rtog bde chen po/ /rtag tu seMs can de nyid las khro'i? tshul 'chang 'khros pas kyang/ 'jig rten gsum ngag sreg byed na sangs rgyas thaMs cad? khros pa khams gsuM ma lus smos ci dgos?/ sdug bsngal ba la mi bzod pa sbyar ba kun slong nus pa dang/ don brtson pa/ /mgon po mdon mthong nges la 'dren pas he ru ka dpal khra?
113b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ mnga' mnyes pa/? d+harma ka ya/ kun ? d+ho ka ba/ nir man ka ya/ nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba dang/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mngon brjod rgyud las gsungs bsgrub thabs/ /bzlos pa sbag? bla ma'i man ngag gis gsal bshad/ /rjod byed kyi dgos pa/
113b5(rgyud 'grel): sku bzhi'i bdag nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshig don tsam las mi sbyor gsung/ sgo gsum skyabs ngan song gsuM la skyob pa'i gsung/ bstan pas sdang ba'i dag dgos pa/ dngos grub la bar du gcod pa'i bdud dang lus srag la rna par 'tshe ba'i/ rang dga' yangs le'u bcu drug? pa yul dngos gsung brjod bya/ gsum la ni mngon dga' zhing/ nges par spro bas ste/ /byang she dka' skyabs gnas su byed pa
113b6(rgyud 'grel): chub mchog sems brtan pa dang/ /rtoD? pa thugs su tshud pa mnyes pa/ dkyil 'khor zhuD shing dbang thob nas/ /dam tshig spyod pa la brtson ?/ /rtse mo las/ 'jig rten ni gang zag bzhi/ bskal pa brgyad ni brtsan byas shang/ chag bzhin du kun sbyad kyang/ de dag 'grub par yod mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems ni ma skyed pa/ je? tshoM yod ba nyid dang ni/ gang zhig bka' bstsol mi byed dags? dang ni mi 'grub ces paS
113b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi spangs pa/ nyan rang las mchog du gyur pa b+hu ta'i gsung/ phyi dang nang gi 'jug pas zhuD gsung/ mngon rtoD 'phel ba'i 'dab? pas/ ? ba las ? 'dor bar/ yangs d+ha rak? la bshad chud pas/ rangs grub dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas bcud/ bdag 'dzin byi rtoD ? zhing bdag med pa'i rtog ?/ /ces bde ba'i yan lag du grub 'khrus bya/ 'di'i bzhir pa las ni shes hUM gi zuD lus dag yid gsuM dag pa bya nyid do/ /ri
114a1(rgyud 'grel): sul ri rtse chu doD? 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /shing cig zhi gnas ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam/ /bskyed tshal lha khang mchod rten khang stong bzhi mdo 'am/ /yid ni gang du dga' bar bde ba'i stan gnas ste/ /snying kar rang 'byung 'od dro can/ /der gnas
114a2(rgyud 'grel): dzuM gi 'od zer gyis/ bsgrub ba mnyes pa tshangs ma rgya byin mo sogs/ sngon grub pa rnams legs bskul bas/ /nam mkha' ched du byas pa'i skye shi gsung gang ba lo bdun ma bzung na gsal de shad che bas bltas 'di rjes mthun la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags dang rjes yid rang/ /ya
114a3(rgyud 'grel): sa sngo skyabs 'gro bskul gsol/ /sems bskyed dang/ lam gnas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi lus dbul nyer spyod lngas rnams b+heMs te/ stong pa'i
114a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes chos? 'khor rdo rje mya ngan ni 'da' mchog b+heM bya/ smon pa gsung 'dug pa gsung nam mkhar raM las nyi dkyil 'khor/ /de stengs hUM byung rdo sna tshogs rje las/ /'od 'phros ra ba sa gzhi gur/ /bla re dra ba me 'od b+haM/ mthar de nyid kyang ? der ni paM las pad+ma'i lte gsung? ba dang 'dzin pas
114a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ rig bya rig byed mi byed pas ngar a li dang shugs?/ ka li las byung zlo nyi'i sngar gyi tshad med pa'i 'phrin las nu'i don du ? thob par bya mnyam pa dang gyur pa las/ las 'od 'phros 'dus gyur pa las dbus de las rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'phros son hUM gyur hya dang sgra byung a brlab pa'i/ /rdo rje lte ba'i khongs sna tshogs chud de rig pa 'joms ?
114a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu las? a li rnam pa zla ba dang rang bzhin ste 'ong? ye shes ngo bo shes rab?/ gyur pa'am 'bu? ma brgyad rgyu ka'i? rnam pa nyi ma rang bzhin mnyan nyid ngo bo thabs hUM gis 'phro 'du las yongs su rdzogs pa khro bo'i 'khor lo b+heM par bya/ /chus skyes ? 'od 'phros sems can don bya ba rung? 'dus lte bar 'dren pa mchog/ hUM mdzad in tra ni la'i mdog
114a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang brgyad gnyis zhal phyag gis/ /rnam mdzes 'jig rten gsum rgyal b+heM/ sa pas ? 'da' gyi rnaM par tshur 'dum po yongs su gyur pa las/ dbang sngon chu shel 'dzam+bu'i chu gser dza ba dang/ sna tshogs 'dab ? rnam pa byas tshan rang bzhin mngon? rtog brgyu gzhan nyi zla bya ba mtshan nam lo? gyi go ? bya ba grub ba rgyu ?
114b1(rgyud 'grel): kun dang utpal gtso ma'i ste ? gser dang pad+ma ra ga /spyan gsum ba dan du'i mdog can mche' brtsigs thod pa'i/ /'phreng bas thod byas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ /g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa yis/ /bde byed kyi ni mgo bo dang/ /u ma'i nu? ma mnan
114b2(rgyud 'grel): su ma ti rtsa zhal sngo/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab ser de'i steng na gsum dbus dkar g.yas sngon ser de'i steng dug dmar lha ? bo de rtsa zhal g.yon gyi gsum/ ` thugs rjes ma nu'i don la chags pa ? bzhi 'joms pa mdzad cing/ /ngo bo yang na steng na sangs rgyas lnga'i zhugs tshul khros pa'i spyan gyis rnaM par dur ? gzigs/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug gis?
114b3(rgyud 'grel): sku brgyan cing/ /mgo bo'i do shal mgo 'phreng ske rags stag lpags gos/ /sdigs 'dzub lcags kyu 'ching ba'i phyag gis rdo rje dang/ /dril bus rang sna ? ga ma la 'khyud gnyis med bde/ /gnyis kyis dpral ba'i steng phyag rgya/ /sdigs 'dzub lcags kyi ?
114b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /rus pa'i ska rags dang gnyis yod paS gsung/ gzhan rnams thod pa kha rlon? ba TwaM ga/ phyag dang po gnyis kyi rtsa ral gri ltar gug ge ba rgyab sprod nas the chung gnyis g.yas dang g.yon ni lcags kyu rang ji 'dra ba dang/ sdigs thag yid pa dang po'i 'og ma 'dzub zhagS pa 'khor lo dang/ /rin po che dnag tho ba mdud/ /
114b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcas pa mgo bo cang te'u na ra'i/ g.yon? gsum pa lpags pa'i gos mchog steng du 'dzin/ /? phyogs kyi mdab mar lugs las bzlog pa yis lnga pa/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje sngon drug pa po dang/ /stobs chen rdo rje dang bcas pa mi bdun pa g.yo g.yas gsum pa ?
114b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnams/ drug pa/ sngo bdun pa ljang brgyad pa nyid kyi dmar dang dud ka ngur smrig ? g.yas bstan bsres/ /dmar nag yangs drug phyed zhal dang gsum gnyis phyag gnyis shar/ /spyan byang gsum mche ba nub rnam brtsigs zhal/ /lho thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan
114b7(rgyud 'grel): su ma ? zhal thams cad sku mdog dang gcig par bzhed ? bo d+hi ngos kyi zhal gnyis de'i khro bo sku mdog dang mthun pas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gangs ljang/ g.yon ? zag gsogs su gsung/ /cing g.yas dang po nas 'dod pa'i rdo rje thob rdo rje sngon po'i dbyig ga stobs chen? mdud rtse gsum mi g.yo ral gri/ na ra'i rus pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yas rim pa bzhin? changs? pa/
115a1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang zhabs kyis bdud bzhi rnam mnan cing/ /'dren pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba'i phyag rgya dag gis/ /rang gi mtshan ma dang ni dril buAm/ /rdo rje dril yang thams cad g.yas rdo rje bus rang snang rig mar 'khyud/ /phyag gzhan dag gis
115a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag po yi/ /phyag rgya dpral dang po lha'i?/ nye dbang drag po bar 'ching ba dang/ /thod pa ste gtso bo kha TwaM kha 'dzin a bi nas rang gi phyag rgya dril bur bcas 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya chir? pa ste ces pa dang thob dbyug to mdung dang ni/ ral gri dril du de bzhin no/ /yang na thams cad rdo rje dril bu te ces so/ brlab h+roM? ? byin bal yang ces? so mol hUM b+hUM/ ? pa dza bas rdo rje bo la ?
115a3(rgyud 'grel): la baM nag pa la ? pa uM gsang bar ? bshad par ? bdag gsung cing/ /sdigs 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /gnas gsum la ni rdo rje gsum b+heM cing/ /lus gnas go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung/ /hya dang phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyer bkug pa'i/ /ye shes dam tshig
115a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med dbang bskur/ ye shes pa dang dus gcig? byon pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes pa dang hya? brjod cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo gsung sprad/ a'oM suM b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ phyir gsum du yod pa las 'di'o/ a'oM g+h+ri h+na pa ya g+h+ri h+na pa ya/ oM a na pa ga ban ba badzra hUM hUM
115a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ */ /sting kar pad ma 'dab brgyad kyi lte bar hUM baM/ phyogs bzhir TAM laM khaM hUM tshogs khar khaM sraM/ spyi gtsug kaM haM?/ sna ba g.yas maM sraM/ lhag par baM ye/ sna ba g.yon sum bi/ smin dbus lngaM? khaM/ mig gnyis baM laM khrag pa gnyis so/ druM mchan khung gnyis oM oM/ nu ma gnyis baM maM/ sna rtse baM suM/ kha la sUM sh+yaM?/ 'gul par ba suM/ snying kar mi haM/ lgangs? par maM khaM/ rtags la laM tsam/ bshad par
115a6(rgyud 'grel): raM khaM brla la h+raM shaM byin pa la maM tsaM?/ sor pa la hUM suM/ bal la ba mi/ the bo la bEe'i?/ pus mo la baM/? kha la kaM/ sna la yuM/ gsang bar ?/ bshad par sum/ mig gnyis la yang bzhi'o/ /rgyud nas sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag pas/ /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor b+hai par bya/ /ces pa/ snying kar hUM dang baM/ phyogs bzhir DaM laM khaM tuM/ gnas nyer bzhir khaM sraM sogs/ mig sogs rang du kaM uM shaM suM
115a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag yaM? bzhi po btso bo la mi skyod pa 'khor lo rnam snang don grub 'od dpag med rin 'byung/ rang snying chos kyi yi ge las lha'i kha dog dang mthun pa mar ma'i 'phreng ba bzhin bskor ba la dmigs la gsungs ste nges par ? bsdug snying ga'i 'od kyis gtso bo dang 'khor dang bsrung 'khor dang bsrung 'khor la khyab rgya che bar byas/ 'khor gtso bo de las phyag nyid laS brjod ? zun gnyis sogs ?
115b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag gnyis pa/ spro ba dang bsdu pa la dmigs te/ rtse gcig sems kyis mngon bzlas na/ /las kun thogs pa med par 'grub/ /dpal ldan mngon brjod bla ma las/ /gsungs pa'i bsgrub thabs rnams bskyod pa'i/ /dge nges 'gro rnams sdang ba las/ rnam rgyal
115b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sems can don byas tshur mchog hUM la bsdu hUM de las gtso bo 'khor pa ni d+hes pa ye shes bzhu pa yan chad bya gdung thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das rgyun dang 'bras bu'i 'bras bu de bsgrub pas dang de ston gsung la'ang de sgras do?// dpal rdo rje gnod mdzes khro bo'i rkyal po bsngo ba'i dngos mo chen po sdang pa ched ?
115b3(rgyud 'grel): skabs dang mthar thug gnyis gsung/ thams cad d+harma tsakra mcho? rten kyi 'khor lta bu b+h+ruM? do badzra rad rna'i rang na tsakshu? gsum pa ste rung gsum gyi logs gsum la dpag gsum pa'o/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i bsgrub thabs/ rdo rje ni 'joms? pa dang mi byed pa ste rdo rjes mkha' 'gro dang brtag? pa gnyis pa las/ mi shes pa'i ri po chen po 'doms pas na ye shes nyid rdo rje'o ?
115b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mi phyed zhes bya ste/ ces pa'o/ /slob dpon prad dz+nyA rak+Shir tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po b+ha tra bo d+hi dang/ a tsarya mar ba chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// //phan gdags bya ba 'dogs byed bshad/ 'dogs tshul mtshang kha skong dang ?
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed cha mthun la/ nges pa bskyed pa gsum yin no/ /man tra mi 'grub ba'i rgyu ba ni lung ma thob pa/ yid mches pa/ ngag gnyis pa bzhi ma spangs pa/ bzlas pa bar ma chad ba'i/ lung bra ma gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i lung yod pa'am rten byin brlabs can las so// */ /khro bo rig tshig gi bsgrub thabs rnams bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ye na kro taM sa tsa na na me/ bod
115b6(rgyud 'grel): skad du ? khro bo reg tshig gi bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ khro rgyal reg tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum chen rab 'bar gdug pa 'joms/ /ngan sngags sbyor 'joms phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshon cha rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /pha rol sbyor ba bshig phyir bri/ /
115b7(rgyud 'grel): bsang bsrung gnang kyi man ngag ni/ zab mo bsrung bzlog gsang mdor bsdus/ yi ge pa'i phyag gsum shes par phyag gi yul bya/ /dang po sdug bdag las ? gtan ? gsum stegs bsngal bus dag 'di gsum kyi rgyu spyod pa'i/ /sems pha rol gcod pas can kun la snying spyi la rje ched du bya ba bsgom/ /rang la bye brag du sngar
116a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems ldan zhing/ /ngan sngags sbyor byed pho nya spod/ /dmod pa'i sbyor ba byed pa la/ /ched du gtang pa'i snying rje bskyed/ /bdag gzhan gnyis ka bde ba'i phyir/ /thabs mchog b+har ba'i lha sgom smon/ /snying rje ldan pa'i mi
116a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi/ /lus ni pha lam gong po 'dra/ /de nas phyi nang 'jig rten gyi/ /dngos po thams cad gzhom par bya/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud gdebs gsum bla ma'i zhal las sheS b+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba shud d+ho haM/ /lan gsum brjod de 'jig rten na/ /bdag dang pha rol spod stong dang/ /rdzas dang
116a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi sbyor grags ma nyid pas ba rnams/ /thams cad ma lus stong par bsam/ /mkha' ltar thams cad stong chos thams cad shin tu dag pa la/ /gcig la gcig gnod byed bar 'gal/ /stong snang ba tsam 'di pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las/ /dgra'o yi b+h+ruM bskyed 'khor lo ?
116a4(rgyud 'grel): kho'i dag 'bar ba ni mi yi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ 'dab dgu'i sngags ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba tshad ldan bsam par bya// steng du cung zad ma gnyis ka stong nyid yin pas reg par/ /raM las 'bar mkha' la sprin byung ba ltar ba'i gzhal byas bskyed/ /dkyil sems las gyur ba'i du
116a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM las ni/ /'byung po sde? brgyad gcor? pa'i sngags brjod lha tshad dgu dus gcig bskyed/ /sku mdog mun ltar gnag 'khor lo pa la/ /ba spu kun nas me dpung 'phro/ /sma ra smin dmar ma ma'i dbu skra 'bar/ /nyi ma b+har ba'i spyan gsum me'i dkyil 'khor gyi bgrad//
116a6(rgyud 'grel): mche pad nyi'i? steng du brtsigs ljags sgril gang rtsa sngags mos 'debs/ /'khor dang nyeg la 'bur che khro bo dgu/ 'jigs pa'i shangs/ /phyag gnyis rdeg tshul sha sul h+rags/ /ba spu kun nas me dpung 'phro/ /gyen du gsus dus gsum mkhyen ? pa 'phyang zhing brkyang bkum bzhug
116a7(rgyud 'grel): stag gi sham thabs rlon pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan/ /yan lag phyag gnyis mangs? gad ? rtog rdo rje shu la ? skal med 'khor lo g.yas rtsibs g.yon brgyad yan lag sbom? rtsibs bzhi bkal/ /'khor ma zhum bzhing rnam par gcod khog 'dren g.yon pa g.yas rnams//
116b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lha dgu bskyed nas ni/ /phyogs mtshams lha brgyad phyir bltas nas/ /sngags 'di kun gyis brjod par bsam/ /oM b+ha ya na sa ni/ tra sa ni sarba ma ra/ pra kaM taM/ hi ra/ b+hi na sa ni/ yi ge ci? ta/ sarba dushTan/ duSh+Tan sa ta ki/ sarba na/ pra te
116b2(rgyud 'grel): ki ? ni/ phaT du phaT swAhA/ /me dang 'khor lo khrab ? thaMs cad kun/ /g.yas skor du ni 'khor lo bsam/ /dmigs sngags bzlos mtho ka sngags kyi tshogs bcad du mi rung gsung// pa'i dgra dang bgegs yod na/ /me dang 'khor lo spros la bsnun/ /sgom bzlas dus drug
116b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson gyur na/ /sbod gtong ldog cing ngan sngags 'jig/ rdzas kyi nus pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /bzlog pa'i dus su drin rang la can bla ma steng du sgom/ /khro bo brgyad kyi mdza' bskor la/ /steng du 'khor lo b+har ba bsam/ /'og tu lus la slob 'khor nyin ?
116b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum yo byad bsam/ kho'i/ khro bo brgyad kyis mdza' bskor kho'i la/ /'og tu 'khor lo b+har ba bsam/ /de bla ma med nga rgyags? bla mas bsrung pa'o nas bzlog par 'dod bla ma'i pa yis/ /gdug pa bzhin 'khor lo'i gnad dgu shes pa bya/ /snang ba rnam rtog
116b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa gcod/ /bzlog dang gsang rang gi mdza' ma'i dag dra bas dang phan? dzun bskor ? gcig go gdan bzhin ? blo rdeg dang/ /lus bsrung ngag gnan so byed do/ /lo rang la rlung gi 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa/ /gcod pa brtan gyi 'khor man ngag du lo bsam/ /rnam gtsang? ba'i
116b6(rgyud 'grel): par gcod cing ? 'kho ma shaM? tsam/ 'khor ba yis/ /gnas pa kho dang po nya gnyis ka snod kyi 'jig rten dang/ /rang gi ? kho'i brten dang/ /rang gi kho'i brten rmi lam brtag pa pa sde brgyad rgya'i 'byung po rnams/ /gcad 'og du bsreg thams cad stong par bsam/ /'og du dngos po
116b7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams rnam shes thams cad kun/ /sprul pa'i tshul du rang la bsdu/ /nam 'byung bzhi las bsam lo grub tshad mkha' stong pa'i dbyings ni/ /'khor lo gzhal sems can byas lha bkra rnams kun/ /tshangs pa bzhin du 'jigs ? dang bral lo brtag
117a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ /sngags zlas spyod lam thams cad bya/ /de nas skyo bar 'gyur gyi bar/ /snying khar 'khor lo b+har ba bsam/ /lte bar rdo rje nas sems nyid kyi tsam la/ /yi ge hUM gis mtshan pa la/ /mdza' mar sngags
117a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor bar bsam/ /rnam skyon rang par 'khor lta'i nga rgyal gyis bar gyur pa la/ /yid bsgoms? pas gtad rnam rtog rang gi gzhan mi gtang/ /'dzub gang ting 'dzin brtan sngon po pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bro? bo'i ye shes kyi ngo bo/ lus seMs las su hUM gi rung rtsa bar
117a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de las ldang bar 'dod pa na/ /rang rnam du smin zhen pa'i lus brtubs rtse bcig tu shing/ /ye shes me yis bsregs nas ni/ /dngos rtse gcig tu gnas bral bdag med nam mkhar bsam/ /bzlo sgar 'dod na g.yas su bskor/
117a4(rgyud 'grel): nus stobs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur gsad bar 'dod na g.yon du bskor/ /las ngan las grub pa'i sha khrag blo rdeg byed na bsgyur la phye ma rnams bskor/ /rten gyi bdag rang dang pa rgyal pa'i rgyu/ /rin chen phye ma dur khrod sa/ /so thub 'jim pa sbrus pa la/ /khru ?
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gang tshad ldan mchod rten bya/ /bang rim lnga dang ldan pa la/ /dang po hUM gis bskor ba bri/ /oM dang ta? dang sa dang ha/ /bang rim bzhi la rim bzhin bri/ /gzungs ma ring srel tshan nyi gser shu rtsa gcig shar yod pa nas bsregs la/ /bdag gi rang gi 'the'u? rungs?
117a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo che ge mo'i/ /lus ngag yid byang chub chen por gsum gyi sbyor ba rnams/ /mgo nang du yod pa shig cig shig cig/ chom cig chom cig/ non cig non cig/ ces pa gtags bris nang du bzhug /mi 'jigS brtan pa'i gzungs dang
117a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhug/ dur dri? bzhi khrod ras kyi gzhi ma la/ /gi khrag dug chu sbyar ba yis/ /lte ba dgra'i brtsibs brgyad mu khyud gnyis/ /lte bar ming rus dgra'i zer dang sngags bya yin gzungs kyis bskor/ /rtsibs mchod rten gyi rten 'grel? snying po la hUM raM g.yas g.yon re raM
117b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang/ /sngags la 'dogs byas mu khyud la/ /rdo rje tri shul de phyir bri/ /mchod rten bcug la zhabs sdom bya/ /bsgrub bya'i ling kha khru gang tshad/ /lce ni thod kang tshad du bri/ /rnag rdzas dug dang d+ha du ra'i/ /khu bas ling ga byug par bya/ /dpal bar mang?
117b2(rgyud 'grel): ming ste snying khar rus/ /yan lag phyi'i bzhi la de'i yang byin la dza dang raM/ /lce rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /de la chas nas lus tshad rang gi bsgrub brang thod du drangs khang du/ /chu shul ba ma d+hal steng du ling kha gding/ /de'i steng du mchod rten bzhag
117b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad la/ /bgegs sprang stong pa nyid du bsam/ /rno nang du bstan pa gser gyi yig 'bru rnams ni lha ru bsam/ /b+h+ruM las rin chen mchod rten bskyed/ /lha bzhugs khrus gsol mchod bstod bya/ /bsgrub bya mnan par gsol brdab/ /
117b4(rgyud 'grel): dus de nas rang gi snying kha nas/ /lcags rtsa sngags kyis kyu zhags ? b+ha bas pa rab spros la/ /snying ? phugs mgul mchings dgug par bya/ /oM b+ha ya na che ge mo spyan? drangs ba'i oM a g+hu chu gtsang gis sha dza/ /lcags ? kyu'i phyag rgya dang bcas ?
117b5(rgyud 'grel): lan grangs khro bor bsams nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ /bkug la ling ka de la bstim/ /dgra'i oM b+ha yan che ge mo pra pe sha stom/ /'khor lo gong dang 'dra dgra'i ming ba la/ /lte bar hUM gcig raM gnyis mdza' / /de'i mdza' ma sngags kyis bskor/ /hUM
117b6(rgyud 'grel): gi steng du oM byas la/ /rtsi a la hUM dang raM gnyis bri/ /rtsa sngags rak+Sha bcas pa ni/ /mu khyud nang la bri dgra bo'i ming bar bya/ /rdo rje bar mchig? grub bzhi dang bri lugs mtshams med par bri/ /de'i phyi la g.yas g.yon me ri bri/ /hUM raM gyi bgegs skrang 'khor lo stong
117b7(rgyud 'grel): mgo? ? par bsam/ b+h+ruM las bzhi phyir brtan pa 'khor lo ji bzhin skye ba yig 'bru dam tshig khro bo la/ /ye shes khro po bkug la bstim/ /rten 'brel snying pos mu khyud phyi ma la me tog gtor/ /bum chus bkru zhing bsnyen pa byas pa'i rtsa sngags bzlas thun ? gnyis
118a1(rgyud 'grel): med bstim/ /mchod bstod bsrung ba gsol ba gdab/ /zhag bdun bar du bsnyen pa bya/ /de nas dril la laS btum/ /dpung pa g.yon la gdags par bya/ /dus rnams kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rang gi
118a2(rgyud 'grel): snying kha ru/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa bsam rnam lnga bstod pa dbus su sngags kyi yig 'bru pa saM/ 'khor lo 'dus? a nu ta ra 'dab ma la/ /'od zer ldan par rang gi bsams nas ni/ /oM b+ha ya na a nu ta ra/ a sa le ston/ ces pa brgya dang brgyad bzlas la/
118a3(rgyud 'grel): gos gsar gon la sngas khar gzhug ? /lho ru mgo bstan pa pad+ma? rtsa ba zhogs g.yas pas/ mdun? rgyab/ g.yas g.yon nyal la yi ge rnams la rmi ltas brtag par bya/ /bong bu dre'u bud med dang/ /bya nag lug nag tshong pa rnams/ /mo rig rnams
118a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho 'phral yin/ /mon dang gnag dang bya rog rnams/ /bdud dang 'god bo'i cho 'phrul yin/ /srin po shan pa ri dags sha/ gshin rje yi dags cho 'phrul yin/ /gcan zan d+ha dang jag pa rnams/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi cho 'phrul srog gcod kyi
118a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /me 'bar nyi mas gdungs pa ni/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'i rmi ltas yin/ /ser ba sho rgal ri nyer rmi/ /zor kha gtod pa'i ltas su bzung/ /dong du ltung dang 'dam du bying/ /gdos la brtags dang ri yis mnan/ /steng du srog chags 'khrab
118a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /lus dang khyim/ mnan pa yod pa'i rmi ltas yin/ /bsrung bzlog sbyor ba drag tu bya/ /go gon mtshon thogs 'khar du chud/ /srin pos g.yog byas rmi pa na/ /bzlog shing thub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas rang gi lto ba ni/ /rin chen
118a7(rgyud 'grel): bum bar bsam par bya/ /'khor lo'i steng du snying khar lha dgu bskyed nas ni/ /dmigs la lha la bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /lha rnams bdud rtsir zhu bar las mkhan yin pas na bsam/ /tho rangs snga bar la bar langs la ni/ /dgra yi phyogs su kha lus 'di byin gyis ?
118b1(rgyud 'grel): bltas la/ /dri chu'i dang sa ma khyor gang la/ /oM b+ha ya na a mri ta hUM phaT/ ces pa nyi shu rtsa gcig btab la/ rang gi khong du btud bar bya/ /de 'og dri chu khyer gang la/ /oM b+ha ya ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ /ces btab g.yon ba'i srin lag gis/ /spyi gcug smin
118b2(rgyud 'grel): lha ru bsam mtshams lkog ma dang/ /snying kha lte ba gsang gnas dang/ /bcu drug mdo dang ro rgyab dang/ /bdud rtsir bsam zhal gdams las shes so/ /ltag pa'i bdud du g.yas pa'i thig le bya/ /grub na mgo lus khyab? par byug /de'i lhag pa'i dri chu la/ /oM b+ha ya na che ?
118b3(rgyud 'grel): me ma ra ya/ /srog thun sa ma ya zlog /thum b+hyo/ nyi shu gcig btab lan gsum gsum 'phang/ /zor gyi sna la dgra bangs? nas/ /gshin rje'i gnas su song tsakra rdo rjes mtshan pa re bsam bar bsam/ /yang bzlog dkar mo 'di shes pa'i/ /mi la sbyor
118b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan mi dgos/ /de nas bsang pa'i sbyor byed na/ /'phang sreg gnan gsum tsakra me dang bcas par bsams la shes par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /ra khyi phag gsum rog po yi/ /snying gi khrag ? gzhan la/ la bzlog byed na nyung dkar
118b5(rgyud 'grel): skye che lan tsha dang/ /dug dang cher ma'i rtse mo gdab/ /gru gsum ga'u'i nang du blugs/ /mi rgyus bsgril ma'i skud pa gdags/ /sngags kyi 'dum tshe lnga nye bsnyan 'bum tsho gsum dang bcas pa don dran stong par bya/ /h+ri srog chags gang rung las chos 'byung gru gsum bskyed
118b6(rgyud 'grel): ra las rak+ta'i rgya mtsho bsam/ /de'i nang du lha dgu lcags sam zangs la bre gsum shod ba bskyed/ /ye shes gdul khro bo bkug la bstim/ /swa b+ha ba lha la dmigs te sngags bzlas pas/ /khro bo rnams kyi smin mtshams nas/ /ye dmar nag shes rgyun 'dzag
118b7(rgyud 'grel): thim par bsaM/ khrag gi mdog du smug? nag mchod bstod gtor mas mnyes dus drug du byas shing/ /nyi shu gcig tu bsgrub thun drug du pa bya/ /rtags ga'u yi byung khrag ltung pa logs pa nas ni las sbyor brtsam/ /g.yag rog rtse mo mnyams pa'i ra g.yas nang du blugs/ /
119a1(rgyud 'grel): steng g.yogs med pa'i sa khyer la/ /dgra'i phyogs su kha bltas te/ /rang gi gdong du khrag zor bzhag /bsnyen gtor de yi g.yas su ste/ /yul gyi lha la gser skyems dbul/ /phyogs kyi lha la dbang gzugs bya/
119a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /brdzus skyes drag po'i pho nya rang la bskul/ /lha chen rtag pa tshangs pa'i sras/ /dbang phyug chen po khros pa'i sku/ /srin po zor gyi rag sha mthu bo che/ /rdzu nas kyi 'phrul shugs che rang gis mnyes pa'i mi la chibs/ /
119a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gsal bar bya mdog smug nag gcer pu la/ /lcags rang bzhin rang gi mdun du bsam/ yang kyi ral pa sha ra ra/ /dpral lhan khrag gi dmig dam nyams la dgu la/ /khrag gi sprul pa'i mtshan mchi ma nyi li li/ /g.yas gnyis ro dbyug lcags ber bsnams/ /
119a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pas byobs la ber kas bsnan/ /g.yon gnyis lcags kyu rgyu zhags bsnams/ /lcags kyus khug la zhags pas chings/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i snying mgo chod/ /rag sha b+har ba'i g.yas mi'i g.yon na/ /lcags kyi mon pa
119a5(rgyud 'grel): nag po gnyis/ /gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can la/ /lcags kyi ral pa rtsug na rlon pa 'khyil/ /snying kha nas lag na lcags kyi tho skam bsnams/ /skam pas bzung la tho bas rdungs/ /dam nyams dgra bo'i bshad ma mdzod/ /dza la rag sha
119a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ra pra kang/ /hi ra b+hi na sa naM yi ge tsi ta/ sa ma ya che ge mo la ma ra ya b+hyo/ /'khor lo rtsibs brdzes? brgyad rtsibs bzhi la/ /ra'i steng dang 'og du bsgom/ /dgra la bsnun par bsams la 'phang/ /dgra la kha bltas thebs pa ste/ /rang la kha
119a7(rgyud 'grel): bltas log pa yin/ /gzhan du bltas na 'gyangs par 'gyur/ /zor kha nyi shu gcig steng du 'phangs na/ /dgra 'og tu la byas na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /lus la bgegs la byas na zlog par nges/ /ra rtse'i mnan pa'i las ka byed pa na/ /
119b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa gong dang 'dra ba la/ /sa bdag phag pa'i thod par bzhug /re ba nag po'i khud du gril/ /chon sna lnga yi skud pas bcing/ /sbyin sreg thal ba dang bcas par/ /dur khrod gnyan po'i gnas su sba/ /gru gsum khru gang dod du gzhug /
119b2(rgyud 'grel): steng nas rgya raM b+ha ra bas mnan/ /steng du sbyin las sbyor dus su sreg lan gsum bya/ /drag po'i las gsum phal che rnams/ /sbyin sreg cho ga'i gzhung nas shes/ /brdzus skyes kyi slob dpon arya d+he bas/ /mu stegs pa'i sbyor ba rnams ?
119b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje gdan pa dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba ba ri bas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ya shu la stam b+ha san tsa na/ bod skad du/ de gag?
119b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bigs ma'i bsgrub thabs/ khro gnyer ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re 'bigs mdud can sgrol ma khro gnyer can la 'dud/ /gdug pa thams cad gzhom phyir de sgrub yang dag bri/ /thog med mar gyur kun la phan zhing bde bar bsam/ /gdug dgra? bgegs ?
119b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyag chi mthar thug du kha zhal la gnod sems can la mchog dkra bgegs la? tu byams arya d+he bas blo bskyed mtshan bstan pa spyi gang nag spyi bla ma'i bdag rang gi thar pa la bar du gcod pa'o bde la dgod sngon pa phyir ma byas mchog bsngaD gnas skabs su khro mo nyid bskyed bya/ /stong nyid
119b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos bral spros med mi rtog don dam snying rje med pa bsam/ /kun rdzob bden sems can gyi nang nas pa paM las pad+ma mdud mtshan ste/ /tsher ldan me b+har me stag rab 'gyed rab 'khor bsaM ? bon/ e las dmar nag 'khrug pa'i gsang 'dus nas chos rnams
119b7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i chos 'byung gru gsum bskyed/ /dkyil du chos 'byung gi b+haM khro mo'i sa bon las lha'i snang tsam du gzungs sa bon gdan du pad ma'i tse mo pad ma kun la pad ma la brjod ? pa'i khros byin phyogs kun tu khro mo g.yas su ? dgu bskyed de dus gcig du steng 'og? dun? pa ba'i zhal khro mo rnams kyi tse mo la bsrung ba'i
120a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyir bltas gzungs 'di kun gyis bzlas par bya/ /oM sarba b+ha ya na sha ni/ tra sa ni tra sa ya /b+he ra te b+h+ri/ ku ta ta Ti/ bE ta Ti/ b+he ra ti shwe ta she ta/ dza taM ni swAhA/ /mdung dang tri shul 'khor lo rtsibs
120a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rtsibs bzhi yis/ /dgra bgegs rnams kyi lus la bsnun te myos byas la/ /ne thams cad twi d+ha reg 'bigs phye gcig su gtor gcig phuk+Sha'i rnam pas drangs nas ni/ shangs su rdubs te lte bar nges g.yas par bsreg g.yod par ? shu la'o? star?
120a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gri lcags shi shing sha khrag gi lus la las ni 'khor 'khor lo spros la lo rtsibs mi brgyad 'dra lta bya/ /sde tshan brgyad lha ma yin ni gnod sbyin 'od zer gyi rtsibs la rang gi rab a nan bkod e'i pe ? lha bstims ? la/ /ga'ur
120a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhug ste de mi bsang? ba'i/ bdan? mthar ling kha spyi tshugs bzhug /thun drug lte bar yu ba yod pa bskor zhing gzungs sngags kyi sngags 'di brjod bya/ /dgra bgeD dgug bzhug bcings te /nges 'khor lo la skor las sbyar bya/ /nyungs rdza'i gru gsum pa
120a5(rgyud 'grel): kar skye tse dug khrag sol ba thal chen dang/ /dgra bgags kyi gshin rje skra dang dur khrod ras snyigs zhag re la sdig gong gi sha sprul/ /bsras la gzugs bcas ling ka la zhal du 'od zer gyis gzungs kyi 'khor chag pas lo bzhug/ dgra la zhal
120a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan gdong? du ling kha bzhag cing brdung/ /gsum 'grub de nas sbyar bar bya zhing legs spang bya/ /dge ba 'di yis thub pa'i bstan sprul gyi pa ring du gnas gyur cig/ slob dpon rtsibs brgyad la sngags rno phyogs gcig tu byas la arya d+he bas sbrul kyi mdzad
120a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// dral las la/ /dgra'i grong mthong bar snang?/ la bzhag go/ de nas bsnyen bsgrub bya/ 'gul ba 'am rmi lam du rab byung na 'og tu ling ga bzhug mnan pa'o/ /khyud gi 'dra bgo ba dang rma bya'i sgros brgyan pa dang bla mas byug pa gal che'o/ /sbrul gyi mnan ba byed dus sba'o/ /
120b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du /a wi shin tsa tu ma b+hi ti/ bod skad du/ skal 'jog dbang gi cho ga/ dpal gyi mchog dbang gi bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde chen bde mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ngan skal 'jog dbang gi cho ga 'di
120b2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam bya/ /dbang thob ltung spangs bsnyen rdzogs pa'i/ /dang por sa brtags thu gsum gyi 'bras bu bslang dang/ /sa sbyangs sa bsrung sngon 'jug bya/ /dal la tshon chos sku zag med sna lnga yis bri/ /rtsibs brgyad nag po gru chad dmar/ /nag po dkar ser
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar ljang bla ma la bzhi rdzogs? su rtsa ltung bzhi pa dbang bsnyen sum 'bum/ 'jig rten pa la gtor ma gtang rtsigs/ /'dod yon pha khu dra ba dang/ /dra phyed pa gam d+ha yab ka /rta babs la sogs spyi dang bstun/ /'khor lo dmar po 'di phyir dri/ /hUM dkyil du nang na ? ma rdo rje
120b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dgod/ /bsnyen pa'i bum pa dgod bya ste/ /gtor ma mchod pa rgyan sogs dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dmar ser lha khro bo rnams rdzogs dkar ser bsgoms gar mdzes stsal/ /rang bzhin rdo byed? ba'i dod du khro bo dur? khrod brgyad po chen po'i tshogs/ /
120b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na dam tshig chen dbang bsgrub byas ba'i pos 'dir mdza' ru gshegs la/ /gnyis su med par rang gi ltar bzhugs gsol te/ /dbang bskur rdzogs par rtsal gyur cig /dza hUM baM ho/ 'og min gyi de nas 'byung po'i gtor ma sbyin/ /slob ma lha thams cad nang
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhug sngon gyi phyi rol tu/ /maN+Dal phul la dam la bzhag rang gi gnas /khro bo'i rgyal po reg tshig gi /bsams pa dang byin brlabs tshul dbang dag 'jug du lha la zhus pa'o// 'dzin bdag yin gyis/ /khyod kyis dbang la bar du gcod pa rnams la phyi'i brnyas par ma
120b7(rgyud 'grel): byed cig /brnyas na mnar med slob mas ? de/ bla mas dag tu ltung/ 'thung bdud rtsi byin la bla mas slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ cig rdo rje'i dam tshig chu/ /bsrung na reg tshig dngos grub ster/ /'das na snying 'byin srog gcod 'gyur/ /badzra sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor
121a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs chen rab 'bar ba/ /dam tshig med la mi bstan te/ /de bzhin smra bar mi bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor nang bcug la/ /yon phul gsol pa gdab par bya/ /mdzes brjod bya lus phyog bcu na bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang
121a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang/ /slob dpon snying khar rdo rje bshag la bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni bcom ldan rig? chig gi /dam tshig yol? ba'i dngos grub 'tshal ba ste/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba dang/ /bsgrub
121a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs rnams ji lta bar/ /bdag la de bzhin bstan du gsol/ /de nas slob ma lha ru bsam/ /snying shar lha bsti? las sngags kyis rtsal/ /me tog phul te mgo la bcing/ /gdeng g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan/ /bkra shis gug pa
121a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mchog /skal 'jog khyod kyi mgo la bzhag /dngos grub dam pa spyi bos kha rang gi long /bla mas de dag bsal ? bltam pa'i dus lha la bzhin dar tshig gi rtags su ye shes rdo rje sems dpa' mig phye bas dal thams cad mthad do/ /? ? ?
121a5(rgyud 'grel): chus/ /skal rtsol dag byed khrus gsol zhing/ /zhe sdang dri ma legs sbyangs te/ /lha dang mi phyed spro bar bya/ /oM b+ha ya dz+nya na a wa ni de nas lha rnams? thim lag? mdu? bzhug go/ ka maM/ /slob ma lha ru yang dag bskyed/ /yab yum mkha' gsang las byung ba/ /ye shes byang
121a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems chen po/ /bde chen bdud rtsi yang dag sbyin/ /rdo rje lce yis blangs par gyis/ /a ha ma ha su ka ho/ /skrag dang gzi mdangs ldan par bsam/ /de nas bla mas slob ma la/ /bla mas de lta bu gsal bar byin brlabs lha mo yang dag sbyin/ /mkha' 
121a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang byin brlabs sbyor bar bya/ /bde chen mkhas spyod rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dbyings kyi pad+mar yang dag sbyor/ /lhan skyes bde ba rdo rjer 'gyur/ /khyod kyis tshul mchog 'di spyod cig /a nu ra ga badzra stom/ /bde stong mi rtog nam mkha' i bzhin/ /lhan skyes
121b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rje bskom/ de nas lha rnams bde bar sbyang/ /nam mkhar sprin bzhin stong par bsdu/ /de la gang dang mi gnas te/ /yod med kun spangs bsgom par bya/ /dbang bzhi rdzogs par sbyin no/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ho sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba shud d+ho haM/ 'di yis
121b2(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs dngos bral bya/ /yar ngo'i tshes brgyad nyi ma la/ /yon dang mchod pa legs phul te/ /gong bzhin gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /bla mas sngags kyi phreng ba rnams/ /slob ma'i kha ru bstim par bya/ /sngags kyi sgra ni rjes bzlas so/ /bcom
121b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan khro rgyal reg chig dang/ /bla ma bzlas? lung gi bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan rig tshig dbang chog nas rgyal po la/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa ni/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying po thob kyi bar/ /yid dam bgyid par dam
121b4(rgyud 'grel): 'cha'o/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'di la rtsal lags kyis/ /bcom ldan 'di la byin gyis
121b5(rgyud 'grel): rlobs/ /de yi spyi bor me tog bzhag /khro bo rnams ni de la bzhug /khro bo rkyang pa'i rigs stsal lo/ /byin brlab sngon 'gro gong bzhin bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa dang gzungs brjod/ /dam bca' pa la khro mo gzugs/ /byin brlabs pa yang khro mos bya/ /
121b6(rgyud 'grel): yum rkyang dag gi byin brlabs so/ /gzhan phan gzhung nyung 'di sbyar bas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ring gnas shog /dbang gi cho ga arya d+he bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /sems can sku'i? rnam 'gyur //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha yaM kro ta g+hu? ya
121b7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya saM naM can/ bod skad du/ khro bo reg? tshig gi dam tshig gsang ba'i bsgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das reg chig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo bo nyid stong zhing thugs rjes 'jigs pa'i skur snang ba'i/ /de nas rab gtum khros pa'i khro bo khro rnams la sku la
122a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal te/ /de nyid bsgrub phyir de'i bsgrub thabs bri/ /dbang skur legs thob sngags pas thog mar ni/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms sgom/ /skyabs 'gro seMs ? gsuM la seMs can? kyi don du bskyed bshaD dang yi rang dang/ /bskul
122a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing gsol gdab bsngo ba rnams brjod la/ /chos rnams dngos sngar mthob pa rnams thob par by+d pa'i phyir bral stong pa nyi tsher bsam/ /dung skyes ma ser mo gzugs can ma dmar mo/ mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu/ 'di rnams zhal gcig phyag bzhi la/ g.yas rnams gri gug Da ma ru/ g.yon thod pa kha TaM kha lte ba snying la
122a3(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba dkog ma krong bskyad du bsam mo// 'brum gsum las ni 'khor lo sum rtsegs bskyed/ /tri shul rdo rje 'khor lo rim bzhin mtshan/ /bar ma'i lte bar e bskyed chos 'byung bsam/ /de nas raM gyur me'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo pad nyi dgu
122a4(rgyud 'grel): yis rab mtshan bsam/ /phyi rol phyogs mtshams stang du gyur bar dur ba 'og tu sa bzhi dur 'og yi? bar pa khrod steng ma rab? 'jigs 'bar/ /hUM b+haM las gyur rdo rje sngon po rtsibs brgyad pa tri shu la/ 'od rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'phros mchod cing sdig
122a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs tshur 'dus te/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku gnyis mnyam rdzogs bskyed/ /reg tshig reg 'bigs 'jigs ches mi sdug sku/ /'khor yab yum gyi lo hUM las rgya ra mthong skam baM? las sprul gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje tri shu la las glang chen ko
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rlon stag lpaD shan ? bgos? yum su gyon/ dus gcig du/ stag? sham glang chen stod g.yogs smin ma gyen du 'bar pa/ spyan gsum dmar zlum?/ smin mtshams khro gnyer shangs 'bur che ba tshe btsigs? pa ljags 'dril ba/ phyag 'phyad ba phyal 'phyang ba brgyad bskum? mo/ /thod rlon d+ho shal chun stod g.yogs su
122a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phyangs se ral kha /rdo rje tri shul 'khor lo rab rtsibs brgyad pa la bzhi pa bsnams bskor/ /gri gug gsum gyi g.yas pas tri shul 'khor lo g.yon pas/ dang ba'i/ bsnams cing 'khyud/ /'jiD byed pa? byin bas las dus mtshan yum gyi ? pa lnga bcu brdzis shing brgyad bkum bzhugs//
122b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang rnam shas tsher dang 'du shes 'du byed dang/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid la yi ge rim bzhin bkod/ 'od 'phros spyan drangS mchod la gnyis med bstim/ /ye shes bum pas dbang bskur khrus gsol bas/ /mi
122b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hu kar por ? ba/ bskyod sngon po snying ga ? po lte ba/ dmar po mgrin? pa/ ta ljang gu pos? gong kro ? hUM ser ? dmar kha rdza pa sku yis rgyu? truM? mthing gtsug gi rgyan du bsam/ rang la /yab yum rdo rje yid kyi bsams te pad+ma byin rang la/ yang 'od 'phros rigs lnga spyan rnams la sprul pa'i lha mo bzhis dbang bskur la thod pa lnga'i
122b3(rgyud 'grel): steng du rigs lngas rgyas btab par brlabs snyoms zhugs la/ /thig le cha re phyogs mtshams kun tu spro/ /thig le las byung khro tshogs dus gcig bsky+d/ /'jigs 'bar gtum 'bar sgrol 'bar rngam 'bar phyogs/ /stobs 'bar shugs 'bar dbugs
122b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar gzi brjid 'bar /g.yon skor tshul gyis rgyu/ byang chub kyi sems?/ yum gyi mkha' las thig le dkar po gran mtsam bcu drug phyogs bzhir g.yas skor mtshams g.yon bskor du spros pa'o/ shar du mtshams bzhir lho ru dgod nub du byang du par bya/ /khyi gdong byang shar phag nub byang shar lhor
122b5(rgyud 'grel): lho nub gdong khwa shar lhor gzi brjid mtshams gdong 'ug gdong phyogs/ /pho nya mche ? ba'i 'dod du? byang gtan ma ce sbyang gdong can lho nub ba mthar byed gshin rje 'joms gshin rje dgod bdag gis bdag mchod bstod pa bya/ /shar du de nas sngags lho btus legs
122b6(rgyud 'grel): par brjod par rung? bya/ /dge ba 'di yis byed sku g.yas bskor du/ khyu mchog rtogs byang shar gsum myur thob shog /bde mchog ma ? gdong can shar lho ru/ reg tshig gis bsgrub rnam lnga dang gtor ma dang du ? gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams ? rang nyi mchod ston byad? rtsa ba'i thabs/
122b7(rgyud 'grel): arya d+he bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje gdan pa dang/ ba ri lo tshad bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ya haM me b+hi ti nam/ bod skad du/ khro bo reg tshig gi sbyin sreg gi?
123a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga zhes bya ba/ /za? byed rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /za byed rngam pa dgra bgegs sgral/ /drang srong mchog la phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub kun dang nye ba'i phyir/ /sbyin srag cho ga bshad par bya/ /thab
123a2(rgyud 'grel): dang shing dang me dang rdzas/ /dus dang cho ga rnams su des/ /dur khrod sa'i 'jim pa la/ /gru gsum rtse mo lhor bstan pa/ /ngos la 'theb chung khru re ste/ /zab kyi tshad du de rten pa'i phyed yin/ /phyi ru bskyed gzhan la phan don du dang dpangs su
123a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsib/ /kha khyar la sogs sor bzhi yin/ /zhabs su rtse gsum kha khyer la/ /khrag gis sbrus la rdo rje phreng ba bri bar bya/ /stobs gsung ka la chen shugs ldan gyad gsum gyis/ /zur gsum nas ni phyir phyir phyogs su bteg pa bya/ /dug
123a4(rgyud 'grel): ? la khrag ro sol thal ba rnams/ /sbyar ba'i khu ba byug par bya'o/ /dug rtsa khrag la spags pa yis/ /kha khyer la ni gzugs pa'o/ /mdog gnag tsher ma rno ba bzugs brnyan dang/ /dri ngan srin me thab kyi bus zos pa dang/ /'gal rog la
123a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs shing bu la/ bud shing tshad ni ? khru gang la/ /yam shing tshad dang de'i phyed/ /rtsen yam shing dug ? kyi dang mar la spags/ /shing gi de nas shan pa nag po yi/ /khyim nas nyi phyed me blangs la/ /me rdzas nang du blugS ro bsreD la
123a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /chu rtsang me tog dang po'i mar me spos/ /dri dang byis bsnan pa lha bshos rol mo ming rtse mo gnyis rnams/ /thab kyi g.yon du bsham par bya/ /dgu dang nyung kar skye tshe dang/ /d+ha du ra dang til mar rnams/ /g.yas kyi phyogs su
123a7(rgyud 'grel): legs par bzhag /bcu sor gnyis tshan ldan gzag? ba'i rdzas ling ga la/ /dpral mchod rdzas ba bkog ma snying khar ru/ /? rus ming dang ming mkhan rus rnams theg? dang? te/ /yan lag bzhi la dza dang raM/ /yig 'og kun du bstan ye shes khro bo
123b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'bru rnams/ /spyi bo nas bzung g.yas su bskor/ /dza la rag sha'i drag sngags kyis/ /spyi bo nas btsugs g.yon du bskor/ /bsgrub bya'i ling ka bri bar bya/ /rjes sa dri chu dri ma rnaMs/ /khrag la bsres pas byug par bya/ /dgug/ thun gyis?
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhug brab dang bcing ba rnams/ /bsgrub ba'i dus su rdzogs par bya/ /che ge mo'i rtsi ta phyung/ mar ya srog la thun/ /cas pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pri/ /thab khung nad du kho rang gi brub par bya/ /gzung dus ling ka pa tshes brgyad dgra legs pa
123b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub thun gyis sngon dmar ? pas pa'i dus/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs nges yin nges? pa'i du/ /dgu stong nyi phyed nam phyed la /bsreg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin/ /me sbar me prad? smon pa dang/ /me pra brtag dang me lha bskyed/ /mchod pas mchod a bsreg
123b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dbul/ /gnag pa'i rdzas btums bstab par bya/ /bstod dang gsol btab gshegs su gsol/ /sra bkrol gdong pa khrag gis byug /stan spangs pus btsugs gos nag bgo /dur khrod ras dang tshil chen la/ /me bskyed lho'i zur
123b5(rgyud 'grel): nas spar/ /b+ha ya na dza la dza la hUM/ /las 'di myur du 'grub pa na/ /me mdog dmar nag 'tsher ba dang/ /me lce rnol 'tsher ba dang/ /du ba mnga' ltar 'gro bar shog /ji ltar smon pa bzhin byung na/ /ma'i ltas ni bzang ba yin/ /de las bzlog
123b6(rgyud 'grel): na ngan pa yin/ /me'i nang du kaM las ni/ /srin po 'bar ba bskyed par bya/ /spyi bor reg tshog lha dgu bskyed/ /ye shes pa la dgug bzhug bya/ /mchod pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kun/ /rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /b+ha ya na sa ni tra sa ni/ /dza la
123b7(rgyud 'grel): rag sha ma ra mra kaM argaM dmar nag swAhA/ mdog phyag mtshan sku ltar bsam mo/ /pus paM/ du baM/ d+hi paM/ g+han d+haM ni bi te/ mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad nas/ /lan grangs nyi shu re re dbul/ /bsreg ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad kun/ /dgu po'i
124a1(rgyud 'grel): sha dang khrag du bsam/ /kun nas lan grangs gong bzhin dbul/ /b+ha ya na sa ni tra sa ni/ dza la rag sha ma ra pra kaM /che ge mo'i srog la thun ma ra ya phaT/ rang gi mdun gyi ling kha ni/ /mchon gyis nyi shu rtsa gcig gdus
124a2(rgyud 'grel): ming gi ling kha re re dang/ /bcas pa rngam pa'i zhal du bstab/ /b+ha ya na sa ni/ tra sa ni/ dza la rag sha ma dpra kaM /che ge mo ma ra ya rbad srog thun la rbad /tsi ta/ mas/ rag ta/ go ro tsan/ ba su ta/ ra la kha raM kha hI/ /dum bu re re lan re dbul/
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa tshul bzhin bstod par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun gsol ba gtab/ /rang bzhin gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /lhag chad bskang phyir brgya pa brjod/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba yiS/ /bdag sogs bsgrub zhugs gsol par bsams la
124a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gtor mchog? nas? kun/ /dngos grub dang nye bar shog /khro bo reg tshig sbyin sreg 'di/ /dge slong byang chub seng ges bris/ /gzhan la dbang por 'di mi tsha/ /rang gi shes rab sbyang phyir byas/ /'on kyang mkhas pa'i gzhung rnams
124a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'gal zhing nor ba 'di la med// //aTi/ arya d+he bas mdzad do// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha li d+ha b+hi ti na ma/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ khro bo rag tshig gi gto ma/ rad na
124a6(rgyud 'grel): g+hu ru la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsham dang sbyang dang bsang ba dang/ /bskyed dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /dgra bgegs bkug bstam spyan drang dang/ /de bzhin gtor ma dbul ba dang/ /bstod cing gsol gdab gshegs gsol lo/ /
124a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dru sna lnga yi zan la ni/ /zur gsum zur rnaM rtsa ba brtan/ /dkyil mthug dpal byas dkyil du gzugs/ /de yi mdza' ma 'theb skyas dgang/ /ra khyi phag gsum rog po yi/ /sha dang khrag gis brgyan pa ste/ /chus sbyangs bsham snod thod pa'o//
124b1(rgyud 'grel): bar du gcad pa'i bgegs rnams kun/ /se kol rtog cing sngags bzlas la/ /rang rang gnas su bskrad par bya/ /gtor ma gtor snod bcas pa rnams/ /dag pa'i sngags brjod stong par bya/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las/ /rni las byad gsum skyed bu ste/
124b2(rgyud 'grel): aM las rin chen thod pa'i snod/ /dgu? yaM raM laM khaM aM lag pa g.yon pas las ni/ /'khris pa khrag dang glad pa sha /rus pa la sogs dug lnga bsam/ /yi ge 'bru gsum swa b+ha ba'i steng bsams la/ /zhu nas thim pa'i bdud rtsir gyur/ /mi dang 'dra ba du lcags kyu 'dra
124b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od byi ka ? dmar pa mdun rang ? gags tu rjod du rgyab du g.yon? du 'phros pas/ /snying khrag dog /'dod chags nga rgyal gti mug zhe sdang phug a g+hu shas kug ste/ /yaM yA hUM gnyis su med par bstim par dngos po bya/ /'od 'phros lhag dgu pho nya dang/ /bcas snying la nas
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bar mdun du spyan drangs la/ /sngags 'di brjod la dbul bar bya/ /oM dbra? bgegs kyi b+ha ya na sa ni tra sa ni/ badzra kro ta b+ha la ni d+ha kha'i kha hi/ thum b+ha thum b+ha kha hi kha hi gtor ma la ma ha rag ta la kha kha hi/ ma ha maM sa kha kha hi/ gti mug shi'i mchod par zhes/ /zhe sdang dus pa'i
124b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chod? pa bzhes 'dod chags khrag gis mchod pa bzhes/ /ma ra ya ci te srog thun kha kha hi/ /bdun nam gsum brjod zhal du dbul/ /khro rgyal reg tshig stobs po che/ /mun nag lta bu'i sku 'dzin cing/ /phaT kyi sgra 'byin me dpung 'bar/ /mgon du gyur
124b6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i rling dkyil na/ /khro rgyal brgyad po stang stabs tshul du bzhugs/ /zhal du dgra bgegs don snying ma lus gsol/ /khro rgyal gtum chen las kun grub par mdzod/ /dngos grub ci 'dod gsol bar
124b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /badzra mu? brjod gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /dge ba 'di yis thams cad 'byor ldan shog athiM //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA d+he ba tra b+ha sa na tsa na/ bod skad du/ lha chen po gsum gyi bsgrub thabs?
125a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i sde dpon reg chig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /reg chig chogs la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi las byed bsgrub thabs bri/ /rten la bsnyen te gzugs la bsgrub/ /gzugs gnyis dag gis las sbyar sphad/ /lha chen/ klu mgo
125a2(rgyud 'grel): mang? ma za'i snying/ /rten byas 'di rnams brjod par bya/ /lo ki sha ri d+ha ba b+hA ma b+had tra b+had tru h+ri taM dza/ zhag bcu bsnyen pa 'di bya'o/ /de nas lha chen gsum gyi gzugs byas la/ /snying khar 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /bkug byas bkug dmigs pa 'bring/
125a3(rgyud 'grel): la sngags brjod te/ /bcu ru bsgrub pa 'di bya'o/ /las mkhan par par ling kha gtang/ /ral nag skud pas legs dkris la/ /de la sgrol ba'i las bcol te/ /sngags bdag drag po sde gsum po/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i rje/ /
125a4(rgyud 'grel): lha bdud gtso bo mi zad pa/ /dmar ser 'od zer nyi stong chas/ /'dod khams kun 'khor 'khor lo zhon/ /'dod yon drug gi 'khor lo dang/ /nyon mongs lnga yi mdal 'gyengs byed/ /khyod kyis bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/ /tshangs pa
125a5(rgyud 'grel): skyed gu kun gyi rje/ /dkar ser zla ba stong 'od 'gyed/ /pha rol phyin dang mchog phreng can/ /khyod kyis bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/ /lha chen khyab 'jug rgyal chen gtso/ /nag ser char sprin nag po'i mdog /gza' sbrul nag po chibs
125a6(rgyud 'grel): su zhon/ /lag na rdo rje tho chen thogs/ /khyod kyis bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/ /'khros te gsum ka srin po'i gzugs/ /sprul te gsum ka mon pa'i gzugs/ /gzugs ni mi sdug lho yi mon/ /mdog ni mi mdzes thal nag mdog /skad
125a7(rgyud 'grel): ni mi go ldab ma ldib/ /dmod pa 'dor ba shibs se shibs/ /drag sngags zlos pa sha ra ra/ /mon pa mang po bun bun bun/ /mon pa rkang sngon shad de shad/ /mon phrug mang po nyi li li/ khyod kyis bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/ /'di yis
125b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di mchog 'gyur te/ /sngags bdag drag shul stobs ldan shog /las byed kyi bsgrub thabs arya d+he bas mdzad pa/ athii? //*/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra
125b2(rgyud 'grel): tsArya kri ya sa muts+tsha ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba kun laS btus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan gar mdzad rnga zlum la sogs sgra yis bos pa'i lha rnams kyis ni zhabs la phyag byas
125b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'khyog cing g.yo ba'i sku de yi ni zhabs kyi bkod pa rnam par bskyod cing nges par 'dug pa can/ /smim 'khyog po bris shing mig ni rjes 'gro dpung pa'i bkod pa g.yo ba'i lag pa'i sor mo yis/ /phyag rgya 'ching ba rab 'jug rim g.yI gdong
125b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan he ru ka yis khyod kyi sdig pa 'joms gyur cig /'gro mang mya ngan shin tu sdug bsngal bas/ /mang po kun nas lta bar mi nus pa/ /de phyir yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga 'di/ /mkha' 'go'i lam gyur bdag gis nus bzhin bya/ /bdag gis bya
125b5(rgyud 'grel): kun las bcus/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byas pa min/ /gang 'dir tshig gi skyon rnams ni/ /mkhas pa kun gyis bzod par mdzod/ /sna tshogs rgyud rnams kun nas blangs/ /sna tshogs slob dpon luD rnams kyang/ /me long gis 'dir bri bya ste/ /kun nas
125b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'debs dbang gis so/ /rab gnas la sogs bya ba kun/ /rdo rje slob dpon sngon 'gro ba/ /de phyir 'jig rten phan don du/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// //de la re zhig dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid brjod
125b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten laS 'das pa'i kun tu spyod pa ston pa ni slob dpon no/ /gzhan yang sdig pa las ring du song zhing chos la spyod pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig gis cho ga bsgrub pa ni slob dpon no/ /gang yang rdo rje'i lam ston pa po'i slob dpon
126a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje slob dpon no/ /rdo rje'i sgra'i khyad par gyis ni rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa nyid du rab tu rig par bya'o/ /de'ang ci ltar gyur pa zhe na rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags rnam par bral zhing/ smod pa dang ni bstong pa
126a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /bde ba dang ni mi bde 'gog cing 'phel ba'i blo gros spro ba dang ldan rab tu mkhas/ /snying rjes kun nas bskor zhing sngags kyi tshul la ro myong ser sna med cing 'dod pa'ang med/ /de nyid shes pa thob cing rab tu brtan pa'i blo
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rtag tu slob dpon rgyal po'o/ /de yang mchog la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ /bde mchog rgya mtsho'i rgyud las ni/ /ji bzhin gsungs pa'i slob dpon gsum/ /khyim gnas dge tshul zhes bya dang/ /
126a4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong zhes pa rnam gsum 'gyur/ /slob dpon mchog ni dge slong ste/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /'bring ni dge tshul zhes bya ste/ /khyim na gnas pa tha ma'i lugs/ /dbang bskur rnam pa lnga thob/ /khyim na gnas pa tha ma'i
126a5(rgyud 'grel): lugs/ /dbang bskur bcu rnams thob pa ni/ /dge tshul zhes bya 'bring po yin/ /mchog gi dbang bskur thob pa ni/ /dge slong mchog yin rdo rje 'dzin/ /bslab pa'i gnas lnga thob pa dang/ /bslab pa'i gnas bcu ldan pa dang/ /mdza' yi
126a6(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa'i gnas thob pa/ /de gsum mnyam par brjod ma yin/ /mdza' yi bslab pa zhes pa ni/ /mthar thug gnas la slob phyir dang/ /brung 'jug ting 'dzin la 'bang phyir/ /mchog ni mngon sum yod bzhin du/ /sngags pa gzhan
126a7(rgyud 'grel): la bsnyen bkur min/ /gnas gcig gsum ni yod pa las/ /gang tshe khyim nas mchod byed pa/ /de tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun la yang gus med 'gyur/ /de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnam kyis kyang 'di la
126b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa mdzad de de gsungs pa/ dbang bskur mchog thob rdo rje yi/ /slob dpon la ni de bzhin gshegs/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs rnams/ /dus gsum byon nas phyag mdzad do/ /zhes so/ /gang las mchog gi dbang bskur ba
126b2(rgyud 'grel): thob pa de las ni dge slong bcu dang mnyam par don dam pa'i bsnyen pa las gsungs pa/ /dge tshul bcu las lhag pa'i yon tan dge slong mchog /dge slong bcu las lhag pa'i yon tan sngags pa mchog /dpal tshangs par spyod pa dang ni ting
126b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang/ /byams pa la sogs de nyid shin tu rig pa'o/ /dpal ldan tshangs par spyod pa zhes pa la dpal ldan tshangs par spyod pa ni lang tsho can dang rab tu sbyor ba na 'pho ba mi 'ong zhing bde ba sbyin pa ste/ dug gi dbang po zos pa na dug gi de kho nyid
126b4(rgyud 'grel): smra ba po yin gyi/ ma zos na yang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/ /de'i phyir theg pa chen po las mchog gi dbang bskur ba thob pa ni dge slong du mngon par brjod par bya'o/ /gang gi phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis bla ma'i man

126b6(rgyud 'grel): slong ba'i dge slong dang/ gos tsam 'dzin pas phye ba'i dge slong dang/ gsol ba dang bzhis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong dang/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i dge slong ngo zhes pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba/ dge slong rdo rje
126b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa bya /gdug pa 'dul ba de ni mchog /ces so/ /nyon mongs pa bcom pa kho na gdug pa 'dul ba nus par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /gang zhig gsol ba dang bzhis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong de rnams ni nyan thos kyi
127a1(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde'i spyod pa kun tu spyod do/ /de rnams 'dir ni dbang du bya ba nyid med de/ gang gi dman pa la mos pa nyid kyi phyir dang skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir dngul chu'i du ba las gsungs pa/ de las
127a2(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gnyis kyi lus yongs su bzung ba rnams dang/ tshig mdza' dag gi don yongs su dpyad pa byas pa rnams dang/ mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni nyan thos pa'i mdo sde'i spyod pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /gang gi
127a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir? nyan thos la sogs par man pa la mos pa rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa/ bdag nyid sgrub pa dang bral ba sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa bya ba'i lam la mi gnas pa /de kho na nyid shes pa rnams la dad pa med pa/ thar pa la ring
127a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'du shes can/ /bde ba'i thabs lhag par ma thob pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pa dka' ba'i spyod pas dus ring por byang chub 'tshol pa rnams kyis ni/ de ltar yang thob par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ rdzogs pa'i
127a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pas lhag par 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dge slong dngos por gnas pa dang/ /gang zhig rgan por gnas gyur kyang/ gang yang rtog ger dga' ba'i mi/ /de la de nyid bstan mi bya/

127b1(rgyud 'grel): min/ /mkhar bsil lhung bzed lag thogs dpal ldan bla ma min/ /phyag dar khrod pas sdug bsngal dpal ldan bla ma min/ /ljon shing rtsa bar gnas pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher ro/ /gzhan las kyang gsungs

128a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi gsung snying la 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir dge slong gi gzugs kyis ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par mi rigs te/ gang zhig gi mchog gi 'dod chags chen po'i spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dge
128a2(rgyud 'grel): slong gi gzugs nyid kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa ste/ rnam pa 'di nyid sngags kyi tshul gyis spyod pa la ni rigs pas ma yin no/ /de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'da kyis d bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
128a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pa/ sor brgyad la sogs skra dang ni/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bya ba bya/ dge slong rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gzhan rnams su ni nges pa med/ /ces pa la sogs

128b2(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog tu mdzes pa'o/ /de ltar yang rang ngam gzhan gyi dbang yang rung/ /gnas skabs gang du ci spyod kyang/ /bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa'i/ /gnas skabs de la 'bad de bslab/ ces pa'o/ /rab tu dang ba'i mtshan gyis phyug /de nyid
