175b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bzhi dor nas/ /zlum po gcig ni bskor bar bya/ /slar yang cha chung zlum po la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rab mdzes pa'o// de nas cha chud gsum dor nas/ /zlum po gcig ni sbyin bya ste/ /bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thig rnams bshad pa ji bzhin no/
175b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi thig rnams thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir yang de bzhin nyid/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'i thig kyang 'chad par 'gyur pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/
175b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni gzhan dag go/ snying po'i gzhal yas khang las gzhal yas khang gnyis pa ni zlum po'o zhes pa kha cig gi'o/ /gzhan dag ni 'dir gzhal yas khang med de/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba sngar bzhin no/ /zhes pa'o/ /bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid can
175b4(rgyud 'grel): khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la yang/ /tshangs la cha chung bdun mdza' dang/ /brgyad kyi mthar yang thig gdab ste/ /kun nas zur gyi thig gdab ste/ /kun nas zur gyi thig la'o/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba'i mtshan ma ste/ /phyogs su rdo rje'i rwa lde ste/ /kun
175b5(rgyud 'grel): nas cha chung brgyad pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sgrol ma'i lha'i// dkyil 'khor thig gi nges pa ni/ /tshangs las cha chung gsum gyi mthar/ /ge sar rtse mo'i zlum po ste/ /de'i phyir cha chung drug nas bskor/ /'dab ma'i phreng ba'i mtshan ma'o/ /der gnas
175b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs dang de bzhin slar 'jud? gyi thig kyang dbyi bar bya/ /dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni ji bzhin slar/ /nyer lnga'i bdag nyid 'od zer can/ /dkyil 'khor la yang de bzhin no/ /bcu gsum gyi ni bdag nyid can/ /bsrung ba
175b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi dkyil 'khor yang/ /tshangs pa'i thig las cha chung gnyis/ /ge sar rtse mo'i zlum po ste/ /de nas cha chud bzhin nas bskor/ /'dab ma'i don du rab mdzes pa'o/ /de nas cha chud bar phyogs su/ /cha chud brkyang pa'i pad+ma ste/ /thig de
176a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi pha rol du/ /kun nas gru bzhi sbyin par bya/ /tshangs pa'i thig dang de bzhin du/ /slar yang zur gyi thig rnams dbyi/ /gsum lhag pa yi brgya phyed can/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la'ang/ /rtsa ba yi ni nang?
176a2(rgyud 'grel): du thig/ cha chung brgyad du sbyin par bya/ /de nyid gnyis pa nad ma yin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rtsa thig yin/ /rta babs med cing sgo khyad bcas/ /sgo rnams dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /rtsa ba'i nang gi mthar thug par/ /kun nas zlum po sbyin par
176a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /slar yang cha chung zlum po la/ /rdo rje yi ni mtshan ma ste/ /tshangs pa'i g.yas dang g.yon dag tu/ /cha chung gnyis gnyis kyi ni bar/ /spangs nas thig ni rab sbyin bya/ /zlum po'i thig gnyis bar du'o/ /cha chung bar nas slar yang thig/
176a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ba'i don du de bzhin sbyin/ /re mig dgur ni 'gyur ba yin/ /tshangs pa'i thig la sogs pa dbyi/ /de nyid bsdus pa las khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi dkyil 'khor lo ni nang gi gzhal yas khang pa rta babs dang bcas pa'o/ /zhes
176a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gsum bdag nyid can/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du thig/ rang gi sgo tshad gnyis kyi bar/ /der yang sngags pas sbyin par bya/ /zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o/ /de nyid gnyis
176a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nang gi ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi yang rtsa thig yin/ /rta babs med cing sgo dang ni/ sgo 'gram sogs dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin du/ /de yi yang ni nang du bya/ /ji ltar rdo rje dbyings bzhin nang/ /de bzhin
176a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang re'u mig dgu /de nyid sngags pa rnams kyis bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor/ /gsung gi dbang phyug dkyil 'khor la'ang/ /'khor lo thams cad mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /thig gdab pa ni shes bya ste/ /khyad bar
176b1(rgyud 'grel): slar yang brjod par bya/ /kun nas zlum pa bzang po yis/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'khor lo bya/ /gos 'og rtsa ba nas gzung ste/ /pha rol gos kyi 'og nas thig /thig gi rim pa ma 'das par/ zlum po 'dun ni bskor bar bya/ /rtsa ba'i thig ge nang dag tu
176b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo gnyis kyi ni bar spangs nas/ /thig gcig rab tu sbyin bya ste/ /zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o/ /thig de yang ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnyis pa yi yang rtsa ba yin/ /rta babs med cing sgo khyad bcas/ /sgo rnams dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /de yi nang du gsum
176b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rtsa ba ste/ /sgo gnyis yongs su de ri bas na/ /thig kyang de bzhin gdab par bya/ /rta babs med cing sgo 'gram dang/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sogs kyis brgyan/ /de yi yang ni nad dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin nyid/
176b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings kyi nang ji bzhin/ /de bzhin 'dir yang mig dgu'o/ /rwa yi phyi rol gyur pa 'dir/ /gser gyis la sor bzhi ste/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba de bzhin bya/ /rin chen phreng ba de bzhin slar/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin nyid/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba slar
176b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin/ /lhag ma'i gnas la de bzhin du/ /phyi rol 'od zer sor bcu gnyis/ /shes pa ni 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer gyi mthar thug pa la khru bcu drug gi /tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig brjod par bya ste/ /gzhan du yang 'di'i
176b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bdag nyid lha/ /'phags lugs 'khor lo ji lta bar/ /de nyid rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ngan song sbyod ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /khyad par rdo rje'i phreng ba yi/ /nang du rig par bya ba ste/ /rdo rje'i
176b7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba sogs spabs nas// 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi nad dag tu/ /'di ni sgo yi bar spangs nas/ /thig gsum rab tu sbyin bya ste/ /zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o/ /cha chud rig byed spangs nas kyang/ /thig gcig slar
177a1(rgyud 'grel): yang ? bar bya/ /slar yang mchud bzhi spangs nas/ /de bzhin du yang thig sbyin no/ /dbus su re khA dgu pa ste/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i zlum po yi/ /pho brang bzhis ni shes par bya/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /da ni
177a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' 'gro lnga rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni brjod par bya/ /so so'i ngos su tshangs pa las/ /cha chung phyed dang lnga spangs par/ /bya ste de la cha chud bcu gnyis/ /cha ni gnyis gnyis ngos dag tu/ /spangs par rtsa ba'i thig bya zhing/ /nang gi
177a3(rgyud 'grel): cha yi brgyad cha yi/ /tshad nges sgo dang sgo logs sogs/ /bya ste rta babs med pa'o/ /cha chung spang cha chung spangs nas phyogs rnams su/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la yang/ /rim pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas paS thig rnamS sbyin par bya/ /phyogs
177a4(rgyud 'grel): su dkyil 'khor phyi yis/ /cha chung phyed dang gnyis par shes/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lor yang/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nad du ni/ /thig gcig rab tu sbyin bya ste/ /kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do/ /slar yang cha chung gcig nas thig/ rdo rje'i
177a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'i mchan ma ste/ /zla phyed mnyam pa'i rnam pa yis/ /dbus su legs par mdzes par bya/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lor ni/ /'khor lo'i phrang bar zlum po nyid/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro'i rin chen gyis/ /kun nas legs
177a6(rgyud 'grel): par bskor ba ni/ /rin chen cha brgyad lta bu ste/ /de yi dbus su slar yang bya/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lor ni/ /cha chung dag la pad+ma'i phreng/ /gru bzhi pa dang pad+ma yi/ /rnam pa de yi dbus su bya/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i 'khor
177a7(rgyud 'grel): lor yang/ /ral phre'i phreng pa cha chung ste/ /de yi dbus su gru gsum bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pas so/ /rang rang dkyil 'khor tshad kyis ni/ /sgo la sogs pa rab tu brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur drug dkyil 'khor la/ /mkhas paS thig
177b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams sbyin bya ste/ /tshangs las g.yas dang g.yon dag tu/ /cha chung bzhi bzhi spangs nas su/ /cha chung brgyad po 'di rnams la/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par rdzogs par bya/ /bcu gnyis char ni mnyam byas nas/ /chin gnyis gnyis ngos
177b2(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ /spangs te sgo la sogs pa bya/ /slar yang rta babs med pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshad kyi ni/ /cha chung gnyis nyid spangs par yang/ /tshad kyi don du sgrub pa pos/ /zlum po'i thig kyang bskor bar bya/ /slar yang de bzhin phyi rol du/
177b3(rgyud 'grel): cha chung bcu yi bar nas bskor/ /cha lnga rnams su byas pa la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po de bzhin bya/ /phyi nang zlum po dag dang ni/ /gzhan yang lhag pa'i re khA dbye/ /nad ma dang ni lhan gcig tu/ dkyil 'khor drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor
177b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi nad nyid du/ /lte ba'i don du cha chung gsum/ /de phyir 'dab ma'i don du yang/ /cha chung drug pa'i zlum po bya/ /phyi rol phyogs dang phyogs bral du/ /cha chung drug pa'i pad+ma brgyad/ /de yi phyi nas zlum po gcig/ /cha chung bar nas slad de
177b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /rang rang dkyil 'khor tshad kyis ni/ /sgo sogs mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /gzhan pho? brang bdun pI dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzhal yas khong gi khyad par rnams kyang bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs te dpags la mkhas pa
177b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /slar yang dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dir brjod pa'i rgyud gzhan mdza' dag tu gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams las nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa gdul bar bya ba'i don du bya
177b7(rgyud 'grel): ba mi 'dra bar gsungs pa'o/ /de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang nyid sna tshogs pa'i skus dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i dbang phyug yin pas mngon par 'dod pa thams
178a1(rgyud 'grel): cad bskyed cing 'byung ba'o zhes brtan par mos pa byas na rgyud gzhan gyi cho gas kyang rab tu gnas pa la sogs pa rjes su gnang zhing mi 'gal bas mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/ /nges na dus kyi 'khor lo'i bya ba rab
178a2(rgyud 'grel): tu spros pa rnams yongs su dor nas dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa tsam brjod par bya'o/ /rdul mtshon dgye ba tsam yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdul tshon dgye ba'i skabs su brjod par bya'o/ /'dir slob dpon gyi mtheb sor nyi shu rtsa bzhin
178a3(rgyud 'grel): khru ste khur bzhi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nyid 'gyur srid du khru brgyad pa'i tshangs thig gnyis gdab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la de bzhin du zur thig gnyis so/ /thig skud kyi sboms su ni slob dpon gyi nas kyi tshad do/ /de la thugs kyi dkyil
178a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi sgo'i drug cha ni mtheb sor phyed kyi tshad de cha chung du tha snyad gdags par bya'o/ /snying po nyid du thig gzung nas/ /lte ba'i don du cha chung gnyis/ /de nas 'dab ma'i cha chud bzhir/ /rdo rje can gyis zlum po bya/ /de nas bar med
178a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni thig/ kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te/ /cha chung bar nas slar sbyin/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o/ /cha chung bzhi yi bar spangs nas/ /zur gnyis dag la thug pa'i thig/ slar yang cha chung bar dor nas/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab po/ /'di
178a6(rgyud 'grel): yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /rab mdzes cha chung bzhi pa ste/ /ngos ni gnyis po dag tu yang/ /cha chung re re'i ka ba bya/ /de dag gi ni ngos su rgyar/ /cha chung gsum pa'i bum pa ste/ /slar yang ka ba cha chung nyid/ /srid du cha chung bzhi pa'o/ /phyi nas de yi
178a7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ma yi/ /phyi rol du ni thig gdab ste/ /cha chung thub pa yongs dor nas/ /zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o/ /de yi phyi rol lha snam la/ /cha chung bzhi ni spangs par te/ /de nas cha chung bar spangs nas/ /rtsa thig rab tu gdab par bya/ /rtsa 
178b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i thig gi mthar thug/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin zhing/ /'khor lo'i brgyad cha sgo yin te/ /de yi drug cha cha chung ngo/ /de la tha snyad byas pa ni/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /sgong mtshad kyis sbo khyad de/ /'gram dang sogs
178b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin no/ /de yi phyed kyis stegs bur 'gyur/ /stegs bu'i phyed kyis mtshon gyis/ /dri ba stegs bu'i tshad du 'gyur/ /rin chen sa ni de yi phyed// shar bu dang ni mdal yab sa/ /tshon gyi sa dod? mnyam pa ste/ /ka sa? cha chung phyed dang gnyis/ /bang
178b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rin chen la sogs bdun/ /cha chung phyed dang brgyad pa yi/ /dpangs su yang dag gnas pa ste/ /de yi steng du gnas pa yi/ /rta babs rtsegs ma gsum par 'gyur/ /steng du sgo las sum 'gyur gyi/ /tshad ldan mdzes par gyur ba der/ /brtsegs
178b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang po cha chung drug /gnyis pa la ni phyed dang lnga/ /gsum pa cha chung phyed dang bzhi/ /rgya phubs cha chung gnyis par brjod/ /de nyid steng du gnas pa yi/ /bum pa cha chung gnyis par 'gyur/ /de la brtsegs ma dang por ni/ /snam bu dang po cha chung
178b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig/ nyi shu rtsa bzhir ring ba'o/ /de yi steng du cha chung gcig /myos pa bsrung ba'i snam bu ste /rings su cha chung bcu drug pa'o/ /de yi steng gi dbus su ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas nyid kyang/ /cha chung bzhi pa rab mdzes pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon
178b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas bya/ /de yi yang ni ngos dag tu/ /cha chung re re'i ka pa bya/ /slar yang mchod pa'i lha mo'i gnas/ /ngos gnyis dag tu de bzhin te/ /phyir zhing che chung ka ba dag /ngos dag tu yang de bzhin nyid/ /ngos gnyis dag tu so ldan gyi/
178b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang po mnan pa'i seng ge sta/ /seng ge'i mgo bo steng du 'degs/ /de dag spyi bor de bzhin slar/ /snam bu cha chung phyed par 'gyur/ /bco brgyad du yang ring pa'o/ /de steng snam bur gyur pa ni/ /myos pa bsrung ba zhes bya ba/ /bar ni cha
179a1(rgyud 'grel): chung gcig par 'gyur/ /rings su cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de steng de bzhin ring pa yi/ /snam bu'i bar la cha chung gsum/ /der ni rkang pas dman pa yi/ /cha chung gis kyang ka bzhi bya/ /lha mo rnams kyi gnas rnams kyang//
179a2(rgyud 'grel): ka ba'i bar du yong dag gnas/ /cha chung gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /gnas gsum slar yang sngags pas bya/ /ka ba'i phyi rol ngos dag tu/ /gdung 'degs pa yi lha mo bya/ /de yi spyi por slar yang dbangs/ /cha chung phyed pa'i snam bur 'gyur
179a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid cha chung bcwa? lnga yi/ /rings su yang dag gnas pa yin/ /de steng myos pa bsrung ba yi/ /snam bu la ni cha chung ste/ /rings su cha chung brgyad par 'gyur/ /de steng cha chung gnyis pa ste/ /de yang rings su de bzhin nyid/ /'di la yang
179a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ka ba bzhi/ /cha chung phyed pa'i tshad dang ldan/ /rings su cha chung gnyis par ldan/ /gnas gsum cha chung gnyis pa yang/ /ka ba'i bar du yang dag gnas/ /phyi rol ka ba'i ngos dag tu/ /sngar bzhin gdung 'degs lha mo'o/ /de steng
179a5(rgyud 'grel): cha chung phyed pa yi/ /snam bu cha chung bcu gnyis? su/ /de ni ring bar gyur pa yin/ /de steng rgya phubs yang dag gnas/ /cha chung brgyad du ring ba ste/ /de la steng du bum pa'i gnas/ /de yi g.yas dang g.yas min du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni
179a6(rgyud 'grel): ba den phyag snam du kun gyi rtsa mo la/ /dril bu me long rnga yab dang/ /rgyal mtshan la sogs khyad par gyis/ /der yang brgyan par bya ba yin/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor bya ba ste/ /thugs kyi
179a7(rgyud 'grel): nyis? 'gyun? chad kyi? ni/ /de yi tshad rnams rab tu brtag /so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su/ /de la cha chung bcu gnyis ni/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsig sogs dang/ /mda' yab rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o/ /de yi phyi
179b1(rgyud 'grel): rol thig gcig ni/ /cha chung bdun gyi bar du slar/ /cha chung dag ni bzhi rnams kyis/ /slar yang lha'i snam bu'o/ /cha chung bzhi pa'i pad+mar 'gyur/ /de yi phyogs su gyur pa yang/ /thugs kyi rta babs 'og rnams su/ /shes bar bya ste mdor bsdu
179b2(rgyud 'grel): na/ /myos pa bsrung ba'i snam bu sogs/ /brtsegs ma gnyis pa dag la yang/ /cha chung bzhi yi bar du ni/ /kun nas 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /ka ba gnyis kyi bar la yang/ /cha chung phyed dag bsnur nas so/ /lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni//
179b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol cha chung bar rnams su/ /rtsa thig rab tu sbyin bya ste/ /zur thig gnyis kyi bar du'o/ /sgo dang rta babs dag kyang der/ /sngar gyi rim pas bri bar bya/ /'on kyang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor tshad/ /nyis 'gyur gyi ni tshad kyis so/ /gsung gi dkyil
179b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rtsa ba las/ /phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog /de las nyis 'gyur tshad kyis ni/ /de yi tshad rnams rab gzhal bya/ /so so'i phyogs kyi cha rnams su/ /cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor thig sogs dang/ /mnga' yab
179b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bsgribs pa'o/ /cha chung drag po der spangs nas/ /thig ni zur gnyis bar du ste/ /slar yang cha chung nyi ma ni/ /spangs nas lha snam de bzhin no/ /snam bu 'di de nyid la ni/ /pad+ma yang ni bcu gnyis te/ /de rnams cha chung bcu gnyis
179b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de las yang ni cha chung gi /dbus kyi cha yi lte ba ste/ /de yi g.yas dang g.yas min du/ /'dab ma rnams ni bzhi bya zhing/ de yi g.yas dang g.yon dag tu/ /'dab ma rnams ni brgyad du bya/ /de yang g.yas dang g.yon rnams su/ /'dab
179b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams ni bcu drug 'gyur/ /de yang rim pa gsum pa ste/ /rim pa gsum du gyur pas kyang/ /'dab ma nyi shu? rtsa brgyad ngo/ /lha yi snam bu'i thig las ni/ /phyi rol du yang rtsa ba'i thig/ /cha chung bar nas sbyin bya ste/ /zur gyi thig gi bar du'o//
180a1(rgyud 'grel): sgo dang rta babs dag gi tshad/ /sngar brjod ji bzhin 'dir yang ste/ /'on kyang gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'khor tshad/ /nyis 'gyur dag gis rab gzhal bya/ /chu yi 'khor yug phyed du yang/ /rta babs kyis kyang khyab pa'o//
180a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi dkyil 'khor rta babs las/ /phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sgo yi dbus su shing rta ni/ /cha chung bcu gnyis pa rnams bya/ /sa yi 'khor yug la yod ni/ /cha chung ngag ni bcu gnyis bya/ /de yi phyi nas chu yi ni/ /'khor
180a3(rgyud 'grel): yug cha chung nyer bzhi ste/ /de phyir mi yi 'khor yug la/ /slar yang cha chung nyer bzhi'o/ /de nas rlung gi 'khor yug la/ /cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ /de las phyi rol nam mkha' yi/ /'khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so/ /sa sogs 'khor yug
180a4(rgyud 'grel): drug po yi/ /dang por zlum po rab tu sbyin/ /'od phreng mthar yang zlum po ste/ /zlum po bdun du 'gyur ba yin/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog/ /'di yi thig skud khru brgyad de/ /'dzin ma'i zlum pa
180a5(rgyud 'grel): ji srid du'o/ /zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go /gang gi tshe 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i? tshad dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad du yongs su brtags te de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pa
180a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i tshe cha chung nges gtso bo'i pad+ma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyis 'khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o/ /de'i tshe ni thugs rdo rje gtso bo ste dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu gnyis dang/ /de'i
180a7(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni sa'i 'khor yug gi dang po ji srid du'o zhes pa phyogs gnyis pa'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung rdo rje'i gnas su gyur na/ /gsung rdo rje ni gto bo ste/ /de las gzhan
180b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha la sogs pa dgong pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin no/ /gang gi tshe yang dbus kyi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa dang de'i nyis 'gyur gnyis pa dang/ /de'i nyis 'gyur gsum pa yin pa de'i tshe khru bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung
180b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor dang/ /de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud khru sum bcu so gnyis ni sa'i 'khor yug gi dang po ji srid du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o/ /gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad par brjod par brjod par
180b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshar bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags te/ /de'i drug cha la cha chung du tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe cha chung nges gtso bo'i pad+ma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi 'khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs
180b4(rgyud 'grel): bya zhing/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o/ /sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin no/ /de'i tshe sku rdo rje ni gtso po'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor la
180b5(rgyud 'grel): khru nyi shu dang de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skus khru bzhi bcu ni sa'i khor yug gi dang po ji snyam du'o zhes pa phyogs bzhi pa'o/ /de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las thig skung khru brgyad pa zhes pa ni rtsa ba la khru brkyad ces bya ba ste dkyil 'khor gyi ni
180b6(rgyud 'grel): nyis 'gyur ro/ /zhes rnam par bkral nas de la dang po'i sangs rgyas su thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu gnyis bya zhing/ de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni k ru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor la khru bcu drug go /sku'i
180b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu'o/ zhes pa ni nges pa ste thig skud ni de'i nyis 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /dbang gi don du ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor tsam yang bskor par rjes su gnang ste/ ji skad du/ dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor rim ni rigs
181a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang gis phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so/ gang yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ /sgo 'khor lo'i dgu cha dang/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las/ /sgo 'khor
181a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i bcu char gsungs pa de dag ni/ /slob dpon rnams da lta tha snyad mi mdzad mod/ /bdag gis ni yongs su byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi tshad rnams kyang rab tu grags pa brjod kyi 'di tsam kho na ni ma yin no/ /de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das
181a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gam/ /'khor lo sbyar? ba'i rgyal po yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ /kun nas dpag tshad rab tu'o/ /gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa la/ /mkhas pas mnyam par bltas nas ni/ /'dod pas tshad ni
181a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa las/ nyes bcung zad yod ma yin/ /rang gi 'dod pas dkyil 'khor kun/ /lag pa'i mthil du bris byas nas/ /bstan bcos las gsungs don byed de/ /sa stengs sogs su smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpag tu med pa'i
181a5(rgyud 'grel): dbye bas tha dad ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ji tsam zhig mngon par brjod par bya bar nus/ /gang gi phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor ji lta de bzhin du/ /rab tu brtag pa su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi rnal
181a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub pa yin/ /zhes pa dkyil 'khor la thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas gtor ma byin la/ /baM laM raM yaM haM rnams kyi sa bon las grub pa'i dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku
181a7(rgyud 'grel): dang nag po'i tshon rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba chu shel dang/ karke Ta Ni dang/ pad+ma rA ga ? in+t+ra nI la las byung ba rnams sam yang na mu tig dang gsar dang byi ru dang bsres pa mu men las byung ba rnams sam/ /bsras pa ni 'dar mu tig la
181b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bzhi po rnams so/ /yang na khams las byung ba 'am/ /'bras las byung ba 'am/ /me tog las byung ba 'am/ /ji ltar rigs bar sol ba dang so phag dang rus pa'i phye ma la sogs pas kyang rung/ legs par 'dus byas pa'i bzang po
181b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams buM aM h+rIM:khaM hUM rnams las grub pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsams nas/ /nam mkha' lag kod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kar buM la sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams
181b3(rgyud 'grel): thig skud 'du bya bar brjod pa'i 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyi bkug ste bcug pas ye shes kyi tshon dang lhan cig ro gcig tu gyur pa rnams la bum zhes pa la sogs pas mngon par bsngags shing/ /oM badzra tsa tra sa ma ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags
181b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags so/ /de bzhin du 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag par gzi brjid bskyed cing/ /re re la h+ri yig bkod nas/ /bden ba gang gi sems can rnams rdul tshon mang zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can
181b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la chags pas rjes su chags par gyur pa'i bden pa des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig /ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sbar bar bya ste/ /lha bsgoms pa phul du byung ba las ni 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /dri dang me tog la
181b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas mchod nas snod sar par gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes pa rdul tshon gyi bzlas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar gnas pa'i phur bu dkyil 'khor ji lta bar 'chad par 'gyur pa'i las thams
181b7(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i sngags kyis bton nas rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la bstim ste phur bu'i khung bu rin po che lnga dang tshon sna lngas bkang bas mnyam por byas la/ dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i glus mtshan ma ngan pa bsam bar bya'o/ chos dbyings 'di
182a1(rgyud 'grel): ni ngag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab grol mdzad/ /rang nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /'khor lo'i nang du yang dag bzhugs/ /sems can
182a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar bya/ /zhes pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par mos la/ /lag pa g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan zhing g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis oM badzra raM ga sa ma ya oM A:hUM zhes pa 'am/ oM badzra tsitra sam la hUM
182a3(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar du phyogs par 'dug pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te/ g.yas skor du mtshon bgye bar bya'o/ /phyi nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo'i slob dpon la sogs pa gzhan gyis rkyad do/ /sboms
182a4(rgyud 'grel): su sgro? yi nyi shu cha'i/ /re khA yang dag dang bya ste/ /mnyam zhing drang po ma chang pa/ /ji ltar rigs pa'o pan tshun gyi/ /bar gyi tshad ni nas tsam la 'og dang steng ni ci mngos? bya/ /sbom por bkyen nang 'byung ste/ /phra mo yis ni rnam par sdang//
182a5(rgyud 'grel): chad na bla ma slob ma 'chi/ /g.yas skor min par bkye na ni/ /tshon rnams phur bus btab par 'gyur/ /phur bus btab pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu ma yin pa ste/ /phan tshun 'dres pas ni rigs 'chang par 'gyur ro/ /nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
182a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nyid med pa'i bsam sbyor las/ /gang zhig tshon bkye'i nyes pa ste/ /bzang po'i de nyid bsam sbyor las/ /sus kyang bar chad bya mi nus/ /dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin/ /ji srid du ni de nyid brtag
182a7(rgyud 'grel): ces so/ /tshon gyi de khA rnams kyang rin po che dkar po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi thur ma la sogs pa'i ngo bor lhag par myos par bya'o/ /'byung ba las thig dang tshon la 'goms pa'i sdig pa 'jigs pa'i phyir rdo rje shugs kyis
182b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi tshon gyi re khA yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg la/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ zhes bzla zhing/ rtsa ba'i thig gi nang? du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang pa 'am 'byung bar bya'i/ /de la dang por lha thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la
182b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbus kyi gtso bo'i kha dog gi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi'i re khA nas brtsams te/ nang
182b3(rgyud 'grel): gi re khA'i bar du tshon sna lnga'i rtsig pa'i re khA rnams kyi kha dog go/ /phyogs dang dbus su lha gzhan 'gong pa na rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi rim pa'o/ /bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la rtsig ba lnga po 'di dag rin
182b4(rgyud 'grel): po che kha dog lnga las grub cing bar ni nas tsam mo zhes pa kha cig go /rtsig pa 'di ni gcig nyid rim gyis stang nas stang du kha dog lnga'i rin po che las byas pa'o/ /zhes pa ni gzhan dag go/ /'dir 'dod pa dang po la rin po che'i snam bu'i sa
182b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dmar po dang dra ba dang phra ba phyed pa'i sa gzhi nag po'o/ /'dod pa gnyis pa la ni dang po'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che'i snam bu ste/ yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyi rin po che las grub pa bgod pa
182b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rin po che'i snam bu'o/ /lnga pa'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid sna tshogs pa'i dra ba dang dra ba bu'o/ /phyogs gzhan brjod ba ni de'i steng du rin po rje'i che las grub pa bkod pa ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'i snam bu'o/ /phyogs gzhan
182b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod ba ni de'i steng du rin po rje'i snam bu do shal gyi snam bu'o/ /'dod pa gnyis pa la yang stegs so bu ni shel lam gser gyi rang bzhin nam pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin nam/ rin po che gzhan yang rung ste ji ltar mdzes pa'o/ /rin po che'i shar bu
183a1(rgyud 'grel): dang mda' yab rnams ni dkar po'o/ /rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab dang dar dbyangs kyi bar gyi sa gzhi ni sngon po ste nam mkha' i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir bar gyi snam bu la mun pa'i snam bu zhes brjod do//
183a2(rgyud 'grel): gdung ni ji ltar mdzes pa'i rin po che las byas pa ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i pa Ta 'phro ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/ kyog po'i nang gi bla
183a3(rgyud 'grel): res kyis yang de rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi 'od kyis spras pa'i nam mkha' i rang bzhin no/ /rta rmig dang ba ran gyi kha dog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste chu srin gyi snam bu yang ngo/ /'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog ste rin po che
183a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las kyang byas pa'o/ /zhes kha cig go/ ri dags dang ri dags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin la rin po che gzhan gyis spras pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po ste kha cig tu ni gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/
183a5(rgyud 'grel): rwa dbus ma rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog ste de las gzhan pa rnams ni de dag gi ngos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/ ? lnga pa las ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ste ji ltar rigs par ro/ /phyogs gcig gi rwa thams cad kyang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go/ zhes pa kha cig tu ste/ 'khor lo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go/ zhes pa ni phyogs
183a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan no/ /bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o/ /dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i shing lta bu'o/ /pad+ma'i lte ba ni ljang ku ste ge sar ni ser po yin la 'dab ma rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog go/ de'i sa gzhi
183b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dmar po shas che pa'i dkar po ste chos 'byung gi cha'i re khA ni dkar po'o/ /khor yug gi phyogs la yang shel nyid yin na re khA dkar po'am gser gyi mdog yin na ser po'o/ /rdo rje rnams dang de'i re khA yang nag po ste gzhan du dkar po 'am ser po ?
183b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' nas steng du yang 'og min gyi mdza' ji srid par rdo rje'i rab gnas ba'i phyir dang/ rlung la sogs pa rnams kyang ji
183b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'od zer rnams ni kha dog lnga pa ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ni/ rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir/ /ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod/ /chos sku'i bdag nyid legs
183b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa/ /'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rigs pas/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang ku dang ni nag po nyid/ /rtsig pa yi ni tshe na/ zhes gsungs so/ /gang gi tshe/ chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar/ /des na ngag
183b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang 'di dkar nyid/ /ces gsungs pas gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe ni/ /dkar po dang ser po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'i tshon gyi re khA'o// kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po yin na'ang mi bskyod
183b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir nang gi rtsig pa nag po nyid do/ /gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te/ /ji ltar gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur paS kha cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes so/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi dkyil 'khor du yang
183b7(rgyud 'grel): zur thig gnyis gnyis kyi yongs su bcang pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/ bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thog rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /ka ba rnams kyang de bzhi cha
184a1(rgyud 'grel): te rang rang gi re mig gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o/ /gtso bo'i sa gzhi ni gtso bo'i mdog go /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ /bden bral ljang ku dbang ldan gnag/ /me dang rlung ni ser po ste//
184a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o/ /gtso bo'i snam bu la ni gtso bo'i mtshan mai phreng ba ste/ re khA bzhin gyi legs pa'i yon tan dang kha dog ni ji ltar mdzes pa'o/ /dpal ldan bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po'o//
184a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i? rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsung gi 'khor lo ni dmar po'o/ /de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dkar po ste/ sku'i 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sku'i 'khor lo ni dkar po'i/ /de'i rtsibS
184a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go /mu khyud gsum ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang/ /pad+ma dmar po dang/ 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng ba
184a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /de'i phyi rol nas brtsams te nang gi bar du ljang ku dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i kha dog gi re khA lnga'o/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang dbus kyi sa gzhi dang thog rnams kyang dkar po dang ljang
184a6(rgyud 'grel): ku dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po'i kha dog go/ gzhan dag ni re khA lnga dang sa gzhi dang thog rnams nag po dang ljang ku dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdog go zhes zer ro/ /de ltar snga ma dang phyi mar
184a7(rgyud 'grel): kha dog gi rim pas yongs su bsams nas rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /de la skal dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya nyid ji ltar rigs par bri bar bya'o/ /skal pa dang ldan pa 'dus pa na ni lha'i sku bri bar bya zhing/ bris
184b1(rgyud 'grel): sku 'am lugS ma'am 'bur du gtod pa 'am legs par 'dus byas pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar yang klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis/ /ji ltar nus pas dkyil 'khor du/ /sa bon dgong bya yang na ni/ /mtshan ma 'am lha yi gzugs nyid de/ /lugs ma
184b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am 'bur ma bzhag par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /phyag rgya bri bar ni mngon par brjod pa bla ma'i rgyud las gsungs so/ /mi nus na ni bris pa'i phyag rgya 'am mtshan ma bzhag par bya ste/ /tshon nam yang na pir rnams kyis/ /bris pa rnams kyis rnam
184b3(rgyud 'grel): par spras/ /shes so/ /de'i phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ral gri sngo bsangs so/ /shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /lhor nyi ma la
184b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang ku cha dgu ba'o/ /nub tu nyi ma la 'od dpag med kyi pad ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang ku'o/ /mer zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar
184b5(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o/ /bden bral du zla ba la mA ma kI'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste rgyud du de ltar gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /rlung du zla ba la gos dkar mo'i pad+ma dmar po kha bye zhing yub rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la sgrol ma'i
184b6(rgyud 'grel): utpal kha dog sngo ser ro/ /me la sogs pa'i zur bzhi dang shar sgo'i g.yon dang g.yas su cha chung gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi dbyings
184b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang dri za'i pi wang sngon po dang dri ser po'i dung dang ro'i snod dmar po dang/ sna tshogs pa'i gos dang chos 'byung dkar po rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje thar byed dang
185a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi go rim ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje'i thob nag po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje kha gyes pa sngon po'o/ /'di ltar
185a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan nas gnas pa ste/ 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi ni nub tu mgo bstan pa'o/ /de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang de/ /rdo
185a3(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni/ dbus su chu skyes dang zla ba la zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o/ /gcig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so/ /dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon gyi re khA mi bya'o zhes man ngag go /zlum po'i thig gi phyi rol
185a4(rgyud 'grel): du tshangs thig gi ngos so sor cha chung bzhi spangs nas bum pa cha chung bzhi pa ste bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa brgyad do/ /zhes phyogs gcig gi ste gzhan dag ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go/
185a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes ba'o/ /'di dang phyi ma rnams la yang dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyi mtshan ma 'god pa na de'i gnas su dbus su kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o/ /bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su nyi ma la si/
185a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa in+d+ra ni la lta bu dang/ /rag bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so/ /rnam par sna mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no//
185a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gsum par sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu 'tshangs pa'i theg las cha chung spangs par g.yon du byams pa'i klu shing me tog 'khor lo dang bcas pa dang/ g.yas su sa'i snying po 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /lhor
185b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha' i snying po'i rdo rje dang cha dgu pa'i rin po che mar ka ta'o/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam ba'i dbyangs kyi pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri'o/ /byang du de bzhin du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang kun tu
185b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang pad+ma dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me la sogs pa'i zur
185b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams su mi g.yo ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po ni gshin
185b4(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi bos su ste/ gzhan dag ni 'khor lo ser po'o zhes so/ /gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje ni pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su'o/ /byams pa la sogs pa brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa ste/ gshin rje gshed la
185b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bcu'i mtshan ma ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa ste bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin no// //kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor la dbus
185b6(rgyud 'grel): su zla ba la rdo rje sems dpa' i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o// shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dang/ lhor nyi ma la rin chen dbang po'i rin po che dang/ /nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mdza' yas kyi mnga' dang/ byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i
185b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /spyan ma'i smin la gnas pa'i mig dang/ mA ma kI'i mnga' dang gos dkar mo'i mnga' dang sgrol ma'i utpal dmar po'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su drag mo'i mnga' dang bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma'i shak+ti dang rlung dus
186a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ljang ngo/ /rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs su bzhad ma'i rdo rje dang lhor sgeg mo'i rdo rje dang nub tu glu ma'i mkhar rnga dang byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang ku dang dbang ldan du gling bu ma'i gling bu dang
186a2(rgyud 'grel): med pi wang ma'i pi wang dang bden bral du rnga zlum ma'i rnga zlum dang rlung du rdza rnga ma'i rdza rnga'o/ /phyi'i snam bu la mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dang bden bral du bdug spos ma'i spos me dang/ rlung du mar me ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong dang dbang
186a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du dri ma'i dri'i dung chos dang/ shar du mi long ma'i mi long dang lhor ro'i snod dang nub tu reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs dang byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma
186a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnaMs kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje phreng ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang rdo rje dril bu rnams te nyi ma la gnas ba'o/ /'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la
186a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i mtshan ma bdun las gzhan pa'i mtshan rnams ni zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa ste nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du thod ba rnams la gnas pa'o/ /bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te thig zlum po drug
186a6(rgyud 'grel): pa las phyi rol du'o? zhes pa ni khyad par ro// //ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang shar dang byad dang nub dang lho rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma dang
186a7(rgyud 'grel): ro langs ma dang gtum mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TAng+ga rnams so/ /dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung rnams su seng ge mo stag mo dang lce sbyang mo dang 'ug pa mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnams so/ /shar dang byad dang nub dang lho'i sgo
186b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams su rgyal dbang mo dang gsal byed mo dang 'ji ba byed mo dang 'dar byed mo rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim pa phye ba dang snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis dang 'dzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis
186b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'o// 'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin du seng ge lnga dang so ldan dkar po dang rin
186b3(rgyud 'grel): po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang ma he dang gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang po bzhi la gnas pa ste so so'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du ni skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na bri bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du ni ral bas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang sbyin
186b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so/ /skal ba dang ldan pa rab tu dang bar bya ba'i don dang sbyin bdag gi dbang ldan nas bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung bar bri ba dang mi bri bar rig bar bya'o/ /phyi ros kyi thig zlum pa'i phyi rol
186b5(rgyud 'grel): du bum pa bri'o// //bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o// shar dang lho la sogs pa dang byang dang me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
186b6(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje drag mo dang rdo rje gzugs ma dang rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang rdo rje zhib mo dang rdo rje gnod sbyin mo dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang sgra rdo rje ma dangs rdo rje ma rnams kyi gling bu dang pi wang dang rnga? zlum dang rdza rnga rnams so// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams
186b7(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrogs ma dang rdo rje dril bu mo rnams gyi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang rdo rje dril bu rnams so/ /mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni thod pa dang
187a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /phyag gnyis pa dang phyag bzhi pa la ni thod pa med do/ /phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar khro
187a2(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o/ /shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rim ji lta ba bzhin du gau ri dang btsau bo? ri dang ro langs ma dang g+hasma ri dang puk+ka si dang ri khrod ma dang gtum mo dang rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams kyi/ /mda'
187a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dang thod pa khrag dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i ru sbal dang/ tshil gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang shas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng ge dang khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang khrag
187a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams so/ / rim pa gnyis pa'i zur rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rta gdong ma dang phag gdong ma dang
187a5(rgyud 'grel): seng ge mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang rdo rje dril bu rnams so/ /mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma rnams so
187a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi rol du bum pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// //bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba dang shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bdag med ma dang rdo rje ma dang dkar
187a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang chu ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ rim pa gnyis par phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin te rta gdong ma la sogs
187b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gri gug rnams so/ /rta gdong ma'i phyi ngos su mkha' spyod ma'i rdo rje ste khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i phyi ngos su spyod ma'i rdo rje'o/ /'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa ste mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba dang nyi ma ni sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'o//
187b2(rgyud 'grel): gling bum la sogs pa brgyad med pa na lhag ma lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyi ni zla ba la gri gug rnams so/ /dkar mi'i ngos su/ mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma ste ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'i 'o/ /de bzhin du ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te//
187b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas pa'i utpal dmar po kha 'bus pa yod pa'i mda 'o/ /'dir lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyang ku ru kul+le'i bzhin du kha dog dkar po'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba dang/ shar
187b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi dang zhib mo dang/ zhib gdong ma dang zla ldan ma dang ri bong can ma dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma dang/ zla tshes ma dang yod 'od ma dang yid tshim
187b5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o/ /khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba cha gcig go/ rim pa gnyis pa la dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su me tog ma dang/ bdug spos ma dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi za ma tog dang/ spos phor dang
187b6(rgyud 'grel): mar me'i mchod sdong dang/ dri'i dung chos rnams so// shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la gling bu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gling bu la sogs pa bzhi'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su khro gnyer rim par ldan dang/ 'jigs bsdigs
187b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rta gzugs dang tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje dril bu rnams so/ /mtshan ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa ste me tog ma la sogs pa bcu
188a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs 'dam skyes rnams so/ /yang na dkyil 'khor thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o/ /'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go /rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan
188a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun du rig par bya'o// //dgu'i bdag nyid kyi kyi'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyas kyi lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha gyes ba'o/ /shar la
188a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs ba'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rim ji lta pa bzhin du go? ri dang/ chom rkun ma dang ro langs ma dang g+hasma ri dang puk+ka si dang ri khrod ma dang gtum mo dang g.yud mo rnams kyi gri gug dang bcad
188a4(rgyud 'grel): te'u dang rus sbal dang seng ge dang dge slong dang/ 'khor lo dang rdo rje rnams so/ /phyag bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa dkar po'o/ /zhes pa ni khyad par ro/ /phyi'i zlum po las phyi rol du bum pa rnams so//
188a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar nyi ma la bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma chen mo'i ngo bo pad+ma'i snod do// shar la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la g.yas skor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rin chen mkha' 'gro dang pad+ma mkha' 'gro
188a6(rgyud 'grel): ma? dang? sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang rin po che'i snye ma dang sna tshogs chu skyes dang ral gri'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas gnas pa'i phyir de'i mtshan ma tha dang du mi dgod do// //
188a7(rgyud 'grel): dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lta bar nyi ma la cad te'u'o/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang rlung gi 'dab mar nyi ma rnams la sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod
188b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dangs 'og gnas ma dang legs bzad ma dang/ chang 'chod ma dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas ma rnams kyi gri gug go/ //rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje'o//
188b2(rgyud 'grel): shar la sogs bar g.yas bskor du rdo rje dbyug pa dang rdo rje me dang rdo rje gtsug tor dang/ rdo rje 'khyil pa rnams dang me la sogs par g.yas skor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ /rdo rje dus dang nag po chen po dang/ rdo rje bsdigs pa dang/ gtsug tor
188b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje sa 'og rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rje dbyug pa dang/ chu skyes dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu dang dgra sta dang/ rtse gsum dang ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang rdo rje gtun shing rnams te/ mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs
188b4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang/ sheS rab mthar byed dang/ sheS? rab mthar byed dang/ bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang/ pad+ma dmar
188b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams su mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug sngon can dang/ stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug
188b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gshin rje'i gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi rdo rje ste pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o/ /mtshan ma bcu gcig po 'di rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la
188b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje kha gyis pa'o/ /me la sogs pa rnams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang/ stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi lcags kyu dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang rtse gsum
189a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri'o/ /gtsug tor can gyi 'khor lo ni ser po ste/ gzhan rnams ni bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no/ /yang na gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnas kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags
189a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams te gzhan ni bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no/ /dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po/ ba gyes ba'o/ /
189a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug go/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la pad+ma'i snod rnams so/ /bum pa'i steng du'o/ /zhes pa ni kha cig go/ thugs kyi
189a4(rgyud 'grel): 'kho la sogs pa'i rtsibs nyi shu bzhi la rab gtuM ma dang gtu mig mo dang 'od ldan ma dang sna chen ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang mi'u thung ma dang langka'i dbang phyug ma dang shing grib ma dangs srungs ma dang 'jigs byed chen mo brlung? shugs
189a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dang chang 'thung ma dang sngo bsangs lha mo dang shin tu bzang mo dang rta rnam dang bya gdong ma dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang dum skyes ma dang cha nga 'tshad ma dang 'khor lo'i go cham dang shin du dpa' mo dang stobs chen ma dang
189a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sgyur ma dang brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gri gug go /dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni gtso bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir bri bar mi bya'o/ /sgo rnams su kha gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phag dong ma rnams dang/
189a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms pa mo rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi mi la gri gug go/ 'dir shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g.yon skor dang me la sogS
189b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshams su g.yas skor gyi mtshan ma dgod par bya'o/ /phyi ngos kyi zlum po'i thig las phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi char bum pa rnams bri'o/ /de las gzhan ba'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'chang
189b2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ba'i lha bsgom pa'i skabs su rig par bya'o// //nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma la Da ma ru'o/ /lha ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gri gug rnams tre shar
189b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g.yon skor dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor gyis so/ /de la 'khor lo nag po'i rtsibs kyi steng du phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la legs phreng can pa dang thod pa tsan ma dang 'jigs
189b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang mi thub ma rnams kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma la thod pa rnams so/ /rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o/ /rin pa gnyis par rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i chu skyes kyi 'dab ma brgyad la phyogs rnams su mdzes pa'i ska rags can ma
189b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs can ma dang rnam par rgyal ma dang 'dod can ma rnams kyi'o/ /mtshams rnams su dus can ma dang mtsho can mo dang byad ma dang bsod ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje dmar po'i phreng ba'o/ /rim pa gsum par rtsibs brgyad dkar
189b6(rgyud 'grel): po la gnas ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la phyogs rnams su sgrol ma dang 'jigs mthong ma dang lags mthong ma dang thub dka' ma rnams kyi'o/ /mtshams rnams su dge ma dang grig gnon ma dang mtshan mo dang grags chen
189b7(rgyud 'grel): mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje dkar po'i phreng ba'o/ /sgo'i pad+ma rnams la mdzes ma dang nor 'dzin ma dang skal bzangs ma dang mthong dga' ma rnams kyi'o/ /pad+ma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma la gri gug rnams so zhes gdams so// //
190a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la gtso bo'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla bar rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i re mig rnams su pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i khaT? ng+ga? rnams so/ /dbang
190a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang me la sogs pa'i re mig rnams su kha TwAng+ga dang lcags kyu dang dgra sta dang dbyug pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i re mig gi kha TwAng+ga rnams kyi phyir rol du rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang thal mo
190a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba dang khrag gi snyim pa dang gtun shing ste kha TwAng+ga la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol du shar phyogs su bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsum pa dang byang du sgrol ma'i thod
190a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum dang nub tu gtor ma'i thod pa gsum dang lhor btung ba'i thod pa gsum mo/ /dbang ldan du bsnyems pa'i lag pa dang dri'i snod do/ /mer pi wang dang me tog gi za ma tog/ bden bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang sbres kyi?
190a5(rgyud 'grel): snod do/ /rlung dru thal mo dang mar me'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi bzhi dang sgo dang mtshams rnams su brgyad de kha TwAng+ga nyi shu bzhi'o/ /bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa rnams ni mtsho
190a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// //gshin rje'i gshed kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rdo rje sdom po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i
190a7(rgyud 'grel): rwo'i rtsa ba rnams su rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang rin po cha cha dgu pa dang pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang ral gri ljang ku rnams so//
190b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i me dang bden bral la sogs pa'i zur rnams su rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang rdo rje phag mo dang dbyangs can ma dang gau ni rnams kyi 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba ste de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so so ?
190b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su tho ba gshin rje gshed dang dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang ral gri gshin rje gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shus mtshan pa'i tho ba dang 'byug pa dkar po dang pad+ma ?
190b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri'o/ /'dir rtag pa dang lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas ste gzhan rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyi 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi
190b4(rgyud 'grel): ste ngos gzhan du ni bum pa rnams so// //rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa gser gyi mdog can no/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang bdug
190b5(rgyud 'grel): spos sgrol ma dang snang gsal sgrol ma dang dri'i sgrol ma rnams kyi me tog gi phreng ba dang spos phor dang snang gsal gyi kong bu dang dri'i snod rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang snang pa mdza' yas dang
190b6(rgyud 'grel): don yid grub pa rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri rnams so/ /shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ rdo rje dril bum rnams kyi lcags
190b7(rgyud 'grel): kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyi ngos su gtsug tor ma'i 'khor lo ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa ste/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngos su sna tshogs chu skyes
191a1(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi ma la gnod mdzes ma'i sbrul zhags ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o/ /me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su chu skyes la spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnam par dag pa'i byang sems
191a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bum pa dang ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /pad+ma'i phyi rol tu bum pa rnams so/ /'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs pad+mar zla ba 'am nyi ma la mda' ste mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin par nyi ma la
191a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas lha mo rnam par rgyu ba'i phyir/ shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs rnaMs su arka ma si dang marga ma si dang/ an d+harbd+hu? ma si dang te dzom si'i lha mo rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha ba dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i ? mya ngan med pa'i
191a4(rgyud 'grel): shing yal ga dang mda' rnams so/ /me dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su u da ya ma si dang gul mas dang na ba ma si dang tsi bar ma si rnams kyi go rims bzhin du arka ma si la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no/ /phyi'i
191a5(rgyud 'grel): pho brang gi snam bu'i shar du ma hA tsI wa ra ma si dang ba rA ha mu khi'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu dag go/ lhor pa dA kra ma si dang wa ra la'i lha mo dag gi mya ngan med pa'i 'dab ma dag go/ nub tu par kra ma si dang ba da li'i lha mo dag gi mnga' 
191a6(rgyud 'grel): dag go/ byang du ur ma si dang bar li'i lha mo dag gi khab dag go/ me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su bat+tA li dang ba dA li dang ba rA li dang ba rA ha mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang mya ngan med pa'i lo ma dang mda'
191a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /shar sgor A lo'i lha mo'i lcags kyu dang lho sgor tA lo'i lha mo'i rdo rje zhags pa dang nub tu kA lo'i lha mo'i rdo rje lcags sgrog dang byang du sangs lo'i sa ma murta ra'i lha mo'i rdo rje dril bu'o/ /'dir sgo skyong ma rnams kyi
191b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ni pad+ma dang nyi ma la ste gzhan rnams ni pad+ma dang zla ba la'o/ /skud ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rin po che'i chun po'o/ /shar du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la stong chen mo
191b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'joms ma'i 'khor lo'o/ /lhor sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i rdo rje'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i pad+ma'o/ /byang du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i
191b3(rgyud 'grel): mjug sgro'o/ /rim pa gnyis par me la sogs pa'i mtshams su nag mo dang dus ma dang nag mo'i rna ba mo dang/ dkar mo rnams kyi dung dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang dgra sta dang rtse gsum rnams so/ /snam bu rnams la bum pa'o/ /shar la
191b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa
191b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'o/ /lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du g.yas skor gyis sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnaMs kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang rdo rtse lnga ba'i rtse mo can gyi rin po che dang
191b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar zhing dmar ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can gyi sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rin
191b7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po dang rdo rje rin po che dang rdo rje pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so/ /mi bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems
192a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang mda' dang rdo rje'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi chu skyes la rdo rje rin po che dang rdo rje gzi brjid dang
192a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang nyi ma dang yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o/ /'od dpag med kyi chu skyes kyi 'dab mar rdo rje
192a3(rgyud 'grel): chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje smra ba rnams kyi pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang rdo rje rtsa gcig pas mtshan pa'i lce'o/ /don yod pa'i chu skyes la rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur
192a4(rgyud 'grel): rnaMs kyi snogs? rdo rje dang rdo rje'i go cha dang rdo rjes mtshan ba'i mche ba dang rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab ma dang bzhi pa'i mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab mar bri bar bya'o//
192a5(rgyud 'grel): me la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba rnams la rdo rje sgeg mo dang rdo rje phreng ba ma dang rdo rje glu ma dang rdo rje gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang pi wang dang rdo rje'o/ /snying po'i gzhal yas khang las phyi rol gyi snam bu rnams la shar
192a6(rgyud 'grel): du byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad des par 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams kyi pad+ma dang zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnams so/ /lhor spos kyi glang po dang dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' i
192a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzod dang ye shes tog rnams kyi chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje rin po che rnams so/ /nub tu 'od dpag med dang zla 'od dang bzang skyong dang dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje pad+ma rnams so/ /byang du rdo rje snying po dang blo gros
192b1(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad pa dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang kun tu bzang po rnams kyi chu skyes dang zla ba la sna tshogs chu skyes rnams so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i zur rnams su chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje bdug spos ma dang rdo rje me tog ma dang rdo rje mar me ma
192b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dri chab ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su pad+ma dang zla ba la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu rnams kyi mtshan ma'o/ /snam bu la ni bum pa rnams so/ /bzhi bcu
192b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa lnga ni sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ljag khu dang ser po ste shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang dbus kyis gzhi thams cad kyang ngo/ /dkyil
192b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnyis pa la sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po'i rtsig pa gsum sde/ 'khor lo gsum la ni dkar po'i rtsig pa gcig go/ de la dbus kyi sa gzhi ser por sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no/ /shar ?
192b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i re mig tu nyi ma rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje sngon po dang rin po che dang pad+ma dkar po dang ral gri'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs ba'i re mig tu zla ba rnams la
192b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser pho dang rdo rje sngon po dang rdo rje dkar po dang rdo rje ljang ku'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin
192b7(rgyud 'grel): chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i bzhin no/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su zla ba rnams la byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang spos kyi glang po dang ye shes tog
193a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing+gi yal ga dang ral gri dang bum pa la gnas pa'i lag ldan dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser bo 'o/ /lhor zla ba rnams la bzang skyong dang blo gros rgya mtsho dang blo gros mi zad pa dang
193a2(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi mda' dmar po dang dkar po dang ser po dang ljang ku'o/ /nub tu zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang dra ba can gyi 'od
193a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po dang mda' dkar po dang mda' ser po dang utpal la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o/ /byang du zla ba rnams la zla 'od dang 'od dpag med dang nam mkha' i mdzod dang sgril? thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi utpal la gnas pa'i
193a4(rgyud 'grel): zla bal bum pa dmar po dang mda' ser po dang mda' sngon po'o/ /'dir go rim ji lta ba bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi ngos gnyis kyi snam bu rnams la mtshan ma gnyis gnyis so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams
193a5(rgyud 'grel): la gshin rje mthar byed dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang rta mgrin dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams kyi ral gri yu ba nag po can dang rdo rje ser po dang rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang ral gri yu ba nag po can no/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i
193a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su nyi ma rnams la mi g.yo ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje sngon po dang rdo rje'i dbyug pa sngon po'o/ /gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral
193a7(rgyud 'grel): gri ste/ rta mgrin gyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la rdo rjes 'og gi rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyi 'og tu sna tshogs 'dam skyes te snam bu rnams la ni bum pa'o/ /kha cig tu ni gshin rjes gshed kyi mtshan ma'i
193b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi ngos su nyi ma la gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang de'i phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o zhes gsungs so/ /chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la nang gi 'khor yong? dul tshon dkar pos dgang bar bya
193b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gzhan rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no/ /shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams
193b3(rgyud 'grel): la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g.yas skor gyis gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po dang rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags dang rgyal ba rnams kyi
193b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ser po rnams so/ /shar gyi ro mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje sngon po ste dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang
193b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang mda' dang rdo rje'o/ /lho'i re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po 'am rgyal mtshan te/ dbang
193b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje bzhad po rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang
193b7(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o/ /nub kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la snang ba mdza' yas kyi pad+ma dmar po ste dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu
194a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje smra ba rnams kyi pad+ma dang ral gri dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang rdo rje rtse gcig pas mtshan pa'i lce'o/ /byang gi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes
194a2(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ste dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje las rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gsum dang rdo rje go cha dang rdo rjes
194a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i mche ba dang rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re mig rnams su chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi mtshams ni 'jam dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa dang sna
194a4(rgyud 'grel): ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no/ /shar la sogs pI sgo rnams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i lcags kyu
194a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba rnams las bcu gnyis po mos pas spyod pa dang rab tu dga' ba dang dri ma med pa dang 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba dang
194a6(rgyud 'grel): spyad dka' ba dang mngon du gyur pa dang ring du song ba dang mi g.yo ba dang legs pa'i blo gros dang chos kyi sprin dang kun tu 'od rnams kyi rim ba ji lta ba bzhin du g.yas skor gyis pad+ma dmar po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang
194a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po dang sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang utpal dang nor bu ma rak+ta dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glags bam dang sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang yu ba dang bca' 
194b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang utpa la'i steng du ral gri dang chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'o//
194b2(rgyud 'grel): lhor sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis po rin po che pad+ma dang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan ngang shes rab dang thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes dang
194b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'bru sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i snye ma dang lo ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog ge chun po dang pad+ma dkar po dang utpal sngon po dang pad+ma dkar po dang
194b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i po ti dang chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang utpal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi
194b5(rgyud 'grel): shing gi yal ga dang utpal la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la dbang pa cu gnyis po tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang las dang skye ba dang rdzu 'phrul dang mos pa dang smon lam dang ye shes dang chos
194b6(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dbang ba rnams kyi/ nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs dang rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
194b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang sna tshogs pa'i mdog can gyi dzA ti'i khri shing dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bri yang ku'i me tog gi snyem dang utpal sngon po dang utpal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum
195a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzang po dang/ 'dam skyes dkar po dang chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o/ /byang du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la gzungs bcu gnyis po dbyig gi blo gros ma dang rin chen skar mda' ma dang gtsug
195a2(rgyud 'grel): tor rnam par rgyal ma dang 'od zer can dang ri khrod lo ma gyon dang dug sel ma dang sgo mdza' yas ma dang tsunda dang shes rab 'phel ma dang las kyi sgrib pa rnams par sel ma dang ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
195a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod ldan ma rnams kyi 'bras kyi snye ma dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang rma bya'i mjug sgro deng dug gi me tog gi chun po dang pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa'i
195a4(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang ril ba spyi blugs phreng ba dbyangs pa dang utpal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar zhing dmar ba dang rin po che'i za ma tog dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i
195a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe sgom mo/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la chos so sor yang dag par rig pa dang don so sor yang dag par rig pa dang des ba'i tshig so sor yang dag bar rig pa dang spobs pa so sor
195a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rin po che'i zhags pa dang mdza' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog dang rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo dang
195a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ma dang glu ma dang gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba dang pi wang dang rdo rje'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa shar phyogs su pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la kun tu bzang po'i utpal la gnas pa'i ral gri dang sa'i snying po'i
195b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang nam mkha' i snying po'i rin po che'o/ /lhor nam mkha' mdzod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang phyag na rin chen gyi rin po che dang blo gros rgya mtsho'i dud dang rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o/ /nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
195b2(rgyud 'grel): gi pad+ma dang mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang zla ba'i 'od kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang dra ba can gyi ral gri'o/ /byang du pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la 'od dpag med dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i
195b3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros dang sgrib ba thams cad rnams par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs pad+ma dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje rtse lnga ba dang ral gri'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed pad+ma mthar byed dang bgegs
195b4(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed rnams kyi lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrig dang dril bu rnams so/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams? su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang
195b5(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka rdo rje dang rta mchog rnams kyi ral gri dang rdo rje dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol tu gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'khor lo ser po ste pad+ma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol tu gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o?
195b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhi'i phyi ngos dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho na'i zur gyi nang du re kha' sbyin par bya bo/ /de'i phyi rol gyi gnas kyi mi la sogs pa'i zur thig rnams kyi g.yas logs su gnas
195b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang spos por dang mar me'i mchod sdod dang dung chos so/ /g.yon logs su gnas pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs
196a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang rdo rje sgra ma dang rdo rje ro ma dang rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi me long dang pi wang dang ro'i snod dang sna tshogs pa'i gos so/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
196a2(rgyud 'grel): su dbang po dang gshin rje dang chu bdag dang lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje dang dbyug pa nag po dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su dbang ldan dang me lha dang bden bral dang rlung rnams kyi
196a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dang blugs gzar dang ral gri dang rlung ras so/ /de nas dbang ldan gyi phyi rol du nye bar dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas mtshan ma rnams rim gyis bri bar bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng dang khyab 'jug
196a4(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo dang dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang gdong drug pa'i shak+ti dang chengs ma'i phreng ba dang drag mI rtse gsum dang khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo dang gzhon nu ma'i shak+ti dang dbang mo'i rdo rje dang phag mo'i nya ro hi ta dang/ tsa mu ni?
196a5(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang b+h+ring+gi ni'i phreng ba dang tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang nag po chen po'i? rtse gsum dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga dang nyi ma'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i ma mud la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
196a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mig dmar gyi gri gug dang gza' lhag gi mnga' dang phur bu'i bgrang phreng dang pa sangs kyi phreng ba dang spen pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang sgra gcan gyi zla ba dang mjug rings kyi klu'i zhags pa dang stobs bzangs kyi gshol dang
196a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang sprab? rtsir byed pa'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang dpyid kyi lha'i mda' dang mdza' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang rigs ldan rnams kyi
196b1(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar ba ste yang na rang gi pha'i mtshan ma dang 'dra ba'i mtsham ma'o/ /de la mdza' yas dang rigs ldan gyi rigs ni bran ze ste me lha'i bu'o/ /nor rgyas dang dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i 'o/ /'jog po dang pad+ma chen po ni rje rigs te rlung lha'i 'o
196b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs rgyu dang pad+ma ni dmangs rigs te chu lha'i 'o/ /thag bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang rab tu tshim byed rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ni ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /nam mkha' 
196b3(rgyud 'grel): lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar pa dang mi'am ci'i dbang po ljon pa'i pi wang dang dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa'i pi wang dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /gang ba bzang po dang nor bu bzang po
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dang nor sbyin dang rnam thos kyi bu dang rtsi bi kuN+Da li dang ki li mA la dang sku'i dbang po dang spyod pa'i dbang po ste gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyi shing tog pa dza pU ra ka rnams so/ /'phrog ma'i ni chung bu gnyis so/ /tha skar dang gra nye dang smin
196b5(rgyud 'grel): drug dang snar ma dang mgo dang lag dang nab so dang rgyal dang skag dang mchu dang dre dang dbo dang me bzhi dang nag po dang sa ri dang sag dang lha mtshams dang snon dang snubs dang chu stong dang chu smad dang gro bzhin dang mon gre dang mon gru dang/ 'khrum
196b6(rgyud 'grel): stong dang /brums smad dang ni gru dang ji bzhin rnams kyi lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /'dir yang sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa rnams so// //ngan
196b7(rgyud 'grel): song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i phreng ba sngon po'i nang du 'khor lo ser po rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte bar chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ser po'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su sa gnon gyi phyag rgya dkar po dang mchog 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi phyag rgya sngon po dang bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang ku rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nyi ma dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang ral gri dang gdugs rnams so
197a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la sgro'i g.yon du mtshan ma gnyis te g.yas su yang ngo/ /de la klu shing gi me tog dang spyan dang bcas
197a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu skyes dang lcags kyu dang dbyug pa dang ral gri dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgrom dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang bdud rtsi 'bum pa dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs dang rin po che dang rdo rje'i gur dang rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
197a4(rgyud 'grel): utpal dang bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che dang rin po che'i snye ma'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su me tog ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ste sgo rnams su ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o/ /mtshan ma sum cu rtsa bdun
