222a1(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o/ /de la gau rI nag mo g.yas pa na gri gug dang g.yon pa? ro hi ta 'dzin pa'o/ /chom rkun ma dmar mo phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis Da ma ru dang phag pa 'dzin pa'o// ro langs pa

222b5(rgyud 'grel): phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud bzhi mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo// oM de ba bitsa? badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA /zhes pa ni phyag drug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM tEe lokha Ak+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA /zhes pa
222b6(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag gnyis pa'i 'o// oM dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo hUM hUM hUM phaT ces pa phyag bzhi pa'i 'o/ /oM ki Ta ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA /zhes pa phyag drug pa'i 'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+hasma rI oM swA hA/ zhes pa ni g+hasma rI'i ste las thams cad pa'o// /
222b7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa ni chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ste/ kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung med par gzhal yas khang ngo zhes so/ /gzhal yas khang
223a1(rgyud 'grel): gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar nyi ma la sgyu ma chen po las byung ba'i he ru ka nag po nyi ma'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa 'gyid ba'i khro bo dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing?
223a2(rgyud 'grel): gyen du brdzas pa/ thod pa'i cod pan rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyab dang g.yon ba'i zhal gzhi sngon po dad ser po dang dkar po dang ljang ku zhal re re la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa bdag gis thod pa dang

223a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can gtso bo lta bu'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa/ phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sngon po sngon mo dang ser po dang dkar
223a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang ljang ku'i zhal can rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang khaTwdga? 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal(rgyud 'grel): na/ rin bo che'i phaT dang rtse gsum dang mgrin pa btsir
223a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lce sbyang dang ba ngan 'dzin pa'o //nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can sna tshogs pad+ma dang mnga' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang ku dang ser
223a7(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po dang sngon po'i zhal can ral gri dang Da ma ru dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can te/ 'di rnams kyi khyad par rnams ni gtso mo lta bu'o/ /rigs
223b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtags mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang gsung gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /bcom
223b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das gyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM hUM hUM snying po'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang oM oM hUM/ oM hUM hUM /oM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM hUM hUM zhes pa ste sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i
223b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni las thams cad pa'i 'o// //bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gnas po'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu
223b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes kyi lte ba la ro'i snying kar nyi ma la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das te sku mdog la sogs pa ni 'tshang par 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no/ /shar dang byung dang ??
223b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lho'i 'dab ma rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og ma gnas pa ma dang legs bzangs ma rnams ni sku mdog sngon mo g.yas bskum zhing g.yon bkyang bstag gi lpags pa'i sham
223b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs can/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa/ g.yon pa dag gis khaTwd+ha? dang Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan ngad me lha dang bden bral dang rlung gi 'dab ma rnams la chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la
223b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas ma rnams ni ser mon bza' ser po gyen pa 'od zer ser po 'phrog zhabs gnyis g.yas brkyang zhing g.yon bskum pa klung brgyad kyis brgyan pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis gri gug dang Da ma ru /g.yon pa dag gis khaTwdga dang pad+ma'i?
224a1(rgyud 'grel): snod 'dzin pa'o// brgyad po 'di rnams kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa/ dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan
224a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'phyang ba mche bcung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa ste /sna tshogs sde ma la sogs
224a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas rnams kyis so/ /chang 'tshod ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang de rnams nyid do/ /yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyang dkar po ste
224a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar mo'o/ /'di ni yum dang bral ba'am yum dang bcas pa'o// //rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du
224a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bskum zhing g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs dag gis 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba khro bo bskal pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi
224a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs thams cad rab tu gsol bar mdzad pa/ sku mdog sngon po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal gsum pa rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang ser po dang ljang ku mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu gtum pa/
224a7(rgyud 'grel): ljags 'gril zhing shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa smin ma g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can 'bral ba'i steng na thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo
224b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba /phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa/ klu mdza' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba bcings pa 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar por mgul rgyan byas pa/ stobs kyi
224b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dur ? lta bu ljang kus mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa/ pad+ma dkar po kun bzhi me tog ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skor ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du la lta bu khro bos dpung rgyan
224b3(rgyud 'grel): byas ba rdo rje sems pas rgyas btab pa /rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pas rang dang 'dra bo'i shes rab ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis lcags
224b4(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang zhags pa /g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang khaTwdga 'dzin pa'o/ /'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang ser po dang ljang ku/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje tho ba dang sdigs
224b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas ba'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang khaTwdga 'dzin pa'o// byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can/ /phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo rje
224b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa'i lta bu'i ste 'chang bar 'gyur ba gzhan rnams kyang ngo/ /nub tu rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na pad+ma dmar po'o/ /lhor rdo rje 'khyil ba ljang ku ljang ku dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal can phyag na
224b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du pa'i mdog can du ba'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can lcags akyu 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du rdo rje dus dmar mo dmar po dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na dgra sta'o/ /rlung
225a1(rgyud 'grel): du nag po chen po sngon po sngon po dang ser podang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na rtse gsum mo/ dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs rung nag po mig g.yon nag po dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na ral gri'o/ rdo rje dbyug ba la sogs
225a2(rgyud 'grel): pa? brgyad po 'di rnams ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang pad+ma mthar byed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang 'byug sngon can dang stobs po che dang mi gal ba rnams kyi ming? gzhan no/ /ste
225a3(rgyud 'grel): du gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba dkar po dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na 'khor? lo'o/ /'og tu rdo rje lag gnad? mdzes kyi ming gi rnam grangs can sngon po sngon dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na rol pa dang bcas
225a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje'i gtun shing ste/ 'di'i phyag g.yon ba na klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha Dwang+ga'o?/ /rdo rje sdug pa la sogsba'i khro bo 'di rnams phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag dag gis rang bod kyi shes rab ma
225a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil ba/ rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i cod pan mdzes par brgyan pa/ smin ma g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can zhal mche ba gtsigs ba/ zhal re re lo dmar zhing zlum ba'i spyan gsum pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la gnas ba'i phyogs sgyong brgyad dang steng du tshangs ba dang 'og tu thag bzangs ris rnams mnan pa'i g.yas brkyang
225a6(rgyud 'grel): gis bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pa ste 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu ba'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ oM kha badzra d+h+rika badzra hUM phaT/
225b1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa ni snying po'o/ /oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hUM phaT ces ba ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogS dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs ba'i khro bo?
225b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu ste 'di dag thams cad kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs ba ni bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs ba ji lta ba bzhin no/ /yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin no/ /yang na dpal kun ?
225b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor gyi rdo rje sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no/ /phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang oM A:? krita hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad ba'o// //bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi? nang
225b4(rgyud 'grel): rings? gyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'brul sna tshogs rdo rje'i ste bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas/ khang gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das te g.yas brkyang gi zhabs dag gis sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte pa'i steng du nyi ma la gnas ba'i 'jigs byed dang
225b5(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshan mnan? pa sku mdog nag po shar dang byad la sogs pa'i zhal ni nag po dang ljang ku dang dmar po dang ser po'o/ /zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum po/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas
225b6(rgyud 'grel): ? phyag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po'i lpags pa khrag dang bcas brgyangs nas 'dzin pa/ de dag las gzhan pa'i phyag g.yas ba rnams kyis Da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dan rtse gsum pa
225b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /g.yon ba rnams kyis rdo rje mtshan ba'i kha TwAng+ga dang khrag gis gang pa'i thong ba dang rdo rje zhags pa dang tshangs ba'i mgo bo 'dzin ba/ 'dzag ba'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa me'o rgyus pa'i
226a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod phyir thogs byas pa dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyis mn+n pa'i ral ba'i thor cog nag po can/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs
226a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i /zhal mche ba gcigs ba/ gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs gol pa gcer bu thod pa'i dum bus rked pa'i rgyan byas pa/ 'khyud ba'i phyag gis gzung ba'i
226a3(rgyud 'grel): thod ba khrag gis gang ba 'dzag ba'i rgyun gtso bo'i zhal du stobs ba/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje steng du 'phyar bas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs pa/ khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil
226a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan gcung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'dab ba dang bcas shing pa sdu? gyen du langs pa'o/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g.yon skor gyis dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la g.yas skor gyis
226a5(rgyud 'grel): dgong bar bya'o/ /de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang ku dang dmar mo dang ser mo'i mdog can zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma skra grol ba/ phyag bzhi
226a6(rgyud 'grel): ma g.yon pa dag gis kha DwAng+ga dang thod pa dang/ g.yas pa dag gis Da ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa g.yas brkyang gi gnas pa'o/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang khrag dang bdud rtsi dang sgrol ma lnga rnams grub
226a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngul chu lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod rnams te/ yang na bzhi char yang 'dud rtsi lngas gang ba'o/ /de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo la rtsibs rnams su shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum mo/ /byang
226b1(rgyud 'grel): du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i ming can ma/ nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma/ lhor mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen mo mer chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can ma/ bden bral du 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma/ /slung du rdo rje'i 'od dang lang
226b2(rgyud 'grel): ka'i dpang phyug ma/ dbang ldan du rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma'o/ /rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa srungs ma dang rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byang chen mo dang dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma dang rdo rje
226b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung ma dang shin tu bzang mo dang sngo sangs? lha mo dang rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo dang 'jigs byed chen po dang rta sna dang mig mi bzang dang bya gdod ma'o/ /de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i
226b4(rgyud 'grel): shugs can ma dang rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma dang rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma dang nam mkha' i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cho ma dang/ dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma dang rnam par snang mdzad dang
226b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sgyur ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /de la thod ba'i dum bu la sogs ba'i dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral ba'i thong? tshugs can dpral bar gnas shing/ rdo rje mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i
226b6(rgyud 'grel): dar dpyangs dang ldan pa phyag bzhis 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon bas kha TwAng+ga dang g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa/ tshangs pa'i skud pa can dbung rgyan dang ldan ba mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can phyag rgya lnga dang
226b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /rab tu gtum mos? pa sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag pa'i gzugs can ma/ skra grol pa gtsang bu phyag gnyis ma 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa dang g.yas
227a1(rgyud 'grel): pas gdug pa can bsdigs par byed pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams la khwa? gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin te
227a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal can te/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sku phyed de g.yas dang
227a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi lha mo rnams kyi sku dang 'dra ba'o/ /brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan? can nyid do/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad kyang 'dzag pa'i mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ rdo rje'i phreng bas dpral ba mtshan pa/ phyag rgya lnga
227a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa ska rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g.yer kha la sogs bas brgyan pa'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rin chen dbang phyug go /thugS
227a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang rtag pa rnams te dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams kyi ni don yod grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo// oM sh+rI badzra hai ru ru kaM
227a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM khaN+Da ro hi hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms pa ma'i mthar thug pa
227a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o/ /de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga thams cad ni 'khyud pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang khwa gdong ma la
227b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams ni g.yon bas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i kha TwAng+ga dang/ g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa ste gzhan thams cad ni gzhan thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no/ /yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag gnyis ba nyid kyi
227b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs la ni dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje phag mo gser gyi mdog can nam yang na sngon po ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g.yas pas rdo rje gsor ba mchog tu brtson pa// g.yon pas thod pa dang kha DwAng+ga 'dzin pa 'am/ yang na rdo rje dang dril
227b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud par mdzad pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni nag po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ste/ dpa' mo rnams ni dkar mo
227b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po pad+ma'i dril pu 'dzin pa ste mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni nag mo g.yas pa pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i
227b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po dang 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa ste lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g.yas pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad yum la 'khyud par brtson zhing g.yas brkyang gis bzhugS
227b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la 'khril pa'i tshul lo// khwa gdong ma la sogs pa ni g.yas bsdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa ste lha mo thams cad phyag g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rje brtan ma
227b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ni g.yas pas Da ma ru dang/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas bas mi mgo 'dzin pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang kha TwAM gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yon pa na kha TpA bda'o?/ /bcu gnyis po 'di
228a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa ste gzhan rnams ni snga ma bzhin no zhes pa 'de mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo/ /grang gi tshe 'di rnams la dba' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom/ par rdo rje phag mo
228a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo/ /rdo rje phag mo'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni baM mo/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT ces pa ni snying po'o/ /bde mcho phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams
228a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag g.yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang bri bar bya'o/ //bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thong pa lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyad can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi
228a4(rgyud 'grel): snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar ro gan rgyal gyi snying kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpa' he ru ka sku mdog nag pa skyil krung
228a5(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa can gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar mdzad pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis Da ma ru dang gri gug /g.yon pa ngag gis thod pa dang kha Twang+ga? 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan
228a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mi mgo rlan pa lnga bcu'i do shal mgrin pa la 'phyang ba/ gnyis 'thung gi lpags pa'i sham thabs rgyab na cung zad dpyangs pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral ba nag po'i thor cog can dbral ba'i mthar thod pa lngas
228a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no/ /mnga' bdag 'di'i dga' ma ni sna tshogs sde ma ma na bza' med pa mi mgo'i phreng ba can dbu skra sil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lngas dbu la mtshan pa/ mche ba cung zad
228b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon pa bdag po'i mgrin par 'khyud pas khrag gi rgyu 'jig pa'i thod pa yab la stobs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na gri gug rdeg pa'i tshul can no/ /rtsibs nag po'i stang gi
228b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma rnams la shar du legs phreng can ma dang/ byang du thod pa can ma dang nub tu 'jigs ma dang lhor thub dka' ma'o/ /dbang ldan tha sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g.yas skor gyis khu ba dang bdud rtsi dang/ sgron ma lngas ? ba'i
228b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i snod de rim pa dang po 'di ni rdo rje sngon po'i khor yug can no/ /de nas rim pa gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dmar pos bskor ba ste de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du dge ba'i ska rags can
228b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ byang du gzugs can ma dang/ nub tu rnam par rgyal ma dang/ lhor 'dod ma dang/ dbang ldan du dus can ma dang/ mer mtsho chen ma dang/ bden bral du phyed ma dang/ rlung du gsong ma'o/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa'i rtsibs brgyad
228b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad ni rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'i khor yug can te/ de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du sgrol ma dang byang du 'jigs mthong ma dang nub tu legs mthong ma dang/ lhor mi thub ma dang/ /dbang ldan du dge ma dang/ ming? gris?
228b6(rgyud 'grel): gnon ma dang/ bden bral du dus mtshan ma dang/ rlung du grags chen ma'o// sgo rnams su shar gyi pad+ma la mdzes ma dang?  byang gi pad+ma la nor 'dzin ma dang/ nub kyi pad+ma la skral bzangs ma dang/ lho'i pad+ma mthod dga' ma'o/ /'di
228b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad g.yas ba dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /so cung zad sto gzhal gcig ma spyin gsum ma/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma /mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba/ dbu skra sil bu 
229a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du 'bar ba byang sems 'dzag pa/ nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba ste/ thams cad stag gi lpags pa'i
229a2(rgyud 'grel): na bza' sku mdog sngon mo'o/ /yang na legs ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo dang rim pa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams dkar ser dang rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa la rnams ljang ku dang sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o// bcom ldan 'das
229a3(rgyud 'grel): la mi bskyed pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste/ sna tshogs sde ma la rnam par snang mdzad dang legs phreng ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin chen dbang po dang/ rim pa gnyis par gnas pa rnams la snang ba mdza' yas
229a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rim pa gsum par gnas pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang/ sgo'i lha mo rnams la don yod grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM bud+hyaM ka pA li nI A:hUM hai hUM phaT/ snying po'o/ /las thams
229a5(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i sdigs kyang 'di nyid kyis bya'o// //rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i rangs? kyi spyi ngon sna
229a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chu skyes rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi snying por rim pa dbus ma'i lte bar seng+ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' sku
229a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dpral bar gnas pa/ nor bu dang zla ba phyed pha? sna tshogs
229b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i thong cog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs rgyab tu cung zad 'phyang nga/ phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag dag gis ye shes gyi mkha' 'gro
229b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dkar mo 'am nag po la 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa dag gis nu ma dang mnga' /g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas re mig rnams la shar du glang po? che'i rgyal po la 'gyid pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar
229b3(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i mi bzang mkha' 'gro ma ser mo sprul gyis brgyan pa'o/ /nub tu mkha' lding la tsog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmar mo'o/ /lhor mi 'am ci'i gdad? la skyil krung phyed las
229b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i gtum mo sngon mo dbu skra dmar po grol zhing spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /'dir ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lnga ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis kha TwAng+ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
229b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ glang po che la sogs pa pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa glang po che'i lpags pa'i smad g.yogs dang mi'i lpags pa'i stod g.yogs can no/ /dbang ldan du seng+ge la 'gying pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i seng ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g.yas
229b6(rgyud 'grel): pas steng du 'phyar ba'i kha TwAng+ga dang/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /mer rdo rje phag la zlum po'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i stag mo dkar nag phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa dang g.yon pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa
229b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ma he la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i lce spyang mo lce spyangs kyi gdong pa can dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du lce spyang la tsog pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i 'ug pa mo
230a1(rgyud 'grel): 'ug pa'i gdong can dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon pa rnams la pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o/ /shar du mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mkha' 'gro ma dkar
230a2(rgyud 'grel): mo phyag gnyis kyi rtse mo khar bcug pa'o// byang du mi bzad mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mar me ma ser mo spyi bor mar me lta bu'i thal mo sbyar ba dang/ /nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyab tu 'jib byed ma dmar mo snyim pa khrag gis bkang nas gsol
230a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ lhor gtum mo'i rgyab tu kam po 'dza'i? nag mo phyag dag gis thugs kar gtun shing 'phyar ba ste/ 'di rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma dang ro la gnas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol du zlum po'i
230a4(rgyud 'grel): rim par pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su puk+ka sI dang dra mi DaM? dang gtum rnams phyag gnyi kyiS bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du mi bzad ma dang khrag ma dang sha ma rnams ni sgrom lngas gang pa'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o//
230a5(rgyud 'grel): nub tu grag shul ma dang 'bar mi sdug ma rnams gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa can ma rnams btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du sgeg mo bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab ma dri'i snod
230a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /mer pi wang ma pi wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor ba'o/ /bden bral du glu ma kha'i thad kar mdzub mo g.yo ba dang bdug spos ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du gar ma gar gyi tshul gyis steng
230a7(rgyud 'grel): du thal mo sbyar ba dang mar me dang bcas pa'i mar me'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa skra grol ba dbu la thod pa'i
230b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba can no/ /mi bzang mkha' 'gro ma ni dbu sgra gyen du brdzes pa ste seng+ge mo la sogs pa ni gos dmar po gyon pa'o/ /puk+ka si la sogs pa ma'i mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni dkar mo'o/ /mi bzad ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ni ser mo'o/ /
230b2(rgyud 'grel): drag shul ma la sogs pa dang rlung gi mtshams kyi lha mo ngag ni dmar mo'o/ /thod po ma la sogs pa dang bden dral gyi mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni nag mo'o/ /de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi rol gyi rim par sgo rnams dang snam bu rnams la chu skyes
230b3(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba'i gdan rnams la shar sgo khyab 'jug nag po dang/ byang du tshangs pa ser po dang nub tu dbang phyug dkar po dang/ lhor gdong drug dmar po dang/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dbang po ser po dang/ mer lus ngan ? ser po dang/ bden bral du
230b4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje nag po dang/ rlung du chu lha dkar po'o/ /lha'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs dang kha TwAng+ga'i srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril bu'i rna ba can rnams dkar po'o/ /byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang 'dun sa'i lha dang rims kyi dbang
230b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang dzha ka ra 'jigs su rung ba rnams ser po'o/ /nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang shaN+Di li'i dbang phyug dang Da ma ru'i 'dul byed dang sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o/ /lhor tu ma bu ra'i dbang phyug dang/ s+thA ra nA do nga mche ba gtsigs pa dang
230b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin? rnams nag po'o/ /khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis kha Twang+ga dang rtse gsuM 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa ngag gi lha mo la 'khyud pa dang
230b7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa 'dzin pa/ ral pa nag po'i thod cog can thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can no/ /'di rnams kyi lha mo rnams kyang phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang pa TwAng+ga 'dzin
231a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'dir dpal ldan nam mkha' i rnal 'byor la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa'am rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab
231a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi ste/ seng ge ma la sogs pa bzhi la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad
231a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mdza' yas rnams kyis so/ /tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ste dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mdza' yas kyis so/ /lha gzhan dkar po rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang ser po rnams la rin chen dbang
231a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar po rnams la tshe dpag med dang nag po rnams la mi bskyod pa nag po'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo/ /oM huM ha:swAhA zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM yuM ya:swAhA zhes pa ni ro langs ma'i ste las thams
231a5(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i sngags so zhes pa rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khan lta bu la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o/ /zhes pa gzhan dag gi'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la yang
231a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi gzugs so zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi ste de yang zlum po'i byed pa kha cig go/ //gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas
231a7(rgyud 'grel): khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma ha? nag po khros pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang pa'i rkang stabs kyis gshin rje mnan?
231b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed nag po smin ma dang sma ra langs shing dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing ? pa 'phyan ba/ yan lag rags pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyan ba ljags 'gyur ba mche ba
231b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar zhing gtsigs pa rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag drug gi gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i g.yas ba dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyad pa g.yas pa dag gis
231b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa bzhin du mdza' yas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po ? dang g.yas pa dang
231b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i zhal gsum dkar po dang nag po dmar po/ /phyag g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang ral gri dang/ g.yon pa dag gis rin po che dang cha skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rin chen dbang po gser gtso ma'i mdog lta bu ser po dang sngon po dbang
231b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhal gsum pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis rin po che dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu snang ba mdza' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis
231b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang ral gri dang/ g.yon pa dag gis nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ byang du phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang ku ljang ku dang nag po dang dkar po zhal gsum/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang 'khor lo/ /g.yon pa dag gis nor bu dang
231b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi char yang 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid can gyi khro bo/ /g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su rdo rje
232a1(rgyud 'grel): tsaDtsi ka sku dang phyag mtshan rnams gti mug gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /bden bral du rdo rje phag mo phag gzhal can ma zhe sdang gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan du gau rI phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /'di rnam par
232a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtsa ba rnams su ste/ mtshams rnams su ni rdo rje tsartsi ka la sogs pa rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o/ /sgo rnams la shar du pheb gshin rje gshed nag po'o/ /nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal
232a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /phyag g.yas pa dag gis tho ba dang ral gri dang/ g.yon pa dag gis nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar po/ /dkar po deng sngon po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag g.yas pa dag gis dbyug pa dang ral gri/
232a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o/ /byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu lus cung zad sngo ba'o/ /thams cad kyang khro bo klu rnams
232a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ 'jigs pa'i gang rgyangs can/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo
232a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la ste/ lha gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi ni/ khu ba dang rdul dang bdud
232a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga dang/ sgron ma lngas gang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni gshin rje gshed nag po'i spyi bor rang nyid de/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi'i yang de bzhin no/ /de rnams ni go rims ji lta bar spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang/ tho ba
232b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo?/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni ya'o/ /oM h+rI:Sh+Tri? bi kritA na na hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// //rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil
232b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du tshes 'byung gi snying por gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrol ma gser gyi mdog lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang
232b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyab dang g.yon pa'i zhal bzhi gser gyi mdog dang dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/ dmar po'o/ /phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhogs pa dang mnga' dang dung rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams ni utpal ser po rang gzhu dang lcags kyu dang
232b4(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub can no/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la me tog sgrol ma dkar mo phyag dag gis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa dang/ ltor bdug spos sgrol ma nag mo phyag dag gis bdug spos kyi snod 'dzin pa dang/ nub tu mar me sgrol ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis
232b5(rgyud 'grel): mang ma'i kong bu 'dzin pa dang/ byang du dri chab sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dri chab kyi dung chos 'dzin pa ste/ lha mo bzhi po rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rnam par snang mdzad ba sogs pa'i ngo bo de dag
232b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang ral gri'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la sgo rnams su shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/ lhor rdo rje zhags pa ma sar mo phyag g.yas pas zhags pa 'dzin pa dang nub tu rdo rje
232b7(rgyud 'grel): cags sgrog ma dmar mo phyag g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang/ byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang ku phyag g.yas pas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la/ 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang/ ri rab dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o/ /steng du gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste/ 'og tu
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes ma sngon mo klu'i zhags ba 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo bcu drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa ste sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o/ /bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma'o/ /bcu
233a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig po rnams kyang rdo rje skyil krung can gser gyi sna cha g.yo ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ pad+ma rA ga'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sgrol ma'i rin chen dbang po'i me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa'i ni
233a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bar snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin chen dbang po ste gnod mdzes ma'i mi bskyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan
233a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni tAM ngo/ /oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// //'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi nang du
233a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang ste/ kha cig ni chos 'byung med par ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi snying por sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla 'am nyi ma la g.yas bskum zhing g.yon
233a7(rgyud 'grel): bar rabs gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ser mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi cod pan can/ dbu'i rtser mchod rten gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g.yas zhal
233b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ g.yon zhal nag po phag pa'i gdong can khros pa khro gnyer dang zur mig tu ldan pa/ ljags 'gril ba 'jigs su rung ba/ phyag drug? ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mnga' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skad pa dang
233b2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/ smad g.yogs sngon po gyon pa rnam par bkra ba'i stod g.yogs sngon po can/ ser po'i mdog can gyi phag pa la gnas shing de'i mdog can gyi ? gla pas yongs su bskor pa/ mya ngan
233b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa'o/ /shar phyogs su arkam sI me tog band+hu ka'i mdog can g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhod marka ma sI ser mo gser gyi mdog can g.yas pas skad pa dang bcas/
233b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khab dang g.yon pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu and+ha ra d+ha ma sI ser mo g.yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du te dzom sI dmar mo'i mdog can
233b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang/ g.yon pa'i phyag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su u da? ya ma si dang gul ma ma si dang ba nam si dang tsi pA ra ma si rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du arka ma si la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang
233b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan no/ /rim pa phyi ma'i snam bu rnams la shar du ma hA tsi ba ra ma si dang ba rA ha mu khi mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba g.yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu dang g.yon pas rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor pa ta kra ma si dang ba ril ser po
233b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu ba ra kra ma sI dang ba da la dmar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin ba'o/ /byang du a'urma si dang ba ril ljang ku g.yas pa dang g.yon
234a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su bat+tA li dmar mo'i mdog can g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ba dA li ser mo g.yas pas skud pa
234a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i khab dang g.yon pas yal ga dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun pe 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du ba rA li dkar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ?
234a3(rgyud 'grel): ha mu li dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su A lo dang/ tA lo dang kA lo dang sad ? lo sam ba mUr? d+ha Ti rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dkar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mi dang/ ljang
234a4(rgyud 'grel): ku ste phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /arka ma si la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang co can spyi bor mchod rten gyis
234a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ phag zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma phyag gnyis ma gser gyi mdog can gyi phag pa la gnas shed
234a6(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can gyi phag pas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /sgo skyong ma rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yas brkyang gi gnas pa ste gzhan nyi shu rtsa bzhi po sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la g.yon brkyang gis
234a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni 'od zer can ma'i rtag pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la bskor ba rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te
234b1(rgyud 'grel): me la sogs pa'i mtshams la bskor ba rnams kyi 'ang de bzhin no zhes pa ni kha cig go/ yang na dkar mo rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad dang nag mo rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang/ ser mo rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ ljang ku rnams kyi don yod
234b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o/ /zhes pa ni gzhan no/ /'od zer can gyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni maM po?/ /oM mA rI tsye swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM mA rI tsye hUM sarbba big+h+nan ud+pA da ya hUM dang/ ces pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //bsrung ba
234b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser mo
234b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dkar ba rgyab sngo ba/ g.yon dmar ba phyag bcu gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rin po che'i gdugs dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtse gsum
234b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa dbul mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas bzhugs pa/ sku mdog dkar mo
234b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal dkar mo/ /g.yas sngo ba rgyab ser ba g.yon ljang ku phyag bcu ma g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog sbyin dang lcags kyu dang mnga' dang
234b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang dgra sta rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma nag mo nyi ma'i 'od can rtsa ba dang
235a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag bcu gnyis ma g.yas pa dang g.yon pa phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzhan pa gnyis kyis bsam
235a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dad gzhu dang rin po che'i gdugs dang pad+ma la gnas
235a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa dmar mo nyi ma'i 'od can rtsab dad g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po phyag
235a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang bcas pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang mda' dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdig smdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang thugs kar po
235a5(rgyud 'grel): ti 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo sems dpa' i skyil krung can ljang ku zla ba'i 'od can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ljang ku dang nag po dang dkar po phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis
235a6(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'i mjug sgro dang mnga' dang mchog sbyin dang ral gri/ g.yon pa rnams kyis lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong dang gzhu dang pad du gnas pa'i bum pa rin po che 'bar bas 'bar ba can dang sna tshogs rdo rjes spras pa'i rin po che'i
235a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su dus ma nag mo phyag dag gis dung 'dzin pa dang/ bden bral du dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag dag gis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang/ rlung du dus kyi
235b1(rgyud 'grel): rna ba mo dmar phyag dag gis dgra sta 'dzin pa dang/ dbang ldan du dkar mo sku mdog dkar mo phyag dag gis rtse gsum 'dzin pa ste bzhi po 'di dag ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma'o/ /dgu po 'di rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang lha'i
235b2(rgyud 'grel): gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen dbang po dang rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po
235b3(rgyud 'grel): dang snang ba mdza' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje 'bebs ma rnams ni snga ma
235b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /so sor 'drang ma chen mo la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon ni praM dang oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa ni snying po dang/ sa bon ni bu dang/ oM A:mahA sA hA pra marda nI hUM hUM ni snying po dang/ sa bon ni hUM dang/ oM A:
235b5(rgyud 'grel): mahA man+ta a nu pI ra Ni hUM hUM ni snying po dang/ sa bon ni dzrI dang/ oM A:ma hA shI ta ba ta ba ti dzri hUM hUM ni snying po dang/ sa bon ni maM dang/ oM A:ma hA ma yu rO bi Dya radz+nyi hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa snying pa'o/ /dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang
235b6(rgyud 'grel): yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya ste/ 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'o// //rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling rnams dang nye ba'i gling rnams rgya mtsho bdun la
235b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ste/ de'i dbus su seng+ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i ste ba la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'ong can/
236a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog dang ldan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang/ gos can zhi ba/ dkar po dang ser po dang/ dmar po dang ljang
236a2(rgyud 'grel): ku'i zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gis phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gzhan pa dag gis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa// g.yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang mnga' 'dzin
236a3(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// yang na 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa ste/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bslang ba
236a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /'dab ma rnams la mdun du sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin
236a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yas su rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mor rin po ches mtshan pa 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /rgyab tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan pa'i pad+ma
236a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang ku g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mdog can gyi sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad
236a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas shar phyogs su glang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po gzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul
236b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing/ phyag g.yon pa gan rkyal pad du gzhag pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gud mos rdo rje thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa dang bcas
236b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dril bu dkur brten nas 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po ser po phyag g.yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul mdzad cing g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin
236b3(rgyud 'grel): pas spyan 'dren pa'i tshul byed pa'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa dmar po g.yon pa dang cig shos dag gis gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje legs bam ra ka ta'i mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i phyag
236b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis thugs kar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul mdzad pa'o/ /lhor rta'i seng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che ser mo gung mos gzung nas
236b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin gyi tshul mdzad cing/ g.yon pas gan rkyal du pad par gzhag pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje rin chen ser po g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyis mdza' gnyis su rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng
236b6(rgyud 'grel): ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar mdzad cing g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu bsnyems pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma thugs kar 'dzin pa'i 'od kyis gsal bar mdzad
236b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan ljang ku phyag gnyis kyis lyid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing g.yon gyi dpung pa'i gnas su 'phyar pa'o/ /rgyab du rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis so'i 
237a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rdo rje gnyis dang ldan pa gzung nas zhal gyi thad kar 'jog pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la snang ba mdza' yas dmar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa dang
237a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gan rgyal du pang pa'i thad du gzhag nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad de g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje chos dkar dmar g.yon pas bsnyems pa
237a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas pad+ma'i yu ba 'dzin zhing g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltad sngo bsangs g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam dang/ g.yas pas ral gri 'phyar thabs
237a4(rgyud 'grel): su 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyab
237a5(rgyud 'grel): tu rdo rje smra ba dmar po g.yon pas chos kyi dung dang g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu'i lce 'dzin pa'o/ /byad du nam mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la don yod grub pa ljang ku rdo rje'i skyil krung g is bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas
237a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sor mo gung mos sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul mdzad cing/ g.yon pa gan rkyal du pang par gzhag pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje las ljang ku g.yas pas bslang pa'i sbyor bas sna tshogS
237a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa thugs kar gtod pa'i sbyor bas 'dzin zhing/ g.yon sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa ste/ yang na phyag gnyis kyi thal mo ? sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas
237b1(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje srung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag dag gis mthe'u chung gnyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon kyi rtse mo can rang gi zhal gyi gra 'dzin pas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs par byed pa'o//
237b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste rdo rje khu tshur dag gis 'tshing ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzung ba'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i pad+ma la rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur brten pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis rdo
237b3(rgyud 'grel): rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral gyi pad+ma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ rlung gi pad+ma la glum dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang sgrogs pa'o/ /dpal ldan gyi pad+ma la gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa gzung ba phyag drug
237b4(rgyud 'grel): gis gar mdzad pa'o/ /dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar gyi pad+ma rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'dzoms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o/ /lho'i ?
237b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la spos kyi glang po dang dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' i mdzod dang/ ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o/ /nub kyi pad+ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od dang/ bzang skyong dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni snang ba mdza' yas lta
237b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /byang gi pad+ma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi bzad pa dang sbobs pa brtsegs pa dang kun tu bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang
237b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' stong du bzhi yis mtshang ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag gi mtshan rnams ni rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas ma bshad de/ gal te 'dod na bdag gis byas pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa rnal 'byor snying po'i
238a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba las rtogs par bya'o/ /me'i mtshams kyi pad+ma la rdo rje bdug spos ma dkar mo dang/ bden bral gyi pad+ma la rdo rje me tog ma ser mo dang/ rlung gi pad+ma la rdo rje mar me ma dkar dmar dang/ dbang ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje dri chab ma
238a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang ku ste/ bdug spos ma la sogs pa 'di rnams sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /shar la sos pa'i sgo'i pad+ma rnams la/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du
238a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku ste sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan pa'i lha thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ rin? po
238a4(rgyud 'grel): che'i cod pan can no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang rang gi bdag po'i de bzhin gshegs pa la
238a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon du phyogs pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i lha thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga las gzhan
238a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab bo/ /me
238a7(rgyud 'grel): long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg mo dang bdug
238b1(rgyud 'grel): spos ma dang/ byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa rnams kyi rin chen 'gyur
238b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan no/ /chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos rab la sogs pa bzhi dang glu ma dang mar me ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mdza' yas so/ /las kyi rdo rje ma dang/ rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi dang gar ma
238b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dri chab ma dang/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi dang/ rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o/ /'dir nang gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no/ /rnam par
238b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni a'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI shwa ra hUM zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so /gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su rnam pa
238b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa de dag ni mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do// //bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur la sogs pa nas gzhal yas khang
238b6(rgyud 'grel): gi bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs gcig ste/ rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la gnas pa'i
238b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du gzhal yas khang ngo/ /de'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom
239a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni sku mdog gser bcom lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i zur phung gsum gyiS rnam par brgyan pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas
239a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po/ /phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mchog dang mnga' / g.yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang/ utpal sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ ?
239a3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang byug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /dza'i shar gyi re mig la glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa sngon po ? kying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa/ rtsal dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal
239a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar bo/ /phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje thugs kar gyen du ba sphreng? ba/ g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dkur brten pa/ gzhan g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcagS kyu dang mnga' dang/
239a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po
239a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po/ phyag bcu drug pa rtsa pa'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gis phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa dag gis rin po che dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skye dang nyi ma la
239a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mdza' yas dkar po sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po/ /phyag drug pa g.yon pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i yu ba thugs kar gzung ste/ g.yas
239b1(rgyud 'grel): pas kha 'byed pa/ g.yas pa dag gis bgrang breng dang rdo rje 'dzin cing/ g.yon pa dag gis nu ma dang sri blugs 'dzin pa'o/ phyang du nam mkha' i lding gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la don yog sgrub pa dmar po sems dpa' i skyil kang? can/
239b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang sngon po dang dkar po/ /phyag drug pa dang po gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yos pa dag gi rol gri dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag gi nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang
239b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du spyan ma ser mo sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ /phyag brkyang ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyin dang mi 'digs pa dang 'khor lo dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang rin po che'i ste ma dang bkang?
239b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ mer ma mA kI sngon mo khro pa dang bcas pas rgong pa sems dpa' i skyil krung tsam phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mnga' / /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdig mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu
239b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du gos dkar mo 'gying pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mnga' / /g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang/ bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du sgrol ma ma ra ka
239b6(rgyud 'grel): ta lta bu sems dpa' i skyil krung can phyag drug ma/ g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mnga' / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang utpal dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
239b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams su/ sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang mtshon cha rnams ni rim pa ji lta pa bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /'on kyang
240a1(rgyud 'grel): nu ma 'dzin pa med par sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams ni sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa ste chos kyi rdo rje ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du tsan ma zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu
240a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis thugs kar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang ral gri dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang bo dza pU ri dang mnga' dang dgra sta dang dbyug to dang thob dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang bdan gsum
240a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng rnams dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang pad+ma dang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang shak+ti dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang
240a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa kan tsu ka'i stong g.yogs bcings pa bla gos phrag pa la gzar ba/ gar gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin can/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ /g.yas pa'i zhal sngon po ljags 'dril zhing mche ba
240a5(rgyud 'grel): cung zad gcigs pa g.yon pa ser po ma mchu mnan pa'o/ /thal mo yang dag par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs bar pa la zlum po'i rnam par bzhag cing ma the bong dag mdzub mo'i logs kyi rtsa bar 'dzin pa ni 'di'i
240a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /med rin chen skar mda' ma ser mo phyag drug ma dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che kha sbyor 'dzin pa g.yas pa dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang mnga' dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang gzhu
240a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du khro gnyer can ma dkar mo phyag bcu drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mnga' / /g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du rdo rje lcags
240b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog ma ljang gu phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang mnga' dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /spyan ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni rol pa'i kun tu
240b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa dang ldan pas zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu rnams la/ shar bu byams pa
240b3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can phyag dang po gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i? phyag rgya mdzad cing/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pas me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa/ 'jam dpal dmar po'i gzugs can khyad par du shes
240b4(rgyud 'grel): rab ma dang bral ba dang/ spos kyi glang po ljang ku g.yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i sna 'dzin zhing g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang/ ye shes tog ser po g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin
240b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o/ /ltor bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po g.yon pas rin po che 'dzin zhing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang/ blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad brgyad pas chu rlabs kyi tshul mdzad pa dang/ blo gros mi zang ba gser gyi
240b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog can g.yon pa'i khu tshur thugs kar gzhag ste g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can dang/ spobs pa brtsegs ba ljang ku g.yon pa'i khu tshur bang du gzhag cing g.yas pas so gol gtogs pa'o/ /nub tu thu chen thob pa dkar po
240b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas cung zad kha bye pa'i pad+ma dkar po 'dzin zhing/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa 'dor ba'i tshul can dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'dzoms pa'i blo gros ser 
241a1(rgyud 'grel): bo phyag gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba rdeg pa'i tshul can dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g.yon pas ut la la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing g.yaS paS mchog sbyin pa'o/ /byang du zla 'od dkar po g.yon pas
241a2(rgyud 'grel): utpa lar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang/ 'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang/ nam mkha' i mdzod ser po g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten zhing/
241a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa nam mkha' la bskor ba dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po 'am dkar po g.yon pas la rig cing g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo dang mthe bong sbyar te dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/ /byams pa la sogs
241a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra bar zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug gi gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi
241a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang/ gnyis kyi gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /byams pa dang 'jam dpal gnyis ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med ba'o/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan can/ zhal
241a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzum bag dang bcas shing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /shar sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar byed nag po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mnga' 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs
241a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub gyen du bsgreng bas bsdigs par byed pa/ gnyis pas 'khyud par byed pa'i lha mo'i nu ma nas 'dzin pa ste/ de yang phyag nyis ma dkar mo phyag g.yon pas 'dam skyes 'dzin pa zhing g.yas pas kun nas 'khyud pa ra brtson pa'o/ /
241b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa mar ka ta ltar ljang ba'i lha mo phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa utpal sdong po 'dzin zhing phyag g.yon pa mgul pa la 'khyud pas g.yas phyogs nas rnam par mdzes pa zhabs drug pa/ gsum pa 'phyag
241b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal gang rgyangs dang bcas pa/ gnyis pa 'jigs par byed pa gsum pa gdangs pa/ bzhi pa drag po chen po/ lnga pa rdo rje'i mche ba can? phrug pa spyi bor gnas shing ljags sgril pa'o/ /yang na spyi bor gnas pa sngon
241b3(rgyud 'grel): po rtsa ba'i zhal la sogs pa rnams g.yas skor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku rnams so/ /lho skor gzhan gyis mi thub pa ser po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang nag po dang dkar po dang/
241b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda''dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rta mgrin dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams
241b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang sngon po dang phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dbyug pa dang ka Na ya dang mda''dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sngon po zhabs
241b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bgegs mnan pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang dgra ste dang mnga' 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du mi g.yo
241b7(rgyud 'grel): ba sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang zhags pa dang mda''dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs bdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa g.yon ngos su 'byung ba'i gos sngon po can/ khrag gis
242a1(rgyud 'grel): brlan zhing ljags 'dril pa'i zhal gdangs pa'o/ /mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngor po phyag drug pa phyag dang po gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang mda'/ g.yon pa dag gis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/
242a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar nas mtheb chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas te sdigs mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang nas zhags pa ltar byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /bden bral du dbyug sngon can sngon po phyag drug pa
242a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mnga' / g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du stobs po che sngon po phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dbyug pa dang ral gri
242a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang thob dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa rtsa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya
242a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang mda''dzin zhing/ g.yon bdag gis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ 'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzud mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'og tu rdo rje
242a6(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mnga' 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /bgegs mthar byed la sogs
242a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bdud? ? pa dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po'o// khro bo bcu po rnams kyang khros pa'i lha stangs can spyan gsum dmar la smin ma g.yo ba/ rtsa ba'i zhal cung zad byed pa g.yas
242b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhal gdangs ba/ g.yon pa'i zhal tshems kyis ma mchu mnan ga mche ba gtsigs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i gos gyon pa/ thod ba'i phreng ba'i cod pan can skra dang smar ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ rol pa'i kan tu bskyod pa can/ klu brgyad kyas brgyan pa/ sna
242b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa ste/ gshin rje mthar byed ni g.yas brkyang ba 'am rdo rje skyil krung gis so/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir gnod mdzes rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor
242b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du lags su ma bshad de dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa'o/ /bar ma'i rim par bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i ri la gnas ba'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs
242b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyu ba sor ba rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang phyag brgyad pa dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mda''dzin zhing
242b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ral pa'i cod pan can/ spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yis gzhogs gnyis su rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de'i rjes
242b6(rgyud 'grel): su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la bdag gtsug tor 'khor la sgrub dkyil 'khor par tha dang du dang/ de'i sdeng du gnod mdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o/ /zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o/ /lha bzhi bcu rtsa gsum po rnams kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum
242b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'dir nu ma 'dzin par bshad pa de yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi ste/ khro bo rnams ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma g.yon logs su gnas pa rnams
243a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o/ /zhes shes par bya'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med kyang de'i nu ma 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis rang gi nu ma 'dzin pa'o/ /zhes ni gzhan no/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
243a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i rdo rje shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa ste/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
243a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang/ spyan ma dang tsunda rnams la 'dzam pa'i rdo rje dang/ mA ma kI dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang/ khro bo bcu la mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen rdo rje ma dang/ rin chen skar mda' dang/ bzang skyong la sogs pa bzhi la
243a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro gnyer can ma dang/ mthu chen thob la sogs pa bzhi la snang mdza' yas dang/ sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang zla 'od la sogs pa rnams la don yod
243a5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu(rgyud 'grel): so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni snying po'o/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da le big+h+nan+ta ka hUM/ zhes pa las thams cad pa'o// //chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur la sogs pa
243a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i rnam par bzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /gzhan 'dir gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chang par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can te mchod rten ni 'di la med do/ /gzhal yas khang gi lte bar sna tshogs
243a7(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes kyi rje 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ nyi ma gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa gser gyi mdog can in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i zur phud dang ldan pa/ rdo rje dang rin
243b1(rgyud 'grel): po che dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng du sangs rgyas lnga 'phro ba'i rin po che'i cod pan can/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang na bza' can sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon
243b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhal rnams ni ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mnga' dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ta dang/ gzhu
243b3(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams ba'o/ 'dab ma brgyad la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang/ gzi brjid phung po dang rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug ter
243b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mchams rnams su 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags dang rgyal ba rnams te/ gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil krung dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ sku mdog gser po phyag gnyis
243b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi g.yas pas 'khor lo gyen du gzung pa g.yon pa rang gi gdan la brten pa'o/ /de nas shar gyi re mig gi dbus su glang po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g.yas pa dkar po gdangs
243b6(rgyud 'grel): shing drag pa/ rgyab ma ser po dpa' ba/ g.yon pa dmar po mche ba gtsigs shing ma mchu mnan pa/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang
243b7(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lho'i de mig gi dbus su rta'i rgyal po'i la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i
244a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal can phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rin
244a2(rgyud 'grel): chen dang rdo rje gzi brjid dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /nub kyi ri mig gi dbus su rma bya la snang ba mdza' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyi
244a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang mnga' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje gsung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ byang gi re mig gi dbus su nam mkha' 
244a4(rgyud 'grel): lding la don yod grub pa ljang ku zhal bzhi'i rtsa ba ljang ku mche ba gtsigs pa/ g.yas pa ser po zhib/ rgyab ma dmar po rnam par sgeg pa/ g.yon pa dkar po zhib/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcagS kyu 'dzin zhing/
244a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rdo rje las dang rdor je bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rang rang gi bzhon
244a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang gos dang cod pan can no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i
244a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can no/ /'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o/ /zhes pa'i phyogs rkyang yod de/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i sna tshogs
244b1(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gi/ spyan ma dang mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa lta bu'o/ /sgo rnams la gang
244b2(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa dang/ lhor rdo rje zhags ser po rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa dang/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis
244b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pas sa ga'i stabs kyis gnas pa dang/ byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang ku rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa zlum po'i stabs kyis gnas pa ste/ bzhi po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas
244b4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra dang sma ra ser po gyen du brjes pa/ klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan ba'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di las phyi rol dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la/ shar phyogs su dbang ldan nas brtsams nas
244b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor gyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sa ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la mos pas sbyod pa'i sa ma pad+ma dmar po ltar bu chu skyes dmar po
