244b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ rab dga' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin dang/ dri med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang/ 'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ 'od 'phro mo ma ra ka ta'i
244b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog can utpa la sngon po 'dzin pa dang/ sbyang dka' ma ser mo pad par gnas pa'i phyag gan rkyal gyis ma ra ka ta'i nor bu 'dzin pa dang/ mngon du gyur ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po hi 'dzin pa dang
245a1(rgyud 'grel): ring du song ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ mi g.yo ba zla ba'i mdog can zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar pos mtshan pa'i pad ma'i yu ma khengs
245a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pa dang/ legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i utpa la 'dzin pa dang/ chos kyi sprin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa dang/ kun tu 'od
245a3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyin gung gi nyi ma'i mdog can pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshon par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis yid bzhin
245a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi nor bu 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o/ /de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin ma dmar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang
245a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can sna tshogs pa'i so ba'i nyi ma 'dzin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byin ma dkar mo yal ga dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun pa 'dzin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha
245a6(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra ka ta'i mdog can utpal sngon po 'dzin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa dang shes
245a7(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin zhing/ phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma pri yang ku ltar ljang ku
245b1(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma utpa la sngon po'i mdog can/ /utpal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dmar po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i po ti
245b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sna tshogs mdog can utpal sngon po la gnas pa'i sna
245b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ nub tu dbang ma bcu gnyis ni/ phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis utpal 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la tshe la dbang ma dkar dmar kyi mdog can
245b4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'dzin pa dang/ sems la dbang ma dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa dang/ yo byad la dbang ma ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
245b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang/ las la dbang ma ljang ku sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ skye ba la dbang ma sna tshogs mdog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can gyi dzA ti'i 'khri shing 'dzin pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma
245b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ mos pa la dbang ma pad+ma'i rtsa pa ltar dkar ba pri yang ku'i me tog gi snye ma 'dzin pa dang/ smon lam la dbang ma ser mo utpal sngon po 'dzin pa dang/ ye shes la dbang ma sdar
245b7(rgyud 'grel): po utpal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ chos la dbang ma dkar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa dang/ de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas pad+ma dkar po 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pas rdo rje rin po
246a1(rgyud 'grel): che'i snye ma 'dzin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser zhun ma gser zhun ma lta bu g.yas pas chu skyes ser po gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin zhing/ /g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
246a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du gzungs ma bcu gnyis ni/ /phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang /g.yon pas bsnyemS pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la nor gyi blo gros
246a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin ma dang/ rin chen skar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa b'dzin pa dang/ 'od zer can ma
246a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa dang/ /ri khrod lo ma ljang ku rma bya'i 'jug sgro 'dzin pa dang/ dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'jan pa dang/ sgo mdza' yas ma me tog bri yang ku ltar ljang kun skyes dmar
246a5(rgyud 'grel): po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang/ tsunda ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'chang pa'i ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang/ shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo utpal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams
246a6(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam par sel ma ljang ku rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dmar 'dzin pa dang/ ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod ma sor mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che
246a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyi dpe sgro ma 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams la shar du chos so so yang dag par rig ma dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang/ lhor don so so yang dag par rig ma ma ra ka ta'i mdog can g.yas pa dang/
246b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis rin po che'i zhags pa 'dzin pa dang nub tu nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mdza' gnyis su pad+mas mchan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang/ byang du spobs pa so so yang dag
246b2(rgyud 'grel): par rig ma mar ga ta ltar ljang ku phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su sgeg mo ser mo/ /sgeg mo dang bcas pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa dang/ bden bral du phreng ba ma dmar sor? phyag
246b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang/ rlung du glum dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang 'dzin zhing sgra sgrogs pa dang/ dbang ldan du gar ma ljang ku phyag gnyis gar gyi tshul gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma
246b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang/ na bza' dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ cung zad 'dzum zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sams pa'i skyil
246b5(rgyud 'grel): krung gis bzhugs pa ste/ khyad par sgo skyong ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /gzhan dag ni de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa la dbang ldan nas brtsams nas byang chubs sems dpa' rnams te /de la snam bu rnams
246b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi shar du kun du bzang po ser po g.yas pas mchog sbyin dang g.yon pas utpal la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ blo gros mi zad pa ser po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas mi 'jigs pas pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ sa'i snying po ser po
246b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas sa gnon mdzad cing g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang/ nam mkha' i snying po ljang ku g.yas pas rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs shing/ g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor
247a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mdzod ser po g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang g.yon pas bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'o dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang/ phyag na rin chen ljang ku g.yas pas rin po che dang/ g.yon pas chu skyes
247a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g.yas pas dung dang g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje snying po utpal sngon po mdog can g.yas pas rdo rje dang/ g.yon pas sa bcu ba'i glegs bam 'dzin pa'o//
247a3(rgyud 'grel): nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkar po g.yas pas mchog sprin dang g.yon pas chu skyes 'dzin pa dang/ mthu chen thob pa ser po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ zla 'od dkar po g.yas pas 'khor lo dang g.yon pas chu
247a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od dkar dmar g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g.yas pas sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ g.yon
247a5(rgyud 'grel): pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa ser po g.yas pas gol gtogs cing g.yon bas pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gur
247a6(rgyud 'grel): kum g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /g.yon pas shig? 'dzin pa dang/ sgribs pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba ngan 'dzin pa'o/ /bcu drug po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang
247a7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa' i skyil brung can rin po che'i cod pan dang sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang na bzas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa rnams so/ /sgo rnams la shar du ma he la gshin rje mthar byed nag po gsus
247b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'phyang ba zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang/ ral gri dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ zhal dang zhabs kyi khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no/ /lhor shes rab mthar byed
247b2(rgyud 'grel): ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa/ g.yas pa gdangs pa/ rgyab ma drag po chen po'o/ /g.yon pa zhib/ yang na 'di rnams rim pa ji lta bar/ /ser po dang/ sngon po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang ku'o/ /'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags
247b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ mda' dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang shak+ti dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal dmar po bzhi'i rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal rnams sgeg pa dang drag po dang bzhad pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa
247b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na 'di rnams dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje'i lcags sgrogs dang/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda'/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang/ gzhu 'dzin
247b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun tu ba spyod pas gnas pa'o/ /byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi pa/ yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku/ phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis dril bu
247b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis log 'dren mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams rnams la dbang ldan
247b7(rgyud 'grel): du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba khri zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g.yas drag po/ rgyab dpa' ba/ g.yon mi sdug pa'i nyams can yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dkar po'o/ /phyag brgyad
248a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs dkar gzung nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda'/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa zhabs g.yon
248a2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bas dbang phyug chen po'i mgo dang/ g.yas bskum pas ut ma'i nu ma mnan pa'i/ /med rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nag po/ /sgeg pa dang dpa' ba dang 'jigs su rung ba dang snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi pa/ yang na di rnams
248a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang/ dmar po/ 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang kha TwAng+ga dang 'brel pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa/ chung
248a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g.yas brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /bden bral du he ru ka sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba drag go/ g.yas pa rab tu dga' bas bzhad pa/ rgyab ma za bar rdam pa/ g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas
248a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang ku dang dkar po dang/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang mda' dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis snying kar pad+ma kha bye ba dang gzhu dang kha TwAng+ga dril
248a6(rgyud 'grel): bu ba dan dang bcas pa 'dzin zhing/ gnyis kyis 'jig byed chen blo? lpags pa rlung ras lta bu 'dzin pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g.yon brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /rlung du rta mchog ljang ku zhal ljang ku bzhi'i rtsa
248a7(rgyud 'grel): khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa/ g.yas pa drag po/ g.yon pa tshangs pa'i gdong can/ yang na 'di rnams ljang ku dang sngon po dang dkar po ste spyi bor rta mgo ljang ku/ 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje ba dan dang ldan
248b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgreng ba'i tshul dang/ gnyis pas bdan gsum pa'i tshul dang/ gsum pa rol? gri/ bzhi pas mda'/ /g.yon pas phub dang bcas pa'i phyag gis sna tshogs chu skyes su dang/ gsam pa shik+ta dang dbyug pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyad pa dang
248b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang ba ste zhabs bzhi pa/ /g.yas pa cig gis dbang mo dang dpal mo/ /gnyis pas dga' ma dang rangs ma/ g.yon gcig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa/ gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang dpyid kyi lha mnan nas bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor
248b3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i dbang phyag gi steng gi nam mkhar gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ser po/ /de la ser po bzhi pa/ yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang zhal bzhi ba/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral
248b4(rgyud 'grel): gri dang mda'o/ g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ rol pI kun tu bskyod pas bzhugs pa'o/ /'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag po/ /drag po dang zhi ba dang bzhad pa dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i
248b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal nag po bzhi pa/ yang na nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser bo'i zhal bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'/ /g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang gzhu
248b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o/ /khro bo bcu po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa zhal re re gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad dang ldan pas 'jigs su rung bcas/ /stag ti lcags ba'i gos dang smad
248b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yog can/ thod pa'i phreng pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa/ dbu skra d+dmar ser 'bar ba gyen du bcangs ba smrar dmar ser can gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad dang ldan pas 'jigs su rung ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa nyid gyi gra bzhi'i
249a1(rgyud 'grel): nang du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa la sogs pa'i khro bo bzhi'i phyi'i ra ba'i phyi rol gyi gnas su maM? la sogs pa'i zur thig pa bzhi po rnams kyi g.yas logs su me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi
249a2(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon logs su rdo rje gzugs ma la te/ de la me tog ma sar ma phyag na me tog gi snod can dang bdug spos ma nag mo phyag na spos phor can dang mar me ma dmar mo phyag na rin po che'i sgron ma'i mchod sdong can dang/ dri chab ma ljang ku
249a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na dri'i dung can dang/ rdo rje gzugs ma ser me phyag na me? long can dang/ rdo rje sgra ma ljang ku phyag na pi wang can dang/ rdo rje dom dmar mo phyag na dri'i snod can dang/ rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag na gos sna tshogs can no//
249a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bo 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma rin po che'i cod pan can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang gos kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /bzhi pa rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dbang po'i
249a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su sa sungs dkar po la gnas pa'i dbang po ser po rdo rje dang nu ma 'dzin pa dang/ gshin rje'i ma he la gshin rje nag po dbyug pa dang mdud 'dzin pa/ chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po gdengs ka bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang mdud
249a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ /lus ngan du mi la gnas pa'i lus ngan po ser po lcags kyu dang dbyug to 'dzin pa dang/ dbang ldan du glang la gnas pa'i dbang ldan dkar po rtsi gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ ral pa'i thor cog la thod pa dang zla ba phyed pas
249a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan zhing sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa mgrin pa sngon po dang me dar? la me lha dmar po blugs gzar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang/ bden bral du rol srin po'i bdag po bden bral sngon po ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa dang/ rlung du ri dwags
249b1(rgyud 'grel): la rlung lha sngon po rlung ras 'dzin pa ste/ brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pas phyag mtshan dang po dang/ g.yon pas gnyis pa 'dzin zhing rang snad gi btsun mo la 'khyud ba/ gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa'o/ /dbang ldan dang nye
249b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyi rol tu dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas rim pas tshangs pa la sogs pa ste/ de yang dang pa la tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa bgrang phred dang chu skyes 'dzin zhing g.yas ? dang cig shos dag thal mo sbyar bas dbyug pa dang
249b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /mkha' lding la khyab 'dzug nag po phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin zhing g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis thal mo sbyar bas dbyug ta? dang sa raM ga'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /glad la dbang phyug dkar po ri bong gis
249b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i ral pa'i thor cog can/ phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rma bya la gdong drug dmar po zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa dag gis shek+ti dang rdo rje dang/ g.yon pa dag gis khyim bya dang dril bu
249b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin zhing gnyis kyi thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /'di rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /tshengs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o/ /drag ma ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o/ /khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs ba'o/ /gzhon nu
249b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ni gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa'o/ /dbang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o/ /phag mo nag mo 'ug pa la gnas ma phyag bzhim g.yas pa dang cig shos dag gis ro hi ta dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gnyis gyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /yi dwags kyi steng du tsa
249b7(rgyud 'grel): muN+Di dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gzhan pa dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /b+h+rid+gi? ni ma nag mo shin tu skem pa bgrad phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /byi
250a1(rgyud 'grel): ba la tshogs bdag dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rtse gsum dang la du/ g.yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang la phug 'dzin pa'o//
250a2(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dga' byang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon zhing rdza rnga brdud bar brtson ba'o/ /rta bdun pa'i shing rta la nyi ma dmar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
250a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /dang pa la zla ba dkar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis ku mu ta la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /ra la bkra shis dmar po g.yas pas chu gri dang g.yon pas mi'i mgo po zla ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin
250a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /pad+ma la gza' lhag ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /spal pa 'am thod pa la phur bu dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma la pa sangs dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /ru sbal la spen pa nag po dbyug
250a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin pa'o/ /sgra gcan dmar nag phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /glang po la stobs bzangs dkar po ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o/ /khu byug gi shing rta la rgyal
250a6(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa ljang ku phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis me tog phreng ba dang mnga' 'o/ /g.yon pa dag gis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /ne gtso'i shing rta la sbrang rtsir byed pa dkar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa rag gis chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan
250a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mnga' / /g.yon pa dag gis btud ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /spre'u la dpyid kyi lha dkar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis mnga' dang ral gri g.yon pa dag gis gzhu dang btud ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /mdza' yas dang nor
250b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang 'jog po dang stobs rgyu dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang rig ldan rnams ni sprul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba ste/ yang na rang rang gi yab kyi phyag mtshan gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /thag bzangs ris dang stobs
250b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang tshim byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni nag po g.yul 'gyed pa'i go cha gyon pa ral gri dang phub la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na 'dzin pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gshegs pa rab tu brgyad ba pus mo'i
250b3(rgyud 'grel): bar du dkar ba/ de'i steng nas lte ba'i bar du ser po/ /lte ba'i steng nas mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po/ /de'i steng nas spyi bo'i bar nag po/ /phyag dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dmar ser pi wang gi sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o/ /dri za'i
250b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po zur phung lnga pa ser po pi wang gi sgra sgrog pa'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po don thams cad grub pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /gang ba bzang po sngon po dang/ nor bu bzang po ser po dang/ nor sbyin dmar po dang/ rnam thos sras ser
250b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ tsi pi kuN+Da li dmar po dang/ ki li mA lI ljang ku dang sgo'i dbang po ser po dang/ sbyong ba'i dbang po ser po ste/ gang ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'di rnams ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis bi dza pU ri ka'i 'bras
250b6(rgyud 'grel): bu dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o/ /'phrog ma ser mo chad bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o/ /tha skar dkar po dang/ bra nye ljang ku dang/ smin drug sngo sangs dang/ snar ma dmar skya dang/ mgo nag po dang/ lag ser po dang/ rgyal sngo sangs dang/ ?
250b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang/ mchu ser po dang/ bre me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser dang/ dbo? ljang ku dang/ me bzhi dkar po dang/ nag po ljang ku dang/ sa ri ser po dang/ sa ga nag po dang/ lha mtshams ljang ku dang/ snron ser po dang/ snubs ser po dang/ chu stod nag po dang
251a1(rgyud 'grel): chu smad dkar po dang/ gro zhin dkar ser dang/ mon gre nag po dang/ mon gru ser po dang/ khrums stod ljang ku dang/ khrums smad ser po dang/ nam gru dkar po dang/ byi bzhin sngo sangs te/ tha skar la sogs pa'i lha 'di
251a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i stod g.yogs yongs su 'dzin pa thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gzhan yang lha rnams ni 'khor los 'dren pa'i khang brtsegs la gnas par shes par bya ste/ dbang po la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams pad+ma la gnas pa/
251a3(rgyud 'grel): re re 'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba/ 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che brgyan pa/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra phyogs
251a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du sgrogs pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs sgo skyong rnams ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par smad mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin 'jam pa'i dbyangs
251a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o/ /me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad
251a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spyan ma rnams la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang/ mA mra ki dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ sa ma bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang sgeg mo dang kun tu bzang mo la sogs
251a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi dang khro bo bcu dang/ me tog ma dang gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyod pas so/ /rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis dang/ don so so yang dag
251b1(rgyud 'grel): par rig ma dang/ phreng ba ma dang nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dang bdug spos ma dang sgra ma dang/ lho phyogs nas gnas pa'i lha rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan gyis so/ /rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos nga/ nga? mo dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshe dang dbang
251b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bcu gnyis dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ma dang glu ma dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang/ mar me ma dang ro ma dang/ nub phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis so/ /rdo rje las rang la sogs pa bzhi dang sgrol
251b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang rdo rje 'beb pa dang/ gzungs ma bcu gnyis dang/ spongs pa so so yang dag par rig ma dang gar ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang dri chab? ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang/ byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don yod grub pas rgyas
251b4(rgyud 'grel): btab po/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu:O/ /oM a a(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM trI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wan dzA na murti wA gI shwa ra/ mahA wA tsa/ sarba d+harma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hu? tu dz+nyAn garb+ha a:zhes pa
251b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i sngags so/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da li big+h+nadta? ka hUM/ zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o// //ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal
251b6(rgyud 'grel): yas khang gi dbus su/ nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser po/ rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos yongs su bskor ba ste 'ga' zhig 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por gsungs la/ gzhan du ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po dang/ rtsibs
251b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi shar dkar po dang/ lho nag po dang/ nub dmar po dang/ byang ljangs ku'o zhes gsungs so/ /'khor lo'i lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge rnam par mdzad chen po gser gyi mdog
252a1(rgyud 'grel): can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar po sa bon gyi phyag rgya can no/ /lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can no/ nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma gtsug
252a2(rgyud 'grel): tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no// byad gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang ku mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o/ me'i rtsibs la gzi brjid gtsug tor dkar dmar 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas pas nyi ma 'dzin cing/ /
252a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dkur bsten pa'o/ /bden bral gyi rtsibs la rgyal mtshan gtsug tor dmar po dang/ 'dres pa'i nag po phyag dag gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung gi rtsibs la rnon po'i gtsug tor nam mkha' ltar sngo sangs phyag g.yaS
252a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ral gri dang g.yon pas po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gdugs can gtsug tor dkar po phyag dag gis gdugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su skeg mo dang phreng ba dang glu ma dang ger? ma
252a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ dkar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ sna tshogs kyi mdog can phyag gnyis ma'o/ /snam bu rnams la sgo'i g.yon du byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g.yas gnyis te/ de yang shar gyi snam bu la byams pa ser po g.yas pas klu shing
252a6(rgyud 'grel): gi me tog dang/ g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang/ mthong ba don yod ser po phyag g.yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten la dang/ ngan song kun 'bren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/
252a7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser bsres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /lho'i phyogs su spos kyi glang po dkar ljang gnas pas dril bu chos/
252b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang/ nam mkha' i mdzod dkar ser g.yas pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur?
252b2(rgyud 'grel): dkur brten pa dang/ ye shes tog sngon po phyag g.yas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /nub tu bdud rtsi 'od dkar po g.yas pa cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur
252b3(rgyud 'grel): dkur brten pa dang/ zla ba'i 'od dkar po g.yas pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang/ bzang skyod dkar po g.yas pa 'bar ba'i 'od can kyi rin po che 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten
252b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od dkar po g.yas pa rdo rje'i gur 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkar brten pa'o/ /byang du rdo rje snying po sngo skya g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i utpal sngon po 'dzin zhing /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang/ blo gros mi zad pa
252b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po phyag gnyis kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g.yas pa chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang/ kun tu bzang po gser gyi mdog can
252b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur dkur brtan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar mo sa dang dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar po dang ljang ku ste me tog ma
252b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o/ sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po/ phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/ lhor rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa dang/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrogs dmar po phyag gnyis rdo rje
253a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrogs 'dzin pa dang/ byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang ku phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lha sum cu rtsa bdun ? 'di rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang/ rin po ches brgyan pa rin po che'i
253a2(rgyud 'grel): cod pan can/ spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ zla ba rnams la sems dpa' skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po la rang dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /rdo rje
253a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so/ /shar phyogs dang me? mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so/ /lho phyogs dad? pa'i rtsa? bral gyi mtshams su na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor ?
253a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sras so/ /nub phyogs dang rlung gis mtshams na gnas pa rnams la pad+ma gtsug tor gyis so/ byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so/ /'dir phyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i? gnas gyi snam bud? zla ba'i
253a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad po blta bar bya'o/ /zhes sbyod rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir/ /'dod yon gyi snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod pa ni yang dag par rigs so/ kha cig na nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud las gsungs
253a6(rgyud 'grel): pas bya'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o/ /'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgu po gtsug tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin pa'i
253a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad do/ /de ni mi rigs te chags pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs can 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs su mngon par sprul pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang/ /bod? yug?
253b1(rgyud 'grel): gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te g.yas skor gyis mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa dgod par bya ste/ de nas dbang ldan nas glad la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang
253b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pa dag na rtse gsum dang ral gri'o/ /nam mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g.yos pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje dang/ g.yon pa dag mdung dang 'khor lo'o/ /rdo rje gser ma khyab 'jug lta bu ste khyad par na gser
253b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can no/ rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa dmar po g.yas pa dgan shak+ti dang rdo rje dang/ g.yon pa dag mkhyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu min rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o/ /dang pa la mi sma rdo rje ser po zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas pa dag na
253b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang bgrang phreng dang/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug ba dang spyi blugs so/ /rdo rje zhi be ma ni tshangs pa lta bu'o/ /so ldan gyi dbang po dkar po mche ba drug ba dang/ zla ba la rdo rje mtshon cha ser po phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i/ /g.yon pas rdo rje dkar
253b5(rgyud 'grel): brten pa'o/ /lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha lta bu'o/ /rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo dmar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dang/ g.yon pa na pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa lta bu'o//
253b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po la rdo rje'i 'od khro bo dkar po g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje mdog ma ni rdo rje'i 'od lta bu'o/ /ra la rdo rje dmar ser khro bo dmar po phyag g.yas na rdo rje dang g.yon pas mi
253b7(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas za ba'i tshul lo/ /rdo rje ska rags ma ni rdo rje dmar sar lta bu'o/ /pad+ma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu can no/ /rdo rje zhi pa ma ni rdo rje zhi ba lta bu'o/ /sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser po bgrang dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/
254a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bla ma ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /pad+ma la rdo rje pa sangs khro bo dkar po bgrang phred dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje pa sangs ma ni rdo rje pa sangs lta bu'o/ /ru sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag po g.yas pa na rdo rje dang/ g.yon
254a2(rgyud 'grel): pa na dbyug pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o/ /rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo dmar nag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag na zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can no/ /rdo rje lha min mo ni rdo rje sgra gcan lta bu'o/ /rdo rje mjug rings khro bo
254a3(rgyud 'grel): nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje klu mo ni rdo rje mjug rings lta bu'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa drug ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bris pa'o/ glang po che la rdo rje glang sna dkar po g.yas pa ni rdo rje dang
254a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa na thod ga shol 'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma ni rdo rje glang sna lta bu ste khyad par ni g.yon pas khaTwAng+ga'o/ /khu byug gi shing rta la rdo rje phreng ba can ljang ku g.yas pa na rdo rje dang/ g.yon pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje phreng ba can
254a5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ste khyad par ni phyag g.yon na kha shak+ti'o/ /ne btso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g.yas na rdo rje dang/ g.yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan no/ /rdo rje dbang can ma ni rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste khyad par ni sku mdog dmar mo'o/ /spal ba'i shing
254a6(rgyud 'grel): rta la rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba lta bu'o/ /me tog gi shing rta la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis rdo rje btun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pho
254a7(rgyud 'grel): nya mo ni rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste g.yon pas kha TwAng+ga 'dzin pa'i khyad par ro/ /ra la rdo rje me dmar po g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha g.yon pas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba ma ni rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /ma he la
254b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dus nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /ro langs la rdo rje dus ma nag po rdo rje dang kha TwAng+ga 'dzin pa'o/ /klu lhag ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po phag gi gdod pa can rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /skyes bu la rdo rje gdong na sngon po
254b2(rgyud 'grel): phag pa'i gdong can ma rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas na rdo rje dang/ g.yon na klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ chu srin la rdo rje 'jigs mchu srin ma dkar mo gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan
254b3(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas na rdo rje dang/ g.yon na rdo rje mtshan pa'i chu srin can no/ /ri dwags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g.yas na rdo rje dang g.yon na rlung ras can no/ /rdo rje shugs can ma ni rdo rje rlung lta bu'o/ /ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug te?
254b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rnam par gtsigs ma ni rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o/ /g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa ni khyad par ro/ /byi pa la rdo rje legs 'dren dkar po glang po che'i gdong can phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin zhing/
254b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dbyug to 'dzin pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can no/ /byi ba la sbrul mo sngon po g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pas phyag shing can no/ /bsdigs ma ljang ku g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na? ral gri bgegS
254b6(rgyud 'grel): byed 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo ser mo g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na pad+ma can no/ /dbyangs can ma dkar mo g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na pi wang can no/ /seng ge la bgrod dka' ma ljangs ku g.yas dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang phya g.yon
254b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag na lde men dang ral gri can no/ /'dir mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag g.yas pa rnams su ji ltar 'byung pa'i rdo rje rnams ni rtse mo gsum par rig par bya'o/ nub tu rdo rje glu dang nye par pad+ma la sa'i lha mo gsang?
255a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdog can phyag dag gis bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /lha ma yin rnams ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can go cha dang bcas pa ral gri 'dzin pa ras pa? la gyi gdan la 'dug pa'o/ /klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan pa'i/
255a2(rgyud 'grel): gdengs ka can btsun mo dang bcas pa la thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /khor yug gi phyi rol mtshams rnams su med mnar med la sogs pa'i dmyal ba rnams dang/ bden bral du yi dwags kyi 'gro ba rnams dang/ rlung du byol song gi 'gro ba pa rnams?
255a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dbang ldan du ma'i 'gro ba rnams gnas pa ste/ rim pa 'di ni rgyud gzhan las bris pa'o/ /gzhan dang ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar sa'i lha mo dan gnod sbyin rnams dang nye bar lha ma yin rnams so zhes brjod par byed do/ /'khor
255a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang phyug gi thugs kar zla ba la oM mu ni mahA mu ne ye swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags te 'di nyid ni snying po'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba durga ti pa ra shod+ha ne rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te/ samyaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA
255a5(rgyud 'grel): baM bi shod+ha ni shu d+he bi shud+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+he swAhA/ zhes pa phreng ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags ni/ oM sarba bid sarba a pa ya ga ti ha na bi shod+ha ni hUM haM(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ ces pa ste las thams cad pa'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni
255a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag go// //'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nad ri rab kyi steng sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze 'bru la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng
255a7(rgyud 'grel): dam?/ glang po che dang bral ba yang rung sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'byung ba chen po zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral gri thor cog? dang/ sma ra dmar ser can/ thod pa lnga dang ldan pa/ mig gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa
255b1(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'phyang ba/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa stag gi lpags pa'i smad g.yogs can/ lag pa bzhi'i g.yas pa dag gi gri gug dang Da ma ru 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa dag pa ste/ ?
255b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gis mnan pa'i 'byung po 'dul byed drag po chen po sku mdog sngon po thod pa ldas mtshan pa'i cod pan la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen? du bcings pa na bza' sngon po mnabs pa mche ba gtsigs
255b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal can bzhad pa'i gang rgyangs can spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ phyag bzhi'i g.yas pas rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa gsor zhing/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa/ gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings pa ste/ phyag rgya
255b4(rgyud 'grel): ni ming mod? gnyis snol nas mdzub mo gnyis bskum ste mthe'u chung dang gung mo yang mthe bong rgan pas mnan pa'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so/ /kla'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste/ de 'ang stobs kyi rgyu sngon pos spyi bo bcings pa/ mgrin pa
255b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jog po dmar po dga' bo dang nyer dga' ser por rna rgyan/ mdza' yas dkar pos tshangs skur? nor rgyas dkar pos ni ska rags/ phyag rgya'i phyag dag gi dpung par ni rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog can/ phyag gzhan pa gnyis kyi dpung pa la
255b6(rgyud 'grel): dung skyong dkar po/ rkang gdab ngag gis pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dmar po/ re mig rnams la shar du glang dang nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po dkar po mtshan mgyen du langs pa thod pa'i phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral
255b7(rgyud 'grel): gri thod cog can sbrul gyi mchod? phyir thogs pa dang bcas pa/ phyag bzhi'i g.yas pa dag gis gri gug dang Da ma ru 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ lhor nam mkha' lding dang nyi ma la khyab 'jug nag po/ rin
256a1(rgyud 'grel): po cha'i cod pan can g.yas pa dag gis rnga yab dang dung 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu dang pa dang zla ba la tshangs pa dkar po zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa dag
256a2(rgyud 'grel): gis bgrang phreng dang gdugs yu ba 'dzin zhing/ g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ byang du rma bya dang nyi ma la smin drug gi bu dmar po gtsug phur gsum dang ldan pa g.yas pas rnga yab dang/ g.yon pas shak+ti? 'dzin pa'o/ dbang
256a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du byi ba dang zla ba la chogs bdag dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can spyan gsum pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa g.yas pa ngag gis la phug dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ mer nye ma'i dkyil 'khor
256a4(rgyud 'grel): la nyi ma dmar po g.yas pa dang g.yon bdag gis pad+ma la gnas pa'i nye ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ bden bral du shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba la sgra gcan dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba mig dang smin ma dang slar dmar ser ?
256a5(rgyud 'grel): mche ba bzhi pa zhal gdangs pa phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pas thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug ser po gar byed pa/ spyi bor zla ba? can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ g.yas pa dang cig shos dag gi?
256a6(rgyud 'grel): Da ma ru dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su zla ba la dpal mo dkar mo thugs kar thal mo sbyar bas me tog pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru zla ba la thig le mchog ma dmar mo spos snod 'dzin zhing gar byed pa'o/ /nub tu
256a7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la ri bo can ma dmar mo dmar me 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du zla ba la dka' bzlog ma ser mo spyi bor gdengs ka'i rnam par byas pa'i lag pa zlog cing gar byed pa'o /mer zla ba la rin po che dpal mo dmar mo dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral
256b1(rgyud 'grel): du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang ku pi wang sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung du zla ba la lha mdzes ma nag mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin ba'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la kun 'byor ma ser mo gar byed cing phyag na rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar dus
256b2(rgyud 'grel): srungs dkar po dang zla ba la brgya byin ser po rin po che'i cod pan can g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing g.yon pa rdo rje'i mtshon cha can no/ /lhor? ma ha? dang nyi ma la gshin rje nag po gsus pa 'phyang ba/ spyan dang smin ma dang smar dang ral pa dmar
256b3(rgyud 'grel): ser can/ gos ser po gyon pa g.yas pa thod pas mtshon pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin zhing/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu lag 'gro bas zla ba la chu lha dkar po gdongs ka bdun dang ldan pa/ g.yon pas kla'i
256b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa 'dzin zhing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o/ /byang du gnod sbyin la gnas pa'i lus dan ser po sha rgyas shing gsus pa 'phyang ba rin po che'i cod pan can/ /g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis dbyug te dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o/ /me? bar
256b5(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi ma lha me lha dmar po ral pa dang ldan pa/ skra dang sma ra ser zhing 'bar bas gsus pa 'phyang ba/ ril pa dang mchod phyir thogs pa can/ g.yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin dang 'grang phreng 'dzin zhing g.yon pa dag gi dbyug gu gsum pa dang spyi/
256b6(rgyud 'grel): blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du ro langs dang nyi ma la srin po nag po sma ra ser po can/ /g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas me shis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du ri dwags dang zla ba rlung lha sngon po gtsug bud? gsum dang ldan
256b7(rgyud 'grel): pa phyag dag gis rlung ras 'dzin pa'o/ dbang ldan du ngang pa dang zla ba la zla ba dkar po g.yon pa na ku mu ta na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du dbang ldan yang dbang phyug chen po lta
257a1(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /rim pa bzhi pa'i shar du zla bal seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dkar mo seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /lho ru zla ba la rnam par 'byor ma dmar mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu pa rma? ldan mchen mo dkar
257a2(rgyud 'grel): mo gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du zla ba la chang mchog ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang ldan du zla ba la mchog 'brog ma dmar mo thugs kar me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar pa'o/ /mer zla ba la
257a3(rgyud 'grel): la rin chen dbang phyug ma ser mo spos phor 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral du zla bal rgyal mtshan ma ser mo dril bu dung chos 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung du zla ba la 'bro skyod ma ser mo mar me'i mchod stong 'dzin pa'o/ /'dir gdal khyad par gyi tshig med pa
257a4(rgyud 'grel): der ni nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa ste/ lha thams cad sems dpa' i skyil dkrung/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rigs kyi dbang po ni mi bskyod pa
257a5(rgyud 'grel): ste thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM do/ /hUM badzra phaT ces pa ni snying po ste/ yang na/ oM b+hu ta DA ma ru b+hu ta ya d+hi pa ti a k+Sho b+hya/ /kirI Ti na sarbba b+hA ta pre shA tsa na sAd+ha ya hUM phaT/ /ces pa'o/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid de yang na bgegs
257a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed kyi sngags so// //nam mkha' 'gro lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa nas gzhal yas khang gi mthar thug pa sngar gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/ /de la dbus kyi gzhal yas khang
257a7(rgyud 'grel): gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gau ri la sogs pa rnams dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su puk+ka si la sogs pa rnams so/ /de yang gau rI dkar mo g.yas
257b1(rgyud 'grel): ba lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/ tsau rI ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang/ betyA li dmar mo lcags sgog 'dzin pa dang/ g+hasma ri ljang ku dril bu 'dzin pa dang/ puk+ka sI sngon mo byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang/ sha ba rI dkar mo ri rab 'dzin pa dang/
257b2(rgyud 'grel): tsanda li sngon mo me thab 'dzin pa dang/ ro bmi ni snga tshogs mdog can rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ shar gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su zla ba la sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkar po ste/ rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ /g.yon pa dmar po lhag ma rnams ston
257b3(rgyud 'grel): po/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po rnams na rma bya dang ma he dang chu srin dang nya dang/ glang mo che dang ru sbal dang glu lhag ma can dang/ dang po rnams dang/ g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad po rnams na byi dang/ srog chags dzyeSh+Thi? dang/ sbrul ha lA hA la dang/
257b4(rgyud 'grel): Any+dzan b+ho dang byi ba dang g.yag dang dri can dang tsA ta ka rnams so// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta bar lha mo rnams te/ de yang skam pa ma sngon mo skam pa 'dzin pa'o/ zhags
257b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa dang/ dol zlus ma dmar mo nyi rgya zlum po 'dzin pa dang/ lcags kyu ma lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang/ me tog ma dkar mo me tog gi za ma tog 'dzin pa dang/ bdug spos ma nag mo spos por 'dzin pa dang/ mar me ma
257b6(rgyud 'grel): ser mo mar me'i mchod sdong 'dzin pa dang/ dri cha ba ma ser mo dri yis gad ba'i dus chos 'dzin pa'o/ /lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rin chen mkha' 'gro ser po ste 'di'i rtsa ba dang g.yon pa'i zhal dag ni ser po dang dkar po'i/ /lhag ma
257b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sngon po'o/ /g.yas pas thod pa rnams ma bya ka ranDa dang/ dur pa dang/ lug dang/ tsa ka ra dang/ khra dang/ hor pa dang/ 'ol pa dang/ ku ra rnams dang/ g.yon pa rnams na stobs kyi rgyu dang/ dung skyong dang/ rigs ldan dang/
258a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang/ 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas dang /mdza' yas rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su lha mo rnams te/ de yang nyi phyag ma dkar
258a2(rgyud 'grel): mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang/ mar me ma sngon mo mar me'i mtshangs sdong 'dzin pa dang/ rin chen skar mang? ma sor mo rin po che 'dzin pa dang/ glo phyag ma mo ljang ku glog gi 'khri shing 'dzin pa dang/ sgegs mo dmar mo bshes
258a3(rgyud 'grel): shing sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ phreng ba ma dmar mo phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang/ glu ma dmar skya phyag dag gis ting ting shag sgrog pa dang/ gar ma sna tshogs mdog can rdo
258a4(rgyud 'grel): rje dang bcas pa'i phyag dag gis gang byed pa'o/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po ste 'di'i rtsa ba dang g.yon pa'i zhal dag ni dmar po dang dkar po/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngon po'o/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams ma dom dang/
258a5(rgyud 'grel): bya rgod dang bse dang ba man dang stag dang spre'u dang chu srin dang lce spyangs rnams dang/ g.yon pa rnams na khra dang 'ug pa dang so bya dang/ seng ge dang gzhang bya dang/ ra dang ri dwags dang bag rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang/ dbang
258a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan la sogs ba'i mtshams sa rnams su lha mo rnams te/ de yang pad+ma dkar mo pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ chos 'byung ma ser mo chos 'byung 'dzin pa dang/ lcags sgrog mnag mo phyag dag gis lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang /rang 'khyud ma
258a7(rgyud 'grel): ljang ku sangs rgyas la rjes su chags pa 'ching ba'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang la 'khyud par brtson pa'o/ /gling bu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis gling bu bud par brtson pa dang /pi wang ma ser po phyag gnyis kyis pi
258b1(rgyud 'grel): wang bsgreng pa la brtson pa dang/ rdza zlum ma dkar mo phyag dag gis rnga bo che brdung ba dang /rdza rnga ma du ba'i mdog can phyag dag gis rdza rdza brdung ba la brtson pa'o/ /byang gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dung ba ltar ljang ku ste/ 'di'i
258b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i zhal ni rta gdong ljang ku /gzhan rnams ni lha'i zhal can/ /phyogs kha gcig ni rtsa pa'i zhal yang lha'i yin la g.yon pa dkar po/ /lhag ma rnams ni sngon po'o/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa rnams na gza' lhag dang bur bu dang 'jug rings dang sgra gcan
258b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mig dmar dang pa sangs dang spen pa dang khyab 'jug rnams dang/ g.yon pa rnams na dbang po dang chu lha dang tshangs pa dang drag po dang/ 'dod pa'i lha dang stobs bzangs dang thag bzangs ris dang stobs can rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams dang
258b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su lha me rnams te/ de'ang sgo lcangs ma dkar mo sgo lcags 'dzin pa dang/ lde kyog ma ser mo lde kyog 'dzin pa dang/ sgo glegs ma dmar mo sgo glegs 'dzin pa dang/ yol ba man nag? mo yol ba 'dzin pa dang/
258b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang/ mA ma kI sdor mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ gos dkar mo dmar mo pad+ma 'dzin pa dang/ sgrol ma ljang ku utpal sngon po 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang chen po'i sgo rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams
258b6(rgyud 'grel): su gau rI la sogs pa dang/ puk+ki sI la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gdan dang sku mdog dang dbyibs dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnams ni dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag bcu drug pa'i kye'i rdo rje ji lta bu
258b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ kun nas 'khyud pa'i bdag med ma yang de bzhin no/ /'khor lo la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro bzhi brjod pa'i khyad par gzhan rnams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de rnams la 'khyud pa'i lha? mo rnams ni/ rim pa ji lta bar/ spyan
259a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang /mA ma kI dang/ gom dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams te dkar mo dang ser ? dmar mo dang ljang ? dang sdig mdzub dang/ ldan pa'i phyag gnyis ma rnams so/ /mkha' 'gro lnga po rnams kyang re re zhing sangs/
259a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no// thams cad du gzhal yas khang gi lha mo rnams no gcer pu spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa mche ba gtsigs pa zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma dbu skra 'bar? zhing gyen du brdzes pa/ dpral ba'i dbyings sku
259a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i mthong ba lnga dang mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba'i do shal dang phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang ro dang nyi ma la g.yon brkyang giS gar gyis gnas pa'o/ /khyad par ma bshad pa rnams ni thugs ka'i g.yon pa'i
259a4(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur gyi sdigs mdzug kyis bsdigs par mdzad pa ste/ 'khyud pa'i lha mo rnams la ni gdan tha dad pa med do/ /gau rI la sogs pa brgyad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ro'i gdan gyi gnas su tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po
259a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gshin rje dang lus ngan dang bden bral dang thag bzangs ris rnams so zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go /mkha' 'gro rnams dang/ gau rI la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro la mngon par phyogs pa ste/ lha mo gzhan rnams ni rang
259a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi bdag bo la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /kye'i rdo rje'i spyi bor sa rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ rdo rje sde sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo la thugs dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med rnams so/ /rtag pa la 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang 'khor
259a7(rgyud 'grel): lo ste sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la thugs dang/ rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /rdo rje nyi ma la rin chen 'dzin pa dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku
259b1(rgyud 'grel): rang thugs dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la pad+ma 'dzin pa dang rdo rje pad+ma ste/ sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku dang rin chen dang mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag med rnams so/ /rta mchog khra? ral gri 'dzin pa dang
259b2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ste/ sgo dang mtshams kyi lha mo rnams la sku dang thugs dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams so/ /phyi rol gyi gau rI la sogs ba rnams snga ma bzhin no/ rdo rje la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thugs ka'i sa bon rim pa ?
259b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin du/ hUM(rgyud 'grel): oM traM A:kha zhes pa'o/ /snying po'i sngags ni/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya marda marda badzra d+h+rik phaT swA hA/ om shA shwa ta pa ra ma shA ? ta e hye hi dzin dzik hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra sU rya ta mo bid+ha man sa ma ya stwaM a ha ra tri d+hIk?  phaT
259b4(rgyud 'grel): swa hA/ oM badzra d+harmA sa ma yastwaM hu lu hu lu A ro laka phaT swAhA/ oM hUM hUM hiM hi pradz+nyA d+hik phaT/ zhes pa rnams so/ /na ma:sa man+ta bud+d+he b+hya/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya ma hA daM ? utka Ta b+ha ra wA ya badzra san+t+ra ha darpa pa ya a mri te kuN+Da li hUM/ zhes pa ni mthar
259b5(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi sngags taM las thams cad pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro lnga po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgom par bya ste re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor so so/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ gang zhig
259b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mgon po nyid/ dbus su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor snying po yongs 'dzin phyir/ /dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa 'am/ /yang bsdus pa yi dkyil 'khor ro zhes pas so//
259b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sbyar ba drug gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa nas rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo'i mdza' thug pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin te/ rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo la khro bo bcu'o/ /gzhan 'jig
260a1(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rjes 'og gi bar lta bu'o zhes pa ni khyad par ro/ /'dir 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i lte pa'i nang chos kyi 'byung gnas spyi
260a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang re re bas kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang rdo rje'i lte ba la gzhal yas khang chen po/ phyogs gzhan la ni 'dir chos 'byung med pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang chen po'i lte
260a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o zhes mngon par brjod pa bla ma las
260a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i phyir/ /nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi steng du rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ste rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po 'am nag po/ rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bur bcas pa'i g.yas pa dang
260a5(rgyud 'grel): cig shos kyi phyag dag gis lha mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /de ni rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub du bcas pa'i phyag g.yas brkyang zhing phyag g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzin pas 'khyud pa sku mdog dmar po ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ste/ ming gsum?
260a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang/ rdo rje phag mo zhes par yang grags so/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g.yas skor gyiS sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa lnga po dgod par bya ste/ de dag gi 'khor lo rnams ni dkyil 'khor so
260a7(rgyud 'grel): so'i shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su g.yon skor dang/ me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g.yas skor gyis so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i mtshams rnams su rim pa ji lta bar mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can
260b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ sngon mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang ku rnams te g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o/ /sgo rnams su thod pa'i dum bu dang keng rus dang mched rnam par gcig pa rnams ni nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bur bcas pa'i phyag dag gis rab tu
260b2(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo dang/ gtum pa'i mig can ma dang 'ong ldan ma dang/ sna chen mo thal ba dkar po'i mdog can rnams 'khyud pa'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su seng+ge'i steng du sna tshogs su chu skyes dang zla ba la gnas pa'i
260b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i snying kar skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar po sta 'khor lo dang 'khor los mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /sgo rnams pa
260b4(rgyud 'grel): chang dgra dang 'od dpag med dang snying rje'i 'od dang/ rdo rje'i sku rnams ni dkar po ste 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang mi'u thung ma dang lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma dang shing grib ma ser mo rnams la 'khyud
260b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rta'i steng du chu skyes dang nyi ma gnas pa'i lha'i bu nyi ma'i snying kar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rin chen mkha' 'gro ser po sti rin po che dang rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin
260b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis rin chen mkha' 'gro ma ser mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /sgo rnams la myu gu can dang/ rdo rje ral pa can dang/ dpa' bo chen po dang/ rdo rje hUM mdzad rnams ni ser po ste rin po che dang/ rin po che'i dril bu 'dzin
260b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag dag gis sa srungs ma dang 'jigs byed chen mo dang rlung shugs ma dang chang 'thung ma ljang ku rnams la 'khyud pa'o/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas
261a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i snying kar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po ste/ pad+ma dang pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar po ste/ pad+ma dang padmma sa mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma
261a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo 'khyud pa'o/ /sgo rnams la shin tu bzang po dang/ rdo rje bzang po dang/ 'jigs byed chen po dang /mig mi bzang rnams ni sku mdog dmar po ste pad+ma dang/ pad+ma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis sngon sangs lha mo dang/ shin tu bzang
261a3(rgyud 'grel): mo dang rta rnam dang bya gdong ma dkar mo rnams la 'khyud pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i gzhal yas khang gis dbus su glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la khyab 'jug gi snying kar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 
261a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rje mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa'o /de ni dmar mo 'am nag mo'o/ /sgo rnams la stobs po che dang rin chen rdo rje dang/ nam mkha' i snying po rnams
261a5(rgyud 'grel): ni nag po ste rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis 'khor lo'i shags can ma dang dum skyes ma dang chang 'tshong ma dang 'khor lo'i go cha rnams ser mo la 'khyud pa'o/ /don yod grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su nam mkha' 
261a6(rgyud 'grel): lding gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i lha'i bu zla ba'i snying gar rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ljang ku ste sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i
261a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag dag gis sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang ku la 'khyud pa'o/ /sgo rnams la dpal he ru ka dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems dpa' rnams ni ljang ku ste sna tshogs rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i dril bu
261b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis shin tu dpa' mo dang stobs chen po dang 'khor lo sgyur ma dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo du ba ltar sngo skya'i mdog can rnams la 'khyud pa'o/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'dir mkha' 'gro
261b2(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa ni g.yon pas thod pa dang kha DwAng+ga dang g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa bzhi'i phyag g.yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gdengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 
261b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i blo can ma la sogs pa rnams ni 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i sngags mdzub can no/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang sa srungs ma la sogs pa rnams ni rin po che dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang sngo bsangs
261b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo la sogs pa rnams ni pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bo/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma dang shin tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnams ?
261b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sngags mdzub bo/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'khyud par byed pa g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis 'dzug pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo
261b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la khwa gdong mdang 'ug gdong ma dang khyi gdong ma dang phyag gdong ma rnams ni ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhal can te rim pa ji lta bar sngon mo dang ser mo dang dmar mo dang ljang ku'i mdog can/ phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags
261b7(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrogs dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /mtshams rnams la gshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje pho nya mo dang gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i gdong can te g.yas dang g.yon gyi sku
262a1(rgyud 'grel): phyed phyed g.yas dang g.yon gyi lha mo'i mdog can phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis me long dang pi wang dang dril bu chos dang ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o/ /lha mo brgyad po 'di dag kyang g.yon pas thod pa dang kha TwAng+ga
262a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o/ /gzhal yas khang drug po rnams kyi mtshams rnams su byang chub kyi sems la sogs pas gang/ ba'i thod pa rnams ni sna tshogs mu skyes la gnas pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
262a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas gshin rje 'joms pa'i mthar thugs pa rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ro rnams la bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo sgyur ba rnams kyang ro la gnas pa'o/ /zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no/ /lha pho rnams ni sku rgyab tu
262a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang pa'i stag gi lpags pa'i sham 'thabs dkris pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa can mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba mgrin pa la 'phyang ba/ ral ba nag po'i thor cog can no/ /lha mo rnams ni gcer bu dbu skra nag po grol zhing mi mgo
262a5(rgyud 'grel): skams po'i phreng ba mgrin par 'phyang ba'o/ /lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyang zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum pa rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'i dpral ba'i dbyes nas thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ dpung rgyan dang g.yer
262a6(rgyud 'grel): kha la sogs pas mngon par brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor lo sgyur pa drug ni mchog gi phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang zla ba phyed dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i thor cog can no/ /lha mo sum
262a7(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa bzhi po rnams ni rang rang gi 'khor lo'i dbang po la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /'khor lo sgyur ba drug ni mchog gi phyag rgya drug dang ldan po/ nor bu lnga dang khwa gdongs ma la sogs pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'khor lo'i
262b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /dpa' po rnams ni rang rang gi shes rab ma la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /de ltar 'di ni phyogs gcig go/ 'khor lo sgyur ba drug po 'di dag kyang g.yas brkyang gi zhabs can no/ /zhes pa'i khyad par ni phyogs
262b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o/ /phyogs gnyis po 'di dag la yang ye shes mkha' 'gro dang sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dang de dag gi 'khor rnams kyang seng ge'i steng du gnas pa dang/ rin chen mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rta'i steng du
262b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang/ pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang rma bya'i steng du gnas pa dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang glang po che'i steng du gnas pa dang/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dang de'i 'khor rnams kyang
262b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding gi steng du gnas pa'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa 'di dag ni rdo rje'i skyil dkrung can no/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad po 'di dag phyogs skyong ba brgyad po rnams la g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o//
262b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni phyogs gsum pa'o/ /phyogs 'di rnams dang phyogs gzhan la yang ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang/ zhal gsum phyag drug ma nyid la sogs pa dang/
262b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal lnga phyag brgyad ma nyid la sogs pa dang/ zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis ma nyid la sogs pa dang/ zhal brgyad phyag bcu drug ma nyid la sogs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ra tu spros nas gsungs mod/ /gzhung
262b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bstan no/ /rigs kyi bdag po ni 'khor lo sgyur ba drug po rnams rang rang gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi ste /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni 'khor lo sgyur ba lnga'i 'o/ /de ni ni ye shes mkha' 
263a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'o/ khab? gdon ma la sogs pa rnams kyi ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ ye shes mkha' 'gro'o zhes pa ni kha cig gi'o/ /thugs ka'i sa bon rnams ni ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams kyis
263a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ji lta bar/ baM bad+d+huM? AM h+rAM khaM ngo/ /snying po'i sngags rnams ni/ oM sh+ri ma hA su kha badzra satwa DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM hAM A:hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sh+rI bud+d+ha DA ka a la la la b+h+ruM A:DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bri ratna DA ka traM a:hUM DA ki ni dzA
263a3(rgyud 'grel): la sampa raM tUM phaT swA hA/ oM sh+rI pad+ma DA ki h+ri(rgyud 'grel): DA ki h+ri:DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sh+rI badzra DA ka A:hUM phaT DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sh+rI bi shwa DA ko ho/ kha A:hUM DA ki ni dzA la sam+ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ ces pa'o/ /oM khaM hUM phaT/
263a4(rgyud 'grel): ces pa ni du ma skyes ma'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so// //dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du bsrung pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'o/ /de'i shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi rtsibs rnams la shin tu stobs dang
263a5(rgyud 'grel): rmugs byed dang/ rengs byed dang khengs byed rnams ni ming gzhan ni bgegs mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang gshin rje mthar byed dang/ pad+ma mthar byed rnams so/ /me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la dbyug sngon can dang 'dod pa'i
263a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams so/ /steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ste/ 'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes rgyal po'o/ /de skad duAng bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ slar yang 'khor lo'i rtsigs bcu la ni phyogs dang
263a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya/ zhes pa dang/ dri ma med pa'i 'ong las bsrung ba'i 'khor lo khro bo la sogs pa spro bar bya ste dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bsrung ba'i don du'o zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo 'di
263b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no/ /bsrungs pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas te/ gang yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyi rol tu skye ba'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha' i khams mdza' yas pa ste nad du shes rab kyi chos 'byung
263b2(rgyud 'grel): zur gsum pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pas phyi rol gyi nam mkha' i khams nyid dkyil 'khor la chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzugs su bsgom par bya'o/ /chos 'byung gi dbus su rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i khams dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
263b3(rgyud 'grel): ri rab dang sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang thig le nag po'i gzugs can sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor steng du gnas shing/ phyi rol nas rdo rje'i 'od zer dang/ nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i 'khor yug gis yongs su bskor
263b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o/ /yang na bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni bgegs nye bar zhi ba tsam gyi dogs pa'o zhes bgegs bcom pa'i rjes nas ma bsams shing/ chos 'byung yang ma bsgoms par bsrung ba'i gur gyi nang du nam mkha' la
263b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa'i steng du gnas shing phyi rol nas 'od zer la sogs pa'i 'khor yug rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po'i de'i phyed du gsung
263b6(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo dang/ de'i phyed du thugs kyi 'khor lo dang/ de'i phyed du bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang/ de'i phyed du bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma ljang ku ste/ pad+ma'i sum cha ni lte ba'o/ de'i steng nas steng du gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma la sgra gcan dang
263b7(rgyud 'grel): dus me'i dkyil 'khor g yi ster du yan lag med ba dang drag po gan rgyal du bskyed? pa'i snying kar g.yas brkyang gi gar gyis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ste/ /sku mdog nag po nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang sna
264a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can/ rdo rje'i nor bu dang/ rdo rje'i rna cha dang/ rdo rje'i mgul rgyan dang/ rdo rje'i lag gdub dang/ rdo rje'i ska rags dang/ rdo rje'i rkang gdub dang/ rdo rje 'dir dbyang dang/ rdo rje'i phreng ba dang/ stab?
264a2(rgyud 'grel): gi lpags pa 'phyang ba'i sham thab can zhal bzhi pa spyan bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de yang rtsa pa'i zhal nag po mche ba gtsigs pa drag po/ /g.yas pa dmar po chags pa dang bcas pa/ rgyad ma ser po ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa g.yon pa
264a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhi ba'o/ /dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon kyi mgrin pa gsum ni sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni mgrin pa gsum pa'o/ /g.yas pa'i phrag pa dang po sngon po dang gnyis pa dmar po dang gsum pa dkar po
264a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin du g.yon pa'i yang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o/ /de ltar na phrag pa drug dang/ dpung pa bcu gnyis dang nye ba'i dpung pa nas brtsams te/ phyag dar nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de la g.yas ki dpung pa gnyis sngon po dang gnyis
264a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang gnyis dkar po'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon gyi 'ang ngo/ /de bzhin du phyag bzhi bzhi nag po dang/ bzhi bzhi dmar po dang/ bzhi bzhi dkar po ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa rnams kyi'o/ /phyag re re 'ang ser mo lnga po ste/ de dag re
264a6(rgyud 'grel): re zhing yang tshigs gsum pa'o/ /de'ang mthe bong ser po dang mdzub mo dkar po dang gung mo dmar po dang ming med nag po dang mthe chung ljang gu ste /phyag gi mthil nas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs kyi phred pa dang po nag po/ gnyis pa
264a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ /gsum pa dkar po'o/ /de rnams kyang sor gdub rnams kyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/ g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyi nag po rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang rtse gsum dang/ gri gug dang/ dmar po rnams na me'i mda' dang rdo rje'i lcags
264b1(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang/ DA ma ru dang/ tho ba dang/ dkar po rnaMs na 'khor lo dang/ mdung dang/ dbyug pa dang/ dgra sta rnams so/ /g.yon pa'i nag po rnams na dril bu dang/ phub dang/ kha DwAng+ga kha dbye ba dang/ /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang/ dmar mo rnams na
264b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che dang /pad+ma dkar po dang/ dkar po rnams na dung dang/ me long dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so/ /brla nas brtsams nas dmar po'i mdog can gyi zhabs g.yas
264b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthil dmar pos 'dod pa'i lha dmar po gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhis me tog gi mnga' lnga dang/ gzhu dang / zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i snying kar mnan cing/ brla nas brtsams nas dkar po'i zhabs g.yon pa'i mthil?
264b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i de dag ni dman pa'i bzhin dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'jus pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud pa'i sna tshogs su yum ni g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis gri
264b5(rgyud 'grel): bug dang lcags kyu dang/ Da ma ru dang bgrang phreng rnams dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang zhags pa dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ rin po che rnams 'dzin pa'o/ /'dab ma rnams la shar du nag mo 'bar ma nag mo phyag g.yas ba rnams
264b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'dug spos kyi snod dang tsan dan gyi snod dang gur kui? gyi snod dang/ gla rtsi dang bcas pa'i ga pur gyi snod dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang pad+ma dang lha'i ljon pa'i me tog dang sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /lhor dmar mo
265a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ma dmar mo g.yas pa rnams kyis mar me dang do shal dang cod pan dang lag gdub dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis gos dang ska rags dang rin po che'i rna brgyan dang rkang gdub 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu ser mo? 'bar
265a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ser mo g.yas pa rnams kyis dud dang gling bu dang nor bu dang/ Da ma ru dang g.yon pa rnams kyis pi wang dang rnga zlum dang mkhar rnga dang zangs dung 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du dkar mo g.yas pa rnams kyis 'o ma'i snod dang chu'i snod dang lha'i
265a3(rgyud 'grel): sman dang chang gi snod dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i snod dang grub pa'i bcung kyi snod dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang bza' ba'i snod 'dzin ba'o/ /me la sogs pa rnams su du ba ma dang smig rgyu ma dang mar me ma dang mkha' snad
265a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lha mo rnams te/ rim pa ji lta bar nag mo dang dmar mi dang ser mo dang dkar mo'i mdog can phyag brgyad kyis rang dang gi mdog can gyi rnga yab brgyad 'dzin pa'o/ /de dag gi rgyab kyi phyi rol tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang chos kyi
265a5(rgyud 'grel): gaN+Di dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang chos kyi dud rnams te nag po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po'o/ /nag po 'bar ma la sogs brgyad ni mnyam pa'i rkang stabs kyis gnas pa'i/ /sna tshogs yum la sogs pa'i lha
265a6(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag brgyad ma zhal bzhi ma spyan bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de yang shar lho dang nub byang gi rim pas sna tshogs yum gyi zhal rnams ni ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po ste/ de bzhin
265a7(rgyud 'grel): du lha mo ser mo dag gi'ang ngo/ /nag mo ngag gi ni nag mo dang ser po dang dkar po'o/ /dmar mo dag gi ni dmar mo dang ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'o// dkar mo dag gi ni dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po dang ser po'o//
265b1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag gi lha mo rnams ni zhal gsum pa spyan dgu pa phyag drug pa rnams so/ de yang phyogs rnams la shar du don yod grub pa nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i/ zhal can g.yas ba rnams kyis
265b2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang gri gug dang rtse gsum dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis phug dang thod pa dang/ kha TwAng+ga 'dzin pa spyan mas 'khyad pa'o/ lhor rin chen 'byung ldan dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can g.yas pa rnams kyis
265b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mda' dang lcags kyu dang/ Da ma ru dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang zhags pa dang/ rin po che cha dgu pa 'dzin pa mA mi kIs? 'khyud pa'o/ /nub tu rnam par snang mdzad ser po ser mo dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal can/ g.yas
265b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dbyug pa dang mi 'jigs pa mdzad pas rdo rje dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis dung dang rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang dril bu 'dzin pas sgrol ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /byang du snang ba mdza' yas dkar po dkar po dang
265b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can/ g.yas pa rnams kyi tho ba dang mdung dang rtse gsum dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyi pad+ma dkar po dang me long dang bgrad 'phreng 'dzin pa/ gos dkar mos mkhyud pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di rnams ni chu skyes dkar po
265b6(rgyud 'grel): dang nyi ma la gnas pa ral ba'i thor cog can te/ zhal rnams ni rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i rim pas so/ /me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan rnams su pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba la sgrol ma dang ? dkar ma dang spyan
265b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dang mA ma kI rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du don yod grub pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang rtag pa dang snang ba mdza' yas dang mtshungs pa ste rnam? par snang mdzad snang ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ rin chen
266a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan rnams dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /yang na sgrol ma'i kha TwAng+ga'i gnas su utpal te/ gzhog brgyad du ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyad do/ /rim pa gsum pa'i snam bu la shar sgo'i g.yon
266a2(rgyud 'grel): ngos su kun tu bzang po sngon po g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang gri gug dang dgra ste/ g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang thod pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo pa 'dzin g.yang na tshangs pa'i mgo'i gnas su utpal ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma
266a3(rgyud 'grel): dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /g.yas su nam mkha' i snying po don yod grub pa lta bu la dra? rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o/ lho sge'i g.yon du phyag na rdo rje ljang gu g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang gri gug dang sgra ste/ g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang thod pa dang
266a4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa sgra rdo rje sems 'khyud pa'o/ g.yas su sa'i snying po rin chen snying po'i rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu gzugs rdo rje ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /nub sgo'i g.yon du chos kyi dbyings gyi rdo rje ma phyag na rdo rje lta
266a5(rgyud 'grel): bu la kun tu bzang pos 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas su sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnam par snang mdzad lta bu rag bya rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o/ /byang sgo'i g.yon du sgra rdo rje ma kun tu bzang po lta bu la phyag na rdo rjes 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas su
266a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug snang ba mdza' yas lta bu la rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'o/ /mer reg? bya rdo rje ma sgrol ma lta bu la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /bral na bral du ro rdo rje ma gos dkar mo lta bu la 'jig rten
266a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gis 'khyud pa'o/ rlung d+hu'i? rdo rje ma? spyan ma lta bu la nam mkha' i snying pos 'khyud pa'o/ dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje mA ma kI lta bu la sa'i snying pos 'khyud pa'o/ /'dir don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
266b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs pa ste/ sgrol ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnamS ni pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /sgo rnams la khro bo shin tu stobs don yod grub pa lta bu la rengs byed mas yang dag
266b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'khyud pa ste/ de'ang spyan ma lta bu'o/ /lhor rmug byed rin chen dbang po lta bu la/ khengs byed mas snyoms par zhugs ba ste/ de yang mA ma kI lta bu'o/ /nub tu dangs? byed rnam par snang mdzad lta bu la shin tu lto? bsams 'khyud pa ste de yang
266b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol lam lta bu'o/ /byang du khengs byed 'od dpag med lta bu la rmugs byed mas yang dag par 'khyud pa ste de yang gos dkar mo lta bu'o/ /'on kyang khro bo'i 'di rnams kyi g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa ste khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni g.yon brkyang
266b4(rgyud 'grel): gis gnas pa'o/ /'dir lha mo rnams kyi gdan ni pad+ma dkar po 'od? nyi ma rnams te/ lha mo rnams kyi gdan ni pad+ma dmar po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams so/ /yang na nag po dang dkar po dang ljang ku rnams la zla ba la gnas ba dang dmar po dang
266b5(rgyud 'grel): ser po rnams dang kun tu bzang po dang sgra rdo rje ma ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ste/ de dag gi rigs pa yang/ dri ma med pa'i 'od las gsungs pa'o/ /'dir gang gis gnas su lha rnaMs gang gsu sdang? de ni de'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'khor lo'i
